4.8: Bualu bakatentekela ne bakamona ne kanyinganyinga kakola ne bantu ba mu ekelezia bakabanga kudibandisha mu diditambisha ku mesu abu, ne kuteka mitshima yabu ku mabanji abu ne ku bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba, ne bakabanga kulua babuidianganyi, muntu kudi mukuabu, ne bakabanga kukengesha bavua kabayi bitabuja bilondeshila disua ne disanka biabu nkayabu.
4.9: Ne nanku, mu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, kuakabanga makokangana munkatshi mua bantu ba mu ekelezia; eyowa, kuvua malakana, ne luntûta, ne budimu, ne dikengeshangana, ne diditambisha, mena kupita diditambisha dia bavua kabayi ba mu ekelezia wa Nzambi to.
4.10: Ne tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi tshiakajika nanku; ne bubi bua mu ekelezia buvua dibua dia kulendukila dinena bua bavua kabayi ba mu ekelezia to; ne nanku ekelezia wakabanga kupanga mu dikola dienda.
4.11: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia tshitema, Alama wakamona bubi bua ekelezia, ne wakamona ne tshilejilu tshia ekelezia tshiakabanga kusaka bavua kabayi ne ditabuja kudienza bubi bumua kunyima kua bukuabu, nanku bituala dibutuka dia bantu.
4.12: Eyowa, wakamona dishilangana munkatshi mua bantu, bamua badibandisha mu diditambisha, bapetula bakuabu, bakudimuna nyima yabu kudi bakengi ne bavua butaka ne bavua ne nzala, ne bavua ne nyota, ne bavua babêdi ne batatshishibua.
4.13: Mpindiewu etshi tshivua tshiena bualu tshia miadi ivua munkatshi mua bantu, pavua bakuabu badipuekesha, bambuluishi bavua ne dijinga dia diambuluisha diabu, bu mudi kuabanyinangana kua bintu biabu kudi bapela ne bakengi, kudîsha bavua ne nzala, ne bakenga ne mishindu yonsu ya ntatu, bua bualu bua Kilisto, walua bilondeshila nyuma wa buprofete;
4.14: Bavua bindila dituku adi, ne nanku bakalama dilekedibua dia mibi yabu; ne bavua buwujibua ntenta ne disanka bua dibîka dia bafua, bilondeshila ku disua ne bukola bia Yezu Kilisto ne dipatuisha dienda mu mionji ya lufu.
4.15: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne Alama, bualu uvua mumona ntatu ya balondi badipuekeshi ba Nzambi, ne makengeshibua avua mabafuisha nawu kudi tshishadila tshia bantu benda, ne bualu uvua mumona dishilangana diabu dionsu, wakabanga kuikala ne kanyinganyinga kakola; nansha nanku Nyuma wa Mukalenga kakamulekelela to.
4.16: Ne wakasungula muntu wa lungenyi uvua munkatshi mua bakulu ba mu ekelezia, ne wakamupesha bukôkeshi bilondeshila ku dîyi dia bantu, bua ikala ne bukôkeshi bua kuela mikenji bilondeshila ku mikenji ivua mipeshibua, ne kuyilondeshisha bilondeshila ku bubi ne mibi bia bantu.
4.17: Mpindiewu dîna dia muntu ewu divua Nefiha, ne bavua bamusungula bu mulumbuluishi munena; ne wakasomba pa nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu bua kulumbuluisha ne kulombola bantu.
4.18: Mpindiewu Alama kakamupesha mudimu wa kuikala muakuidi munena ku mutu kua ekelezia to, kadi wakalama mudimu wa muakuidi munena buenda nkayenda; kadi wakafila nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu kudi Nefiha.
4.19: Ne wakenza nanku bua kuyayi nkayenda munkatshi mua bantu benda, anyi munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, bua kubayishaye dîyi dia Nzambi, bua kubasonsolaye ku divuluka dia bujitu buabu, ne bua kupûtaye panshi, ku dîyi dia Nzambi, diditambisha ne dikazamuka dionsu ne makokangana onsu bivua munkatshi mua bantu benda, bualu kavua mumona mushindu nansha umua wa kubangatulula to pa kumbusha amu bua kubajadikila patoka bubi buabu.
4.20: Ne nanku ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, Alama wakafila nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu kudi Nefiha, ne wakadifila yonsu ku buakuidi bunena bua mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, ku dijadiki dia dîyi, bilondeshila ku nyuma wa dibuluila ne buprofete.

5.intro: Mêyi akambila Alama, muakuidi munena bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, bantu mu bimenga biabu ne misoku mu bulaba bonsu.
5.1: Mpindiewu biakalua ne Alama wakabanga kuambila bantu dîyi dia Nzambi, diambedi mu bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne kumbuka aku mu bulaba bonsu.
5.2: Ne â mêyi akakulaye kudi bantu mu ekelezia uvua mushikikibua mu tshimenga tshia Zalahemela, bilondeshila ku miandiku yenda nkayenda, wamba:
5.3: Mema, Alama, muikala mujididibua kudi tatuanyi, Alama, bua kuikala muakuidi munena ku mutu kua ekelezia wa Nzambi, yeya muikala ne bukola ne bukôkeshi bufuma kudi Nzambi bua kuenza bintu ebi, monayi, ndi nnuambila wakabanga kuteka kushikika ekelezia mu bulaba buvua mu mikalu ya Nefi; eyowa, bulaba buvua bubikidibua ne bulaba bua Molomo; eyowa, ne wakatambuisha bana babu mu mâyi a Molomo.
5.4: Ne monayi, ndi nnuambila, bakapatuishibua mu bianza bia bantu ba mfumu Noa, kudi lusa ne bukola bia Nzambi.
5.5: Ne monayi, kunyima kua abi, bakabatuala mu bupika mu tshipela ku bianza bia Bena Lamana; eyowa, ndi nnuambila, bavua mu bukuatshibu, ne Mukalenga wakabapatuisha kabidi mu bupika ku bukola bua dîyi dienda; ne tuakafikishibua ku bulaba ebu, ne apa tuakabanga kushikika ekelezia wa Nzambi mu bulaba bonsu ebu.
5.6: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nnuambila, bana betu, nuenu badi mu ekelezia ewu, nudi balama bimpa mu divuluka dienu dikuatshibua dia batatuenu anyi? Eyowa, ne nudi balama bimpa mu divuluka dienu lusa luenda ne bulekelelu buenda kudibu anyi? Ne menamena kabidi, nudi balama bimpa mu divuluka dienu ne wakapatuisha anyima yabu mu ngena anyi?
5.7: Monayi, wakakudimuna mitshima yabu; eyowa, wakababîsha ku tulu tukola, ne bakabîka kudi Nzambi. Monayi, bavua munkatshi mua mîdima; nansha nanku, anyima yabu ivua mikenkeshibua kudi muinda wa dîyi dia kashidi; eyowa, mionji ya lufu ne nkanu ya ngena bivua bibanyungulula, ne dinyanguka dia kashidi divua dibindila.
5.8: Ne mpindiewu ndi nuebeja, bana betu, bakabutuka anyi? Monayi, ndi nnuambila, To, kabakabutudibua to.
5.9: Ne ndi nuebeja kabidi, mionji ya lufu yakakoshibua anyi, ne nkanu ya ngena ivua mibanyungulula, yakasuluka anyi? Ndi nnuambila, Eyowa, yakasuluka, ne mioyo yabu yakakola, ne bakimba dinanga dia disungila. Ne ndi nnuambila ne bakapandishibua.
5.10: Ne mpindiewu ndi nuebeja ne tshinganyi tshivuabu bakengedibua kuenza bua bobu kupandishibua? Eyowa, bua tshinyi bavua ne tshia kutekemena bua lupandu? Tshiena bualu tshia kusuludibua kuabu ku mionji ya lufu, eyowa, ne nkanu ya ngena tshivua tshinyi?
5.11: Monayi, ndi mua kunuambila—tatuanyi Alama ka kitabuja mêyi akafidibua ku mukana mua Abinadi anyi? Ne kavua muprofete munsantu anyi? Kakakula mêyi a Nzambi, ne tatuanyi Alama kakayitabuja anyi?
5.12: Ne dishintuluka dikola diakenzeka mu mutshima wenda bilondeshila ditabuja dienda. Monayi ndi nnuambila ne bionsu ebi bidi bilelela.
5.13: Ne monayi, wakayisha dîyi kudi batatuetu, ne dishintuluka dikola diakenzeka mu mitshima yabu, ne bakadipuekesha ne bakeyemena Nzambi mulelela ne wa moyo. Ne monayi, bavua ne lulamatu tô ne ku nshikidilu; bua nanku bakapandishibua.
5.14: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nuebeja, bana betu ba mu ekelezia, nudi baledibua mu nyuma kudi Nzambi anyi? Nuangatshi tshimfuanyi tshienda pa mpala yenu anyi? Numvu dishintuluka edi mu mitshima yenu anyi?
5.15: Nudi nuenzela ditabuja ku disungila dia wakanufuka anyi? Nudi nutekemena ne disu dia ditabuja, ne numona mubidi wa tshifuaka ewu ujudishibua mu mubidi udi kawuyi ufua, ne mubidi wa dibola ewu ujudishibua mu mubidi udi kawuyi ubola, bua kuimana kumpala kua Nzambi bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi bivua bienjibua mu mubidi wa tshifuaka anyi?
5.16: Ndi nnuambila, nudi mua kudielela meji ne nudi numvua dîyi dia Mukalenga, dinuambila, mu dituku adi: Luayi kundi nuenu badi babeneshibua, bualu monayi, bienzedi bienu bivua bienzedi bia buakana pa mutu pa mpala wa buloba?
5.17: Anyi nudi nudielela meji ne nudi mua kushima Mukalenga mu dituku adi, ne nuamba—Mukalenga, bienzedi bietu bivua bienzedi biakana pa mpala wa buloba—ne neanupandisha?
5.18: Anyi mushindu mukuabu, nudi mua kudielela meji bimanyishibua kumpala kua tubadi tua Nzambi ne anyima yenu miwujibua ne dipîla ne kanyinganyinga, bua divuluka dia dipîla dienu, eyowa, divuluka dijima dia bubi buenu bonsu, eyowa, divuluka ne nuvua bela mikenji ya Nzambi mpata?
5.19: Ndi nnuambila, nudi mua kutangila kudi Nzambi dituku adi ne mutshima mukezuka ne bianza bitoka? Ndi nnuambila, nudi mua kutangila, bikala ne tshimfuanyi tshia Nzambi tshikanunyibua pa mpala yenu anyi?
5.20: Ndi nnuambila, nudi mua kupandishibua panudi badifila bua kulua bakôkedi ba diabulu anyi?
5.21: Ndi nnuambila ne, dituku adi nenumanya ne kanuena mua kupandishibua to; bualu kakuena muntu udi mua kupandishibua to pa kumbusha bilamba bienda bisukudibua ne bilua bitoka; eyowa, bilamba bienda bidi ne tshia kukezudibua tô ne patokeshibuabi ku ditoba dionsu, kupitshila ku mashi a uvua batatuetu bakula buenda, walua kusungila bantu benda ku mibi yabu.
5.22: Ne mpindiewu ndi nnuebeja, bana betu, munyi muadiumvua umua yonsu wa kunudi, bu yeya bua kuimana ku tshilumbuluidi tshia Nzambi, ne bilamba bienda bikala ne matoba a mashi ne bukoya bua mushindu yonsu? Monayi, bintu ebi bijadika tshinyi bua kunufunda?
5.23: Monayi kabiakujadika ne nudi bashibeyanganyi, eyowa, ne kabidi nudi bapîla ku bubi bua mushindu yonsu anyi?
5.24: Monayi, bana betu, nudi nuela meji ne muntu wa mushindu awu udi ne muaba bua kusomba mu bukalenga bua Nzambi, ne Abalahama, ne Isaka, ne Yakoba, kabidi ne baprofete bansantu bonsu, bena bilamba bidi bitokesha ne bikala kabiyi ditoba, bikezuka ne bitoka anyi?
5.25: Ndi nnuambila, To; pa kumbusha nuenu nuamba ne Mufuki wetu udi muena mafi kumbukila ku mbangilu, kanuena mua kuela meji ne muntu wa mushindu awu udi mua kupeta muaba mu bukalenga bua mu diûlu; kadi nebipatshibua bualu badi bana ba bukalenga bua diabulu.
5.26: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nnuambila, bana betu, bu nuenu bumvua dishintuluka dia mutshima, ne bu nuenu bumvua mua kuimba musambu wa dinanga dia disungila, ndi nuebeja, nudi mua kumvua nanku mpindiewu anyi?
5.27: Nudi benda, badilama kakuyi kadiû kumpala kua Nzambi? Bu nuenu bua kufua diba edi, nudi mua kuamba, munda muenu, ne nuvua badipuekesha bikumbana anyi? Ne bilamba bienu bisukudibua ne bitokeshibua kupitshila ku mashi a Kilisto, walua bua kusungila bantu benda ku mibi yabu.
5.28: Monayi, nudi bavûla diditambisha anyi? Ndi nnuambila, bu nuenu kanuyi balekela to kanuena badilongolola bua kusambakena ne Nzambi to. Monayi, nudi ne tshia kudilongolola lukasa; bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu budi pabuipi katataka, ne yonsu udi kayi mudilongolola kakupeta moyo wa tshiendelela to.
5.29: Monayi, ndi ngamba, kudi umua munkatshi muenu udi kayi muvûla dialakana anyi? Ndi nnuambila ne muntu wa mushindu awu kena mudilongolola to; ne ndi musua ne adilongolola lukasa, bualu diba didi pabuipi katataka, ne kena mumanya pâfika diba; bualu wa nanku kena usanganyibua mupanga dipîla to.
5.30: Ne kabidi ndi nnuambila, kudi umua munkatshi muenu udi useka muanabu wa baluma, anyi udi umufuisha ne makengeshibua anyi?
5.31: Diakabi kudi muntu awu, bualu kena mudilongolola to, ne diba didi pabuipi bua yeya kukudimuna mutshima anyi kena mua kupandishibua to!
5.32: Eyowa, diakabi mena kudi bonsu badi benji ba malu mabi; kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima, bualu Mukalenga Nzambi uvua muamba nanku!
5.33: Monayi, udi utuma dîyi ubikila bantu bonsu, bualu maboku a lusa adi mabôluela, ne udi wamba: Kudimunayi mutshima, ne nenuitaba.
5.34: Eyowa, udi wamba: Luayi kundi ne nudia tshimuma tshia mutshi wa moyo; eyowa, nenudia ne nenunua diampa ne mâyi bia moyo tshianana;
5.35: Eyowa, luayi kundi ne kuamayi bienzedi bia buakana, ne kanuakupudibua ne kuedibua mu kapia to—
5.36: Bualu monayi, diba didi pabuipi bua ewu yonsu udi kayi ukuama bimuma bimpa to, anyi ewu yonsu udi kayi wenza bienzedi bia buakana to, yeya udi ne tshia kudilakana ne kudila muadi.
5.37: Ô nuenu benji ba malu mabi; nuenu badi buwulakana ne diditambisha bua bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba, nuenu badi bamba ne nudi bamanya njila ya buakana kadi nudi bapambuka, bu mikoku idi kayiyi ne mulami wa mikoku, nansha muvua mulami wa mikoku munubikila ne utshidi unubikila, kadi nudi nubenga nuteleja dîyi dienda!
5.38: Monayi, ndi nnuambila, ne mulami wa mikoko muimpa udi unubikila; eyowa, ne udi unubikila mu dîna dienda nkayenda, didi dîna dia Kilisto; ne binuabenga kuteleja dîyi dia mulami wa mikoko muimpa, dîyi dinudi nubikidibua, monayi, kanuena mikoko ya mulami wa mikoko muimpa to.
5.39: Ne mpindiewu bu munudi kanuyi mikoko ya mulami wa mikoko muimpa to, nudi ba ku tshisumbu tshia mikoko kayi? Monayi, ndi nnuambila, ne diabulu udi mulami wa mikoko wenu, ne nudi ba ku tshisumbu tshia mikoko tshienda; ne mpindiewu, nganyi udi mua kuvila etshi? Monayi, ndi nnuambila, ewu yonsu udi uvila etshi udi muena mafi ne muana wa diabulu.
5.40: Bualu ndi nnuambila ne etshi tshionsu tshidi tshimpa tshidi tshifuma kudi Nzambi, ne tshionsu tshidi tshibi tshidi tshifuma kudi diabulu.
5.41: Bua nanku, padi muntu ukuama bienzedi bimpa udi uteleja dîyi dia mulami wa mikoku muimpa, ne udi umulonda; kadi ewu yonsu udi ukuama bienzedi bibi, yeya udi ulua muana wa diabulu, bualu udi uteleja dîyi dienda, ne udi umulonda.
5.42: Ne ewu yonsu udi wenza nanku udi upeta difutu dienda dia kudiye; bua nanku, udi upeta lufu bu difutu dienda, bilondeshila malu a buakana, muikala mufua mu bienzedi bimpa bionsu.
5.43: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, ndi musua ne nunteleja, bualu ndi ngakula ne bukola bua anyima wanyi; bualu monayi, ndi nnuambila patoka ne kanuena mua kupambuka to, anyi ndi muakula bilondeshila ku mikenji ya Nzambi.
5.44: Bualu ndi mubikidibua bua kuakula mu mushindu ewu, bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, udi mu Kilisto Yezu; eyowa, ndi mupeshibua mukenji wa kuimana ne kujadika kudi bantu aba malu avua mamba kudi batatuetu bitangila malu adi alua.
5.45: Ne ebi kabiena bionsu to. Nudi nuela meji ne ndi mumanya bintu ebi bionsu nkayanyi anyi? Monayi, ndi nnujadikila ne, ndi mumanya ne bintu ebi bimvua munuambila bidi bilelela. Ne munyi munudi nuela meji ne ndi mumanya bulelela buabi?
5.46: Monayi, ndi nnuambila ne bivua bimanyisha kudi Nyuma wa Tshijila wa Nzambi. Monayi, mvua mujila ne musambila matuku a bungi bua kumanya nkayanyi bintu ebi. Ne mpindiewu ndi mudimanyina ne bidi bilelela; bualu Mukalenga Nzambi uvua mubindeja ku Nyuma wa Tshijila; ne etshi tshidi nyuma wa dibuluila udi munda muanyi.
5.47: Ne menamena kabidi, ndi nnuambila ne mbimbuluibua nanku, ne mêyi avua batatuetu bakula avua malelela, mena bilondeshila nyuma wa buprofete uvua munda muanyi, udi ulua kabidi bu dimueneka dia Nyuma wa Nzambi.
5.48: Ndi nnuambila, ne ndi mumanya nkayanyi ne tshionsu tshinganuambila, bitangila bintu bidi bilua, ntshilelela; ne ndi nnuambila, ne ndi mumanya ne Yezu Kilisto nealua, eyowa, Muana, Umuepela Mulela wa Tatu, muwula ne ngâsa, ne lusa, ne bulelela. Ne monayi, yeya ki udi ulua bua kumbusha mibi ya ba pa buloba, eyowa, mibi ya muntu yonsu udi witabuja mu dîna dienda ne disuminyina.
5.49: Ne mpindiewu ndi nnuambila ne etshi tshidi dilongolola dindi mubikidibua, eyowa, wa kuyisha kudi bana betu bananga, eyowa, ne kudi muntu yonsu udi usomba mu bulaba; eyowa, bua kuyisha kudi bonsu, bakola ne bana, bapika ne badikadila; eyowa, ndi nnuambila ne kudi babandila ku bidimu, ne kabidi badi ne bidimu bia munkatshi-nkatshi, ne bena lukongu lua bantu luvua lulua; eyowa, bua kubila kudibu bua bakudimuna mutshima ne baledibua tshia kabidi.
5.50: Eyowa, Nyuma udi wamba nanku: Kudimunayi mutshima, nuenu bonsu ndekelu ya buloba, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu bukadi pabuipi; eyowa, Muana wa Nzambi udi ulua ne butumbi buenda, ne bukitu buenda, ne bunena buenda, ne bukola buenda, ne bukalenga buenda. Eyowa, bana betu bananga, ndi nnuambila, ne Nyuma wakangambila: Monayi butumbi bua Mukalenga wa buloba bonsu; ne kabidi Mukalenga wa diûlu nealua katataka menamena ukenka munkatshi mua bana ba bantu.
5.51: Ne Nyuma wakangambila kabidi, eyowa, wakabila kundi ne dîyi dia bukitu, wamba: Ndâku ne wambila bantu aba—Kudimunayi mutshima, bualu pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima kanuena mua kupiana bukalenga bua mu diûlu to nansha bishi.
5.52: Ne kabidi ndi nnuambila, Nyuma udi wamba ne: Monayi, tshisuyi kadi kateka ku muji wa mutshi; bua nanku mutshi yonsu udi kawuyi ukuama bimuma bimpa neupudibua ne wedibua mu kapia, eyowa, kapia kadi kakayi mua kujika to, nansha kapia kadi kakayi kajima to. Monayi, ne vulukayi, Wa Tshijila wakamba nanku.
5.53: Ne mpindiewu bana betu bananga, ndi nnuambila, nudi mua kukolela ku mêyi â; eyowa, nudi mua kuteka bintu ebi ku luseka, ne kudiata Wa Tshijila mu makasa enu; eyowa, nudi mua kuikala buwulakana mu diditambisha dia mitshima yenu; eyowa, nenutungunuka mu divuala dia bilamba bia mushinga mukola ne kuteka kua mitshima yenu ku bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba, pa mabanji enu anyi?
5.54: Eyowa, nenutungunuka mu diela dia meji ne nudi balengela kupita bakuabu anyi? Eyowa, nenutungunuka mu dikengesha dia bana benu, badi badipuekesha ne benda mu mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, budi njila wakabuelelabu mu ekelezia, bikala bajididibua kudi Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne badi bakuama bienzedi bidi bikumbanyina dikudimuna dia mutshima—
5.55: Eyowa, ne nenutungunuka mu diela dia bapela nyima yenu, ne bakengi, ne kubapala bintu bienu anyi?
5.56: Ne bua kujikija, nuenu bonsu badi batungunuka mu bubi buenu, ndi nnuambila ne badi aba bupudibua ne bedibua mu kapia pa kumbusha bakudimuna mutshima lukasa.
5.57: Ne mpindiewu ndi nnuambila, nuenu bonsu badi ne dijinga dia kulonda dîyi dia mulami wa mikoku muimpa, umbukayi kudi muntu mubi, ne tapulukanganayi nenda, ne kanulengi bintu bia bukoya to; ne monayi, mêna abu neakupudibua, bualu mêna a bantu babi ka akuikala munkatshi mua mêna a bakana to, bua dîyi dia Nzambi dikumbajibua, divua diamba ne: Mêna a bantu babi ka akusangishibua ne mêna a bantu banyi to;
5.58: Bualu mêna a bakana neafundibua mu mukanda wa moyo, ne nembapesha bupianyi ku diboku dianyi dia baluma. Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, nudi nuamba tshinyi bua etshi? Ndi nnuambila, bu nuenu ne mpata buatshi, kakuena bualu to, bualu dîyi dia Nzambi didi ne tshia kukumbajibua.
5.59: Bualu mulami wa mikoko kayi udi munkatshi muenu udi muikala ne mikoko ya bungi udi kayi uyitangila, bua ne mibuabua kayibuedimu ne ikusula tshisumbu tshia mikoko yenda to? Ne monayi, bu mubuabua mubuela mu tshisumbu tshia mikoko yenda, kakuwipata anyi? Eyowa, ne bua kujikija, bu yeya mua kukumbana, neawushipa.
5.60: Ne mpindiewu ndi nnuambila ne mulami wa mikoko muimpa udi unubikila; ne binuateleja dîyi dienda neanubueja mu tshikumbi tshienda, ne nudi mikoko yenda; ne mmunupesha mukenji ne kanulekedi mubuabua wa lonji ubuela munkatshi muenu to, bua kanulu kubutuka.
5.61: Ne mpindiewu mema, Alama, ndi nupesha mukenji mu muakulu wa ewu udi mumpesha mukenji, bua ne nudienzeja bua kukumbaja mêyi amvua munuambila.
5.62: Ndi nupesha mukenji wa kubuela mu ekelezia; ne ndi mbikila bonsu badi kabayi mu ekelezia to, ngamba ne: Luayi ne nutambuishibua bua kukudimuna mitshima, bua nudia kabidi tshimuma tshia mutshi wa moyo.

6.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kunyima kua Alama mujikija kuakula kudi bantu ba mu ekelezia, uvua mushikikibua mu tshimenga tshia Zalahemela, wakajidila bakuidi ne bakulu, ku dibatenteka dia bianza bienda bilondeshila ku mulongu wa Nzambi, bua kusomba ku mutu ne kutangila ekelezia.
6.2: Ne bonsu bavua kabayi mu ekelezia to bavua bakudimuna mutshima bua mibi yabu bakatambuishibua dikudimuna dia mutshima, ne bakabakidila mu ekelezia.
6.3: Ne biakalua kabidi ne bonsu bavua mu ekelezia bavua kabayi bakudimuna mutshima bua bubi buabu to ne bavua kabayi badipuekesha kumpala kua Nzambi to—ndi musua kuamba ne bakadibandisha mu diditambisha mu mitshima yabu—bobu abu bakabipata, ne mêna abu akakupudibua, bua ne mêna abu ka’akabadibua munkatshi mua a bakana to.
6.4: Ne nanku bakabanga kushikika bulongolodi bua ekelezia mu tshimenga tshia Zalahemela.
6.5: Mpindiewu ndi musua ne numvua ne dîyi dia Nzambi divuaku bua bantu bonsu tshianana, ne muntu nansha umua kavua mubengela diakalengela dia kudisangisha pamua bua kuteleja dîyi dia Nzambi to.
6.6: Nansha nanku bana ba Nzambi bavua bapeshibua mukenji ne badikunguija pamua misangu mivula, ne badisangisha mu dijila ne disambila dia bukitu bua diakalengela dia anyima ya bavua kabayi bamanya Nzambi to.
6.7: Ne mpindiewu pakateka Alama mikandu eyi, wakabashiya, eyowa, wakashiya ekelezia uvua mu tshimenga tshia Zalahemela, ne wakasabuka ku esete kua musulu wa Sidona, kuyayi mu tshibanda tshia Gideona, muvua tshimenga tshiasa, tshivua tshibikidibua ne tshimenga tshia Gideona, tshivua mu tshibanda tshivua tshibikidibua ne Gideona, tshivua tshinyikila muntu uvua Neholo mushipa ku muela wa mvita ku tshianza tshienda.
6.8: Ne Alama wakaya ne wakabanga kuyisha dîyi dia Nzambi mu ekelezia uvuabu bashikika mu tshibanda tshia Gideona, bilondeshila ku dibuluila dia bulelela dia dîyi divua batatuenda bakula, ne bilondeshila ku nyuma wa buprofete uvua muenda, bilondeshila ku bujadiki bua Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, walua kusungila bantu benda ku mibi yabu, ne ku mulongu wa tshijila kuvuaye mubikidibua. Ne nanku mmudibi bifundibua. Amena.

7.intro: Mêyi akambila Alama bantu ba Gideona, bilondeshila ku miandiku yenda.
7.1: Monayi bana betu bananga, bu mudi Mukalenga muanyisha bua ne ndua kunudi, bua nanku ndi ngidikija kuakula kunudi mu tshiakuidi tshianyi; eyowa, ku mukana muanyi, bu muditshi musangu wa kumpala undi ngakula kunudi ne mêyi a mukana muanyi, bualu mvua mudifila yonsu ku nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu, ne ntshivua mua kulua kunudi to bualu mvua ne mudimu wa bungi.
7.2: Ne mena ntshivua mua kulua mpindiewu diba edi, bikala nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu kavua mupeshibua kudi muntu mukuabu bua akôkesha pa muaba wanyi to; ne Mukalenga mu lusa lua bungi uvua muanyisha ne ndua kunudi.
7.3: Ne monayi, ndi mulua muikala ne ditekemena dinena ne dijinga dikola bua nsangana ne nudi badipuekesha kumpala kua Nzambi, ne nudi batungunuka mu dilomba dia ngâsa wenda, bua nsangana ne kanuena ne kadiwu kumpala kuenda to, bua nsangana ne kanuena ne lutatu lutamba bubi luvua nâlu bana betu ba mu Zalahemela.
7.4: Kadi dibeneshibua dikala dîna dia Nzambi, bualu uvua mumpesha bua kumanya, eyowa, uvua mumpesha disanka dipita bunena dia kumanya ne badi bashikikibua kabidi mu njila wa buakana buenda.
7.5: Ne ndi ntekemena, bilondeshila ku Nyuma wa Nzambi udi munda muanyi, ne nempeta kabidi disanka buenu; nansha nanku ntshiena njinga ne disanka dianyi buenu diluila bua bualu bua ntatu ne kanyinganyinga bia bungi bingakapeta bua bana betu ba mu Zalahemela to, bualu monayi, disanka dianyi buabu didi dilua kunyima kua kupututuka mu ntatu ne kanyinganyinga bia bungi.
7.6: Kadi monayi, ndi mutekemena ne kanuena mu ngikadilu wa kupanga ditabuja bikola bu muvua bana benu to; ndi ntekemena ne kanuena badibandisha mu diditambisha mu mitshima yenu to; eyowa, ndi mutekemena ne kanuena bateka mitshima yenu ku mabanji ne bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba to; eyowa, ndi mutekemena ne kanuena nutendelela mpingu to, kadi ne nudi nutendelela Nzambi mulelela ne wa moyo, ne nudi batangila ku mpala dilekedibua dia mibi yenu, ne ditabuja dia kashidi.
7.7: Bualu monayi, ndi nnuambila ne kudi bintu bia bungi bitshilualua; ne monayi, kudi tshintu tshimua tshidi ne mushinga kupita bikuabu bionsu—bualu monayi, diba kadiena kula menamena to dikala Musungidi ne moyo ne dialuaye munkatshi mua bantu benda.
7.8: Monayi, ntshiena ngamba ne nealua munkatshi muetu diba dikalaye mu tshitanda tshienda tshia tshifuaka to; bualu monayi, Nyuma kena mungambila ne nebikala nanku to. Mpindiewu ntshiena mubumanya bitangila bualu ebu to; kadi ndi mumanya ne, Mukalenga Nzambi udi ne bukola bua kuenza bintu bionsu bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda.
7.9: Kadi monayi, Nyuma uvua mungambila nanku: Bila kudi bantu aba, wamba ne: Kudimunayi mitshima, ne longololayi njila wa Mukalenga, ne endayi mu njila yenda, idi milulama; bualu monayi, bukalenga bua mu diûlu bukadi pabuipi, ne Muana wa Nzambi udi ulua pa mpala wa buloba.
7.10: Ne monayi, nealedibua kudi Maliya, mu Yelushalema udi muikala bulaba bua bankambua betu, yeya muikala kamama, lupanza lua mushinga mukola ne lusungula, wabuikidibua bu ne divuba ne wimita ku bukola bua Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne walela muana wa baluma, eyowa, Muana wa Nzambi.
7.11: Ne neaya, ukenga makenga a mubidi ne ntatu ne matêtshibua a mushindu yonsu; ne ebi nanku bua dîyi divua diamba ne neambula makenga a mubidi ne mabêdi a bantu benda dikumbana.
7.12: Ne neitaba lufu, bua kusululaye mionji ya lufu, idi misuika bantu benda; ne neangata mateketa abu, bua munda muenda muwujibua ne lusa, bilondeshila ku musunyi, bua amanya bilondeshila ku musunyi mushindu wa kuambuluisha bantu benda bilondeshila ku mateketa abu.
7.13: Mpindiewu Nyuma udi mumanya bintu bionsu; nansha nanku Muana wa Nzambi udi ukenga bilondeshila ku musunyi bua ne ambula mibi ya bantu benda, bua ne akupula disambuka dia mikenji diabu bilondeshila ku bukola bua dipatuisha dienda; ne mpindiewu monayi, etshi ki bujadiki budi munda muanyi.
7.14: Mpindiewu ndi nnuambila ne nudi ne tshia kukudimuna mutshima ne kuledibua tshia kabidi; bualu Nyuma udi wamba ne binuikala kanuyi baledibua tshia kabidi to kanuena mua kupiana bukalenga bua mu diûlu to; bua nanku luayi bua nutambula bua dikudimuna dia mutshima, bua nusukudibua ku mibi yenu, bua nuikala ne ditabuja kudi Muana wa Mukoku wa Nzambi, udi umbusha mibi ya ba pa buloba, udi ne bukola bua kupandisha ne kulengeja dipanga buakana dionsu.
7.15: Eyowa, ndi nnuambila ne luayi ne kanutshinyi to, ne elayi mibi yonsu ku luseka, idi minukuata kakuyi lutatu to, idi minusuika panshi tô ne ku dinyanguka, eyowa, luayi ne ndayi kumpala, ne lejayi Nzambi wenu ne nudi bitaba bua kukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenu ne kubuela nenda mu tshipungidi bua kulama mikenji yenda, ne kumujadikila nanku lelu mu dibuela mu mâyi a ditambula.
7.16: Ne ewu yonsu udi wenza nanku ne udi ulama mikenji ya Nzambi kubangila apu, yeya neavuluka ne ndi mmuambila ne, eyowa, ne avuluka mvua mumuambila ne neapeta moyo wa tshiendelela, bilondeshila ku bujadiki bua Nyuma wa Tshijila, udi ujadika munda muanyi.
7.17: Ne mpindiewu bana betu bananga, nudi nuitabuja bintu ebi anyi? Monayi, ndi nnuambila ne, eyowa, ndi mumanya ne nudi nubitabuja; ne mushindu undi mumanyina ne nudi babitabuja nku dimuenesha dia Nyuma udi munda muanyi. Ne mpindiewu bualu ditabuja dienu bitangila bintu ebi didi dikola, eyowa, bitangila bintu bindi muakula, disanka dianyi didi dinena.
7.18: Bualu bu mumvua munuambila kumbukila ku mbangilu mvua ne dijinga dia bungi ne kanuikadi mu ngikadilu wa lutatu bu bana benu, mena momumua ngamonyi ne majinga anyi avua makumbana.
7.19: Bualu ndi mmona ne nudi mu njila ya buakana; ndi mmona ne nudi mu njila udi ulombola ku bukalenga bua Nzambi; eyowa; ndi mmona ne nudi nululamija njila yenda.
7.20: Ndi mmona ne bivua binumanyisha, ku bujadiki bua dîyi dienda, ne kena mua kuenda mu njila idi mikonyangala to; anyi kena ukudimuka ku bivuaye muamba to; anyi kandidimbi kakena nansha ukudimuka ufuma ku dia baluma uya ku dia bakaji to, anyi ufuma ku tshidi tshimpa uya ku tshidi tshibi to; bua nanku, njila wenda udi tshijengu tshimua tshia tshiendelela.
7.21: Ne kena usomba mu ntempelo idi kayiyi ya tshijila to; anyi bukoya anyi tshionsu tshia bukoya katshiena mua kubuela mu bukalenga bua Nzambi to; bua nanku ndi nnuambila diba ne dilua, eyowa, ne ku dituku dia ndekelu nebikala ne, udi mukoya neashala ne bukoya buenda.
7.22: Ne mpindiewu bana betu bananga, nganuambidi bintu ebi bua kunutabuluja ku mudimu wenu kudi Nzambi, bua kanuikadi ne kadiu kumpala kuenda to, bua nuenda bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, kuakanuakidilabu.
7.23: Ne mpindiewu ndi musua ne nuikala badipuekeshi, ne nuikala batumikidi ne bena kalolu; nuikala bateketa bua kunusengelela; buwula ne ditukija ne bulekelelu; bikala badikandi mu malu onsu; bikala bananukidi mu dilama mikenji ya Nzambi diba dionsu; nulomba bionsu binudi nukengela, bia mu nyuma ne bia mu mubidi; nupingajila Nzambi tuasakidila diba dionsu bua bionsu binudi nupeta.
7.24: Ne tangilayi ne nudi ne ditabuja, ditekemena, ne bunangi, ne pashisha nenuvulangana diba dionsu ne bienzedi bimpa.
7.25: Ne Mukalenga anubenesha, ne lamayi bilamba bienu kabikadi ne katoba to, bua nuya kusomba, mu bukalenga bua mu diûlu kanuyi kabidi nupatuka mu to, ne Abalahama, Isaka, ne Yakoba, ne baprofete bansantu bavuaku katshia ne katshia buloba buabanga, bikala ne bivualu bienu kabiyi ne katoba to bu mudi bivualu biabu kabiyi ne katoba to.
7.26: Ne mpindiewu bana betu bananga, nganuambidi mêyi â bilondeshila ku Nyuma udi ujadika munda muanyi; ne anyima wanyi udi usanka menamena, bua dinanukila ne ntema bipita binuvua bafila ku dîyi dianyi.
7.27: Ne mpindiewu, ditalala dia Nzambi ditudila pa mutu penu, ne pa nzubu yenu ne malaba enu, ne pa bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena bienu, ne bionsu binudi nabi, bakaji benu ne bana benu, bilondeshila ditabuja dienu ne bienzedi bienu bimpa, kubangila diba edi tô ne bua kashidi. Ne ngambi nanku. Amena.

8.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne Alama wakafuma ku bulaba bua Gideona, kunyima kua mumana kulongesha bantu ba Gideona bintu bia bungi bidi kabiyi mua kufundibua to, muikala mushikika bulongolodi mu ekelezia, bilondeshila bu muvuaye muenza kumpala mu bulaba bua Zalahemela, eyowa, wakapingana ku nzubu wenda ku Zalahemela bua kuikishaye ku midimu ivuaye muenza.
8.2: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.
8.3: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia dikumi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi ne, Alama wakumbuka ku ne wakâsa luendu luenda kuya ku bulaba bua Meleke, kudi ku wesete kua musulu wa Sidona, ku wesete pabuipi ne mikalu ya tshipela.
8.4: Ne bakabanga kulongesha bantu mu bulaba bua Meleke bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, kuvuaye mubikidibua; ne wakabanga kulongesha bantu mu bulaba bonsu bua Meleke.
8.5: Ne biakalua ne bantu bakalua kudiye ku mikalu yonsu ya bulaba buvua ku luseka lua tshipela. Ne bakatambuishibua mu bulaba bonsu;
8.6: Mu mushindu ne pakajikijaye mudimu wenda ku Meleke wakumbuka mu, ne wakenza luendu matuku asatu ku node kua bulaba bua Meleke; ne wakafika ku tshimenga tshivuabu babikila ne Amoniha.
8.7: Mpindiewu tshivua tshilela tshia bantu ba Nefi bua kubikila malaba abu, ne bimenga biabu, ne misoku yabu, eyowa, mena ne misoku yabu mikesa yonsu mu dîna dia wakasamu kumpala; ne ki muvuabi nanku ne bulaba bua Amoniha.
8.8: Ne biakalua ne pakalua Alama ku tshimenga tshia Amoniha wakabanga kubayisha dîyi dia Nzambi.
8.9: Mpindiewu Satana uvua mukuata mitshima ya bantu ba mu tshimenga tshia Amoniha bikola; bua nanku bakabenga kuteleja mêyi a Alama.
8.10: Nansha nanku Alama wakatumika mudimu bikola mu nyuma, uluangana ne Nzambi mu disambila dia bukitu, bua upumuna Nyuma wenda pa mutu pa bantu bavua mu tshimenga; bua anyisha kabidi abatambuisha bua dikudimuna dia mitshima.
8.11: Nansha nanku, bakapapisha mitshima yabu, bamuambila ne: Mona, tudi bamanya ne udi Alama; ne tudi bamanya ne udi muakuidi munena ku mutu kua ekelezia uwudi mushikika mu bitupa bia bungi bia bulaba, bilondeshila ku ngenzelu weba; ne katuena bena mu ekelezia weba to, ne katuena tuitabuja ngenzelu misenji nanku to.
8.12: Ne mpindiewu tudi bamanya ne bualu katuena bena mu ekelezia weba to tudi bamanya ne kuena ne bukôkeshi kutudi to; ne uvua mufila nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu kudi Nefiha; bua nanku kuena mulumbuluishi munena kutudi to.
8.13: Mpindiewu pakamba bantu nanku awu, ne pakabengabu mêyi enda onsu, ne pakamupendabu, ne pakamutuilabu mata, ne pakenzabu ne ipatshibua mu tshimenga tshiabu, wakumbuka ku ne wakâsa luendu luenda mutangila ku tshimenga tshivua tshibikidibua ne Alona.
8.14: Ne biakalua ne patshivuaye wenza ku luendu, mutondeshibua ne kanyinganyinga, mupututuka mu mpaji ya bungi ne dipampakana dia anyima, bua bualu bua bubi bua bantu bavua mu tshimenga tshia Amoniha, biakalua ne patshivua Alama mutondeshibua ne kanyinganyinga nanku awu, monayi muanjelu wa Mukalenga wakamumuenekela, wamba ne:
8.15: Udi mubeneshibua, Alama; bua nanku, ambulula mutu weba ne sanguluka, bualu udi ne tshia kusangulukila; bualu uvua ne lulamatu mu dilama mikenji ya Nzambi kumbukila ku tshikondu tshiwakapeta mukenji weba wa diambedi wa kumbukila kudiye. Mona, mmema wakakupeshawu.
8.16: Ne mona, ndi mutumibua bua kukupesha mukenji bua kupingana ku tshimenga tshia Amoniha, ne kuyisha kabidi bantu ba mu tshimenga; eyowa, bayisha. Eyowa, ubambila ne, Mukalenga Nzambi neababutula, pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima.
8.17: Bualu mona, badi belangana meji diba edi bua banyangakaja budishikaminyi bua bantu beba, (bualu Mukalenga udi wamba nanku) bidi bishilangana ku mikandu ne mêyi, ne mikenji bivuaye mupesha bantu benda.
8.18: Mpindiewu biakalua ne kunyima kua Alama mupeta mukenji wenda kudi muanjelu wa Mukalenga wakapingana lukasa ku bulaba bua Amoniha. Ne wakabuela mu tshimenga ku njila mukuabu, eyowa, ku njila udi sude kua tshimenga tshia Amoniha.
8.19: Ne pavuaye ubuela mu tshimenga wakumvua nzala, ne wakambila muntu ne: Udi bua kupesha musadidi mudipuekeshi wa Nzambi tshiakudia anyi?
8.20: Ne muntu ewu wakamuambila ne: Ndi muena Nefi, ne ndi mumanya ne udi muprofete munsantu wa Nzambi, bualu udi muntu uvua muanjelu mungambila mu tshimônyi ne: Neumuakidila. Bua nanku, luaku nanyi mu nzubu muanyi ne nenkupesha bimua bia biakudia bianyi; ne ndi mumanya ne newikala dibenesha kundi ne nzubu wanyi.
8.21: Ne biakalua ne muntu ewu wakamuakidila mu nzubu muenda; ne muntu ewu uvua ubikidibua ne Amuleke; ne wakalua ne diampa ne munyinyi ne wakabiteka kumpala kua Alama.
8.22: Ne biakalua ne Alama wakadia diampa ne wakûkuta; ne wakabenesha Amuleke ne nzubu wenda, ne wakela Nzambi tuasakidila.
8.23: Ne kunyima kua yeya mudia ne mûkuta wakambila Amuleke ne: Ndi Alama, ne ndi muakuidi munena ku mutu kua ekelezia wa Nzambi mu bulaba bonsu.
8.24: Ne mona, mvua mubikidibua bua kuyisha dîyi dia Nzambi munkatshi mua bantu bonsu aba, bilondeshila ku nyuma wa dibuluila ne buprofete; ne mvua mu bulaba ebu ne bakabenga kungakidila to, kadi bakangipata ne mvua pabuipi ne kuela bulaba ebu nyima wanyi bua kashidi.
8.25: Kadi mona, mvua mupeshibua mukenji ne mpingana ne ngamba mêyi a buprofete kudi bantu aba, eyowa, ne njadikila bantu bitangila malu mabi abu.
8.26: Ne mpindiewu, Amuleke, bualu uvua mundîsha ne muaba wa kulala, udi mubeneshibua; bualu mvua ne nzala, bualu mvua mujila matuku a bungi.
8.27: Ne Alama wakashala ne Amuleke matuku a bungi kumpala kua kubangaye kuyisha bantu.
8.28: Ne biakalua ne bantu bakabipa bikola mu malu mabi abu.
8.29: Ne dîyi diakalua kudi Alama, diamba ne: Ndâku; ne ambila kabidi musadidi wanyi Amuleke ne, ndâku ne amba mêyi a buprofete kudi bantu, wamba ne—Kudimunayi mutshima, bualu Mukalenga udi wamba ne, nenkukumbula bantu aba mu tshiji tshianyi, eyowa, ne ntshiakukudimuna tshiji tshianyi tshikola to, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
8.30: Ne Alama wakaya, ne Amuleke penda, munkatshi mua bantu, bua kubamanyisha mêyi a Nzambi; ne bakuwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila.
8.31: Ne Nzambi uvua mubapesha bukola, mua ne kabavua mua kubakangila mu nzubu mîdima to; anyi muntu kavua mua kubashipa to; nansha nanku kabakenzela bukola buabu to amu pakabasuikabu mionji tô ne pakabelabu mu lukanu. Mpindiewu, biakenzeka nanku bua Mukalenga amona mua kuleja bukola buenda kupitshila kudibu.
8.32: Ne biakalua ne bakaya ne bakabanga kuyisha ne kuamba mêyi a buprofete kudi bantu, bilondeshila ku nyuma ne bukola buvua Mukalenga mubapesha.

9.intro: Mêyi a Alama, ne kabidi mêyi a Amuleke, akambilabu bantu bavua mu bulaba bua Amoniha. Ne badi babela kabidi mu buloko, ne badi bapatuishibua ku bukola bua tshishima bua Nzambi buvua munda muabu, bilondeshila ku miandiku ya Alama.
9.1: Ne kabidi, mema, Alama, bualu mvua mupeshibua mukenji kudi Nzambi ne ngangata Amuleke ne nya ne nyisha kabidi bantu aba, anyi bantu bavua mu tshimenga tshia Amoniha, biakalua ne pangakabanga kubayisha, bakabanga kukokangana nanyi, bamba ne:
9.2: Udi nganyi? Udi wela meji ne netuitabuja bujadiki bua muntu umua, nansha yeya mutuyisha ne buloba nebupita anyi?
9.3: Mpindiewu kabavua bumvua mêyi avuabu bamba to; bualu kabavua bamanya ne buloba nebupita to.
9.4: Ne bakamba kabidi ne: katuakuitabuja mêyi eba to, nansha wewa muamba mêyi a buprofete ne, tshimenga tshinena etshi netshibutuka mu dituku dimua.
9.5: Mpindiewu kabavua bamanya ne Nzambi udi mua kuenza malu a dikema nanku awu to, bualu bavua bantu ba mitshima mipapa ne nshingu miumisha.
9.6: Ne bakamba ne: Nzambi nganyi udi utuma mukôkeshi amu muntu umua munkatshi mua bantu aba, bua kubamanyisha bulelela bua bintu binena ne bia dikema bia nanku?
9.7: Ne bakasemena bua kuntuabu bianza; kadi monayi, kabakandenga to. Ne ngakimana ne dikima bua kubamanyisha, eyowa, ngakabajadikila ne dikima dikola, ngamba ne:
9.8: Monayi, Ô nuenu ba lukongu lua bantu lubi ne lunyanguka, bu munudi bapua moyo ngenzelu wa batatuenu; eyowa, bu munudi bapua moyo lukasa mikenji ya Nzambi.
9.9: Kanuena nuvuluka ne tshianza tshia Nzambi tshiakapatula tatuetu, Lehi, ku Yelushalema anyi? Kanuena nuvuluka ne wakabalombola bonsu mu tshipela anyi?
9.10: Ne nuapu moyo katataka misangu bungi kayi yakapatuishaye batatuetu mu bianza bia baluishi babu, ne uvua mubakuba ku dibutuka, mena ku bianza bia bana babu nkayabu?
9.11: Eyowa, ne bu kabivua bua bukola buenda budi kabuyi kufuanyikija, ne lusa luenda, ne bulekelelu buenda kutudi to, tuvua tukoshibua kakuyi diepuka pa mpala wa buloba mutantshi mula kumpala kua tshikondu etshi, ne pamuapa tupîshibua ku ngikadilu wa dikenga ne diakabi kadiyi ndekelu.
9.12: Monayi, mpindiewu ndi nnuambila udi unupesha mukenji bua kukudimuna mutshima; ne pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima, kanuena mua kupiana bukalenga bua Nzambi to nansha bishi. Kadi monayi, ebi ki mbionsu to—udi unupesha mukenji bua kukudimuna mutshima, anyi neanubutula bonsu pa mpala wa buloba; eyowa, neanukumbula mu tshiji tshienda, ne mu tshiji tshienda tshikola kakukudimuka to.
9.13: Monayi, kanuena nuvuluka mêyi avuaye muambila Lehi, wamba ne: Monsu munualama mikenji yanyi, nenulubuluka mu bulaba anyi? Ne kabidi, bidi biambibua ne: Monsu munuapanga kulama mikenji yanyi nenukoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga.
9.14: Mpindiewu ndi musua ne nuvuluka ne, monsu mudi Bena Lamana bapanga kulama mikenji ya Nzambi to, badi bakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga. Mpindiewu tudi tumona ne dîyi dia Mukalenga divua dijadikibua mu bualu ebu, ne Bena Lamana badi bakoshibua kumpala kuenda, kumbukila ku mbangilu wa disambuka dia mikenji diabu mu bulaba.
9.15: Nansha nanku ndi nnuambila ne, mu dituku dia tshilumbuluilu nebikala biakana bua Bena Lamana kupita bualu buenu, bu nuenu bashala mu mibi yenu, eyowa, ne mena biakana bualu buabu pa buloba ebu kunupita, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
9.16: Bualu kudi milayi ya bungi idi mifidibua kudi Bena Lamana; bualu mbashala mu ngikadilu wabu wa dipanga bua bualu bua ngenzelu ya batatuabu; bua nanku Mukalenga neikala ne lusa kudibu ne nealepesha matuku abu mu bulaba.
9.17: Ne mu tshinga tshikondu nebatuadibua ku ditabuja dîyi dienda, ne ku dimanya ne ngenzelu ya batatuabu kayena miakana to; ne ba bungi babu nebapandishibua, bualu Mukalenga neikala ne lusa kudi bonsu badi babikila dîna dienda.
9.18: Kadi monayi, ndi nnuambila ne bu nuenu mua kutungunuka ne bubi buenu matuku enu ka akulepeshibua mu bulaba to, bualu Mukalenga neanutumina Bena Lamana; ne nuenu kanuyi bakudimuna mutshima to nebalua diba dinudi kanuyi bamanya to, ne nenukumbudibua ne dibutuka dijima; ne nebikala bilondeshila ku tshiji tshikola tshia Mukalenga.
9.19: Bualu kakunulekela ne nuikala ne moyo mu malu mabi enu, bua kubutula bantu benda to. Ndi nnuambila ne, To; bimpa alekela ne Bena Lamana babutula bantu benda bonsu badibu babikila ne bantu ba Nefi, bu biobi mua kuikala ne bavua mua kupona mu mibi ne disambuka dia mikenji, kunyima kua bobu bamana kupeta bukenka bua bungi ne dimanya divula bikola kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wabu;
9.20: Eyowa, kunyima kua kuikala bantu basuibua bikola kudi Mukalenga; eyowa kunyima kua kuikala basuibua kupita tshisamba tshikuabu tshionsu, tshîsa tshikuabu tshionsu, muakulu mukuabu yonsu, anyi bantu bukuabu bonsu; kunyima kua Mukalenga mumana kubamanyisha bintu bionsu, bilondeshila ku majinga abu, ne ditabuja diabu, ne masambila abu, bitangila bivuaku, ne bidiku, ne bitshilualua;
9.21: Bamana kukumbudibua kudi Nyuma wa Nzambi; bamana kuyukila ne banjelu, ne bamana kuambidibua kudi dîyi dia Mukalenga; ne bamana kuikala ne nyuma wa buprofete, ne nyuma wa dibuluila, ne mapa a bungi kabidi, dipa dia kuakula miakulu, ne dipa dia kuyisha, ne dipa dia Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne dipa dia diandamuna miaku;
9.22: Eyowa, ne kunyima kua kupatuishibua kudi Nzambi mu bulaba bua Yelushalema, ku tshianza tshia Mukalenga; bamana kupandishibua ku tshiyola, ne ku bubêdi, ne ku mishindu yonsu ya mabêdi a ngikadilu yonsu; ne bakolakana mu mvita, bua kababutuki to; ne bamana kupatudibua mu bupika ku misangu ne ku misangu, ne bamana kulamibua ne kukubibua tô ne mpindiewu; ne bavua balubuludibua tô ne padibu babanji mu mishindu yonsu ya bintu—
9.23: Ne mpindiewu monayi ndi nnuambila ne, bantu aba, bavua bapeta mabenesha a bungi ku tshianza tshia Mukalenga, bu bobu bua kusambuka mikenji bishilangana ne bukenka ne dimanya didibu nâdi, ndi nnuambila ne bikalabi nanku, ne biaponabu mu disambuka dia mikenji, bidi ne mua kuikala bimpa bua Bena Lamana kupita buabu.
9.24: Bualu monayi, milayi ya Mukalenga idi mifidibua kudi Bena Lamana, kadi kayena buenu panudi nusambuka mikenji to; bualu Mukalenga kavua mulaya patoka ne muedibua mukenji ne dikamakana ne, panuikala bamutombokela nenubutuka bonsu pa mpala wa buloba anyi?
9.25: Ne mpindiewu bua bualu ebu, bua kanubutuki to, Mukalenga udi mutuma muanjelu wenda bua kukumbula ba bungi ba ku bantu benda, ubamanyisha ne badi ne tshia kuya ne kubila ne bukitu kudi bantu aba, bamba ne: Kudimunayi mutshima, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu bukadi pabuipi;
9.26: Ne matuku a bungi ka akupita to Muana wa Nzambi nealua mu butumbi buenda; ne butumbi buenda nebuikala butumbi bua Umuepela Mulela wa Tatu, udi muwula ne ngâsa, bujalama, ne bulelela, udi muwula ne ditukija, lusa, ne bulekelelu, ne udi lukasa bua kumvua mbila ya bantu benda ne kuandamuna masambila abu.
9.27: Ne monayi, udi ulua kusungila bavua batambuishibua bua dikudimuna dia mitshima, ku ditabuja mu dîna dienda.
9.28: Bua nanku, longololayi njila wa Mukalenga, bualu diba didi pabuipi diapôla bantu bonsu tshipeta tshia bienzedi biabu, bilondeshila muvuayi; pikalaye ne ivua miakana nebapôla lupandu lua anyima yabu, bilondeshila ku bukola ne dipatuisha bia Yezu Kilisto; ne pikalaye ne ivua mibi, ne nebapôla dipîshibua dia anyima yabu, bilondeshila ku bukola ne dikuatangana dia ku bupika dia diabulu.
9.29: Mpindiewu monayi, edi didi dîyi dia muanjelu, udi ubila kudi bantu.
9.30: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu bananga, bualu nudi bana betu, ne nudi ne tshia kunangibua, ne nudi ne tshia kukuama bienzedi bidi bikumbanyina dikudimuna dia mutshima wenu, bualu mitshima yenu ivua mipapishibua ku dîyi dia Nzambi, ne bualu nudi bantu bajimina ne bapona.
9.31: Mpindiewu biakalua ne, mema, Alama, pangakamba mêyi â, monayi, bantu bakamfîkila tshiji bualu ngakabambila ne bavua bantu ba mitshima mipapa ne nshingu miumisha.
9.32: Ne kabidi bakamfîkila tshiji, ne bakakeba bua nkutuabu bianza biabu, bua kungelabu mu buloko bualu ngakabambila ne bavua bantu bapona ne bajimina.
9.33: Kadi biakalua ne Mukalenga kakalekela ne bangangata mu diba adi ne bangela mu buloko to.
9.34: Ne biakalua ne Amuleke wakasemena kumpala, ne wakabanga kubayisha kabidi. Ne mpindiewu mêyi a Amuleke ka’ena mafunda onsu to, nansha nanku tshitupa tshia mêyi enda tshidi tshifunda mu mukanda ewu.

10.1: Mpindiewu â ki mêyi akayisha Amuleke bantu bavua mu bulaba bua Amoniha, wamba ne:
10.2: Ndi Amuleke, ndi muana wa baluma wa Gidona, uvua muana wa Yishemaela, uvua kankanunuina ka Aminadi; ne yeya muina Aminadi awu wakandamuna mifunda ivua pa tshimanu tshia ntempelo, ivua mifunda kudi munu wa Nzambi.
10.3: Ne Aminadi uvua kankanunuina ka Nefi, uvua muana wa Lehi, wakapatuka ku bulaba bua Yelushalema, uvua kankanunuina ka Manashe, uvua muana wa baluma wa Yosefe, uvua mupanyibua ku Ejipitu ku bianza bia bana babu.
10.4: Ne monayi, ndi kabidi muntu udi muenda lumu luimpa lua bungi munkatshi mua bonsu badi bammanya; eyowa, ne monayi, ndi ne malela a bungi ne balunda, ne ndi kabidi mupeta mabanji a bungi ku dienza dianyi dia mudimu dikola.
10.5: Nansha nanku, kunyima kua bionsu ebi, ntshivua mumanya bia bungi bitangila njila ya Mukalenga, ne malu masokoka enda ne bukola buenda bua dikema nansha. Mvua ngamba ne ntshivua mumanya bia bungi bitangila bintu ebi nansha; kadi monayi, ndi ntupakana, bualu mvua mumona malu masokoka ne bukola buenda bua dikema bia bungi; eyowa, mena ku dikuba dia mioyo ya bantu aba.
10.6: Nansha nanku, ngakapapisha mutshima wanyi, bualu mvua mubikidibua misangu ya bungi ne ngakabenga kuteleja; bua nanku mvua mumanya bintu ebi, kadi ngakabenga kumanya; bua nanku ngakatungunuka ne kutombokela kua Nzambi, kulondesha ku bubi buvua mu mutshima wanyi, mena tô ne mu dituku dinâyi dia ngondu ewu wa muanda muteketa, didi mu tshidimu tshia dikumi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
10.7: Pamvua ngenza luendu bua kukamona mulela wanyi wa pabuipi menamena, monayi, muanjelu wa Mukalenga wakammuenekela ne wakamba ne: Amuleke, pingana ku nzubu kueba, buela neudîsha muprofete wa Mukalenga; eyowa, muntu munsantu, muntu udi musungudibua kudi Nzambi; bualu uvua mujila biakudia matuku a bungi bua mibi ya bantu aba, ne udi ne nzala, ne neumuakidila mu nzubu weba ne neumudîsha, ne neakubenesha ne ba mu nzubu mueba; ne dibenesha dia Mukalenga neditudila pa mutu peba ne pa ba mu nzubu weba.
10.8: Ne biakalua ne ngakatumikila dîyi dia muanjelu, ne ngakapingana ku nzubu kuanyi. Ne pamvua mpinganaku ngakasambakena ne muntu uvua muanjelu mungambila ne: Neumuakidila mu nzubu mueba—ne monayi uvua muntu muina ewu uvua unuambila bitangila malu a Nzambi.
10.9: Ne muanjelu uvua mungambila ne mmuntu munsantu; bua nanku ndi mumanya ne udi muntu munsantu, bualu bua bivua bingambila kudi muanjelu wa Nzambi.
10.10: Ne, ndi mumanya kabidi ne bintu bivuaye mujadika bidi bilelela; bualu monayi ndi nnuambila ne, bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, mena ki mudiyi mutuma muanjelu wenda bua kumuenesha kundi bintu ebi; ne wakenza nanku patshivua Alama ewu musomba ku nzubu kuanyi.
10.11: Bualu monayi, udi mubenesha ba mu nzubu muanyi, udi mumbenesha, ne bantu bakaji ba mu nzubu muanyi, ne bana banyi, ne tatuanyi ne malela anyi; eyowa, mena mmubenesha malela anyi onsu, ne dibenesha dia Mukalenga didi ditudila pa mutu petu bilondeshila ku mêyi akambaye.
10.12: Ne mpindiewu, pavua Amuleke muamba mêyi â bantu bakabanga kukema, pakamonabu ne kakuvua amu mujadiki umua uvua ujadika bua bintu bivuabu bababandila to, ne kabidi bua bintu bitshilualua, bilondeshila ku nyuma wa buprofete uvua munda muabu.
10.13: Nansha nanku, kuvua bamua munkatshi muabu bavua bela meji a kubela nkonku, bua kubakuatabu mafi ku mêyi abu ku budimu buabu, bua bapeta njadikilu wa kubaluisha nenda, bua kubafilabu kudi balumbuluishi babu bua kubambuluisha bilondeshila ku mikenji, ne kubashipabu anyi kubelabu mu buloko, bilondeshila ku bubi buvuabu mua kubamueneshela anyi kubadingila.
10.14: Mpindiewu bavua bantu aba bavua bakeba bua kubashipesha, bavua balumbuluidi, bavua bantu bangata ku mudimu anyi batekibua kudi bantu bua kuenzeja mikenji meba a malumbulula abu, anyi mu malumbulula bua mibi ya bantu kumpala kua balumbuluishi.
10.15: Mpindiewu balumbuluidi aba bavua balonga didinga ne budimu bonsu bua bantu; ne ebi bivua bua kubambuluisha bua bamanya bua kuenza mudimu wabu.
10.16: Ne biakalua ne bakabanga kukonka Amuleke nkonku, nanku bua bamutompakajija mêyi enda, anyi bamutupakajija mêyi ambaye.
10.17: Mpindiewu kabavua bamanya ne Amuleke uvua mua kumanya majinga abu to. Kadi biakalua ne pakabangabu kumuela nkonku, wakamona meji abu, ne wakabambila ne: Ô nuenu bena lukongu lua bantu lubi ne lunyanguka, nuenu balumbuluidi ne bena mpala ibidi, bualu nudi nuasa bishimikidi bia diabulu; bualu nudi nuteka masoka ne mateyi bua kukuata bansantu ba Nzambi.
10.18: Nudi nuteka malongolodi bua kunyangakaja njila ya bakana, ne bua kupuekesha tshiji tshia Nzambi pa mitu yenu, mena tô ne ku dibutuka dijima dia bantu aba.
10.19: Eyowa, Mosiya, yeya uvua mfumu wetu wa ndekelu, wakamba bimpa, pakavuaye pabuipi ne kulekela bukalenga, bualu kavua ne muntu nansha umua wakubuambikila to, wakenza ne bantu aba bakôkeshibua ku mêyi abu nkayabu—eyowa, wakamba bimpa ne bialua tshikondu tshiasungula dîyi dia bantu aba bualu bubi, buena kuamba ne, bialua tshikondu tshiapona bantu aba mu disambuka dia mikenji, nebikala baboba bua dibutuka.
10.20: Ne mpindiewu, ndi nnuambila ne Mukalenga udi ulumbuluisha bimpa bitangila malu mabi enu; udi ubila bimpa kudi bantu aba, ku dîyi dia banjelu benda ne: Kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu budi pabuipi.
10.21: Eyowa, udi ubila, ku dîyi dia banjelu benda ne: Nempueka munkatshi mua bantu banyi, ne bujalama ne bululama mu bianza bianyi.
10.22: Eyowa, ne ndi nnuambila ne bu kabuyi bua masambila a bakana, badi mu bulaba mpindiewu to, nuvua nukumbudibua mena mpindiewu ne dibutuka dijima; kadi kabivua bikala ku mâyi muwula a mvula, bu muakenzekelabi bantu mu matuku a Noa to, kadi bivua bikala ku tshiyola, ne ku tshipupu, ne ku muela wa mvita.
10.23: Kadi bidi ku masambila a bakana ki mu nudi bepelesha; mpindiewu bua nanku, binuipata bakana munkatshi muenu apu Mukalenga kakukandika tshianza tshienda to; kadi mu tshiji tshienda tshikola nealua kunuluisha; nanku nenutûtshibua ne tshiyola, ne tshipupu, ne muela wa mvita; ne diba didi pabuipi katataka pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
10.24: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne bantu bavua bafîkila Amuleke tshiji tshipita, ne bakabila, bamba ne: Muntu ewu udi upenda mikenji yetu idi mikala miakana, ne balumbuluidi betu ba lungenyi batuvua basungula.
10.25: Kadi Amuleke wakôlola tshianza tshienda, ne wakabila kabidi bikola menamena kudibu, wamba ne: Ô nuenu bena lukongu lua bantu lubi ne lunyanguka, bua tshinyi Satana mmukuata mitshima yenu bikola nanku? Bua tshinyi nudi nudilekelela kudiye bua kuikalaye ne bukola kunudi, bua kufofomijaye mesu enu, bua nubenga kumvua mêyi atudi tuamba, bilondeshila ku bulelela buawu?
10.26: Bualu monayi, ndi mujadika muimanyina mikenji yenu anyi? Kanuena numvua to; nudi nuamba ne ndi muakula muimanyina mikenji yenu; kadi ntshiena muenza nanku to, kadi ndi muakula mu dibandisha dia mikenji yenu, bua dipîla dienu.
10.27: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nnuambila ne tshishimikidi tshia dibutuka dia bantu aba tshidi tshibanga kuibakibua kudi dipanga dia buakana dia balumbuluidi benu ne balumbuluishi benu.
10.28: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Amuleke mêyi â bantu bakamuelela mbila bamufunda, bamba ne: Mpindiewu tudi bamanya ne muntu ewu udi muana wa diabulu, bualu watushimi; bualu udi muakula mu dibenga dia mikenji yetu. Ne mpindiewu udi wamba ne kena muakula mu dibenga diayi to.
10.29: Ne kabidi, uvua mupenda balumbuluidi betu, ne balumbuluishi betu.
10.30: Ne biakalua ne balumbuluidi bakasaka mu mitshima yabu ne bavua ne bua kuvuluka bintu ebi bua kumuluishabu.
10.31: Ne kuvua umua munkatshi muabu uvua ne dîna ne Zêzeloma. Mpindiewu uvua wa kumpala kua mulongu bua kubanda Amuleke ne Alama, ne uvua umua wa bamanyi bapiluka bikola ba munkatshi muabu, uvua ne bungenda mushinga bua bungi buvuaye wenda munkatshi mua bantu.
10.32: Mpindiewu tshiena bualu tshia balumbuluidi aba tshivua tshia kupeta makasa; ne bavua bapeta makasa bilondeshila ku mudimu wabu.

11.1: Mpindiewu tshivua mu mikenji ya Mosiya ne muntu yonsu uvua mulumbuluishi wa mikenji, anyi bobu bavua basungudibua bua kuikala balumbuluishi, bavua ne bua kupeta mafutu bilondeshila diba divuabu benza mudimu bua kulumbuluisha bavuabu balua nabu kumpala kuabu bua kulumbuluishibua.
11.2: Mpindiewu bu muntu muikala ne dibanza dia mukuabu, ne mubenga kufuta dibanza didiye nâdi, bavua bamufunda kudi mulumbuluishi; ne mulumbuluishi uvua wenzela bukôkeshi, ne uvua utuma bampulushi bua balua ne muntu awu kumpala kuenda; ne uvua umulumbuluisha bilondeshila ku mikenji ne majadikibua avua matuala bua kumutuisha, ne nanku muntu ewu bavua bamuenzeja bua kufuta dibanza divuaye nâdi, anyi bamunyenga bivuaye nabi, anyi ipatshibua munkatshi mua bantu bu mudi muivi ne munyengi wa bintu.
11.3: Ne mulumbuluishi uvua upeta mafutu enda bilondeshila diba dienda—senina umua wa ngolo bua dituku, anyi senuma umua wa mpalata, udi mukumbanangana ne senina umua wa ngolo; ne ebi bivua bilondeshila ku mikenji ivua mifila.
11.4: Mpindiewu â avua mêna a bitshiela bia ngolo, ne mpalata yabu, bilondeshila mushinga wayi. Ne mêna avua Bena Nefi bafila, bualu kabavua babala ku mushindu wa Bena Yuda bavua mu Yelushalema to; anyi kabavua bapima ku mushindu wa Bena Yuda to; kadi bavua bandamuna mbadilu wabu ne mpiminu wabu, bilondeshila ku meji ne malu avua afikila bantu, ku tshikondu tshionsu, ne ku dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, bavua Mukalenga Mosiya mushikika.
11.5: Mpindiewu kubala kuabu kudi nanku—senina wa ngolo umua, seyona wa ngolo umua, shuma wa ngolo umua, ne limina wa ngolo umua.
11.6: Senuma wa mpalata umua, amenolo wa mpalata umua, ezeloma wa mpalata umua, ne onti wa mpalata umua.
11.7: Senuma wa mpalata umua uvua mukumbanangana ne senina wa ngolo umua, anyi ne tshipimu tshia orge tshimua, ne kabidi tshipimu tshia nteta ya ngikadilu yonsu.
11.8: Mpindiewu mushinga wa seyona wa ngolo umua uvua misangu ibidi mushinga wa senina umua.
11.9: Ne shuma wa ngolo umua uvua misangu ibidi mushinga wa seyona umua.
11.10: Ne limina wa ngolo umua uvua mushinga wabu bonsu.
11.11: Ne amenolo wa mpalata umua uvua bungi bua senuma ibidi.
11.12: Ne ezeloma wa mpalata umua uvua bungi bua senuma inayi.
11.13: Ne onti umua uvua bungi buabu bonsu.
11.14: Mpindiewu etshi ki mushinga wa makumi makesa a kubala kuabu—
11.15: Shibulona umua uvua tshimua tshia bibidi tshia senuma; bua nanku, shibulona uvua tshimua tshia bibidi tshia tshipimu tshia orge.
11.16: Ne shibuluma umua uvua tshimua tshia bibidi tshia shibulona.
11.17: Ne lea umua uvua tshimua tshia bibidi tshia shibuluma.
11.18: Mpindiewu etshi ki makumi abu, bilondeshila ku dibala diabu.
11.19: Mpindiewu antiono wa ngolo umua uvua mukumbanangana ne shibulona isatu.
11.20: Mpindiewu, tshivua amu bua kipatshila ka kupeta makasa, bualu bavua bapeta difutu diabu bilondeshila diba divuabu benza mudimu, bua nanku, bavua basonsola bantu ku buntomboji, ne ku mishindu yonsu ya masalu ne bubi, bua bapeta mudimu wa bungi, bua bapeta makuta bilondeshila bilumbu bivuabu balua nabi kumpala kuabu; bua nanku bavua basonsola bantu bua kubenga Alama ne Amuleke.
11.21: Ne Zêzeloma ewu wakabanga kabidi kuebeja Amuleke wamba: Neungandamuna nkonku mikesa ingakuebeja anyi? Mpindiewu Zêzeloma uvua muntu mupiluka mu budimu bua diabulu, bua anyangakaja etshi tshivua tshimpa; bua nanku, wakebeja Amuleke: Newandamuna nkonku ingakuela anyi?
11.22: Ne Amuleke wakamuambila ne: Eyowa, bu biobi bilondeshila Nyuma wa Mukalenga, udi munda muanyi; bualu ntshiakuamba tshintu nansha tshimua tshidi tshishilangana ne Nyuma wa Mukalenga to. Ne Zêzeloma wakamuambila ne: Mona, onti ya mpalata isambombo nyoyeyi, ne nenkupesha nayi yonsu bu wewa muvila ne kakuena Mfumu Munena udi ku mutu to.
11.23: Mpindiewu Amuleke wakamba ne: Ô muana wa mu ngena, bua tshinyi udi untêta? Kuena mumanya ne muakana katu ukuluka ku matêtshibua a mushindu ewu to anyi?
11.24: Udi witabuja ne kakuena Nzambi to anyi? Ndi nkuambila, To, udi mumanya ne Nzambi udiku, kadi udi munanga biuma kumupita.
11.25: Ne mpindiewu udi unshima kumpala kua Nzambi. Udi ungambila—Mona onti isambombo eyi, idi ne mushinga wa bungi, nenkupeshayi—pawudi ne meji mu mutshima weba akumpalayi; ne tshivua amu dijinga dieba ne mvila Nzambi mulelela ne wa moyo, bua upeta tshiakunshipela. Ne mpindiewu, neupeta difutu dieba bua bubi bunena ebu.
11.26: Ne Zêzeloma wakamuambila: Udi wamba ne kudi Nzambi mulelela ne wa moyo anyi?
11.27: Ne Amuleke wakamuambila: Eyowa, kudi Nzambi mulelela ne wa moyo.
11.28: Mpindiewu Zêzeloma wakamba: Kudi ba Nzambi bakuabu anyi?
11.30: Mpindiewu Zêzeloma wakamuambila kabidi: Udi mumanya bintu ebi munyi?
11.32: Ne Zêzeloma wakamba kabidi: Nganyi walua? Muana wa Nzambi anyi?
11.34: Ne Zêzeloma wakamba kabidi: Neapandisha bantu benda mu mibi yabu anyi? Ne Amuleke wakandamuna ne kumuambila ne: Ndi nkuambila ne kakuenza to, bualu kabiena mua kuenzeka bua ne avila dîyi dienda to.
11.35: Mpindiewu Zêzeloma wakambila bantu: Tangilayi ne nuvuluka bintu ebi; bualu wambi ne kudi amu Nzambi umua; kadi wambi ne Muana wa Nzambi nealua, kadi kakupandisha bantu benda to—bu udi ne bukôkeshi bua kuelela Nzambi mukenji.
11.36: Mpindiewu Amuleke wakamuambila kabidi: Mona udi ushima, bualu udi wamba ne ngambi bu ndi ne bukôkeshi bua kuelela Nzambi mukenji bualu ngambi ne kakupandisha bantu benda mu mibi yabu to.
11.37: Ne ndi nnuambila kabidi ne kena mua kubapandisha mu mibi yabu to; bualu ntshiena mua kuvila dîyi dienda to, ne uvua muamba ne tshintu tshikoya katshiena mua kupiana bukalenga bua mu diûlu to; bua nanku, munyi munudi mua kupandishibua panuikala kanuyi bapiana bukalenga bua mu diûlu? Bua nanku, kanuena mua kupandishibua mu mibi yenu to.
11.38: Mpindiewu Zêzeloma wakamuambila kabidi: Muana wa Nzambi udi mena Tatu wa Tshiendelela anyi?
11.39: Ne Amuleke wakamuambila: Eyowa, udi mena Tatu wa Tshiendelela wa diûlu ne buloba, ne bintu bionsu bidi mômu; udi mbangilu ne nshikidilu, wa kumpala ne wa ndekelu;
11.40: Ne nealua pa buloba bua kusungila bantu benda; ne neangata pa mutu penda disambuka mikenji dia badi bitabuja mu dîna dienda; ne aba bobu bapeta moyo wa tshiendelela, ne lupandu kaluena lulua kudi mukuabu to.
11.41: Bua nanku bena bubi bupita badi bashala bu ne kakuvua disungila dienzeka to, pa kumbusha disuludibua dia mionji ya lufu; bualu mona, dituku dilualua diajuka bonsu ku bafua ne dimanabu kumpala kua Nzambi, ne dialumbuluishibuabu bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu.
11.42: Mpindiewu, kudi lufu ludi lubikidibua ne lufu lua mubidi; ne lufu lua Kilisto nelusulula mionji ya lufu lua mubidi elu, bua ne bonsu bajudishibua ku lufu lua mubidi elu.
11.43: Nyuma ne mubidi nebisangishibua kabidi mu tshimfuanyi tshiabu tshijima; bubidi bua bidimba ne manungu nebipingajibua mu mubidi wabi muakana, mpindiewu mena bu mutudi mu tshikondu etshi; ne netutuadibua bua kuimana kumpala kua Nzambi, bamanya mena bu mutudi bamanya mpindiewu, ne bikala ne divuluka ditua dia dipîla dietu dionsu.
11.44: Mpindiewu, dipingaja edi nedilua kudi bonsu, bubidi buabu bakola ne bana, bubidi buabu bapika ne badikadila, bubidi buabu baluma ne bakaji, bubidi buabu bena bubi bupita ne bakana; ne mena kakuakuikala nansha lusuki lumua lua ku mitu yabu luajimina to; kadi tshintu tshionsu netshipingajibua ku mushindu watshi mujima, bu muditshi mpindiewu, anyi mu mubidi, ne nebatuadibua ne nebalumbuluishibua kumpala kua tshilumbuluidi tshia Kilisto Muana, ne Nzambi Tatu, ne Nyuma wa Tshijila, badi Nzambi bikala Nzambi wa Tshiendelela umua, bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu, ne bidi bikala bimpa anyi ne bidi bikala bibi.
11.45: Mpindiewu, monayi, mumvua munuambila bitangila lufu lua mubidi wa tshifuaka, ne kabidi bitangila dibîka dia mubidi wa tshifuaka. Ndi nnuambila ne mubidi ewu wa tshifuaka udi ujudishibua muikala mubidi udi kawuyi ufua, buena kuamba ne ku lufu, mena kumbukila ku lufu lua diambedi ne ku moyo, bua ne kabena mua kufua kabidi to; nyuma yabu ikuatangana ne mibidi yabu, kayiyi itapulukangana kabidi nansha; nanku bionsu bilua bia mu nyuma ne kabiyi bifua, bua ne kabayi mua kuikala kabidi ne kubola nansha.
11.46: Mpindiewu, pavua Amuleke mujikija mêyi â bantu bakabanga kabidi kukema, ne Zêzeloma kabidi wakabanga kuzakala. Ne mêyi a Amuleke akajika nanku, anyi ebi ki bionsu bindi mufunda.

12.1: Mpindiewu Alama, bualu wakamona ne mêyi a Amuleke akapuwisha Zêzeloma, bualu wakamona ne Amuleke wakamukuata ku mafi ne didinga dienda bua kumushipesha, ne bualu wakamona ne wakabanga kuzakala bua dimanya dia dipîla dienda, wakabulula mukana muenda ne wakabanga kumuambila, ne kushikika mêyi a Amuleke, ne kujingulula bintu kupita, anyi kumvuija mifundu ya Nzambi kupita bivua Amuleke muenza.
12.2: Mpindiewu mêyi avua Alama muambila Zêzeloma mumvuika kudi bantu bavua babanyungulula; bualu musumba wa bantu uvua munena, ne wakakula mushindu ewu:
12.3: Mpindiewu Zêzeloma, muwamonyi ne wakuatshibu ku dishima ne dikazamuka dieba, bualu kuena mushima amu bantu to kadi udi mushima Nzambi; bualu mona, mmumanya meji eba onsu, ne udi mumona ne meji eba adi matuleja kudi Nzambi ku nyuma wenda;
12.4: Ne udi mumona ne tudi bamanya bulongolodi bueba buvua bulongolodi bua budimu, bilondeshila budimu bua diabulu, bualu kushima ne kudinga bantu aba bua wewa kubasaka bua kutuluishabu, bua ne kupendabu ne kutuipatabu—
12.5: Mpindiewu etshi tshivua bulongolodi bua muluishi weba, ne wenzedi bukola buenda ku njila weba. Mpindiewu ndi musua ne uvuluka ne tshindi ngamba kûdi ndi ntshiamba kudi bonsu.
12.6: Ne mpindiewu mona ndi nnuambila bonsu ne etshi tshidi diteyi dia muluishi, didiye muteka bua kukuata bantu aba, bua anubueja mu bubatshika buenda, bua anunyungulula ne nkanu yenda, bua anusuika panshi ne nkanu bua dinyanguka dia kashidi, bilondeshila ku bukola bua bukuatshibu buenda.
12.7: Mpindiewu pakakula Alama mêyi â, Zêzeloma wakabanga kuzakala bikola kupita, bualu wakitabujijibua bipita ne bipita bitangila bukola bua Nzambi; ne wakitabujijibua ne Alama ne Amuleke bavua ne dimanya dienda, bualu wakitabujijibua ne bavua bamanya meji enda ne majinga a mutshima wenda; bualu bukola buvua bubapesha bua kumanya bintu ebi bilondeshila ku nyuma wa buprofete.
12.8: Ne Zêzeloma wakabanga kubebeja ne dinanukila, bua amanya bikola bitangila bukalenga bua Nzambi. Ne wakambila Alama: Etshi tshivua Amuleke muamba bitangila dibîka dia ku lufu dia bafua, ne bonsu ne babîka ku bafua, bonsu bakana ne badi kabayi bakana, ne badi bimanyishibua kumpala kua Nzambi bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu, tshidi tshiumvuija tshinyi?
12.9: Ne mpindiewu Alama wakabanga kumumvuija bintu ebi, wamba: Nzambi udi mupesha bantu ba bungi bua kumanya malu masokoka enda; nansha nanku Nzambi udi mubapesha mukenji mukola bua bamba amu tshitupa tshia dîyi didiye upesha bana ba bantu, bilondeshila ku ntema ne dinanukila bidibu bafila kudiye.
12.10: Ne bua nanku, ewu udi upapisha mutshima wenda, yeya udi upeta tshipesa tshikesa tshia dîyi; ne ewu udi kayi upapisha mutshima wenda to, kudiye tshipesa tshinena tshia dîyi netshipeshibua, tô ne pamupeshaye dimanya dia malu masokoka enda tô ne pa’amanyaye mu tshiwudi tshiawu.
12.11: Ne aba badi bapapisha mitshima yabu, Nzambi neabapesha tshipesa tshikesa tshia dîyi tô ne paluabu kumanya tshintu nansha tshimua bitangila malu masokoka; ne pashisha diabulu udi ubangata bakuatshibu, ne udi ubalombola ku disua dienda tô ne ku dinyanguka. Mpindiewu etshi ki diumvuija dia nkanu ya ngena.
12.12: Ne Amuleke wakakula patoka bitangila lufu, ne dijudishibua ku moyo wa tshifuaka ewu kulua ku ngikadilu udi kayi ufua, ne batuadibua kumpala kua tshilumbuluidi tshia Nzambi, bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi bietu.
12.13: Pashisha bu muvua mitshima yetu mipapishibua, eyowa, bu mutuvua bapapisha mitshima yetu ku dîyi dia Nzambi, mua ne kadiena disanganyibua munda muetu to, pananku ngikadilu wetu neikala mutamba bubi, bualu apu netupîshibua.
12.14: Bualu mêyi etu neatupîsha, eyowa, bienzedi bietu bionsu nebitupîsha; katuakupanga katoba to; ne meji etu kabidi neatupîsha; ne mu ngikadilu mutamba bubi ewu katuakuidikija kutangila kudi Nzambi wetu; ne tudi mua kusanka bu tuetu bua kuambila mbuebua ne mikuna bua bitukulukila bua kutusokokayi ku mesu kuenda.
12.15: Kadi kabiena mua kuikala nanku to; tudi ne tshia kuya ne kuimana kumpala kuenda ku butumbi buenda, ne mu bukola buenda, ne ku bukitu, bunena, ne bukalenga buenda, ne kuitabuja ku bundu buetu bua kashidi ne bitungu bienda bionsu bidi biakana, ne kuitabuja ne udi mululama mu bienzedi bienda bionsu, ne udi ne lusa kudi bana ba bantu, ne udi ne bukola bonsu bua kupandisha muntu yonsu udi witabuja mu dîna dienda ne udi ukuama bimuma bidi bikumbanyina dikudimuna dia mutshima.
12.16: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nnuambila ne pashisha lufu lumua ludi lulua, mena lufu luibîdi, ludi lufu lua nyuma; pashisha kudi diba didi ewu yonsu udi ufua mu mibi yenda, bitangila lufu lua mubidi, neafua kabidi lufu lua nyuma; eyowa, neafua bitangila bintu bia buakana.
12.17: Pashisha kudi tshikondu tshikala mpaji yabu bu dijiba dia kapia ne nsufulu, kena ndimi idi ibanda mûlu bua kashidi ne kashidi; ne pashisha kudi diba diabasuikabu ne nkanu bua dinyanguka dia kashidi, bilondeshila ku bukola ne bukuatshibu bua Satana, yeya udi mubabatshika bilondeshila ku disua dienda.
12.18: Pashisha, ndi nnuambila, nebikala bu disungila kadivua dienzeka to; bualu kabena mua kusungidibua to bilondeshila ku bululama bua Nzambi; ne kabena mua kufua to, bu mudiku kakuena kabidi dibola nansha.
12.19: Mpindiewu biakalua ne pakajikija Alama kuamba mêyi â, bantu bakabanga kukema bikola;
12.20: Kadi kuvua umua dîna Antiona, uvua mukôkeshi munena munkatshi muabu, wakalua ne wakamuambila: Etshi ntshinyi tshiwambi ne, muntu neajuka ku bafua ne ashintuludibua kumbuka ku ngikadilu wa tshifuaka kulua ku ngikadilu udi kayi ufua, ne anyima kena mua kafua nansha?
12.21: Mufundu udi wamba tshinyi, udi wamba ne Nzambi wakateka bakeluba ne muela wa mvita wa kapia ku esete wa budimi bua Edene, bua baledi betu ba kumpala kabalu kubuelamu ne kudia tshimuma tshia mutshi wa moyo, ne kuikala ne moyo bua kashidi? Ne nanku tudi tumona ne kakuvua mushindu wa bobu kuikala ne moyo bua kashidi to.
12.22: Mpindiewu Alama wakamuambila: Etshi tshidi tshintu tshimvua pabuipi ne kumvuija. Mpindiewu tudi tumona ne Adama wakapona bua kudia kua tshimuma tshikandika, bilondeshila ku dîyi dia Nzambi; ne nanku tudi tumona, ne ku dipona, bukua bantu bonsu buakalua bantu bajimina ne bapona.
12.23: Ne mpindiewu mona, ndi nkuambila ne bu biobi mua kuenzeka ne Adama uvua mudia tshimuma tshia mutshi wa moyo diba adi, lufu kaluvua mua kuikalaku to, ne dîyi divua kuikala tshianana, tshivua mua kuenza Nzambi muena mafi, bualu wakamba: Bualu wewa mudia neufua bulelela.
12.24: Ne tudi tumona ne lufu ludi lulua kudi bukua bantu, eyowa, lufu luvua Amuleke muamba, ludi lua mubidi; nansha nanku kuvua tshikondu tshipesha muntu bua yeya kukudimuna mutshima; bua nanku moyo ewu udi ulua ngikadilu wa kutêtshibua; diba dia kudilongolola bua kusambakena ne Nzambi; diba dia kudilongolola bua ngikadilu udi kayi ndekelu utuvua bakula, udi ulua kunyima kua dibîka dia bafua.
12.25: Mpindiewu, bu kabiyi bua bulongolodi bua disungila to, buvua butekibua kumbukila ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba, kakuvua mua kuikala dibîka dia bafua to; kadi kuvua bulongolodi bua disungila butekibua, buavuija dibîka dia bafua, divua diamba.
12.26: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bu biobi mua kuenzeka ne baledi betu ba kumpala bavua mua kuya ne kudia bimuma bia mutshi wa moyo bavua bashala bakengi bua kashidi, kabayi ne ngikadilu wa kudilongolola; ne nanku bulongolodi bua disungila buvua bunyanguka, ne dîyi dia Nzambi divua kuikala tshianana, dikala patupu.
12.27: Kadi monayi, kabivua nanku to; kadi kupangidikibua ne bantu badi ne tshia kufua; ne kunyima kua lufu, badi ne tshia kulua ku tshilumbuluilu, mena tshilumbuluilu tshimua tshituvua bamba, tshidi nshikidilu.
12.28: Ne kunyima kua Nzambi mupangadika ne bintu ebi biluila muntu, monayi, pashisha wakamona ne bivua bikengedibua bua muntu amanya bitangila bintu bivuaye mubapangidikila;
12.29: Bua nanku wakatuma banjelu bua kuyukila nabu, bakamuenesha bantu tshitupa tshia butumbi buenda.
12.30: Ne katshia ku diba adi tô ne kunyima bakabanga kubikila dîna dienda; bua nanku Nzambi wakayukila ne bantu, ne wakabamanyisha bulongolodi bua disungila, buvua bulongolodibua kumbukila ku tshibangilu tshia buloba; ne etshi wakabamanyisha bilondeshila ku ditabuja diabu ne dikudimuna dia mutshima ne bienzedi biabu bia tshijila.
12.31: Bua nanku, wakapesha bantu mikenji, bualu bavua bangabanga basambuka mikenji ya diambedi ya bintu bia pa buloba, ne balua bu ba Nzambi, bajingulula buimpa ku bubi, baditeka pa ngikadilu wa kuenza mudimu, anyi batekibua pa ngikadilu wa kuenza mudimu bilondeshila ku majinga ne masanka abu, ne bua kuenza bibi anyi bua kuenza bimpa—
12.32: Bua nanku Nzambi wakabapesha mikenji, kunyima kua kubamanyisha bulongolodi bua disungila, ne kabenji bubi to, bu mudi dinyoka diatshi dikala lufu luibîdi, luvua luikala lufu lua kashidi bua bintu bidi bitangila buakana; bualu bulongolodi bua disungila kabuvua kuikala ne bukola kudi bantu wa mushindu ewu to, bualu midimu ya bululama kayivua mua kunyangakajibua to, bilondeshila ku buimpa butamba bua Nzambi.
12.33: Kadi Nzambi wakabikila bantu, mu dîna dia Muanenda, (etshi tshikala bulongolodi bua disungila buvua butekibua) wamba: Binuakudimuna mutshima ne kanuyi bapapisha mitshima yenu to, nanku nengikala ne lusa kunudi kupitshila ku Muananyi Umuepela Mulela;
12.34: Bua nanku, ewu yonsu udi ukudimuna mutshima, ne kayi upapisha mutshima wenda to, neikala ne bunema pa lusa kupitshila ku Muananyi Umuepela Mulela, bua dilekedibua dia mibi yenda; ne aba nebabuela mu dikisha dianyi.
12.35: Ne ewu yonsu wapapisha mutshima wenda ne wenza malu mabi, monayi, ndi nditshipa mu tshiji tshianyi ne kakubuela mu dikisha dianyi to.
12.36: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, monayi ndi nnuambila ne, binuapapisha mitshima yenu kanuakubuela mu dikisha dia Mukalenga to; bua nanku malu mabi enu adi amuyobola bua ne anutumina tshiji tshienda bu mudi diyobola dia diambedi, eyowa, bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda mu diyobola dia ndekelu ne kabidi dia diambedi, tô ne ku dinyanguka dia kashidi dia anyima yenu; bua nanku, bilondeshila dîyi dienda, tô ne ku lufu lua ndekelu ne kabidi lua diambedi.
12.37: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, bu mutudi bamanya bintu ebi, ne bidi bilelela, tukudimunayi mutshima, ne katupapishi mitshima yetu to, bua katuyobodi Mukalenga Nzambi wetu mu didikuluila tshiji tshienda pa mutu petu bitangila mikenji yenda ya mibîdi eyi idiye mutupesha; kadi tubuelayi mu dikisha dia Nzambi, divuaye mulongola bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda.

13.1: Ne kabidi, bana betu, ndi musua kupingaja meji enu kunyima ku diba diakapesha Mukalenga Nzambi mikenji eyi kudi bana benda; ne ndi musua ne nuvuluka ne Mukalenga Nzambi wakajidila bakuidi, ku mulongu wenda wa tshijila, uvua ku mulongu wa Muanenda, bua kulongesha bantu malu â.
13.2: Ne bakuidi abu bavua bajididibua ku mulonga wa Muanenda, mu mushindu wa ne kudiwu bantu bamanya mushindu wa kutekemena kudi Muanenda bua disungila.
13.3: Ne ewu udi mushindu uvuabu bajididibua—bikala babikidibua ne balongolodibua kumbukila ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba bilondeshila ku budianjidi kumanya bua Nzambi, bua ditabuja diabu ditamba bunena ne bienzedi biabu bimpa; bangabanga bikala balekedibua bua kusungulabu buimpa anyi bubi; bua nanku bikala basungula buimpa, ne baleja ditabuja dipita bunena, mbabikidibua ne dibikidibua dia tshijila, eyowa, ne dibikidibua dia tshijila adi divua dilongolodibua ne, ne bilondeshila ku, disungila dia tshibangilu bua nanku.
13.4: Ne nanku mbabikidibua ku dibikidibua dia tshijila edi bua ditabuja diabu, patshivua bakuabu bapidia Nyuma wa Nzambi bua dipapa dia mitshima yabu ne bumpofu bua meji abu, patshivuabi ne, bu kabiyi nanku to bavua ne mua kuikala bapeta diakalengela dinena bu bana babu.
13.5: Anyi mu tshikosu, ku bangabanga bavua mushindu wa momumua ne bana babu; dibikidibua dia tshijila edi nanku divua dilongolola kumbukila ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba bua aba badi babenga kupapisha mitshima yabu, dikala munda mua ne kupitshila ku bupikudi bua Muana Umuepela Mulela, uvua mulongolodibua—
13.6: Ne badi babikidibua nanku ku dibikidibua dia tshijila edi, ne bajididibua ku buakuidi bunena bua mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, bua kulongesha mikenji yenda kudi bana ba bantu, bua kumonabu pabu bua kubuela mu dikisha dienda—
13.7: Buakuidi bunena ebu budi ku mulongu wa Muanenda wa Baluma, mulongu muina uvua muikalaku kumbukila ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba; anyi, mu mêyi makuabu, kabuena ne mbangilu wa matuku anyi ndekelu wa bidimu to, ne budi bulongolola tshiendelela ne tshiendelela, bilondeshila ku didianjila dimanya dia malu onsu—
13.8: Mpindiewu bakajididibua ku mushindu ewu—bikala babikidibua ne dibikidibua tshia tshijila, ne bajididibua ku mululu wa tshijila, ne bakitaba buakuidi bunena bua mulongu wa tshijila, dibikidibua dîna, ne mululu, ne buakuidi bunena, bidi kabiyi ne mbangilu anyi ndekelu to—
13.9: Nanku badi balua bakuidi banena bua kashidi, ku mulongu wa Muana, Umuepela Mulela wa Tatu, udi kayi ne mbangilu wa matuku anyi ndekelu wa bidimu to, udi muwula ntenta ne ngâsa, ne bujalama, ne bulelela. Ne nanku mudibi. Amena.
13.10: Mpindiewu, bu mumvua muamba bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila, anyi buakuidi bunena ebu, kuvua ba bungi bavua bajididibua ne bakalua bakuidi banena ba Nzambi; ne nku ditabuja diabu ditamba bunena ne ku dikudimuna diabu dia mutshima, ne ku buakana buabu kumpala kua Nzambi, bualu bakasungula bua kukudimuna mutshima ne kuenza buakana pa mutu pa kufua;
13.11: Bua nanku bavua babikidibua bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila ewu, ne bajididibua, ne bilamba biabu bisukudibua bitoka kupitshila ku mashi a Muana wa Mukoku.
13.12: Mpindiewu, kunyima kua bajididibua kudi Nyuma wa Tshijila, bilamba biabu bitokeshibua, bikala bakezuka ne kabayi ne katoba kumpala kua Nzambi to, kabavua mua kutangila mibi amu ne dinyoka; ne kuvua ba bungi, ba bungi bapita menamena, bavua bakezukibua ne bakabuela mu dikisha dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu.
13.13: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, ndi musua ne nudipuekesha kumpala kua Nzambi, ne nukuama bimuma bidi bikumbanyina dikudimuna dia mitshima, bua nubuela penu mu dikisha adi.
13.14: Eyowa, dipuekeshayi mena bu bantu ba mu matuku a Melekisedeke, uvua penda muakuidi munena bilondeshila ku mulongu wa momumua ewu umvua muamba, wakitaba penda buakuidi bunena bua kashidi.
13.15: Ne nyeya Melekisedeke umua ewu uvua Abalahama mufuta tshia dikumi kudiye; eyowa, mena tatuetu Abalahama wakafuta tshitupa tshimua tshia dikumi tshia bionsu bivuaye nabi.
13.16: Mpindiewu milulu eyi ivua mifidibua ku mushindu ewu, nanku bua bantu badi bindila Muana wa Nzambi, muvuatshi tshikala tshifuanyikiji tshia mulongu wenda, anyi muvuatshi tshikala mulongu wenda, ne bua bindila nanku bua dilekedibua dia mibi yabu, bua babuela mu dikisha dia Mukalenga.
13.17: Mpindiewu Melekisedeke ewu uvua mfumu mu bulaba bua Salema; ne bantu benda bavua bakolakana mu dienza dia malu mabi ne malu mapita bubi; eyowa, bavua bonsu bapambuka; bavua buwula ntenta ne mishindu yonsu ya bubi;
13.18: Kadi bualu Melekisedeke muikala muenzela ditabuja dikola, ne uvua muitaba mudimu wa buakuidi bunena bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, wakayisha bantu benda dikudimuna dia mutshima. Ne monayi, bakakudimuna mutshima; ne Melekisedeke wakashikika ditalala mu bulaba mu matuku enda; bua nanku wakabikidibua ne mfumu wa ditalala, bualu uvua mfumu wa mu Salema; ne uvua muikala mfumu kadi muikala ku bukôkeshi bua tatuenda.
13.19: Mpindiewu, kuvua ba bungi kumpala kuenda, ne kuvua kabidi ba bungi kunyima, kadi muntu nansha umua kavua mupita bunena to; bua nanku, yeya ki udibu nangananga batela.
13.20: Mpindiewu ntshiena nkengela kuambulula muanda ewu to; bindi muamba bidi bua kuikala bikumbana. Monayi, mifundu ya Nzambi idi kumpala kuenu; nuenu basua kuyikonyangalaja nebikala bua dinyanguka dienu nkayenu.
13.21: Ne mpindiewu biakenzeka ne pakabambila Alama mêyi â, wakôlola tshianza kudibu ne wakabila ne dîyi dikola, wamba ne: Mpindiewu ki diba dia kukudimuna mutshima, bualu dituku dia lupandu didi disemena pabuipi;
13.22: Eyowa, ne dîyi dia Mukalenga, ku mukana mua banjelu, didi dibumanyisha ku bisamba bionsu; eyowa, didi dibumanyisha, bua bapeta mukenji mulenga wa disanka dinena; eyowa, ne udi wamba mukenji mulenga ewu munkatshi mua bantu benda bonsu, eyowa, mena kudi badi batangalajibua kula pa mpala wa buloba; bua nanku mukenji mulenga udi mulua kutudi.
13.23: Ne didi ditumanyisha patoka, bua tuetu kumvua, bua katupambuki to; ne bidi nanku bua kuikala batambakanyi mu bulaba budi kabuyi bumanyika to; bua nanku, tudi basuibua bikola nanku, bualu tudi ne mukenji mulenga ewu mutuambila mu bitupa bionsu bia budimi buetu bua mvinyo.
13.24: Bualu monayi, banjelu badi baumanyisha kudi bantu ba bungi diba edi mu bulaba buetu; ne ebi bidi bua kipatshila ka kulongolola mitshima ya bana ba bantu bua kuitaba dîyi dienda diba dia dilua dienda mu butumbi buenda.
13.25: Ne mpindiewu tudi bindila amu, lumu lua disanka lua dilua dienda luakatumanyisha kupitshila ku mukana mua banjelu; bualu diba didi dilua, kadi katuena bamanya pâluadi. Bisankisha Nzambi ne bikala pantshidi ne moyo; kadi nansha bikala katataka anyi kunyima kua lufu luanyi, nensankilamu.
13.26: Ne nedimanyishibua kudi bantu balulama ne bansantu, kupitshila ku mukana mua banjelu, diba dia dilua dienda, bua mêyi a batatuetu akumbana, bilondeshila ku bivuabu bamba bimutangila, bivua bilondeshila ku nyuma wa buprofete uvua munda muabu.
13.27: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu, ndi njinga kumbukila ku ndondu wa mutshima wanyi, eyowa, ne dipampakana dinena tô ne ku dikenga, ne nuteleja mêyi anyi, ne nuimansha mibi yenu, ne kanupumbishi dituku dia dikudimuna dienu dia mutshima to;
13.28: Kadi ne nudipuekesha kumpala kua Mukalenga, ne nubila dîna dienda dia tshijila, ne nutungunuka kudimuka ne kusambila, bua kanutêtshibu kupita binudi mua kuambula to, ne nanku Nyuma wa Tshijila anulombola, ne nulua badipuekeshi, bapola, batumikidi, bena ditukija, buwula ne dinanga ne bulekelelu;
13.29: Ne nuikala ne ditabuja kudi Mukalenga; ne nuikala ne ditekemena bua nupeta moyo wa tshiendelela; ne nuikala diba dionsu ne dinanga dia Nzambi mu mitshima yenu, bua nubandishibua ku dituku dia ndekelu ne nubuela mu dikisha dienda.
13.30: Ne Mukalenga anupesha dikudimuna dia mitshima, bua kanuluishi tshiji tshienda kunudi to, bua nkanu ya ngena kayinukuatshi panshi to, bua kanukengi lufu luibîdi to.
13.31: Ne Alama wakambila bantu mêyi makuabu mapita bungi, adi kâyi mafundibua mu mukanda ewu to.

14.1: Ne biakalua ne kunyima kua yeya mujikija kuakula kudi bantu ba bungi babu bakitabuja mêyi enda, ne bakabanga kukudimuna mutshima, ne kukebulula mifundu.
14.2: Kadi tshitupa tshinena tshiabu tshivua tshijinga ne bashipa Alama ne Amuleke; bualu bavua bafîkila Alama tshiji, bua butoka bua mêyi enda avuaye muambila Zêzeloma; ne bavua bamba kabidi ne Amuleke uvua mubashima, ne uvua mupenda mikenji yabu ne kabidi balumbuluidi ne babalumbuluishi babu.
14.3: Ne bavua kabidi bafîkila Alama ne Amuleke tshiji; ne bakakeba bua kubashipa mu musokoku, bualu bavua babajadikila bubi buabu patoka.
14.4: Kadi kabakabashipa to; kadi bakabakuata ne bakabasuika ne mionji mikola, ne bakaya nabu kumpala kua mulumbuluishi munena wa mu bulaba.
14.5: Ne bantu bakalua ne bakabashiminyina—bajadika ne bavua bapenda mikenji, ne balumbuluidi ne balumbuluishi babu ba mu bulaba, ne kabidi bantu bonsu bavua mu bulaba; ne kabidi bavua bajadika ne kuvuanu Nzambi umua, ne neatuma Muanenda munkatshi mua bantu, kadi kakubapandisha to; ne bantu bakashiminyina Alama ne Amuleke bintu bia bungi bia mushindu ewu. Mpindiewu biakenzeka nanku kumpala kua mulumbuluishi munena wa mu bulaba.
14.6: Ne biakalua ne Zêzeloma wakakema mêyi avuabu bamba; ne uvua mumanya kabidi bitangila bumpofu bua meji, buvuaye mubueja munkatshi mua bantu ne mêyi enda a mafi; ne anyima wenda wakabanga kupandika pakamanyaye dipîla dienda; eyowa, makenga a ngena akabanga kumunyungulula.
14.7: Ne biakalua ne wakabanga kuela lubila kudi bantu, wamba ne: Monayi, ndi mupîla, ne bantu aba kabena ne katoba kumpala kua Nzambi to. Ne wakabanga kubakuila katshia ku diba adi; kadi bakamupenda, bamba ne: Udi peba ne diabulu anyi?
