36.24: Eyowa, ne katshia ku diba adi tô ne mpindiewu, ndi muenza mudimu kakuyi dilekela to, bua nduisha anyima ku dikudimuna dia mitshima; bua mbatuala ku dilabula dia disanka ditamba bunena dingakalabula; bua ne baledibua pabu kudi Nzambi, ne buwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila.
36.25: Eyowa, ne mpindiewu mona, Ô muananyi, Mukalenga udi umpesha disanka dinena menamena bua bualu bua mamuma a midimu yanyi;
36.26: Bualu bua dîyi didiye mumpesha, mona, ba bungi bakaledibua kudi Nzambi, ne bakalabula bu mungakalabula, ne bakadimuena ne mesu bu mungakadimuena; bua nanku mbamanya bintu bingakakula, bu mundi mubimanya; ne dimanya dindi nâdi didi difumina kudi Nzambi.
36.27: Ne ngakakuatshishibua mu matêta ne mu ntatu ya mishindu yonsu, eyowa, ne mu mishindu yonsu ya mpaji; eyowa, Nzambi wakampatuisha mu buloko, ne mu mionji, ne mu lufu; eyowa, ne ndi mueyemena kudiye, ne neampatuisha kabidi.
36.28: Ne ndi mumanya ne neanjula ku dituku dia ndekelu, bua kusomba nenda mu butumbi; eyowa, ne nemmutumbisha bua kashidi, bualu wakapatula batatuetu mu Ejipitu, ne wakadînyisha Bena Ejipitu mu Mbuwa Mukunza; ne wakabalombola ku bukola buenda mu bulaba bulaya; eyowa, ne wakabapatuisha mu bupika ne mu bukuatshibu ku tshikondu ne tshikondu.
36.29: Eyowa, ne wakapatula kabidi batatuetu mu bulaba bua Yelushalema; ne wakabapatuisha kabidi mu bupika ne mu bukuatshibu, ku bukola buenda bua kashidi, ku tshikondu ne tshikondu mena tô ne lelu ewu; ne ngakashala diba dionsu mu tshivulukilu tshia bukuatshibu buabu; eyowa, ne udi peba ne tshia kushala mu tshivulukilu tshia bukuatshibu buabu, bu mungakenza.
36.30: Kadi mona, muananyi; ebi nki mbionsu to; bualu udi ne tshia kumanya bu mundi mumanya, bua ne monsu muwalama mikenji ya Nzambi neulubuluka mu bulaba; ne udi ne tshia kumanya kabidi ne, monsu muwapanga kulama mikenji ya Nzambi, neukoshibua ku mpala kuenda. Mpindiewu etshi tshidi bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda.

37.1: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi Helamana, ndi nkupesha mukenji ne wangata miandiku ivua mmilamisha;
37.2: Ne ndi nkupesha mukenji kabidi ne ulama miandiku ya bantu aba, bilondeshila mumvua muenza, pa bitata bia Nefi, ne ulama ne tshijila bintu bionsu ebi bimvua mulama, mena bu mumvua mubilama; bualu bidi bilamibua bua kipatshila ka lungenyi.
37.3: Ne bitata bia tshiamua tshia kalabi ebi, bidi bikala ne mikanunu eyi, bidi ne miandiku ya mifundu ya tshijila pa mutu pabi, bidi bikala ne bulondanganyi bua bankambua betu, mena kumbukila ku mbangilu—
37.4: Mona, mêyi a buprofete avua mambibua kudi batatuetu ne, nebilamibua ne nebishîdibua tshikondu tshimua ne tshikuabu, ne tshianza tshia Mukalenga netshibilama ne netshibikuba tô ne payabi ku tshisamba tshionsu, tshîsa tshionsu, muakulu yonsu, ne bantu bonsu, bua nanku bamanya malu masokoka adipu.
37.5: Ne mpindiewu mona, bialamibuabi bidi ne tshia kulama diengeleka diabi; eyowa, ne nebilama diengeleka diabi; eyowa, ne bitata bionsu bidi bikala ne tshidi tshikala kaleta ka tshijila.
37.6: Mpindiewu udi mua kutshinka ne etshi busenji buanyi; kadi mona ndi nkuambila ne, ku malu makesa ne a mateketa malu manena atu enjibua; ne njila mikesa misangu ya bungi itu ipuwisha bena lungenyi.
37.7: Ne Mukalenga Nzambi utu wenzela imua njila bua kukumbaja tuipatshila tuenda tunena ne tua tshiendelela; ne ku njila mikesa bikola Mukalenga utu upuwisha bena lungenyi ne wenzeja lupandu lua anyima ya bungi.
37.8: Ne mpindiewu, bivua tô ne mpindiewu bikala bimpa mu lungenyi lua Nzambi ne bintu ebi bikubibua; bualu mona, bivua bivudija mvulukilu wa bantu aba, eyowa, ne bivua bitabujija ba bungi bitangila ditupakana dia njila yabu, ne bivua bibatuadila dimanya dia Nzambi wabu, bua lupandu lua anyima yabu.
37.9: Eyowa, ndi nkuambila ne, bu kabiyi bua bintu ebi bidi miandiku eyi mikala nabi to, bidi pa bitata ebi, Amona ne bana babu kabavua mua kuitabujija mena binunu bia Bena Lamana bitangila dipanga dia bujalama dia ngenzelu ya batatuabu; eyowa, miandiku eyi ne miaku yabu yakatuala dikudimuna dia mutshima; bivua ne, bakatuadibua ku dimanya dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne bua kusankila mu Yezu Kilisto Musungidi wabu.
37.10: Ne nganyi udi mumanya neikala njila wa kutuala binunu bia bungi biabu, eyowa, ne kabidi binunu bia bungi bia bana betu ba nshingu miumisha, Bena Nefi, badi bapapisha mpindiewu mitshima yabu mu mibi ne malu mabi, ku dimanya dia Musungidi wabu?
37.11: Mpindiewu malu masokoka â ka’ena manji kuikala mammanyisha menamena to; bua nanku nembenga ku’akula a bungi.
37.12: Ne bidi mua kukumbana mema muamba amu ne bidi bikuba bua kipatshila ka lungenyi, kipatshila kadi kamanyibua kudi Nzambi; bualu udi upesha meji mu lungenyi mu midimu yenda yonsu, ne njila yenda idi milulama, ne njila wenda udi tshijengu tshimua tshia tshiendelela.
37.13: Ô vuluka, vuluka, muananyi Helamana, bu mudiyi mikola mikenji ya Nzambi. Ne wakamba ne: Panualama mikenji yanyi nenulubuluka mu bulaba—kadi nuenu kanuyi balama mikenji yenda to nenukoshibua ku mpala kuenda.
37.14: Ne mpindiewu vuluka, muananyi, ne Nzambi udi mukulamisha bintu ebi, bidi bikala bia tshijila, bidiye mulama bia tshijila, ne bialamaye ne biakubaye kabidi bua kipatshila ka lungenyi buenda, bua aleja bukola buenda kudi nkongu ya bantu idi ilua.
37.15: Ne mpindiewu mona, ndi nkuambila ku nyuma wa buprofete ne, wewa musambuka mikenji ya Nzambi, mona, bintu ebi bidi bikala bia tshijila nebiumbushibua kûdi ku bukola bua Nzambi, ne neufidibua kudi Satana, bua akupepula bu mudi bisota kumpala kua lupepela.
37.16: Kadi biwalama mikenji ya Nzambi, ne biwenzela bintu ebi bidi bikala bia tshijila bilondeshila mudi Mukalenga ukupesha mukenji, (bualu udi ne tshia kuebeja Mukalenga bua bintu bionsu biwudi ne tshia kuenza nabi) mona, bukôkeshi bua pa buloba anyi bua ngena nansha bumua kabuena mua kukunyenga biobi to, bualu Nzambi udi mutamba bukola bua kukumbaja miaku yenda yonsu.
37.17: Bualu neakumbaja milayi yenda yonsu yâkulayaye, bualu uvua mukumbaja milayi yenda ivuaye mulaya batatuetu.
37.18: Bualu wakabalaya ne neakuba bintu ebi bua kipatshila ka lungenyi buenda, bua aleja bukola buenda kudi nkongu ya bantu idi ilua.
37.19: Ne mpindiewu mona, udi mukumbaja kipatshila kamua, mena ka dipingaja dia binunu bia bungi bia Bena Lamana ku dimanya dia bulelela; ne mmuleja bukola buenda kudibu, ne nealeja kabidi bukola buenda kudibu mu nkongu ya bantu idi ilua; bua nanku nebikubibua.
37.20: Bua nanku ndi kumpesha mukenji, muananyi Helamana, ne wikala munanukidi mu dikumbaja mêyi anyi onsu, ne wikala ne dinanukila mu dilama dia mikenji ya Nzambi bu midiyi mifunda.
37.21: Ne mpindiewu, nenkuambila bitangila bitata makumi abidi ne binayi abi, bua ubilama, bua malu masokoka ne midimu ya mîdima, ne midimu ya mu musokoku ya bantu abu bakabutuka, bimueneshibua kudi bantu aba; eyowa, dishibeya dia bantu diabu dionsu, ne dinyengangana diabu dia bintu bia benda, ne dipawula diabu dia bintu bia benda, ne bubi buabu bonsu ne malu mapita bubi abu onsu bimueneshibua kudi bantu aba; eyowa, ne ukuba biandamunyi bia miakulu ebi.
37.22: Bualu mona, Mukalenga wakamona ne bantu benda bakabanga kuenza mudimu mu mîdima, eyowa, kuenza dishibeya dia bantu ne malu mapita bubi mu musokoku; bua nanku Mukalenga wakamba ne, bobu kabayi bakudimuna mutshima to, badi babutuka pa mpala wa buloba.
37.23: Ne Mukalenga wakamba ne: nendongoluela musadidi wanyi Gazelema, dibua, diakenka mu mîdima bua bukenka, bua ndeja bantu banyi badi bansadila, bua mbaleja midimu ya bana babu, eyowa, midimu yabu ya mu musokoku, midimu yabu ya mîdima, ne bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu.
37.24: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, biandamunyi bia miakulu ebi bivua bilongolola bua dîyi dia Nzambi dikumbajibua, diakakulaye, wamba ne:
37.25: Nempatula midimu yabu ya mu musokoku ne malu abu mapita bubi ku mîdima ne nembileja patoka; ne nembabutula pa mpala wa buloba pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima; ne nentuala malu abu a mu musokoku ne malu mapita bubi abu onsu patoka, kudi tshisamba tshionsu tshiâsa mu bulaba ebu mu matuku adi alonda.
37.26: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, tudi tumona ne kabakakudimuna mutshima to; bua nanku bavua babutuka, ne tô ne mpindiewu dîyi dia Nzambi divua dikumbajibua; eyowa, malu mapita bubi abu a musokoku avua mapatudibua ku mîdima ne avua mamanyishibua kutudi.
37.27: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, ndi nkupesha mukenji ne, usokoka mitshipu yabu, ne bipungidi biabu, ne diuvuangana diabu dia malu mapita bubi abu a mu musokoku; eyowa, ne neusokoka bimanyinu biabu bionsu ne malu abu a dikema onsu kudi bantu aba, bua kababimanyi to, bua pamuapa kabalu kabidi kupona mu mîdima ne kabalu kubutuka.
37.28: Bualu mona, kudi mulawu pa mutu pa bulaba ebu bonsu, bua ne dibutuka nedilua kudi benji ba midimu ya mîdima bonsu, bilondeshila ku bukola bua Nzambi, pikalabu baboba menamena; bua nanku ndi njinga ne bantu aba kababutuki to.
37.29: Bua nanku neusokoka malongolodi a mu musokoku a mitshipu yabu ne bipungidi biabu kudi bantu aba ne neubamanyisha bubi buabu ne dishibeya dia bantu diabu ne malu mapita bubi abu; ne neubalongesha bua kukina bubi ne malu mapita bubi ne dishibeya dia bantu bia buena ebi; ne neubalongesha kabidi ne bantu aba bavua babutuka bua bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu ne bua dishibeya dia bantu diabu.
37.30: Bualu mona, bakashibeya baprofete bonsu ba Mukalenga bakalua munkatshi muabu bua kubamanyisha malu mabi abu; ne mashi a bakashibeyabu akabila kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wabu bua disombuela kudi bavua babashibeyi; ne nanku bitungu bia Nzambi biakalua pa mutu pa benji ba midimu ya mîdima ne bipungidi bia mu musokoku aba.
37.31: Eyowa, ne bulaba ebu nebutshipibua bua kashidi ne kashidi bua benji ba mudimu wa mu mîdima ne wa bipungidi bia mu musokoku aba, mena tô ne ku dibutuka, pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima kumpala kua kubobabu menamena.
37.32: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, vuluka mêyi andi mukuambila; kupeshi bantu aba malongolodila masokoka â to, kadi balongesha lukinu lua kashidi lua mibi ne malu mabi.
37.33: Bayisha dikudimuna dia mutshima ne ditabuja kudi Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto; balongesha bua kudipuekesha ne kuikala bapola ne bapuekela mu mutshima; balongesha bua kukolela matêtshibua onsu a diabulu, ne ditabuja diabu kudi Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto.
37.34: Balongesha bua kabatshioki bienzedi bimpa nansha, kadi bua kuikala bapola ne bapuekela mu mutshima; bualu ba nanku nebapeta dikisha bua anyima yabu.
37.35: Ô, vuluka, muananyi, ne longa lungenyi mu bunsonga bueba; eyowa, longa mu bunsonga bueba bua kulama mikenji ya Nzambi.
37.36: Eyowa, ne bila kudi Nzambi bua didikuatshisha dieba dionsu; eyowa, lekela midimu yeba yonsu ikala bua Mukalenga, ne lekela konsu kûdi uya kuikala mu Mukalenga; eyowa, lekela meji eba onsu aludikibua kudi Mukalenga; eyowa, lekela dinanga dia mu mutshima weba ditekibua mu Mukalenga bua kashidi.
37.37: Ebeja Mukalenga mu midimu yeba yonsu, ne neakuludika mu buimpa; eyowa, pawudi ulala panshi butuku, lala panshi mu Mukalenga, bua akulama mu tulu tueba; ne pawudi ubîka mu dinda lekela mutshima weba wikala muwula ne tuasakidila kudi Nzambi; ne biwenza malu â, neubandishibua ku dituku dia ndekelu.
37.38: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, ndi ne kakesa ka kuamba bitangila tshintu tshidi batatuetu babikila ne dibulungu, anyi kaludiki—anyi batatuetu bavua batshibikila ne Liahona, tshidi mu diandamuna dia miakulu tshiamba ne kaleji njila; ne Mukalenga uvua mutshilongolola.
37.39: Ne mona, kakuena muntu nansha umua udi mua kuenza mudimu ku mushindu wa mudimu wa bianza wa dikema nanku awu to. Ne mona, tshivua tshilongolodibua bua kuleja batatuetu njila uvuabu ne bua kulonda mu tshipela.
37.40: Ne tshiakabenzela mudimu bilondeshila ku ditabuja diabu kudi Nzambi; bua nanku, bu bobu ne ditabuja bua kuitaba ne Nzambi uvua mua kutangidija tulonda etu ku njila uvuabu ne bua kuya, mona bivua bienzeka; bua nanku bakamona tshishima etshi, ne bishima bikuabu bia bungi kabidi bivua bienzeka ku bukola bua Nzambi, ku dituku ne ku dituku.
37.41: Nansha nanku, bualu bishima bionsu abi bivua bienzeka ku njila mikesa, tshiakabaleja midimu ya dikema. Bavua bafuba, ne bakapua moyo bua kuenzela ditabuja ne dinanukila diabu ne pashisha midimu ya dikema ayi yakajika, ne kabakaya kumpala mu luendu luabu to;
37.42: Bua nanku, bakanenga mu tshipela, anyi kabakenda mu njila mululama to, ne bakatatshishibua ne nzala ne nyota, bua disambuka dia mikenji diabu.
37.43: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, ndi musua ne umvua ne bintu ebi kabiena bipanga tshindidimbi to; bualu pavua batatuetu bikala bafuba bua kuteya ntema ku kaleji njila aka (mpindiewu bintu ebi bivua bia pa buloba) kabakalubuluka to; bidi mena momumua nanku bua bintu bia mu nyuma.
37.44: Bualu mona, bidi mena biteketa kuteya ntema ku dîyi dia Kilisto, diakuleja njila mululama wa ku disanka dia tshiendelela, bu muvuabi bua batatuetu bua kuteya ntema ku kaleji njila aka, kavua bua kubaleja njila mululama wa ku bulaba bulaya.
37.45: Ne mpindiewu ndi ngamba ne, kakuena tshifuanyikiji mu bualu ebu anyi? Bualu bushuwa bu muvua kaludiki aka kalombola batatuetu, ku dilonda dia njila waku, ku bulaba bulaya, patualonda njila wa miaku ya Kilisto neitusambuisha dinsambu dia tshibanda etshi tshia kanyinganyinga ne neitufikisha ku bulaba bua mulayi budi bupita buimpa.
37.46: Ô muananyi, katuikadi bafuba bua buteketa bua njila to; bualu ki muvuabi nanku bua batatuetu; bualu ki muvuabi bilongolola buabu, bua ne bikalabu batangila, bavua bapeta moyo; mena ki mudibi buetu. Njila udi mulongolola, ne bituatangila, netupeta moyo bua kashidi.
37.47: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, tangila ne ulama bintu bia tshijila ebi, eyowa, tangila ne utangila kudi Nzambi ne wikala ne moyo. Ndâku kudi bantu aba ne bamanyisha dîyi, ne ikala ne bushindama. Muananyi, ushala bilenga.

38.intro: Mikenji ya Alama kudi muanenda wa baluma Shibulona.
38.1: Muananyi wa baluma, teya matshi ku mêyi anyi, bualu ndi nkuambila ne, mena bu mungakambila Helamana ne, monsu muwalama mikenji ya Nzambi neulubuluka mu bulaba; ne monsu muwapanga kulama mikenji ya Nzambi neukoshibua ku mpala kuenda.
38.2: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi mutekemena ne nempeta disanka dinena kûdi, bua disuminyina dieba ne lulamatu lueba kudi Nzambi; bualu muwuvua mutuadija kutangidila kudi Mukalenga Nzambi weba mu bunsonga bueba, bia momumua mena ndi mutekemena ne neutungunuka ne kulama kua mikenji yenda; bualu mubeneshibua ngudi unanukila tô ne ku ndekelu.
38.3: Ndi nkuambila, muananyi wa baluma, ne nkavua mupeta disanka dinena bueba, bua bualu bua lulamatu lueba ne dinanukila dieba, ne ditukija dieba ne bulekelelu bueba munkatshi mua bantu ba Zolama.
38.4: Bualu ndi mumanya uvua mu mionji; eyowa, ne ndi kabidi mumanya ne bakakuasa mabua bua bualu bua dîyi; ne wakambula bionsu ebi ne ditukija bualu Mukalenga uvua neba; ne mpindiewu udi mumanya ne Mukalenga wakakupatuisha.
38.5: Ne mpindiewu muananyi wa baluma, Shibulona, ndi musua ne uvuluka ne, monsu muweyemena kudi Nzambi mena neupatuishibua momumua nanku ku matêta eba, ne ntatu yeba, ne mpaji yeba, ne neubandishibua ku dituku dia ndekelu.
38.6: Mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ntshiena musua ne wela meji ne ndi mudimanyina bintu ebi nkayanyi to, kadi Nyuma wa Nzambi udi munda muanyi ki udi ummanyisha bintu ebi; bualu bu mema ntshiyi muledibua kudi Nzambi to, ntshivua mmanya bintu ebi to.
38.7: Kadi mona, Mukalenga mu lusa luenda lunena wakatuma muanjelu wenda bua nkumanyisha mvua ne tshia kulekela mudimu wa dinyanguka munkatshi mua bantu benda; eyowa, ne ndi mumona muanjelu ku mpala ne mpala, ne wakakula nanyi, ne dîyi dienda divua bu dikubakuba, ne diakanyungusha buloba bujima.
38.8: Ne biakalua ne ngakenza matuku asatu ne butuku busatu mu dikenga ne dipampakana dikola kupita dia anyima; ne ntshiakapeta dilekedibua dia mibi yanyi nansha, tô ne pangakabila kudi Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto bua kulomba lusa. Kadi mona, ngakabila kudiye ne ngakapeta ditalala bua anyima wanyi.
38.9: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi mukuambila nanku bua ulonga lungenyi, bua ulonga kundi ne kakuena njila anyi mushindu mukuabu kudi muntu kupandishibua to, amu munda mua ne kudi Kilisto. Mona, yeya udi moyo ne bukenka bua ba pa buloba. Mona, yeya udi dîyi dia bulelela ne dia buakana.
38.10: Ne mpindiewu, bu muwudi mubanga kulongesha dîyi mena nanku ndi musua ne utungunuka ne kulongesha; ne ndi musua ne wikala munanukidi ne mudikandi mu bintu bionsu.
38.11: Manya bua kubenga kudibandisha mu diditambisha; eyowa, manya bua kuikadi udileja bua lungenyi lueba to, anyi bua bukola bueba bua bungi to.
38.12: Ikala ne dikima, kadi diambu to; ne kabidi manya bua kukanda majinga eba onsu, bua wewa uwujibua ntenta ne dinanga; manya bua kulekela bufuba.
38.13: Kusambidi bu mudi Bena Zolama benza to, bualu udi mumona ne badi basambila bua bumvuibua kudi bantu, ne bua basamunyibua bua lungenyi luabu.
38.14: Kuambi to ne: Ô Nzambi, ndi nkusakidila bualu tudi bimpa kupita bana betu; kadi amba ne: Ô Mukalenga, mbuikidila dipanga bukumbana dianyi, ne vuluka bana betu mu lusa—eyowa, itabuja diba dionsu dipanga dieba kumpala kua Nzambi.
38.15: Ne Mukalenga abenesha anyima weba, ne akuakidila ku dituku dia ndekelu mu bukalenga buenda, bua wewa kusomba mu ditalala. Mpindiewu ndâku, muananyi wa baluma, ne longesha dîyi kudi bantu aba. Ikala ne bushindama. Muananyi wa baluma, ushala bilenga.

39.intro: Mikenji ya Alama kudi muanenda wa baluma Koliantona.
39.1: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi ne mêyi makesa makuabu akukuambila adi mashilangana ne amvua muambila muanenu wa baluma; bualu mona, kuena mumona disuminyina dia muanenu wa baluma, lulamatu luenda, ne dinanukila dienda mu dilama dia mikenji ya Nzambi anyi? Mona, kakakuleja tshilejilu tshimpa anyi?
39.2: Bualu kuena muteya ntema ya bungi ku mêyi anyi bu mudi muanenu wa baluma to, munkatshi mua Bena Zolama. Mpindiewu ebu mbualu bundi nabu kûdi; wakatungunuka tô ne mu diditambisha bua bukola bueba ne lungenyi lueba.
39.3: Ne ebi kabiena bionsu to, muananyi. Wakenza tshivua tshibi bikola kundi; bualu wakalekela disadila, ne wakaya ku bulaba bua Silona ku mikalu ya Bena Lamana, ulonda Izabela ndumba.
39.4: Eyowa, uvua mupambula mitshima ya bantu ba bungi; kadi etshi katshivua tshikubingisha to, muananyi. Uvua ne bua kudifila ku disadila diwuvua mupeshibua.
39.5: Muananyi, kuena mumanya ne malu â adi bualu bupita bubi ku mesu kua Mukalenga; eyowa, bualu bupita bubi kumpala kua mibi yonsu, pa kumbusha dimatshisha dia mashi a muntu udi kayi ne bualu anyi divila dia Nyuma wa Tshijila anyi?
39.6: Bualu mona, biwavila Nyuma wa Tshijila pakadiye mumana kupeta kaba munda mueba, ne udi mumanya ne udi uvila, mona, etshi tshidi bubi budi kabuyi bubuikidibua to; eyowa, ne ewu yonsu udi ushibeya muntu, mu kushilangana ne muinda ne dimanya dia Nzambi, kabiena biteketa bua yeya kupeta dibuikidila to; eyowa, muananyi wa baluma, ndi nkuambila ne kabiena biteketa bua yeya kupeta dibuikidila to.
39.7: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi njinga kudi Nzambi bua ne kuikadi mupîla bu bubi bunena ebu to. Ntshivua bua kusombela mibi yeba to, bua kupandisha anyima weba, bu kabiyi bua diakalenga dieba.
39.8: Kadi mona, kuena mua kusokoka mibi yeba kudi Nzambi to; ne pa kumbusha wewa mukudimuna mutshima nebikala bu tshijadikilu tshiakutuisha ku dituku dia ku ndekelu.
39.9: Mpindiewu muananyi, ndi musua ne ukudimuna mutshima ne ulekela mibi yeba, ne kulondi kabidi lukuka lua mesu eba to, kadi dipidia mu bintu ebi; bualu pa kumbusha wewa muenza nanku kuena mua kupiana bukalenga bua Nzambi to nansha bishi. Ô, vuluka, ne diambuila bujitu ebu, ne dipidia mu bintu ebi.
39.10: Ne ndi nkuelela mukenji bua udiambuila bujitu bua kuebeja bakulu beba ba baluma bitangila midimu yeba; bualu mona, udi mu bunsonga bueba, ne udi ne dijinga dia kudîshibua kudi bana benu ba baluma. Ne teya ntema ku mubelu wabu.
39.11: Kudilekedi bua kupambuishibua kudi tshintu tshia tshianana ne tshisenji nansha tshimua to; kulekedi ne diabulu apambula mutshima weba kabidi mu dilonda dia bandumba babi abu to. Mona, Ô muananyi, bu mudibu bunena bualu bubi buwakatuala pa Bena Zolama; bualu pakamonabu bienzedi bieba bakabenga kuitabuja mêyi anyi.
39.12: Ne mpindiewu Nyuma wa Mukalenga udi ungambila ne: Elela bana beba mukenji bua benza malu mimpa, bua kabapambuishi mitshima ya bantu ba bungi ku dinyanguka; bua nanku ndi nkuelela mukenji, muananyi, mu ditshina dia Nzambi, bua kubenga malu mabi eba;
39.13: Ne ukudimuka kudi Mukalenga ne meji, bukitu, ne makanda eba onsu; bua kupambuishi kabidi mitshima ya bantu bua kuenza bubi to; kadi upingana kudibu, ne witabuja mapanga eba ne bubi abu buwuvua muenza.
39.14: Kukebi mabanji anyi bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba ebu to; bualu mona, kuena mua kuya nabi to.
39.15: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi, ndi musua kukuambila kakesa bitangila dilua dia Kilisto. Mona, ndi nkuambila ne, yeya ki walua bushuwa ne nealua bua kumbusha mibi ya ba pa buloba; eyowa, udi ulua kumanyisha bantu benda mukenji mulenga wa lupandu.
39.16: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, etshi tshivua disadila diwuvua mubikidila, bua kumanyisha bantu aba mukenji mulenga, bua kulongolola meji abu; anyi bua lupandu lulua kudibu, bua balongolola meji a bana babu bua kumvua dîyi diba dialuaye.
39.17: Ne mpindiewu nempepeja meji eba kakesa pa bualu ebu. Mona, udi ukema bua tshinyi bintu ebi bidi bimanyishibua musangu mula kumpala kua kuenzekabi. Mona, ndi nkuambila ne, anyima kawena ne mushinga kudi Nzambi diba edi bu muikalawu mu diba dia dilua dienda anyi?
39.18: Kabiena bikengela ne bulongolodi bua disungila bumanyishibua kudi bantu aba momumua ne kudi bana babu anyi?
39.19: Kabiena biteketa mu diba edi bua Mukalenga kutumaye muanjelu wenda bua kutumanyisha mukenji mulenga ewu bu kudi bana betu, anyi momumua ne kunyima kua diba dia dilua dienda anyi?

40.1: Mpindiewu muananyi wa baluma, mona kakesa kakuabu kandi musua kukuambila; bualu ndi mumona ne meji eba adi aditatshisha bitangila dibîka dia ku lufu.
40.2: Mona, ndi nkuambila ne, kakuena dibîka dia ku lufu to—anyi, mu mêyi makuabu, nengamba ne mubidi wa tshifuaka ewu kena uvuala mubidi udi kawuyi ufua to, mubidi wa dibola ewu kena uvuala mubidi udi kawuyi ubola to—tô ne kunyima kua dilua dia Kilisto.
40.3: Mona, udi utuala dibîka dia ku lufu dia bafua. Kadi mona, muananyi wa baluma, dibîka dia ku lufu kadiena dianji kufika to. Mpindiewu, ndi nkujinguluila bualu busokoka; nansha nanku, kudi malu masokoka a bungi adi malama, adi muntu kayi mumanya to amu Nzambi nkayenda. Kadi ndi nkuleja tshintu tshimua tshindi muebeja ne dinanukila kudi Nzambi bua mmanya—ne mbitangila dibîka dia ku lufu.
40.4: Mona, kudi diba dipangidikibua diajuka bonsu ku bafua. Mpindiewu muntu kena mumanya padi diba edi dilua to; kadi Nzambi udi mumanya diba didi dipangidikibua.
40.5: Mpindiewu, ne biakuikala musangu umua, anyi musangu muibîdi, anyi musangu muisâtu, wajuka bantu ku bafua, kabiena ne bualu to; bualu Nzambi mumanya bintu bionsu; ne mbikumbana bua mema mema kumanya ne bienzeka nanku—ne kudi diba dipangidikibua diajuka bonsu ku bafua.
40.6: Mpindiewu kudi ne tshia kukuila mutantshi pankatshi pa diba dia lufu ne diba dia dibîka dia ku lufu.
40.7: Ne mpindiewu ndi ngebeja ne tshinyi tshiafikila anyima ya bantu kumbuka ku diba dia lufu tô ne ku diba didi dipangidikibua bua dibîka dia ku lufu?
40.8: Mpindiewu nansha kuikala misangu mipita umua mipangidikibua bua bantu kujuka kabiena ne bualu to; bualu bonsu kabena bafua musangu umua to, ne etshi katshiena ne bualu to; bionsu bidi bu dituku dimua kudi Nzambi, ne diba didi dibadibua amu kudi bantu.
40.9: Bua nanku, kudi diba dipangidikibua bua bantu ne nebajuka ku bafua; ne kudi mutantshi pankatshi pa diba dia lufu ne dibîka dia ku lufu. Ne mpindiewu, bitangila mutantshi wa diba ewu, tshiafikila anyima ya bantu ki tshintu tshimvua muebeja ne dinanukila kudi Mukalenga bua kumanya; ne etshi ki tshintu tshindi mumanya.
40.10: Ne palua diba diajuka bonsu, pashisha nebamanya ne Nzambi udi mumanya meba onsu adi mapangidikibua bua bukua bantu.
40.11: Mpindiewu, bitangila ne ngikadilu wa anyima pankatshi pa lufu ne dibîka dia ku lufu—Monayi, bivua bimmanyisha kudi muanjelu ne, nyuma ya bantu bonsu, katataka padiyi ipatuka mu mubidi wa tshifuaka ewu, eyowa, nyuma ya bantu bonsu, nansha ya bantu bimpa anyi babi, idi yalujibua kuabu, kudi Nzambi awu wakayipesha moyo.
40.12: Ne pashisha nebifika ne, nyuma ya badi bakana idi yakididibua mu ngikadilu wa disanka, udi ubikidibua ne mpaladiso, ngikadilu wa dîkisha, ngikadilu wa ditalala, muaba wikishilabu ku ntatu yabu yonsu ne ku diditatshisha ne dibungama dionsu.
40.13: Ne pashisha nebifika ne, nyuma ya babi bapita, eyowa, badi bibi—bualu mona, kabena ne kapesa anyi tshitupa tshia Nyuma wa Mukalenga to; bualu mona, bavua basungula bienzedi bibi pa mutu pa bimpa; bua nanku nyuma wa diabulu uvua mubuela munda muabu, ne uvua muakangata nzubu yabu—ne aba nebimanshibua mu mîdima ya pambelu; nekuikala muadi, ne kudilakana, ne disumakana dia menu, ne ebi bua malu mabi abu nkayabu, bikala balombolodibua bakuatshibu ku disua dia diabulu.
40.14: Mpindiewu ewu udi ngikadilu wa anyima ya bantu babi, eyowa, mu mîdima, ne mu ngikadilu wa dindila dibi ditamba ne bôwa, dia difîka munda didi bu kapia dia tshiji tshia Nzambi kudibu; nanku badi bashala mu ngikadilu ewu, bu mudi bantu bakana bashala mu mpaladiso, tô ne diba dia dibîka dia ku lufu.
40.15: Mpindiewu, kudi bamua bantu bavua bumvua ne buikadi bua disanka ebu ne buikadi bua dikenga ebu bua anyima, kumpala kua dibîka dia ku lufu, uvua dibîka dia ku lufu dia diambedi. Eyowa, ndi ngitaba ne udi mua kubikidibua ne dibîka dia ku lufu, dijuka dia nyuma anyi anyima ne difidibua diabu ku disanka anyi ku dikenga, bilondeshila ku mêyi adi mâkudibua.
40.16: Ne mona, bivua biakudibua kabidi, ne kudi dibîka dia ku lufu dia diambedi, dibîka dia ku lufu dia bonsu bavuaku, anyi badiku, anyi bikalaku, kupueka tô ne ku dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto.
40.17: Mpindiewu, katuena tutshinka ne dibîka dia ku lufu dia diambedi edi, didi diakudibua mu mushindu ewu, didi mua kuikala dibîka dia ku lufu dia anyima ne difidibua diayi ku disanka anyi ku dikenga. Kuena mua kutshinka ne bidi biumvuija nanku to.
40.18: Mona, ndi nkuambila ne, To; kadi bidi biumvuija ne disangisha pamua dia anyima ne mubidi, dia bavuaku katshia ku matuku a Adama kupueka tô ne ku dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto.
40.19: Mpindiewu, nansha biasangishibua musangu umua, anyima ne mibidi yonsu ya aba badi bâkudibua, bantu babi ne kabidi bantu bakana, ntshiena ngamba nanku to; bikumbana ne ngamba ne bonsu nebajuka; anyi mu mêyi makuabu, dibîka dia ku lufu diabu nedienzeka kumpala kua dibîka dia ku lufu dia aba bâfua kunyima kua dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto.
40.20: Mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ntshiena ngamba ne dibîka dia ku lufu diabu didi dilua diba dia dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto; kadi mona, ndi ngamba nanku bilondeshila dimona dianyi, ne anyima ne mibidi bidi bisangishibua kabidi, bia bantu bakana, diba dia dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto, ne dibanda dienda mu diûlu.
40.21: Kadi ne diba dia dibîka dia ku lufu anyi kunyima, ntshiena ngamba to; kadi mbindi ngamba bungi ebu, ne kudi mutantshi pankatshi pa lufu ne dibîka dia ku lufu dia mubidi, ne ngikadilu wa anyima mu disanka anyi mu dikenga tô ne diba didi Nzambi mupangadika diajuka bafua, ne diasangishibuabu kabidi, anyima ne mubidi, ne dîmanyikibuabu kumpala kua Nzambi, ne dialumbuluishibuabu bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu.
40.22: Eyowa, etshi tshidi tshienzeja dipingaja dia bintu didi diakudibua kupitshila ku mikana ya baprofete.
40.23: Anyima neapingajibua ku mubidi, ne mubidi ku anyima; eyowa, ne tshidimba tshionsu ne dinungu dionsu nebipingajibua ku mubidi wabi; nansha lusuki lua ku mutu lumua kaluakujimina to; kadi bintu bionsu nebipingajibua mu mushindu wabi muakana ne mujima.
40.24: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, etshi ki dipingaja didi diakudibua kupitshila ku mikana ya baprofete—
40.25: Ne pashisha bantu bakana nebakenka mu bukalenga bua Nzambi.
40.26: Kadi mona, lufu lutamba bubi ludi luluila bantu babi; bualu badi bafua bitangila bintu bia buakana; bualu kabena bakana to, ne tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshiakana to katshiena mua kupiana bukalenga bua Nzambi to; kadi nebipatshibua, ne bafidibua bua kudia bimuma bia midimu yabu anyi bienzedi biabu, ivua mikala mibi; ne badi banua binyindanyinda bia dikopu dia bululu.

41.1: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi ne kakesa ka kuamba bitangila dipingaja didi diakudibua; bualu mona, bamua bantu mbakonyangalaja mifundu ya Nzambi, ne mbapambuka kula bua bualu ebu. Ne ndi mumona ne meji eba adi aditatshisha kabidi bitangila bualu ebu. Kadi mona, nenkûmvuijabu.
41.2: Muananyi wa baluma, ndi nkuambila ne bulongolodi bua dipingaja budi bukengedibua ne bululama bua Nzambi; bualu bidi bikengela ne bintu bionsu bipingajibua mu bulongama buabi buakana. Mona, bidi bikengela ne bidi biakana, bilondeshila ku bukola ne dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto, ne anyima wa muntu apingajibua ku mubidi wenda, ne tshitupa tshionsu tshia mubidi tshipingajibua kudiwu.
41.3: Ne bidi bikengela bilondeshila ku bululama bua Nzambi ne bantu balumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu; ne pikala bienzedi biabu bikala bimpa mu matuku a moyo â, ne majinga a mitshima yabu mikala mimpa, ne bapingajibua kabidi kudi tshidi tshimpa, ku dituku dia ndekelu.
41.4: Ne bikala bienzedi biabu bibi, nebipingajibua kudibu bua bubi. Bua nanku, bintu bionsu nebipingajibua mu bulongama buabi bulelela, tshintu tshionsu mu mushindu watshi wa ku tshifukilu—mubidi wa tshifuaka ujudishibua mu mubidi udi kawuyi ufua, mubidi wa dibola mu mubidi udi kawuyi ubola—ujuka bua disanka dia kadiyi ndekelu bua kupiana bukalenga bua Nzambi, anyi bua dikenga dia kadiyi ndekelu bua kupiana bukalenga bua diabulu, etshi ku tshianza etshi, ne tshikuabu ku tshianza tshikuabu—
41.5: Tshimua tshijula ku disanka bilondeshila ku majinga enda bua disanka, anyi buimpa bilondeshila ku majinga enda bua buimpa; ne tshikuabu ku bubi bilondeshila ku majinga enda bua bubi; bualu udi mujinga bua kuenza bubi dituku dijima dionsu, momumua neapeta difutu dienda dia bubi palua butuku.
41.6: Ne bidi nanku ku tshianza tshikuabu. Pikalaye mukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenda, ne mujinga buakana tô ne ku nshikidilu wa matuku enda, nanku mena neamufutshibua buakana.
41.7: Aba ki badi basungidibua kudi Mukalenga; eyowa, aba ki badi bapatudibua, ne bapatuishibua ku butuku bua mîdima abu budi kabuyi ndekelu; ne nanku badi bimana anyi badi bapona; bualu mona, badi balumbuluishi babu nkayabu, pikalabi bua kuenza buimpa anyi bua kuenza bubi.
41.8: Mpindiewu, mikenji ya Nzambi kayena mua kukudimuka to; bua nanku, njila udi mulongolola bua ewu yonsu udi musua enda mômu ne apandishibua.
41.9: Ne mpindiewu mona, muananyi wa baluma, kuidikiji kuenza tshilema tshikuabu kabidi kudi Nzambi weba bitangila malu a dilongesha awu, awuvua muidikija tô ne mpindiewu bua kuenza mibi to.
41.10: Kuedi meji ne, bualu bivua biakudibua bitangila dipingaja, ne neupingajibua kumbuka ku mibi bua kupeta disanka. Mona, ndi nkuambila ne, bubi kabutu buikala disanka nansha.
41.11: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, bantu bonsu badi mu ngikadilu wa mfukilu, anyi ndi musua kuamba, mu ngikadilu wa mu mubidi, badi mu kanyonga ka bululu ne mu mionji ya malu mabi; kabena ne Nzambi pa buloba to, ne mbenda bashilangana ne buikadi bua Nzambi; bua nanku, badi mu buikadi bushilangana ne ngikadilu wa disanka.
41.12: Ne mpindiewu mona, diumvuija dia muaku “dipingaja” didi kuangata tshintu mu ngikadilu wa mfukilu ne kutshiteka mu ngikadilu udi kayi wa mfukilu, anyi kutshiteka mu ngikadilu udi mushilangana ne buikadi buatshi anyi?
41.13: Ô, muananyi wa baluma, kabiena nanku to; kadi diumvuija dia muaku “dipingaja” didi kutuala kabidi bubi bua bubi, anyi tshia mu mubidi bua tshia mu mubidi, anyi tshiena diabulu bua tshiena diabulu—tshimpa bua tshidi tshimpa; tshiakana bua tshidi tshiakana; tshilulama bua tshidi tshilulama; tshia lusa bua tshidi tshia lusa.
41.14: Bua nanku, muananyi wa baluma, tangila ne wikala ne lusa kudi bana benu; ubenzela malu malulama, ulumbuluisha ne buakana, ne wenza buimpa diba dionsu; ne pawikala muenza bintu bionsu ebi pashisha neupeta difutu dieba; eyowa, lusa nelupingajibua kûdi kabidi; bululama nebupingajibua kûdi kabidi; tshilumbuluilu tshiakana netshipingajibua kûdi kabidi; ne buimpa nebufutshibua kûdi kabidi.
41.15: Bualu tshiwudi upatula netshikupinganyina kabidi, ne netshipingajibua; bua nanku, muaku “dipingaja” udi upîsha muenji wa mibi bikola bipita kabidi, ne kawena umubingisha nansha mushindu kayi.

42.1: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi mumona ne kudi tshintu tshikesa tshikuabu tshidi tshitatshisha meji eba, tshiwudi kuyi mua kumvua to—tshidi tshitangila bululama bua Nzambi bitangila dinyoka dia Nzambi dia muenji wa mibi; bualu udi widikija kutshinka ne bidi kupanga kua bululama bua muenji wa mibi apîshibua ku ngikadilu wa dikenga.
42.2: Mpindiewu mona, muananyi wa baluma, nenkumvuija tshintu etshi. Bualu mona, kunyima kua Mukalenga Nzambi muipata baledi betu ba kumpala mu budimi bua Edene, bua kudimabu buloba, kuvuabu bangatshibua—eyowa, wakapatulamu muntu, ne wakateka bakeluba ku esete wa budimi bua Edene, ne muela wa mvita wa kapia uvua unyunguluka ku nseka yonsu, bua kulama mutshi wa moyo—
42.3: Mpindiewu, tudi tumona ne muntu wakalua bu Nzambi, mumanya buimpa ne bubi; ne kalu kôlola tshianza tshienda, ne kuangata kabidi bia ku mutshi wa moyo, ne kudia ne kuikala ne moyo bua kashidi, Mukalenga Nzambi wakateka bakeluba ne muela wa mvita wa kapia, bua kadi tshimuma to—
42.4: Ne nanku tudi tumona, ne kudi diba difila kudi muntu bua kukudimuna mutshima, eyowa, diba dia kutêtshibua, diba dia kukudimuna mutshima ne kusadila Nzambi.
42.5: Bualu mona, bu Adama môlola tshianza tshienda katataka, ne mudia bia ku mutshi wa moyo, uvua mua kuikala ne moyo bua kashidi, bilondeshila dîyi dia Nzambi, kayi ne diba dia kukudimuna mutshima to; eyowa, ne kabidi dîyi dia Nzambi divua mua kuikala patupu, ne bulongolodi bunena bua lupandu buvua mua kunyanguka.
42.6: Kadi mona, nkupangidikibua ne muntu afua—bua nanku, bu muvuabu bakoshibua ku mutshi wa moyo bavua ne bua kukoshibua pa mpala wa buloba—ne muntu wakalua mujiminyi bua kashidi, eyowa, bakalua bantu bapona.
42.7: Ne mpindiewu, nudi numona ne bua bualu ebu baledi betu ba kumpala bavua bakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga mu mubidi ne mu nyuma; ne nanku tudi tumona ne bakalua bakôkedi ku dilonda disua diabu nkayabu.
42.8: Mpindiewu mona, kabivua bikengela bua ne muntu asungidibua ku lufu lua mubidi elu to, bualu abi bivua mua kunyangakaja bulongolodi bunena bua disanka.
42.9: Bua nanku, bu mudi anyima kayi mua kufua nansha, ne dipona diakatuadila bukua bantu bonsu lufu lua nyuma ne kabidi lua mubidi, etshi ne, bavua bakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga, bivua bikengela ne bukua bantu busungidibua ku lufu lua nyuma.
42.10: Bua nanku, bu muakaluabu bantu ba mu mubidi, bena majinga a mubidi, ne bena diabulu, ku buikadi buabu, ngikadilu wa kutêtshibua ewu wakalua ngikadilu wa bobu ku dilongolola; wakalua ngikadilu wa bulongolodi.
42.11: Ne mpindiewu vuluka, muananyi wa baluma, bu kabiyi bua bulongolodi bua disungila to, (tuetu babulekela ku luseka) katataka pavuabu bafua anyima yabu ivua ne dikenga, bikala bakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga.
42.12: Ne mpindiewu, kakuvua mushindu wa kusungila bantu ku ngikadilu wa dipona ewu to, uvua muntu mudituadila kudiye nkayenda bua dibenga kutumikila dienda;
42.13: Bua nanku, bilondeshila ku bululama, bulongolodi bua disungila kabuvua mua kuenzeka to, amu ku bintu bikengedibua bia dikudimuna dia mutshima dia bantu mu ngikadilu wa kutêtshibua ewu, eyowa, ngikadilu wa kudilongolola ewu; bualu pa kumbusha bua bintu bikengedibua ebi, lusa kaluvua mua kupeta tshipeta to, amu lolu lunyangakaja mudimu wa bululama. Mpindiewu mudimu wa bululama kawuvua mua kunyangakajibua to; bu biobi nanku, Nzambi uvua ulekela kuikala Nzambi.
42.14: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne bukua bantu bonsu buvua bupona, ne bavua ku bukôkeshi bua bululama; eyowa, bululama bua Nzambi, buvua bubafila bua kashidi bua kukoshibua ku mpala kuenda.
42.15: Ne mpindiewu, bulongolodi bua lusa kabuvua mua kukumbajibua to, pa kumbusha bupikudi buenzeka; bua nanku Nzambi nkayenda udi upikula bua mibi ya ba pa buloba, bua kukumbaja bulongolodi bua lusa, bua kutukija milombu ya bululama, bua ne Nzambi ikala Nzambi mujalama, mululama, ne Nzambi wa lusa kabidi.
42.16: Mpindiewu, dikudimuna dia mutshima kadivua mua kulua kudi bantu to pa kumbusha koku kuikala dinyoka, divua padi dia tshiendelela bu mudi moyo wa anyima muikala, mubambika mutangilangana ne bulongolodi bua disanka, buvua buikala bua tshiendelela pawu bu moyo wa anyima.
42.17: Mpindiewu, munyi muvua muntu mua kukudimuna mutshima bikalaye kayi muenza mibi to? Munyi muvuaye mua kuenza mibi bu koku kakuyi mikenji to? Munyi muvuaku mua kuikala mikenji bu dinyoka kadiyiku to?
42.18: Mpindiewu, kuvua dinyoka dibambika, ne mikenji miakana mipeshibua, biakatuala kudi muntu kanyinganyinga mu meji.
42.19: Mpindiewu, bu kakuyi mikenji mifila to—bikala muntu mushibeya mukuabu udi ufua—uvua mua kutshina ne neafua bikalaye mushibeya mukuabu anyi?
42.20: Ne kabidi, bu kakuyi mikenji mifila ikandika mibi, bantu kabavua kutshina bua kuenza mibi to.
42.21: Ne bu mikenji kayiyi mifila to, bu bantu benza mibi, bululama buvua bua kuenza tshinyi, anyi lusa palu, bualu kabivua bikala ne bunema pa tshifukibua to?
42.22: Kadi kudi mikenji mifila, ne dinyoka dibambika, ne dikudimuna dia mutshima dipeshibua; dikudimuna dia mutshima didi, lusa lulombolola bunema pa diodi; biobi kabiyi nanku to, bululama budi bulombolola bunema pa tshifukibua ne buenzela mikenji, ne mikenji idi ifila dinyoka; kabiyi nanku to, midimu ya bululama ivua mua kunyangakajibua, ne Nzambi uvua mua kulekela kuikala Nzambi.
42.23: Kadi Nzambi kena ulekela kuikala Nzambi to, ne lusa ludi lulombolola bunema pa aba badi bakudimuna mutshima, ne lusa ludi lulua bua bualu bua bupikudi; ne bupikudi budi butuala dibîka dia bafua; ne dibîka dia bafua didi dipingaja bantu ku mpala kua Nzambi; ne nanku badi bapingajibua ku mpala kuenda, bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu, bilondeshila ku mikenji ne bululama.
42.24: Bualu mona, bululama budi buenzela milombu yabu yonsu, ne lusa kabidi ludi lulombolola bunema pa bonsu badi bâlu; ne nanku, kakuena muntu udi upandishibua to amu bakudimunyi mutshima balelela.
42.25: Tshinganyi, udi utshinka ne lusa ludi mua kuiba bululama anyi? Ndi nkuambila ne, To; nansha kanungu kamua. Bu biobi nanku, Nzambi uvua ulekela kuikala Nzambi.
42.26: Ne nanku Nzambi udi ukumbaja majinga enda a tshiendelela, avua malongolola katshia ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba. Ne nanku lupandu ne disungila dia bantu didi dilua, ne kabidi dinyanguka ne dikenga diabu.
42.27: Bua nanku, Ô muananyi wa baluma, ewu yonsu wikala musua udi mua kulua ne kunua mâyi a moyo tshianana; ne ewu yonsu udi ubenga kulua, yeya muina kena wenzejibua bua kulua ku bukola to; kadi ku dituku dia ndekelu nebimupingajidibua bilondeshila ku bienzedi bienda.
42.28: Bu yeya mujinga bua kuenza bubi, ne kayi mukudimuna mutshima mu matuku enda to, mona, bubi nebumuenzekela, bilondeshila ku dipingaja dia Nzambi.
42.29: Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndi musua ne kulekedi bintu ebi bikutatshisha kabidi nansha, ne ulekela amu mibi yeba ikutatshisha, ne ditatshisha diakupuekesha ku dikudimuna dia mutshima.
42.30: Ô muananyi wa baluma, ndi musua ne kuvidi kabidi bululama bua Nzambi nansha. Kukebi bua kudibingisha ku bualu nansha bukesa bua mibi yeba to, mu divila bululama bua Nzambi; kadi lekela bululama bua Nzambi, ne lusa luenda, ne bulekelelu buenda biwula mu mutshima weba; ne lekela bikupuekesha panshi mu lupuishi mu didipuekesha.
42.31: Ne mpindiewu, Ô muananyi wa baluma, udi mubikidibua kudi Nzambi bua kuyisha dîyi kudi bantu aba. Ne mpindiewu, muananyi wa baluma, ndâku njila weba, umanyisha dîyi ne bulelela ne bushindama, bua uvuija bantu ku dikudimuna dia mutshima, bua bulongolodi bunena bua lusa buikala ne bunema pa mutu pabu. Ne Nzambi akupesha mena bilondeshila ku mêyi enda. Amena.

43.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne bana ba baluma ba Alama bakaya munkatshi mua bantu, bua kubamanyisha dîyi. Ne Alama, yeya muina, kavua mua kuikisha to, ne wakaya kabidi penda.
43.2: Mpindiewu katuakuamba kabidi bia bungi bitangila diyisha diabu to, pa kumbusha ne bakayisha dîyi, ne bulelela, bilondeshila ku nyuma wa buprofete ne wa dibuluila; ne bakayisha bilondeshila ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi kuvuabu babikidibua.
43.3: Ne mpindiewu ndi mpingana ku mulubu wa mvita pankatshi pa Bena Nefi ne Bena Lamana, mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
43.4: Bualu monayi, biakalua ne Bena Zolama bakalua Bena Lamana; bua nanku, ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu bantu ba Bena Nefi bakamona ne Bena Lamana bavua balua kubaluisha; bua nanku bakadilongolola bua mvita; eyowa, bakasangisha misumba yabu ya basalayi pamua mu bulaba bua Yeleshona.
43.5: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakalua ne binunu biabu; ne bakalua mu bulaba bua Antionuma, budi buikala bulaba bua Bena Zolama; ne muntu wa dîna dia Zelahemena uvua mulombodi wabu.
43.6: Ne mpindiewu, bu muvua Bena Amaleki bikala ne ngikadilu mupita bubi ne wa dishibeya dia bantu kupita muvua Bena Lamana bikala, munkatshi muabu ne kudibu nkayabu, bua nanku, Zelahemena wakateka tupita tunena ku mutu kua Bena Lamana, ne bavua bonsu Bena Amaleki ne Bena Zolama.
43.7: Mpindiewu wakenza nanku bua akuba lukinu luabu kudi Bena Nefi, bua ababueja mu bubatshika bua kukumbaja majinga enda.
43.8: Bualu monayi, majinga enda avua a kusonsola Bena Lamana ku tshiji kudi Bena Nefi; wakenza nanku bua apeta bukôkeshi bua bungi ku bukola pa mutu pabu, ne bua apeta kabidi bukôkeshi pa mutu pa Bena Nefi ku dibatuala mu bupika.
43.9: Ne mpindiewu dijinga dia Bena Nefi divua dia kulama malaba abu, ne nzubu yabu, ne bakaji babu, ne bana babu, bua babakuba ku bianza bia bena lukuna babu; ne kabidi bua bakuba manema abu ne diakalengela diabu, eyowa, ne kabidi budishikaminyi buabu, bua batendelela Nzambi wabu bilondeshila ku majinga abu.
43.10: Bualu bavua bamanya ne biaponabu mu bianza bia Bena Lamana, ne ewu yonsu watendelela Nzambi mu nyuma ne mu bulelela, Nzambi mulelela ne udi ne moyo, Bena Lamana bavua bamushipa.
43.11: Eyowa, ne bavua kabidi bamanya lukinu lupita lua Bena Lamana kudi bana babu, bavua bikala bantu ba Anti-Nefi-Lehi, bavua babikidibua ne bantu Amona—ne bakabenga kuambula biluilu, eyowa, bavua babuela mu tshipungidi ne bakabenga kutshishipa—bua nanku, biaponabu mu bianza bia Bena Lamana, nebashipibua.
43.12: Ne Bena Nefi kabakalekela ne bashipibua to; bua nanku bakabapesha malaba a bupianyi buabu.
43.13: Ne bantu ba Amona bakapesha Bena Nefi tshipesa tshinena tshia bintu biabu bua kukuatshisha misumba yabu ya basalayi; ne nanku Bena Nefi nkayabu bavua benzejibua bua kukandamena Bena Lamana, bavua bikala disangisha dia ndelanganyi ya Lamana ne Lemuele, ne bana ba baluma ba Yishemaela, ne bonsu bavua batapuluka ku Bena Nefi, bavua bikala Bena Amaleki ne Bena Zolama, ne tunkanunuina tua bakuidi ba Noa.
43.14: Mpindiewu tunkanunuina atu tuvua tua bungi pabuipi ne muvua Bena Nefi; ne nanku Bena Nefi bavua ne tshia kukokangana ne bana babu, mena tô ne ku dimatshisha dia mashi.
43.15: Ne biakalua ne bu muvua misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana midisangisha pamua mu bulaba bua Antionuma, monayi, misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi ivua midilongolola bua kusambakena nabu mu bulaba bua Yeleshona.
43.16: Mpindiewu, mulombodi wa Bena Nefi, anyi muntu uvua musungudibua bua kuikala kapita kanena ka Bena Nefi—mpindiewu kapita kanena kakangata bulombodi bua misumba yonsu ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi—ne dîna dienda divua Moloni;
43.17: Ne Moloni wakangata bulombodi bonsu, ne buludiki bua mvita yabu. Ne uvuamu amu ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu pakasungudibuaye kapita kanena ka misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi.
43.18: Ne biakalua ne wakasambakena ne Bena Lamana mu mikalu ya Yeleshona, ne bantu benda bavua bayibua ne miela ya mvita, ne tuela tua mvita, ne mishindu yonsu ya biluilu bia mvita.
43.19: Ne pakamona misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana ne bantu ba Nefi bavua badilongolola, anyi ne Moloni uvua mulongolola bantu benda ne bibuikilu bia pa tshiadi, ne ngabu ya pa maboku, eyowa, ne ngabu bua kusungidila mitu yabu, ne bavua kabidi bavuala bilamba bia mupimbu—
43.20: Mpindiewu musumba wa basalayi wa Zelahemena kawuvua mudilongolola ne tshintu nansha tshimua tshia nanku to; bavua amu ne miela yabu ya mvita, ne tuela tuabu tua mvita, mata abu ne miketa yabu, mabua abu ne bieledi biabu; ne bavua butaka, amu pa kumbusha tshiseba tshivua tshisuikibua ku bimonu biabu; eyowa, bonsu bavua butaka, amu pa kumbusha Bena Zolama ne Bena Amaleki;
43.21: Kadi kabavua bapayibua ne bibuikilu bia pa tshiadi, anyi ngabu to—bua nanku, bakatshina misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi menamena bua bualu bua biluilu biabu bia mvita, nansha muvua bungi buabu buikala bunena kupita bua Bena Nefi.
43.22: Monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne kabakidikija kulua kuluisha Bena Nefi mu mikalu ya Yeleshona to; bua nanku bakumbuka ku bulaba bua Antionuma, bakaya mu tshipela, ne bakanyunguluka ne kuasa luendu luabu mu tshipela, kula pabuipi ne mpokolo wa musulu wa Sidona, bua babuela mu bulaba bua Manti ne bangata bulaba; bualu kabakatshinka ne misumba ya basalayi ya Moloni ivua bua kumanya kuvuabu baya to.
43.23: Kadi biakalua ne katataka pakayabu mu tshipela Moloni wakatuma batentekedi mu tshipela bua kutentekela tshitudilu tshiabu; ne Moloni, kabidi, bualu uvua mumanya mêyi a buprofete a Alama, wakatuma bamua bantu kudiye, ujinga ne ebeja kudi Mukalenga kunyi kuvua misumba ya basalayi ya bena Nefi ne bua kuya bua kudisungidila kudi Bena Lamana.
43.24: Ne biakalua ne dîyi dia Mukalenga diakalua kudi Alama, ne Alama wakamanyisha batumibua ba Moloni ne, misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana ivua inyungulukila mu tshipela, bua baluila ku bulaba bua Manti, bua batuadija kubunda tshitupa tshiteketa bikola tshia bantu. Ne batumibua abu bakaya ne bakafikisha mukenji kudi Moloni.
43.25: Mpindiewu Moloni, muikala mushiya tshitupa tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi ku bulaba bua Yeleshona, bua mu mushindu mukuabu tshitupa tshia Bena Lamana katshilu kubuela mu bulaba abu ne kuangata tshimenga, wakangata tshitupa tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi tshivua tshishala ne wakaya ku bulaba bua Manti.
43.26: Ne wakenza ne bantu bonsu mu tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi badisangisha pamua bua kuluangana ne Bena Lamana, bua kusungidila malaba abu ne ditunga diabu, manema abu ne budikadidi buabu; bua nanku bavua badilongolola bua diba dia dilua dia Bena Lamana.
43.27: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakasokokesha musumba wenda wa basalayi mu tshibanda tshivua pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa musulu wa Sidona, tshivua mu tshipela ku wesete wa musulu wa Sidona.
43.28: Ne Moloni wakateka batentekedi ku mpenga yonsu, bua amanya pâlua tshitudilu tshia Bena Lamana.
43.29: Ne mpindiewu, bu muakamanya Moloni dijinga dia Bena Lamana, ne divua dijinga dia kubutula bana babu, anyi dia kubabatshika ne kubabueja mu bupika bua bashikika bukalenga buabu nkayabu pa bulaba bonsu;
43.30: Ne bualu uvua kabidi mumanya ne dijinga dimua dia Bena Nefi divua amu dia kukuba malaba abu, ne budishikaminyi buabu, ne ekelezia wabu, bua nanku kakela meji ne katshivua bubi to ne abasungidila ku budimu; bua nanku, kupitshila ku batentekedi benda wakajandula njila wangatshila Bena Lamana.
43.31: Bua nanku, wakâbanya musumba wenda wa basalayi ne wakaya ne tshitupa tshimua mu tshibanda, ne wakabasokoka ku esete, ne ku sude kua kakuna ka Lipala;
43.32: Ne bavua bashala wakabasokoka mu tshibanda tshia ku wesete, ku wesete kua musulu wa Sidona, ne nanku kupueka tô ne ku mikalu ya bulaba bua Manti.
43.33: Ne nanku muikala muteka musumba wenda wa basalayi bilondeshila ku dijinga dienda, uvua mudilongolola bua kusambakena nabu.
43.34: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakabanda ku node kua kakuna, kuvua tshitupa tshia musumba wa basalayi ya Moloni basokoma.
43.35: Ne pakapita Bena Lamana kakuna ka Lipala, ne pakaluabu mu tshibanda, ne pakabangabu kusabuka musulu wa Sidona, musumba wa basalayi uvua musokoma ku sude kua kakuna, uvua muntu muena dîna ne Lehi ulombola, ne wakalombola musumba wenda wa basalayi ne bakanyungulula Bena Lamana ku esete ne kunyima kuabu.
43.36: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana, pakamonabu Bena Nefi babaluila kunyima kuabu, bakakudimuka ne bakabanga kukokangana ne musumba wa basalayi wa Lehi.
43.37: Ne mudimu wa lufu wakatuadija ku nseka yonsu ibidi, kadi uvua ukuatshisha bôwa bikola ku luseka lua Bena Lamana, bualu butaka buabu buvua buikala bulekelela patoka ku mitûtu mikola ya Bena Nefi ne miela yabu ya mvita ne tuela tuabu tua mvita, bivua bituala lufu pabuipi ne ku mukumu yonsu.
43.38: Pinapu ku luseka lukuabu, ku musangu ne ku musangu kuvua muntu upona munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, ku miela yabu ya mvita ne ku dijimija dia mashi, bualu bavua babuikila bitupa bia moyo menamena bia mubidi, anyi bitupa bia moyo menamena bia mubidi bivua bibuikila ku mikumu ya Bena Lamana, ne bibuikilu biabu bia pa tshiadi, ne ngabu yabu ya pa maboku, ne bifulu biabu bia mvita; ne Bena Nefi bakatungunuka nanku ne mudimu wa lufu munkatshi mua Bena Lamana.
43.39: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakumvua bôwa, bua lufu lunena munkatshi muabu, mena tô ne pakabangabu kunyema batangila ku musulu wa Sidona.
43.40: Ne bakabalondakaja kudi Lehi ne bantu benda; ne bakasakibua kudi Lehi mu mâyi a Sidona, ne bakasabuka mâyi a Sidona. Ne Lehi wakalama misumba yenda ya basalayi ku muelelu wa musulu wa Sidona, bua ne kabasabuki to.
43.41: Ne biakalua ne Moloni ne musumba wenda wa basalayi bakasambakena ne Bena Lamana mu tshibanda, dishiya dia musulu wa Sidona, ne bakabanga kudiela kudibu ne kubashipa.
43.42: Ne Bena Lamana bakanyema kabidi kumpala kuabu, batangila ku bulaba bua Manti; ne bakasambakena kabidi ne misumba ya basalayi ya Moloni.
43.43: Mpindiewu musangu ewu Bena Lamana bakaluangana menamena; eyowa, Bena Lamana kabavua banji kumanyika bua kuluangana ne makanda a bungi menamena ne dikima nanku to, tô, mena nansha kumbukila ku mbangilu to.
43.44: Ne bakapetela meji kudi Bena Zolama ne Bena Amaleki, bavua bikala tupita tunena ne balombodi banena babu, ne kudi Zelahemena, uvua muikala kapita kabu kanena, anyi mulombodi munena ne komanda munena wabu; eyowa, bakaluangana bu mudi dragon, ne bakashipa Bena Nefi ba bungi bakashipibua ku bianza biabu, eyowa, bakapanda bifulu biabu bia mvita bia bungi mu bipesa bibidi, ne bakatubula bibuikilu biabu bia pa tshiadi bia bungi, ne bakakosa maboku abu a bungi; ne nanku Bena Lamana bakatûta mu tshiji tshiabu tshikola.
43.45: Nansha nanku, Bena Nefi bavua bapetela meji ku bualu buimpa, bualu kabavua baluangana bua bukalenga bua muntu umua anyi bukôkeshi to, kadi bavua baluangana bua nzubu yabu ne budikadidi buabu, bua bakaji babu ne bana babu, ne biabu bionsu, eyowa, bua ngenzedi yabu ya kutendelela ne ekelezia wabu.
43.46: Ne bavua benza tshivuabu bamona ne tshivua tshikala mudimu uvuabu nawu kudi Nzambi wabu; bualu Mukalenga wakabambila, ne kabidi kudi batatuabu, ne: Bu munudi kanuyi bapîla bua tshilema tshia kumpala, anyi tshibîdi to, kanuakudilekela ne nushipibua ku bianza bia bena lukuna benu to.
43.47: Ne kabidi, Mukalenga uvua muamba ne: Nenusungidila mêku enu mena tô ne ku dimatshisha dia mashi. Nanku bua bualu ebu Bena Nefi bavua bakokangana ne Bena Lamana bua kudisungidila, ne mêku abu ne malaba abu, ditunga diabu, ne manema abu, ne ntendelelu wabu.
43.48: Ne biakalua ne pakamona bantu ba Moloni lonji ne tshiji tshia Bena Lamana, bavua pabuipi ne kupingana panyima ne kubanyema. Ne Moloni, muikala mumona dijinga diabu, wakatuma bantu ne kukankamika mitshima yabu ne meji â; eyowa, meji a malaba abu, budishikaminyi buabu, eyowa, budishikaminyi buabu ku bupika.
43.49: Ne biakalua ne bakakudimuka kudi Bena Lamana, ne bakabila ne dîyi dimua kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, bua budishikaminyi buabu ne bua budishikaminyi buabu ku bupika.
43.50: Ne bakabanga kukandamena Bena Lamana ne bukola; ne mu diba dina adi muvuabu babila kudi Mukalenga bua budishikaminyi buabu, Bena Lamana bakabanga kunyema kumpala kuabu; ne bakanyema mena tô ne ku mâyi a Sidona.
43.51: Mpindiewu, Bena Lamana bavua bapita bungi, eyowa, bavua bikala bungi bua Bena Nefi misangu ibidi; nansha nanku, bavua bapatshibua tô ne bavua basangishibua pamua mu tshisumbu tshimua mu tshibanda, ku muelelu wa musulu wa Sidona.
43.52: Bua nanku misumba ya basalayi ya Moloni yakabanyungulula, eyowa, mena ku nseka yonsu ibidi ya musulu, bualu monayi, bantu ba Lehi bavua ku esete.
43.53: Bua nanku pakamona Zelahemena bantu ba Lehi ku esete kua musulu wa Sidona, ne misumba ya basalayi ya Moloni ku wesete kua musulu wa Sidona, ne bavua babanyungulula kudi Bena Nefi, luzakalu luakabakuata.
43.54: Mpindiewu Moloni, pakamonaye luzakalu luabu, wakapesha bantu benda mukenji bua balekela dimatshisha dia mashi.

44.1: Ne biakalua ne bakimana ne bakabashila kaba ka tshidia tshimua. Ne Moloni wakambila Zelahemena ne: Mona, Zelahemena, katuena tujinga bua kuikala bantu ba mashi to. Udi mumanya ne nudi mu bianza bietu, kadi katuena tujinga bua kunushipa to.
44.2: Mona, katuena balua kunuluisha bua kumatshisha mashi enu bua kupeta bukalenga to; anyi katuena tujinga kutuala muntu nansha umua ku tshikokedi tshia bupika to. Kadi ebu ki bualu bunudi baluila kutuluisha; eyowa, ne nudi batufîkila tshiji bua ntendelelu wetu.
44.3: Kadi mpindiewu, nudi numona ne Mukalenga udi netu; ne nudi numona ne udi munufila mu bianza bietu. Ne mpindiewu, ndi musua ne numvua ne bidi bituenzela nanku bua ntendelelu wetu ne ditabuja dietu mu Kilisto. Ne mpindiewu nudi numona ne kanuena mua kunyagakaja ditabuja dietu edi to.
44.4: Mpindiewu nudi numona edi didi ditabuja dilelela dia Nzambi; eyowa, nudi numona ne Nzambi neatukuatshisha, ne neatulama, ne neatukuba, diba dionsu dituikala ne lulamatu kudiye, ne ku ditabuja dietu, ne ntendelelu wetu; ne Mukalenga kakulekela ne tubutuka nansha, pa kumbusha bituapona mu disambuka mikenji ne bituavila ditabuja dietu.
44.5: Ne mpindiewu, Zelahemena, ndi nkupesha mukenji, mu dîna dia Nzambi wa bukola bonsu awu, udi mukolesha maboku etu mu ne tudi bapeta bukola pa nuenu, ku ditabuja dietu, ku ntendelelu wetu, ne ku ngenzedi yetu ya kutendelela, ne ku ekelezia wetu, ne ku dikuatshisha dia tshijila ditudi ne bua kupesha kudi bakaji betu ne bana betu, ku budishikaminyi adi budi butusuika ku malaba etu ne ku ditunga dietu; eyowa, ne kabidi ku dilama dia dîyi dia tshijila dia Nzambi, kutudi bapetela disanka dietu dionsu; ne ku bionsu bidi bikala ne mushinga kutudi—
44.6: Eyowa, ne ebi ki mbionsu to; ndi nkupesha mukenji bua majinga onsu anudi nawu bua kuikala ne moyo, ne nutupesha biluilu bienu bia mvita, ne katuakukeba mashi enu to, kadi netuepelesha mioyo yenu, panuendela njila wenu ne kanuakulua kabidi kutuluisha mvita to.
44.7: Ne mpindiewu, panuikala kanuyi benza nanku to, monayi, nudi mu bianza bietu, ne nempesha bantu banyi mukenji bua badiela kunudi, ne banutapa mputa ya lufu pa mibidi yenu, bua nubutuka; ne pashisha netumona ne nganyi wikala ne bukola pa mutu pa bantu aba; eyowa netumona ne nganyi wabuejabu mu bupika.
44.8: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakumvua Zelahemena mêyi â, wakasemena kumpala ne wakafila muela wenda wa mvita ne kela kenda ka mvita, ne buta buenda mu bianza bia Moloni, ne wakamuambila ne: Mona, biluilu bietu bia mvita mbiobi ebi; netubifila kunudi, kadi katuakulekela ne tuditshipa mutshipu kunudi, utudi bamanya ne netushipa, ne bana betu kabidi; kadi angatayi biluilu bietu bia mvita, ne lekelayi ne tuya mu tshipela; tshianana netulama miela yetu ya mvita, ne netufua anyi netutshimuna.
44.9: Mona, katuena bena ditabuja dienu to; katuena tuitabuja ne Nzambi ki udi mutufila mu bianza bienu to; kadi tudi tuitabuja ne mbudimu buenu mbudi bunupandisha ku miela yetu ya mvita. Mona, mbibuikilu bienu bia pa tshiadi ne ngambu yenu mbidi binupandisha.
44.10: Ne mpindiewu pakajikija Zelahemena kuamba mêyi â, Moloni wakapingajila Zelahemena muela wa mvita ne biluilu bia mvita bivuaye mumupesha, wamba ne: Mona, netuya ku ndekelu wa mvita.
44.11: Mpindiewu ntshiena mua kupinganyina mêyi amvua muakula to, bua nanku bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, kanuakuya to pa kumbusha nuenu baya ne mutshipu ne kanuakutupinganyina kabidi bua kutuluisha mvita to. Mpindiewu bu munudi mu bianza bietu netuitshikija mashi enu panshi, anyi nenukôkela ku mikenji indi munupesha.
44.12: Ne mpindiewu pakamba Moloni mêyi â, Zelahemena wakalama muela wenda wa mvita, ne wakafîkila Moloni tshiji, ne wakalua lukasa bua kushipa Moloni; kadi pakajulaye muela wenda wa mvita, monayi, umua wa ku basalayi ba Moloni wakawutûta ne mena kuwukuluisha panshi, ne wakakoseka pabuipi ne tshilabi; ne wakatûta kabidi Zelahemena ne wakamutula tshiseba tshia ku mutu ne tshiakapona panshi. Ne Zelahemena wakumbuka kumpala kuabu ne wakaya munkatshi mua basalayi benda.
44.13: Ne biakalua ne musalayi uvua muimana pabuipi, uvua mukosa tshiseba tshia ku mutu tshia Zelahemena, wakambuila tshiseba tshia ku mutu atshi panshi ku nsuki, ne wakatshiteka ku lusongu lua muela wenda wa mvita, ne wakawôlola kudibu, ubambila ne dîyi dikola ne:
44.14: Mena bu mudi tshiseba tshia ku mutu etshi, tshidi tshikala tshiseba tshia ku mutu tshia kapita kenu, tshipona panshi, bia momumua nenupona panshi pa kumbusha nuenu bafila biluilu bienu bia mvita ne baya ne tshipungidi tshia ditalala.
44.15: Mpindiewu kuvua ba bungi, pakumvuabu mêyi â ne pakamonabu tshiseba tshia ku mutu tshivua ku muela wa mvita, bôwa bua kabakuata; ne ba bungi bakasemena kumpala ne bakimansha biluilu biabu bia mvita panshi ku makasa a Moloni, ne bakabuela mu tshipungidi tshia ditalala. Ne bonsu bakabuela mu tshipungidi bakabalekela bua baya mu tshipela.
44.16: Mpindiewu biakalua ne Zelahemena wakafîka tshiji menamena, ne wakasonsola basalayi benda bavua bashala ku tshiji, bua kukokangana ne Bena Nefi ne bukola kupita.
44.17: Ne mpindiewu Moloni wakafîka tshiji, bua mutu mukola wa Bena Lamana; bua nanku wakapesha bantu benda mukenji ne badiela kudibu ne babashipa. Ne biakalua ne bakabanga kubashipa ; eyowa, ne Bena Lamana bakakokangana ne miela yabu ya mvita ne bukola buabu.
44.18: Kadi monayi, mibidi yabu ya butaka ne mitu yabu mitupu bivua bilekelela patoka ku miela ya mvita mitua ya Bena Nefi; eyowa, monayi bakatubudibua ne bakatûtshibua, eyowa, ne bakapona lukasa menamena ku miela ya mvita ya Bena Nefi; ne bakabanga kubakomba panshi, mena bu muvua musalayi wa Moloni mudianjila kuamba.
44.19: Mpindiewu Zelahemena, pakamonaye ne bavua pabuipi ne kubutuka bonsu, wakabila ne bukitu kudi Moloni, ulaya ne neenza nabu tshipungidi, ne bantu benda pabu, bikalabu bepelesha mioyo ya bavua bashala, ne kabakulua kabidi kubaluisha mvita nansha to.
44.20: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakimakaja kabidi mudimu wa lufu munkatshi mua bantu. Ne wakangata biluilu bia mvita kudi Bena Lamana; ne kunyima kua babuela nenda mu tshipungidi tshia ditalala bakalekedibua bua baya mu tshipela.
44.21: Mpindiewu bungi bua bafua babu kabuvua bubala to bua bunena bua bungi; eyowa, bungi bua bafua babu buvua bunena menamena, bonsu ku Bena Nefi ne ku Bena Lamana.
44.22: Ne biakalua ne bakimansha bafua babu mu mâyi a Sidona, ne bakaya ne badi bajîkibua mu ndondu ya mbuwa.
44.23: Ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, anyi ya Moloni, yakapingana ne yakalua ku nzubu yabu ne ku malaba abu.
44.24: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku. Ne ki muakajika miandiku ya Alama, ivua mifunda pa bitata bia Nefi, nanku.

45.intro: Mulubu wa bantu ba Nefi, ne mvita yabu ne matapuluka abu, mu matuku a Helamana, bilondeshila ku miandiku ya Helamana, yakalamaye mu matuku enda.
45.1: Monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne bantu ba Nefi bakasanka menamena, bualu Mukalenga uvua mubapatuisha kabidi ku bianza bia bena lukuna babu; bua nanku bakela Mukalenga Nzambi wabu tuasakidila; eyowa, ne bakajila bikola ne bakasambila bikola, ne bakatendelela Nzambi ne disanka dia bungi menamena.
45.2: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, ne Alama wakaya kudi muanenda wa baluma Helamana ne wakamuambila ne: Udi witabuja mêyi amvua mukuambila bitangila miandiku ivua milamibua anyi?
45.3: Ne Helamana ne wakamuambila ne: Eyowa, ndi ngitabuja.
45.4: Ne Alama wakamba kabidi ne: Udi witabuja kudi Yezu Kilisto, walua anyi?
45.5: Ne wakamba ne: Eyowa, ndi ngitabuja mêyi onsu awuvua muakula.
45.6: Ne Alama wakamuambila kabidi ne: Neulama mikenji yanyi anyi?
45.7: Ne wakamba ne: Eyowa, nendama mikenji yeba ne mutshima wanyi mujima.
45.8: Pashisha Alama wakamuambila ne: Udi mubeneshibua; ne Mukalenga neakulubuluja mu bulaba ebu.
45.9: Kadi mona, ndi ne mêyi a buprofete makesa a kuamba kûdi; kadi mêyi a buprofete andi ngamba kûdi, kuamanyishi to; eyowa, mêyi a buprofete andi ngamba kûdi kâkumanyishibua to, mena tô ne pa kumbajibua dîyi dia buprofete edi; bua nanku funda mêyi angamba.
45.10: Ne eyi ki mêyi awu: Mona, ndi mmona ne bantu bina aba, Bena Nefi, bilondeshila nyuma wa dibuluila udi munda muanyi, bidimu nkama inayi kunyima kua diba dikala Yezu Kilisto mudileja kudibu, ne nebashinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja.
45.11: Eyowa, ne pashisha nebamona mvita ne bipupu, eyowa, biyola ne dimatshisha dia mashi, mena tô ne pâbutuka bantu ba Nefi—
45.12: Eyowa, ne nanku bualu nebashinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja ne nebapona mu midimu ya mîdima, ne majinga a mubidi, ne mu mishindu yonsu ya malu mabi; eyowa, ndi nkuambila ne, bualu nebenza mibi kumpala kua bukenka ne dimanya bia bungi, eyowa, ndi nkuambila ne kubangila dituku adi, mena lukongu lua bantu luinâyi kalua kupita to kumpala kua bualu bubi bunena ebu kuluabu.
45.13: Ne palua dituku dinena adi, mona, diba didi dilua dikala bantu badi bikala mpindiewu, anyi ndelanganyi ya badibu babala mpindiewu munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, kabakubadibua kabidi munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi to.
45.14: Kadi ewu yonsu udi ushala, ne udi kayi ushipibua mu dituku dinena ne didi dikuatshisha bôwa adi, nebamubala munkatshi mua Bena Lamana, ne nealua bu mudibu, bonsu, amu pa kumbusha bakesa bâbikidibua ne bayidi ba Mukalenga; ne bobu Bena Lamana nebabalondakaja mena tô ne pâbutukabu. Ne mpindiewu, dîyi dia buprofete edi nedikumbajibua bua bualu bua malu mabi.
45.15: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kunyima kua Alama muamba bintu ebi kudi Helamana, wakamubenesha, ne bana benda ba baluma bakuabu kabidi; ne wakabenesha kabidi buloba bua bimpa bia bakana.
45.16: Ne wakamba ne: Mukalenga Nzambi udi wamba nanku—Bulaba nebuedibua mulawu, eyowa, bulaba ebu, bua tshisamba tshionsu, tshîsa tshionsu, muakulu yonsu, ne bantu bonsu, badi benza bubi, bua dibutuka, pikalabu baboba menamena; ne nebikala bu mundi muamba; bualu etshi mulawu ne dibenesha dia Nzambi pa bulaba, bualu Mukalenga kena mua kutangila mibi ne tshipimu tshikesa tshia dianyisha to.
45.17: Ne mpindiewu, pakamba Alama mêyi â wakabenesha ekelezia, eyowa, bonsu bâkankamana mu ditabuja katshia ku tshikondu atshi.
45.18: Ne pakenza Alama nanku wakashiya bulaba bua Zalahemela, bu bua kuya ku bulaba bua Meleke. Ne biakalua ne kabakumvua kabidi bualu buenda nansha; ne bua lufu luenda anyi dijîkibua dienda katuena bamanya.
45.19: Monayi, tudi bamanya nanku, ne uvua muntu muakana; ne lumu lua katangalaka kula mu ekelezia ne Nyuma wakamuangata mûlu, anyi tshianza tshia Mukalenga tshiakamujîka, mena bu muvuabi bua Mose. Kadi monayi, mifundu ya Nzambi idi yamba ne Mukalenga wakangata Mose kudiye; ne tudi tutshinka ne wakakidila kabidi Alama mu nyuma, kudiye; nanku, bua bualu ebu katuena bamanya tshintu nansha tshimua bitangila lufu luenda anyi dijîkibua dienda to.
45.20: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, ne Helamana wakaya munkatshi mua bantu bua kubamanyisha dîyi.
45.21: Bualu monayi, bua mvita yabu ne Bena Lamana ne matapuluka makesa a bungi ne disalu bivua munkatshi mua bantu, biakalua bikengedibua ne dîyi dia Nzambi dimanyishibua munkatshi muabu, eyowa, ne bulongolodi buenzejibua mu ekelezia monsu.
45.22: Bua nanku, Helamana ne bana babu bakaya kushikika ekelezia kabidi mu bulaba bonsu, eyowa, mu tshimenga tshionsu mu bulaba bonsu buvua bantu ba Nefi basamu. Ne biakalua ne bakasungula bakuidi ne balongeshi mu bulaba bonsu, ku mutu kua ma’ekelezia onsu.
45.23: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kunyima kua Helamana ne bana babu basungula bakuidi ne balongeshi ku mutu kua ma’ekelezia kuakajuka ditapuluka munkatshi muabu, ne bakabenga kuteya ntema ku mêyi a Helamana ne bana babu to;
45.24: Kadi bakalua baditambishi, bikala badibandisha mu mitshima yabu, bua biuma biabu bia bungi menamena; bua nanku bakalua babanji ku mesu abu nkayabu, ne bakabenga kuteya ntema ku mêyi abu, bua kuenda bôloloka kumpala kua Nzambi to.

46.1: Ne biakalua ne bonsu bavua babenga kumvuila mêyi a Helamana ne bana babu, bakadisangisha bua kuluisha bana babu.
46.2: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bakafîka tshiji menamena, mua ne bavua bangata dipangadika dia kubashipa.
46.3: Mpindiewu mulombodi wa bavua bafîkila bana babu tshiji uvua muntu munena ne wa makanda; ne dîna dienda divua Amalikia.
46.4: Ne Amalikia uvua ujinga bua kuikala mfumu; ne bantu abu bavua bafîka tshiji bavua bajinga kabidi ne ikala mfumu wabu; ne tshitupa tshinena tshiabu tshivua tshia balumbuluishi bashadila ba bulaba, ne bavua bakeba bukalenga.
46.5: Ne Amalikia wakalobesha ku lubombu luenda, ne bu bobu bua kumukuatshisha ne kumushikika bua kuikala mfumu wabu neabateka bakôkeshi pa bantu.
46.6: Nanku bakapambuishibua kudi Amalikia ku matapuluka, nansha muvuaku diyisha dia Helamana ne bana babu bayisha, eyowa, nansha bua bukubi bunena menamena buabu kudi ekelezia, bualu bavua bakuidi banena ku mutu kua ekelezia.
46.7: Ne kuvua ba bungi mu ekelezia bavua bitabuja miaku ya lubombu ya Amalikia, bua nanku bakatapuluka ku ekelezia; ne nanku malu a bantu ba Nefi ka’avua mashindama to ne avua ne njiwu, nansha bua ditshimuna diabu dinena divuabu bapeta pa mutu pa Bena Lamana, ne masanka abu manena avuabu bapeta bua dipatuishibua diabu kudi tshianza tshia Mukalenga.
46.8: Nanku tudi tumona bu mudilu lunena lukasa ludi bana ba bantu bua kupua moyo Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, eyowa, bu mudilu lunena lukasa lua kuenza malu mabi, ne kupambuishibua kudi muena bubi.
46.9: Eyowa, ne tudi tumona kabidi bubi bunena budi muntu mubi menamena umua mua kufikisha munkatshi mua bana ba bantu.
46.10: Eyowa, tudi tumona ne Amalikia, bualu uvua muntu wa budimu ne muntu wa mêyi a bungi a lubombu, wakapambuisha mitshima ya bantu ba bungi bua kuenza bubi; eyowa, ne bua kukeba bua kunyangakaja ekelezia wa Nzambi, ne bua kunyangakaja tshishimikidi tshia budishikaminyi buvua Nzambi mubapesha, anyi dibenesha dina divua Nzambi mutuma pa mpala wa bulaba bua bimpa bia bakana.
46.11: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakumvua Moloni, uvua muikala komanda munena wa misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, matapuluka â, wakafîkila Amalikia tshiji.
46.12: Ne biakalua ne wakapanda tshilamba tshienda; ne wakangata tshipesa tshiatshi, ne wakafundapu ne—Bua divuluka dia Nzambi wetu, ntendelelu wetu, ne budishikaminyi buetu, ne ditalala dietu, bakaji betu, ne bana betu—ne wakatshisuika ku lusongu lua mutshi.
46.13: Ne wakasuika tshifulu tshienda tshia mvita, ne tshibuikilu tshienda tshia pa tshiadi, ne ngabu yenda, ne wakadisuika biluilu bienda ku tshimonu tshienda; ne wakangata mutshi uvua ne tshilamba tshienda tshipanda ku lusongu luawu, (ne wakawinyika ne mukanda wa budishikaminyi) ne wakinama panshi pa buloba, ne wakasambila Nzambi wenda ne bukitu bua mabenesha a budishikaminyi atudila pa mutu pa bana babu, diba dionsu dikala tshisumbu tshia Bena Kilisto tshishala bua kuasa mu bulaba—
46.14: Bualu nanku ki muvua bitabuji balelela ba Kilisto, bavua ba mu ekelezia wa Nzambi, babikidibua kudi bavua kabayi ba mu ekelezia to.
46.15: Ne bavua mu ekelezia bavua ne lulamatu; eyowa, bonsu bavua bikala bitabuji balelela ba mu Kilisto bakadiangatshila, ne disanka, dîna dia Kilisto, anyi Bena Kilisto bu muvuabu bababikila, bua ditabuja diabu kudi Kilisto walua.
46.16: Ne bua nanku, diba adi, Moloni wakasambila ne tshiena bualu tshia Bena Kilisto, ne budishikaminyi bua mu bulaba bikala binangibua.
46.17: Ne biakalua ne pakitshikijaye anyima wenda kudi Nzambi, wakinyika bulaba bonsu buvua ku sude kua bulaba ne Kabutu, eyowa, ne mu tshikosu, bulaba bonsu, bonsu ku node ne ku sude—Bulaba busungula, ne bulaba bua budishikaminyi.
46.18: Ne wakamba ne: Bushuwa Nzambi kakulekela ne tuetu, badi bapetula bualu tudi tuangata dîna dia Kilisto pa mitu yetu, tudiatshîbua ne tubutuka, tô ne patuatshituala pa mitu yetu ne disambuka dia mikenji dietu nkayetu.
46.19: Ne pakamba Moloni mêyi â, wakaya munkatshi mua bantu, upepa tshipesa tshia tshilamba tshienda tshivua tshipanda mûlu, bua bantu bonsu bamona mifundu ivuaye mufunda pa tshipesa tshivua tshipanda, ne ubila ne dîyi dikola, wamba ne:
46.20: Monayi, bantu bonsu badi basua kukuba mukanda ewu mu bulaba, lekela balua ku bukola bua Mukalenga ne babuela mu tshipungidi ne nebakuba manema abu, ne ntendelelu wabu, bua Mukalenga Nzambi ababenesha.
46.21: Ne biakalua ne pakamanyisha Moloni mêyi â, monayi, bantu bakalua lubilu pamua ne biluilu biabu bisuikibua ku bimonu biabu, bikala bapanda bilamba biabu bu mudi tshilejilu, anyi bu tshipungidi, ne kabakulekela Mukalenga Nzambi wabu to; anyi, mu mêyi makuabu, biasambukabu mikenji ya Nzambi, anyi biaponabu mu disambuka mikenji, ne bikalabu ne bundu bua kuangatabu dîna dia Kilisto, Mukalenga neabapanda bu muvuabu bapanda bilamba biabu.
46.22: Mpindiewu etshi tshidi tshipungidi tshidibu benza, ne bakimansha bilamba biabu ku makasa a Moloni, bamba ne: Tudi tuenza tshipungidi ne Nzambi wetu, ne netubutuka, mena bu muvua bana betu mu bulaba bua ku node, bituapona mu disambuka mikenji; eyowa, neatuimansha ku makasa a bena lukuna betu, bu mutudi bimansha bilamba bietu ku makasa eba bua bidiatakajibua ku makasa, bituapona mu disambuka mikenji.
46.23: Moloni wakabambila ne: Monayi, tudi tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yakoba; eyowa, tudi tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe, muena tshilamba tshiakapandabu kudi bana babu mu bipesa bia bungi; eyowa, ne monayi mpindiewu, tuvulukayi bua kulama mikenji ya Nzambi, anyi bilamba bietu nebipandibua kudi bana betu, ne tuetu bedibua mu buloko, anyi bapanyishibua, anyi bashipibua.
46.24: Eyowa, tukubayi budishikaminyi buetu bu mutudi bikala tshishadila tshia Yosefe; eyowa, tuvulukayi miaku ya Yakoba, kumpala kua lufu luenda, pakamonaye tshishadila tshia tshilamba tshia Yosefe tshivua tshikuba ne tshivua katshiyi tshibola to. Ne wakamba ne—Bu muvua mena tshishadila etshi tshia tshilamba tshia muananyi wa baluma tshikala tshikuba, momumua tshianza tshia Nzambi netshikuba tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya muananyi wa baluma, ne neatshiangata kudiye nkayenda, pikala tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe ifua, mena bu mudi tshishadila tshia tshilamba etshi.
46.25: Mpindiewu monayi, bidi binyingalaja anyima wanyi; nansha nanku, anyima wanyi udi ne disanka bua muananyi wa baluma, bua bualu bua tshitupa tshia ndelanganyi yenda atshi tshiângatshibua kudi Nzambi.
46.26: Mpindiewu monayi, etshi tshivua ngakuilu wa Yakoba.
46.27: Ne mpindiewu nganyi udi mumanya ne tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe, tshiafua bu mudi tshilamba tshienda, kabena abu bavua batapuluka kutudi to? Eyowa, ne nebikala nansha tuetu, bu tuetu kutuyi tukankamana mu ditabuja dia Kilisto.
46.28: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Moloni mêyi â wakaya, ne wakatuma kabidi bantu mu bitupa bionsu bia bulaba muvua muikala matapuluka, ne bakasangisha pamua bantu bonsu bavua bajinga kukuba budishikaminyi buabu, bua kukandamenabu Amalikia ne bonsu bavua batapuluka kudibu abu, bavua babikidibua ne Bena Amalikia.
46.29: Ne biakalua ne pakamona Amalikia ne bantu ba Moloni bavua ba bungi bapita Bena Amalikia—ne wakamona kabidi ne bantu benda bavua ne mpata bitangila bululama bua bualu buvuabu bâsa—bua nanku, bualu uvua utshina ne kakukumbaja kipatshila kenda, wakangata ba ku bantu benda bavua basua ne wakaya ku bulaba bua Nefi.
46.30: Mpindiewu Moloni wakela meji ne kabivua bikengedibua bua Bena Lamana kupetabu bukola bukuabu to; bua nanku wakela meji bua kukosa bantu ba Amalikia njila, anyi kubakuata ne kubapingaja, ne kushipa Amalikia; eyowa, bualu uvua mumanya ne uvua bua kusonsola Bena Lamana ku tshiji kudibu, ne kubenzeja bua kulua kubaluisha mvita; ne uvua mumanya ne Amalikia uvua bua kuenza nanku bua kupetaye kipatshila kenda.
46.31: Bua nanku Moloni uvua wela meji ne bivua bikengedibua ne angata misumba yenda ya basalayi, ivua midisangisha pamua, ne ivua midipaya ne biluilu, ne ivua mibuela mu tshipungidi tshia kulama ditalala—ne biakalua ne wakangata musumba wenda wa basalayi ne wakaya ne ntenta yenda mu tshipela, bua kukosa njila wa Amalikia mu tshipela.
46.32: Ne biakalua ne wakenza bilondeshila ku majinga enda, ne wakaya mu tshipela, ne wakakosa misumba ya basalayi ya Amalikia njila.
46.33: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakanyema ne bungi bukesa bua bantu benda, ne bavua bashala bakadifila mu bianza bia Moloni ne wakapingana nabu ku bulaba bua Zalahemela.
46.34: Mpindiewu, Moloni bualu uvua muntu uvua balumbuluishi banena ne dîyi dia bantu basungula, bua nanku uvua ne dianyisha dia kuenza ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi bilondeshila ku disua dienda, bua kushikika ne bua kuenzela bukôkeshi pa mutu pabu.
46.35: Ne biakalua ne bonsu ba ku Bena Amalikia bavua babenga kubuela mu tshipungidi tshia kukuatshisha bualu bua budishikaminyi, bua kulamabu bukalenga bua budishikaminyi, wakabashipesha; ne kuvua amu bakesa bakabenga tshipungidi tshia budishikaminyi.
46.36: Ne biakalua kabidi ne wakabandishisha mukanda wa budishikaminyi pa tshibumba tshionsu tshivua mu bulaba bonsu, buvua Bena Nefi basamu; ne nanku Moloni wakâsa dibendela dia budishikaminyi munkatshi mua Bena Nefi.
46.37: Ne bakabanga kupeta kabidi ditalala mu bulaba; ne nanku bakakuba ditalala mu bulaba tô ne ku ndekelu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
46.38: Ne Helamana ne bakuidi banena bakakuba kabidi bulongolodi mu ekelezia; eyowa, mena bua mutantshi wa bidimu binayi bavua ne ditalala dia bungi ne disanka mu ekelezia.
46.39: Ne biakalua ne kuvua ba bungi bakafua, bitabuja ne dikamakana ne Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto neasungila anyima yabu; nanku bakashiya buloba ne disanka.
46.40: Ne kuvua bamua bakafua ne mubidi wa luya, uvua mu bimua bikondu bia tshidimu muikala mupita bungi mu bulaba—kadi kabayi bafua bapita bungi menamena ne mubidi wa luya to, bua bimanyishilu bimpa bia mitshi ne miji ya bungi ivua Nzambi mulongolola bua kumbusha tshivua tshifila mabêdi, avua bantu mua kusâmina bilondeshila ngikadilu wa muvu—
46.41: Kadi kuvua ba bungi bakafua bua bukulakaja; ne bavua bafua bikala ne ditabuja kudi Kilisto badi basangala kudiye, bu mutudi ne tshia kutshinka.

47.1: Mpindiewu tupinganyina miandiku yetu bitangila Amalikia ne bakanyema nenda mu tshipela; bualu, monayi, uvua muangata bakaya nenda ne wakabanda ku bulaba bua Nefi munkatshi mua Bena Lamana, ne wakasonsola Bena Lamana ku tshiji kudi bantu ba Nefi, mu mushindu wa ne mfumu wa Bena Lamana wakatuma dimanyisha mu bulaba buenda bonsu, munkatshi mua bantu benda bonsu, ne badisangisha pamua kabidi bua kuya kuluisha Bena Nefi.
47.2: Ne biakalua ne pakalua dimanyisha kuya munkatshi muabu bakumvua bôwa bukola; eyowa, bakatshina bua kubungamija mfumu, ne bakatshina kabidi bua kuya kuluisha Bena Nefi bua kabalu kujimija mioyo yabu. Ne biakalua ne, ne bobu, ne tshitupa tshinena tshiabu, bakabenga kutumikila mikenji ya mfumu.
47.3: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mfumu wakafîka tshiji bua dibenga ditumikila diabu; bua nanku wakapesha Amalikia mukenji bua tshitupa etshi tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi tshivua ne ditumikila ku mikenji yenda, ne wakamupesha mukenji ne aya ne abenzeja ku bukola bua kuambulabu biluilu.
47.4: Mpindiewu monayi, edi divua dijinga dia Amalikia; bualu uvua muikala muntu mutalama bua kuenza bubi bua nanku wakalongolola bulongolodi mu mutshima wenda bua kumbusha mfumu wa Bena Lamana mu nkuasa wa bukalenga.
47.5: Ne mpindiewu wakapeta bulombodi bua bitupa bia Bena Lamana aba bavua bananga mfumu; ne wakakeba kunangibua kudi bantu bavua kabayi ne ditumikila; bua nanku wakaya ku muaba uvuabu babikila ne Onida, bualu aku ki kuvua Bena Lamana banyemena; bualu bakajandula musumba wa basalayi ulua; ne, bualu bakatshinka ne uvua ulua kubabutula, bakanyemena ku Onida, ku muaba wa biluilu.
47.6: Ne bavua basungula muntu umua bua kuikala mfumu ne mulombodi ku mutu kuabu, bualu bavua ne dipangadika dikola mu meji abu bua kabakabatshikibua bua kuluisha Bena Nefi to.
47.7: Ne biakalua ne bavua badisangisha pa musongu wa mukuna uvuabu babikila ne Antipa, bua kudilongolola bua mvita.
47.8: Mpindiewu kadivua dijinga dia Amalikia bua kubela mvita bilondeshila ku mikenji ya mfumu to; kadi monayi, divua dijinga dienda divua dia kusuibua kudi misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana, bua aditeka ku mutu kuabu ne atonkola mfumu ne angata bukalenga.
47.9: Ne monayi, biakalua ne wakashisha musumba wenda wa basalayi ntenta yabu mu tshibanda tshivua pabuipi ne mukuna wa Antipa.
47.10: Ne biakalua ne pakîla butuku wakatuma bantu mu musokoku ku mukuna wa Antipa, ujinga ne mulombodi wa bantu bavua pa mukuna, muena dîna dia Lehonti, apueka kuinshi ku mbangilu wa mukuna, bualu uvua ujinga bua kuakula nenda.
47.11: Ne biakalua ne pakapeta Lehonti mukenji kakidikija kupueka kuinshi kua mukuna to. Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakatuma mukenji kabidi bua musangu muibîdi, ujinga bua apueka. Ne biakalua ne Lehonti wakabenga; ne wakatuma kabidi mukenji bua musangu muisâtu.
47.12: Ne biakalua ne pakamona Amalikia ne kavua mua kutulula Lehonti ku mukuna to, wakabanda ku mukuna, pabuipi ne ku tshitudilu tshia Lehonti; ne wakatuma kabidi mukenji wenda kudi Lehonti bua musangu muinâyi, ujinga ne apueka ne uvua bua kulua ne balami benda.
47.13: Ne biakalua ne pakapueka Lehonti ne balami benda kudi Amalikia, ne Amalikia wakajinga ne yeya alua ne musumba wenda wa basalayi mundankulu, ne anyungulula bantu aba mu bitudilu biabu, bavua mfumu mumupeshela bulombodi, ne uvua ubafila mu bianza bia Lehonti, bu yeya mua kumuteka yeya (Amalikia) mulombodi muibîdi ku mutu kua musumba wa basalayi mujima.
47.14: Ne biakalua ne Lehonti wakapueka ne bantu benda ne bakanyungulula bantu ba Amalikia, bua ne kumpala kua kubîkabu patshiatshia bavua banyungulula kudi misumba ya basalayi ya Lehonti.
47.15: Ne biakalua ne pakamonabu ne bavua babanyungulula, bakasengelela Amalikia bua alekela ne badisangisha ne bana babu, bua kababutuki to. Mpindiewu etshi tshivua tshintu mena tshivua Amalikia ujinga.
47.16: Ne biakalua ne wakafila bantu benda, bishilangana ne mikenji ya mfumu. Mpindiewu etshi tshivua tshintu tshivua Amalikia ujinga, bua akumbaja majinga enda a kumbusha mfumu mu nkuasa wa bukalenga.
47.17: Mpindiewu tshivua tshibidilu munkatshi mua Bena Lamana ne, bu bobu bashipa mulombodi wabu munena badi basungula mulombodi muibîdi bua kuikalaye mulombodi wabu munena.
47.18: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakenzeja ne umua wa basadidi benda elela Lehonti mulungu ku kakesa ku kakesa, ne wakafua.
47.19: Mpindiewu, pakafua Lehonti, Bena Lamana bakasungula Amalikia bua kuikalaye mulombodi wabu ne komanda wabu munena.
47.20: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakaya ne misumba yenda ya basalayi (bualu uvua mupeta majinga enda) ku bulaba bua Nefi, ku tshimenga tshia Nefi, tshivua tshikala tshimenga tshikulu.
47.21: Ne mfumu wakapatuka ne balami benda bua kusambakena nenda, bualu wakatshinka ne Amalikia uvua mukumbaja mikenji yenda, ne Amalikia uvua musangisha musumba munena wa basalayi bua kuyabu kuluisha Bena Nefi.
47.22: Kadi monayi, pavua mfumu upatuka bua kusambakena nenda Amalikia wakenzeja ne basadidi benda baya kusambakena ne mfumu. Ne bakaya ne bakinama kumpala kua mfumu, bu kumukukuila bua bunena buenda.
47.23: Ne biakalua ne mfumu wakela tshianza bua kubajula, bu muvua tshibidilu kudi Bena Lamana, bu tshilejilu tshia ditalala, tshibidilu tshivuabu bangatshila kudi Bena Nefi.
