47.24: Ne biakalua ne pakajulaye wa kumpala panshi, monayi wakatua mfumu kela ku mutshima; ne wakapona panshi.
47.25: Mpindiewu basadidi ba mfumu bakanyema; ne basadidi ba Amalikia bakela lubila, bamba ne:
47.26: Monayi, basadidi ba mfumu bamutu kela mu mutshima, ne waponyi ne banyemi; monayi, luayi ne numona.
47.27: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakela mukenji ne misumba yenda ya basalayi iya ne imona tshivua tshifikila mfumu; ne pakafikabu pa muaba awu, ne bakasangana mfumu mulala mu mashi enda, Amalikia wakenza bu uvua mifîka tshiji, ne wakamba ne: Yonsu uvua munanga mfumu, aya ne alondakaja basadidi benda bua bashipibua.
47.28: Ne biakalua ne bonsu bavua bananga mfumu, pakumvuabu mêyi â, bakalua ne bakalondakaja basadidi ba mfumu.
47.29: Mpindiewu pakamona basadidi ba mfumu musumba wa basalayi ubalondakaja, bakumvua bôwa, ne bakanyema mu tshipela, ne bakalua ku bulaba bua Zalahemela ne bakadisangisha ku bantu ba Amona.
47.30: Ne musumba wa basalayi wakabalondakaja wakapingana, bualu bakabalondakaja tshianana; ne nanku Amalikia, ku dibila dienda, wakapeta mitshima ya bantu.
47.31: Ne biakalua ne pakatshiabu wakabuela mu tshimenga tshia Nefi ne misumba yenda ya basalayi, ne wakangata tshimenga.
47.32: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mukaji wa mfumu, pakumvuaye ne bavua bashipa mfumu—bualu Amalikia uvua mutuma bantu kudi mukaji wa mfumu, bua kumumanyisha ne basadidi ba mfumu bavua bamushipa, ne uvua mubalondakaja ne musumba wenda wa basalayi, kadi bivua tshianana, ne bakanyema—
47.33: Bua nanku, pakapeta mukaji wa mfumu mukenji ewu wakatuma muntu kudi Amalikia, ujinga ne epelesha bantu ba mu tshimenga; ne wakajinga kabidi ne alua kudiye; ne wakajinga kabidi ne alua ne bajadiki bua kujadika bitangila lufu lua mfumu.
47.34: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakangata musadidi wa momumua wakashipa mfumu, ne bonsu bavua nenda, ne wakaya kudi mukaji wa mfumu, ku muaba uvuaye musomba; ne bakamujadikila bonsu ne umua wa ku basadidi ba mfumu nkayenda wakamushipa; ne bakamba kabidi ne: Bavua banyema; ne etshi katshiena tshijadika dipîla diabu anyi? Ne nanku bakasankisha mukaji wa mfumu bitangila lufu lua mfumu.
47.35: Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakakeba kusuibua kudi mukaji wa mfumu, ne wakamuangata bua ikala mukaji wenda; ne nanku ku dibila dienda, ne ku diambuluisha dia basadidi benda bena budimu, wakapeta bukalenga; eyowa, wakitabujibua mfumu mu bulaba bonsu ne udi mfumu, munkatshi mua bantu bonsu ba Bena Lamana, bavua bikala nsangilu wa Bena Lamana, ne Bena Lemuele, ne Bena Yishemaela, ne batapuluki bonsu ba ku Bena Nefi, katshia ku bumfumu bua Nefi tô ne ku tshikondu etshi.
47.36: Mpindiewu batapuluki aba, bualu bavua ne dilongesha dia momumua ne dimanya dia momumua ne Bena Nefi, eyowa, bualu bavua balongeshibua mu dimanya dia momumua ne dia Mukalenga, nansha nanku, bidi bikemesha bua kulonda ne, mutantshi kawuyi mula to kunyima kua matapuluka abu bakalua bapapishibua bikola ne kabayi bitaba tshilema tshiabu to, ne bapala, bena bubi ne bena tshikisu kupita Bena Lamana—bangata ngenzelu ya Bena Lamana; badifila ku bufuba, ne ku mishindu yonsu ya majinga a mubidi; eyowa, bapua Mukalenga Nzambi wabu moyo kashidi.

48.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne, katataka pakapeta Amalikia bukalenga wakabanga kupesha mitshima ya Bena Lamana meji bua kuluisha bantu ba Nefi; eyowa, wakasungula bantu bua kuambila Bena Lamana kûlu ku bibumba biabu bua kuluisha Bena Nefi.
48.2: Ne nanku wakapesha mitshima yabu meji bua kuluisha Bena Nefi, ki bua bualu kayi ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, bualu uvua mukumbaja majinga enda tô ne mpindiewu, eyowa, bualu uvua mutekibua mfumu ku mutu kua Bena Lamana, wakakeba kabidi bua kukôkesha mu bulaba bonsu, eyowa, ne kudi bantu bonsu bavua mu buloba, Bena Nefi ne Bena Lamana kabidi.
48.3: Bua nanku uvua mukumbaja dijinga dienda, bualu uvua mupapisha mitshima ya Bena Lamana ne uvua mufofomija meji abu, ne uvua mubasonsola ku tshiji, mua ne uvua musangisha musumba wa bungi pamua bua kuya kuluisha Bena Nefi.
48.4: Bualu uvua mupangadika, bua bunena bua bungi bua bantu benda, bua kutamba Bena Nefi bukola ne kubabueja mu bupika.
48.5: Ne nanku wakasungula tupita tunena tua Bena Zolama, bualu bavua bamanya makanda a Bena Nefi bimpa, ne miaba yabu ya tshinyemenu, ne bitupa biteketa menamena bia bimenga biabu; bua nanku wakabasungula bua kuikala tupita tunena ku mutu kua misumba yenda ya basalayi.
48.6: Ne biakalua ne bakambula tshitudilu tshiabu, ne bakaya batangila ku bulaba bua Zalahemela mu tshipela.
48.7: Mpindiewu biakalua ne pakapeta Amalikia bukôkeshi nanku ku dibila ne didinga, Moloni, ku luseka lukuabu, uvua muikala ulongolola meji a bantu bua kuikala ne lulamatu kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wabu.
48.8: Eyowa, uvua muikala ukolesha misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, ne uvua muikala wimanyikija bisokomenu bikesa, anyi miaba ya tshinyemenu; wela mabûla a buloba ku mpenga yonsu bua kukangila misumba yenda ya basalayi munda, ne kabidi muikala wibaka bimanu bia mabua bua kuyinyungulula, ku nyunguluilu ya bimenga biabu ne mikalu ya malaba abu; eyowa, ku mpenga yonsu ya bulaba.
48.9: Ne mu miaba yabu mikolesha ivua miteketa wakateka bungi bupita bunena bua bantu; ne nanku wakakolesha ne bulaba buvua Bena Nefi basamu ne wakabupesha makanda.
48.10: Ne nanku uvua muikala ulongolola bua kukuatshisha budishikaminyi buabu, malaba abu, bakaji babu, ne bana babu, ne ditalala diabu, ne bua bikala ne moyo bua Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne bakuba tshivua bena lukuna babu babikila ne kipatshila ka Bena Kilisto.
48.11: Ne Moloni uvua muntu wa makanda ne bukola; uvua muntu wa ngumvuilu mujima; eyowa, muntu uvua kayi usanka bua dimatshisha dia mashi to; muntu muena anyima uvua usanka bua budishikaminyi ne budikadila bia ditunga dienda, ne bia bana babu ku lukanu ne ku bupika;
48.12: Eyowa, muntu wa mutshima uvua muwula ne tuasakidila kudi Nzambi, bua diakalengela dia bungi ne mabenesha a bungi akapeshaye bantu benda; muntu wakakuata mudimu bua diakalengela dia bantu benda ne bukubi buabu.
48.13: Eyowa, ne uvua muntu uvua mukamakana mu ditabuja dia Kilisto, ne uvua muditshipa ne mutshipu bua kusungidila bantu benda, manema enda, ne ditunga dienda, ne ntendelelu wenda, mena ne ku dijimija dia mashi enda.
48.14: Mpindiewu bavua balongesha Bena Nefi kudisungidila kudi bena lukuna babu, mena ne ku dimatshisha dia mashi pikalabi bikengedibua nanku; eyowa, ne bavua babalongesha kabidi bua kabayobodi nansha, eyowa, ne kabajudi muela wa mvita nansha pa kumbusha bikala bua muena lukuna, pa kumbusha bikala bua kukuba mioyo yabu.
48.15: Ne ditabuja diabu divua ne, ku dienza dia nanku Nzambi neabalubuluja mu bulaba, anyi mu mêyi makuabu, bikalabu ne lulamatu mu dilama mikenji ya Nzambi neabalubuluja mu bulaba; eyowa, neabadimuisha, anyi bua kudilongolola bua mvita, bilondeshila njiwu wabu;
48.16: Ne kabidi, ne Nzambi neabamanyisha kuvuabu ne bua kuya bua kudisungidila kudi bena lukuna babu, ne ku dienza dia nanku, Mukalenga neabapatuisha; ne edi divua ditabuja dia Moloni, ne mutshima wenda wakatumbilamu; kabiyi mu dimatshisha dia mashi to kadi mu dienza dia malu mimpa, mu dikuba dia bantu benda, eyowa, mu dilama dia mikenji ya Nzambi, eyowa, ne mu dikolela ku malu mabi.
48.17: Eyowa, bulelela, bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, bu bantu bonsu bavua bikala, ne bavua, ne nebikalaku, bafuanangana ne Moloni, monayi, makola mina a mu ngena abukudibua bua kashidi; eyowa, diabulu kakuikala ne bukola pa mitshima ya bana ba bantu nansha.
48.18: Monayi, uvua muntu uvua mufuanangana ne Amona, muana wa baluma wa Mosiya, eyowa, ne mena bana ba baluma bakuabu ba Mosiya, eyowa, ne kabidi Alama ne bana benda ba baluma, bualu bavua bonsu bantu ba Nzambi.
48.19: Mpindiewu monayi, Helamana ne bana babu kabavua ne dikuatshisha dikesa dishala dia bantu ba Moloni to; bualu bakayisha dîyi dia Nzambi, ne bakatambuisha bantu bonsu bakateleja mêyi abu bua dikudimuna dia mitshima.
48.20: Ne nanku bakaya kumpala, ne bantu bavua badipuekesha bua mêyi abu, mua ne bavua basuibua bikola kudi Mukalenga, ne nanku kabavua ne mvita ne makokangana munkatshi muabu to, eyowa, mena bua mutantshi wa bidimu binayi.
48.21: Kadi, bu mumvua muamba, ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema, eyowa, nansha muvuaku ditalala munkatshi muabu, bakabenzeja, mitshima yabu ibenga, bua kukokangana ne bana babu, Bena Lamana.
48.22: Eyowa, ne mu tshikosu, mvita yabu ne Bena Lamana kayakajika nansha to bua mutantshi wa bidimu bia bungi, nansha muvua mitshima yabu ibenga bikola.
48.23: Mpindiewu bakanyingalala bua kuambula biluilu bua kuluisha Bena Lamana, bualu kabavua basanka mu dimatshisha dia mashi to; eyowa, ne ebi kabivua bionsu to—bakanyingalala bua kuikala njila wa kumbusha bana babu ba bungi pa buloba ebu bua kubabueja ku buloba bua tshiendelela, kabayi balongolola kusambakena ne Nzambi wabu to.
48.24: Nansha nanku, kabavua mua kulekela bua kufila mioyo yabu, bua bakaji babu ne bana babu bashipibua ku lonji ludi lupanga nshidimukilu lua bavua bikala ku kala bana babu, eyowa, ne bavua batapuluka ku ekelezia wabu, ne bavua babashiya ne bavua baya bua kubabutula ku didisangisha kudi Bena Lamana.
48.25: Eyowa, kabavua mua kuitaba ne bana babu basanka bua mashi a Bena Nefi to, patshivuaku bamua bavua balama mikenji ya Nzambi, bualu mulayi wa Mukalenga uvua ne, bialamabu mikenji yenda nebalubuluka mu bulaba.

49.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mu ngondu wa dikumi ne umua wa tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema, mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondu, bakamona misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana isemena mitangila ku bulaba bua Amoniha.
49.2: Ne monayi, tshimenga tshivua tshibakulula, ne Moloni uvua muteka musumba wa basalayi pabuipi ne mikalu ya tshimenga, ne bavua bashikika buloba ku mpenga yonsu bua kubakuba ku miketa ne mabua bia Bena Lamana; bualu monayi, bavua baluangana ne mabua ne miketa.
49.3: Monayi, ngakamba ne tshimenga tshia Amoniha tshivua tshibakuludibua. Ndi nnuambila ne, eyowa, tshivua tshîbakulula mu tshitupa tshimua; ne bualu Bena Lamana bavua batshibutula umua musangu bua bualu bua malu mabi a bantu, bavua batshinka ne bivua kulua kabidi biteketa buabu.
49.4: Kadi monayi, bu muvuadi dinena diteketa diabu dia maboku; bualu monayi, Bena Nefi bavua bashikika dibûla dia buloba ku mpenga yabu yonsu, divua dikala dila bua Bena Lamana kabayi mua kukupa mabua abu ne miketa yabu kudibu, bua bibasa, anyi kabayi mua kubaluila amu pa kumbusha ku muaba wabu wa tshibuelelu.
49.5: Mpindiewu diba adi tupita tunena tua Bena Lamana tuakakema menamena, bua lungenyi lua Bena Nefi mu dilongolola dia miaba yabu ya bukubi.
49.6: Mpindiewu balombodi ba Bena Lamana bavua batshinka ne, bua bunena bua bungi buabu, eyowa, bavua batshinka ne bikala ne mushindu wa kubabunda bu muvuabu benza tô ne mpindiewu; eyowa, bavua kabidi badilongolola ne ngambu, ne bibuikilu bia pa tshiadi; ne bavua kabidi badilongolola ne bilamba bia biseba, eyowa, bilamba bia mupimbu menamena bua kujika butaka buabu.
49.7: Ne bualu bavua badilongolola nanku, bakatshinka ne nebatamba bana babu bukola ne nebababatshika ku tshikokedi tshia bupika biteketa, anyi bavua bua kubashipa ne kubashipeya bilondeshila ku dijinga diabu.
49.8: Kadi monayi, bakakema menamena, bualu bavua badilongolola buabu, mu mushindu uvua kawuyi muanji kumanyika munkatshi mua bana ba Lehi to. Mpindiewu bavua balongolola bua Bena Lamana, bua kuluangana ku mushindu wa mikenji ya Moloni.
49.9: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana, anyi Bena Amalikia, bakakema menamena bua mushindu wabu wa didilongolola bua mvita.
49.10: Mpindiewu, bu mfumu Amalikia mupatuka mu bulaba bua Nefi, ku mutu kua musumba wenda wa basalayi, pamuapa uvua bua kuenzeja Bena Lamana bua kubunda Bena Nefi mu tshimenga tshia Amoniha; bualu monayi, kabivua bimutatshisha bua dijimija dia mashi a bantu benda to.
49.11: Kadi monayi, Amalikia kakapueka yeya muina bua kuluangana to. Ne monayi, tupita tuenda tunena katuakidikija bua kubunda Bena Nefi ku tshimenga tshia Amoniha to, bualu Moloni uvua mukudimuna bulombodi bua malu munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, mu mushindu wa ne Bena Lamana bakateketa maboku mu miaba yabu ya kunyemena ne kabavua mua kulua kubabunda to.
49.12: Bua nanku bakapingana mu tshipela, ne bakambula tshitudilu tshiabu ne bakaya batangila ku bulaba bua Noa, batshinka ne aku kuvua muaba muibidi muimpa bua kuluisha Bena Nefi.
49.13: Bualu kabavua bamanya ne Moloni uvua mukolesha, anyi uvua muibaka bisokomenu bia bukubi, bua tshimenga tshionsu ku mpenga ya bulaba yonsu; bua nanku, bakenda kumpala batangila ku bulaba bua Noa ne dipangadika dikamakana; eyowa, tupita tuabu tunena tuakasemena ne tuakela mutshipu ne nebabutula bantu ba mu tshimenga atshi.
49.14: Kadi monayi, bakakema ne, tshimenga tshia Noa, tshivua tshikala tô ne mpindiewu muaba muteketa, tshivua tshilua mpindiewu ne makanda, kupitshila ku mishindu ya Moloni, eyowa, mena kupita makanda a tshimenga tshia Amoniha.
49.15: Ne mpindiewu, monayi, bivua bikala bimpa mu lungenyi lua Moloni; bualu uvua utshinka ne tshimenga tshia Amoniha tshivua bua kubumvuija bôwa; ne bu muvua tshimenga tshia Noa tshikala tô ne mpindiewu tshitupa tshipita kuteketa tshia mu bulaba, bua nanku bavua bua kuya koku bua kuluangana; ne bivua nanku bilondeshila ku majinga enda.
49.16: Ne monayi, Moloni uvua musungula Lehi bua kuikala kapita kanena ku mutu kua bantu ba mu tshimenga atshi; ne nyeya Lehi umua awu wakaluangana ne Bena Lamana mu tshibanda ku esete kua musulu wa Sidona.
49.17: Ne mpindiewu monayi biakalua ne, pakamona Bena Lamana ne Lehi uvua ulombola tshimenga bakateketa maboku kabidi, bualu bavua batshina Lehi menamena; nansha nanku tupita tuabu tunena tuakaditshipa ne mutshipu bua kubunda tshimenga; bua nanku, bakalua ne misumba yabu ya basalayi.
49.18: Mpindiewu monayi, Bena Lamana kabavua mua kubuela mu bisokomenu bia bukubi ku njila mukuabu to amu pa kumbusha ku tshibuelelu, bua bula bua dibûla divuabu bela ne bua ndondu wa tshina tshia munkoloji tshivua tshiumbula ku mpenga yonsu, amu pa kumbusha ku tshibuelelu.
49.19: Ne nanku Bena Nefi bavua badilongolola bua kushipa bonsu bidikija kubanda bua kubuela mu muaba wa tshisokomenu ku njila mukuabu, ku dibashila mabua ne miketa pa mutu.
49.20: Bavua badilongolola nanku, eyowa, tshisumbu tshia bantu babu makanda mapita, ne miela yabu ya mvita ne bieledi biabu, bua kukuluisha panshi bonsu bidikija kubuela mu muaba wabu wa bukubi ku muaba wa tshibuelelu; ne bavua badilongolola nanku bua kudisungidila kudi Bena Lamana.
49.21: Ne biakalua ne tupita tua Bena Lamana tuakalua ne misumba yabu ya basalayi kumpala kua muaba wa tshibuelelu, ne bakabanga kukokangana ne Bena Nefi, bua kubuela mu muaba wabu wa bukubi; kadi monayi, bakabapingaja kunyima ku tshikondu ne tshikondu, mua ne bakabashipa ne dishibeya dia bungi.
49.22: Mpindiewu pakamonabu ne kabavua mua kupeta bukola pa mutu pa Bena Nefi kupitshila ku mushiku wa mbelu to, bakabanga kumbula mabûla abu a buloba bua kupetabu njila bua misumba yabu ya basalayi, bua bikala ne mushindu wa momumua bua kuluangana; kadi monayi, ku midikija â bakashibua kudi mabua ne miketa yakabakomba; ne pa mutu pa kuwuja bina biabu bia minkoloji ku dishimbula dia mabûla a buloba, mu mushindu mukuabu ne bafua babu ne bantu babu bavua batapika.
49.23: Nanku Bena Nefi bavua ne bukola bonsu pa mutu pa bena lukuna babu; ne nanku Bena Lamana bakidikija kubutula Bena Nefi tô ne pakashipibua tupita tunena tonsu tuabu; eyowa, ne bakashipa Bena Lamana bapita tshinunu tshimua; pavuaku, ku luseka lukuabu, kakuyi muntu nansha umua wa ku Bena Nefi uvuabu bashipa to.
49.24: Kuvua pabuipi ne bantu makumi atanu bavua batapika mputa, bavua bikala badilekelela ku miketa ya Bena Lamana ku mushiku wa mbelu, kadi bavua badibuikila ne ngambu yabu, ne bibuikilu biabu bia pa tshiadi, ne bifulu biabu bia mvita, mua ne mputa yabu ivua ku mikolo yabu, ne ya bungi yayi ivua minena.
49.25: Ne biakalua ne, pakamona Bena Lamana ne bavua bashipa tupita tuabu tunena tonsu bakanyema mu tshipela. Ne biakalua ne bakapingana ku bulaba bua Nefi; bua kumanyisha mfumu wabu, Amalikia, uvua muikala Muena Nefi ku diledibua, bua dijimija diabu dinena.
49.26: Ne biakalua ne wakafîkila bantu benda tshiji menamena, bualu kavua mupeta dijinga dienda bitangila Bena Nefi to; kavua mubabatshika ku tshikokedi tshia bupika to.
49.27: Eyowa, wakafîka tshiji menamena, ne wakatshipa Nzambi, ne Moloni kabidi, uditshipa ne mutshipu ne neanua mashi enda; ne nanku bualu Moloni uvua ulama mikenji ya Nzambi ku didilongolola bua bukubi bua bantu benda.
49.28: Ne biakalua ne, ku luseka lukuabu, bantu ba Nefi bakasakidila Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, bua bualu bukola buenda budi kabuyi kufuanyikija to bua dibapatuisha mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu.
49.29: Ne tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi ku mutu kua bantu ba Nefi tshiakajika nanku.
49.30: Eyowa, ne kuvua ditalala dia munanunanu munkatshi muabu, ne dilubuluka dinena menamena mu ekelezia bua ntema yabu ne dinanukila diabu bivuabu bafila ku dîyi dia Nzambi, divua Helamana, ne Shibulona, ne Koliantona, ne Amona ne bana babu babamanyisha, eyowa, ne bonsu bavua bajididibua ku mulongu wa tshijila wa Nzambi, ne bavua batambuishibua bua dikudimuna dia mutshima, ne batumibua bua kuyisha munkatshi mua bantu.

50.1: Ne biakalua ne Moloni kakalekela kuenza dilongolola bua mvita to, anyi kusungidila bantu benda kudi Bena Lamana to; bualu wakenzeja ne misumba yenda ya basalayi ituadija ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, ne ituadija kushikika mishiki ya buloba ku mpenga yonsu ya bimenga bionsu, mu bulaba bonsu buvua Bena Nefi basamu.
50.2: Ne pa mutu pa mabûla a buloba â wakatekeshapu mikamba ya buibaki, eyowa, midimu ya mikamba mimanyikija bula bua muntu, ku mpenga yonsu ya bimenga.
50.3: Ne wakenzeja ne pa mutu pa midimu ya mikamba ayi pibakibua musaka wa tuluwa pa mutu pa mikamba ku mpenga yonsu; ne tuvua tukola ne tula.
50.4: Ne wakenza ne bibumba bimanyikibua bivua bitangila pa mitu pa midimu ya tuluwa, ne wakenza ne miaba ya bukubi ibakibua pa bibumba abi, bua mabua ne miketa ya Bena Lamana kabibatapi to.
50.5: Ne bivua bilongolodibua bua bikala mua kuashila mabua kûlu kuabi, bilondeshila ku dijinga diabu ne ku makanda abu, ne bua kushipa ewu yonsu widikija kusemena pabuipi ne bimanu bia tshimenga.
50.6: Nanku Moloni wakalongolola miaba mikolesha bua kuimanyina dilua dia bena lukuna babu, ku mpenga ya tshimenga mu bulaba bonsu.
50.7: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakenzeja ne misumba yenda ya basalayi iya mu tshipela tshia ku esete; eyowa, ne yakaya ne yakipata Bena Lamana bonsu bavua mu tshipela tshia ku esete ne bakaya batangila ku malaba abu nkayabu, avua mikala ku sude kua bulaba bua Zalahemela.
50.8: Ne bulaba bua Nefi buvua buikala mu njila mululama kumbukila ku mbuwa wa ku esete tô ne ku mbuwa wa ku wesete.
50.9: Ne biakalua ne pavua Moloni munyemesha Bena Lamana bonsu bapatuka tshipela tshia ku esete, tshivua ku node kua malaba adibu basamu nkayabu, wakenzeja ne bantu bavua basomba mu bulaba bua Zalahemela ne mu bulaba bua ku mpenga yabu yonsu baya mu tshipela tshia ku esete, mena ku mikalu ya pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa, ne bâsa mu bulaba.
50.10: Ne wakateka kabidi misumba ya basalayi ku sude, mu mikalu ya malaba abu, ne wakenzeja ne bimanyisha miaba mikolesha bua balama misumba yabu ya basalayi ne bantu babu bua kabaponyi mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu.
50.11: Ne nanku wakakosa miaba mikolesha yonsu ya Bena Lamana mu tshipela tshia ku esete, eyowa, ne ku wesete kabidi, mu kukolesha mushonyi pankatshi pa Bena Nefi ne Bena Lamana, pankatshi pa bulaba bua Zalahemela ne bulaba bua Nefi, kubangila ku mbuwa ku wesete, kupuekela ku mpokolo wa musulu wa Sidona—Bena Nefi bikala ne bulaba bonsu buvua ku node, eyowa, mena bulaba bonsu buvua ku node kua bulaba bua Buvula, bilondeshila ku disua diabu.
50.12: Nanku Moloni, ne misumba yenda ya basalayi, ivulangana dituku dionsu bualu midimu yenda yakabatukija mitshima ne bukubi buvuaku, bakakeba bua kukosa makanda ne bukola bua Bena Lamana ku malaba adibu basamu, bua kabikadi ne bukola ku malaba adibu basamu to.
50.13: Ne biakalua ne Bena Nefi bakabanga tshishimikidi tshia tshimenga, ne bakabikila dîna dia tshimenga ne Moloni; ne tshivua pabuipi ne mbuwa wa ku esete; ne tshivua ku sude pabuipi ne mushonyi wa malaba a Bena Lamana.
50.14: Ne bakabanga kabidi tshishimikidi tshia tshimenga pankatshi pa tshimenga tshia Moloni ne tshimenga tshia Alona, tshikuatangana ne mikalu ya Alona ne ya Moloni; ne bakabikila dîna dia tshimenga, anyi bulaba, Nefiha.
50.15: Ne bakabanga kabidi mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi bua kuibaka bimenga bia bungi ku node, tshimua mu mushindu wa pa buatshi tshiakabikilabu ne Lehi, tshivua ku node pabuipi ne ku mikalu ya ku muelelu wa mbuwa.
50.16: Ne tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshiakajika nanku.
50.17: Ne bantu ba Nefi bavua mu mushindu wa dilubuluka ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshimua tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi.
50.18: Ne bakalubuluka menamena, ne bakalua babanji menamena; eyowa, ne bakavulangana ne bakakolakana mu bulaba.
50.19: Ne nanku tudi tumona bu mudiyi ya lusa ne buakana ngenzelu yonsu ya Mukalenga, mu dikumbaja dia miaku yenda yonsu kudi bana ba bantu; eyowa, tudi mua kumona ne miaku yenda idi mijadikibua, mena diba edi, yakambilaye Lehi, wamba ne:
50.20: Nudi babeneshibua wewa ne bana beba; ne nebabeneshibua, monsu mualamabu mikenji yanyi nebalubuluka mu bulaba. Kadi vuluka ne, monsu muapangabu kulama mikenji yanyi nebakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga.
50.21: Ne tudi tumona ne milayi eyi ivua mikumbajila bantu ba Nefi; bualu bivua bikala matandu abu ne makokangana abu, eyowa, dishibeya dia bantu diabu, ne dipawula diabu dia bintu bia benda, ditendelela diabu dia mpingu, masandi abu, ne malu abu a bubi bupita, bivua munkatshi muabu, biakabatuadila mvita yabu ne dinyanguka diabu.
50.22: Ne bavua bikala ne lulamatu mu dilama mikenji ya Mukalenga, bavua bapatuishibua mu meba onsu, pakafilaye binunu bia bana babu ba bubi ku bupika, anyi bua kufua ku muela wa mvita, anyi bua kushinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja, ne kudisangisha ne Bena Lamana.
50.23: Kadi monayi kakuvua tshikondu tshia disanka dipita munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, katshia ku matuku a Nefi, kupita tshikondu tshia Moloni to, eyowa, mena tshikondu etshi, mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshimua tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
50.24: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshibîdi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi tshiakajika kabidi mu ditalala; eyowa, ne tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisâtu kabidi.
50.25: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshinâyi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, kuvua bua kuikala kabidi ditalala munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi bu kabuyi bua dikokangana dia kangata muaba munkatshi muabu bitangila bulaba bua Lehi ne bulaba bua Moliantona, buvua bukuatangana ku mikalu ya buloba bua Lehi; bonsu bubidi buvua ku mikalu ya pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa.
50.26: Bualu monayi, bantu bavua bâsa mu bulaba bua Moliantona bakalombolola bunema pa tshitupa tshia bulaba bua Lehi; bua nanku kuakabanga kuikala dikokangana dikola pankatshi pabu, mua ne bantu ba Moliantona bakambula biluilu bua kuluisha bana babu, ne bavua bapangadika bua kubashipa ku muela wa mvita.
50.27: Kadi monayi, bantu bavua bâsa mu bulaba bua Lehi bakanyemena ku tshitudilu tshia Moloni, ne bakamulomba diambuluisha; bualu monayi kabavua benza bibi to.
50.28: Ne biakalua ne pakamona bantu ba Moliantona, bavua balombodibua kudi muntu muena dîna dia Moliantona, ne bantu ba Lehi bavua banyemena ku tshitudilu tshia Moloni, bakatshina menamena ne musumba wa basalayi wa Moloni kawulu kubaluila ne kubabutula to.
50.29: Bua nanku, Moliantona wakela mu mitshima yabu ne bavua ne bua kunyemena ku bulaba buvua ku node, buvua bubuikila kudi mishiki minena ya mâyi, ne bua kuangata bulaba buvua ku node.
50.30: Ne monayi, bavua bua kukumbaja bulongolodi ebu, (tshivua bua kuikala tshiena bualu tshia muadi) kadi monayi, bualu Moliantona, uvua muikala muntu wa tshiji tshikola, bua nanku wakafîkila umua wa ku basadidi benda ba bakaji tshiji, ne wakadiela kudiye ne wakamukuma bikola.
50.31: Ne biakalua ne wakanyema, ne wakaya ku tshitudilu tshia Moloni, ne wakalondela Moloni bintu bionsu bivua bitangila bualu ebu, ne kabidi bivua bitangila majinga abu a kunyema ku bulaba bua ku node.
50.32: Mpindiewu monayi, bantu bavua mu bulaba bua Buvula, anyi nansha bua Moloni, bakatshina bantu ba mu bulaba bua Buvula kabalu kumvuila mêyi a Moliantona ne kabalu kudisangisha ne bantu ba Moliantona, ne nanku angata bitupa bia bulaba abi, bivua bua kuikala tshishimikidi tshia bipeta bibi menamena munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, eyowa, bipeta bibi bivua bua kulombola ku ditonkola dia budishikaminyi buabu.
50.33: Bua nanku Moloni wakatuma musumba wa basalayi, ne tshitudilu tshiabu, bua kukosa bantu ba Moliantona njila, bua kuimanyikija dinyema diabu ku bulaba bua ku node.
50.34: Ne biakalua ne kabakabakosa njila to amu pakafikabu ku mikalu ya bulaba bua Kabutu; ne aku bakabakosa njila, pabuipi ne kajila kabumbakana kavua kalombola pabuipi ne mbuwa bua kuya ku bulaba bua ku node, eyowa, pabuipi ne mbuwa, ku wesete ne ku esete.
50.35: Ne biakalua ne musumba wa basalayi uvua Moloni mutuma, uvua mulombola kudi muntu muena dîna ne Teyankuma, wakasambakena ne bantu ba Moliantona; ne bantu ba Moliantona bavua ne mutu mukola (bikala bapetela meji ku bubi buenda ne mêyi enda a lubombu), ki bua tshinyi mvita yakatuadija pankatshi pabu, muakashipa Teyankuma Moliantona ne muakatshimunaye musumba wenda wa basalayi, ne wakakuata bakuabu bena lukanu, ne wakapingana ku tshitudilu tshia Moloni. Ne tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshinâyi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi tshiakajika nanku.
50.36: Ne bakapingana ne bantu ba Moliantona nanku. Ne diba dia dienza diabu dia tshipungidi bua kulama ditalala, bakapingajibua ku bulaba bua Moliantona, ne didisanga diakenzeka pankatshi pabu ne bantu ba Lehi; ne bakapingajibua kabidi ku malaba abu.
50.37: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi muvua bantu ba Nefi bikala ne ditalala dibapingajila, Nefiha, mulumbuluishi munena muibîdi, wakafua, yeya mumana kusomba mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu ne bululama bujima kumpala kua Nzambi.
50.38: Nansha nanku, uvua mubengela Alama bua kulama miandiku ayi ne bintu bivua Alama ne batatuenda bamona bidi bipita tshijila; bua nanku Alama wakabifila kudi muanenda wa baluma, Helamana.
50.39: Monayi, biakalua ne muana wa baluma wa Nefiha wakasungudibua bua kusomba mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu, pa muaba wa tatuenda; eyowa, wakasungidibua mulumbuluishi munena ne ngovena wa bantu, ku diditshipa ne ku mukenji wa tshijila bua kulumbuluisha biakana, ne kulama ditalala ne budishikaminyi bua bantu, ne bua kubapesha diakalengela diabu dia tshijila bua kutendelela Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, eyowa, bua kukuatshisha ne kukuba kipatshila ka Nzambi matuku enda onsu, ne bua kutuala bena bubi bonsu ku tshilumbuluilu, bilondeshila ku bubi buabu.
50.40: Mpindiewu monayi, dîna dienda divua Paholana. Ne Paholana wakasomba mu nkuasa wa tatuenda, ne wakatuadija bukalenga buenda ku ndekelu kua tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshinâyi, dikôkesha dienda pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi.

51.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitânu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, kunyima kua bobu bashikika ditalala pankatshi pa bantu ba Lehi ne bantu ba Moliantona bitangila malaba abu, ne kunyima kua bobu batuadija tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitanu mu ditalala;
51.2: Nansha nanku, kabakakuba ditalala dijima mu bulaba to, bualu kuakabanga kuikala dikokangana munkatshi mua bantu bitangila mulumbuluishi munena Paholana; bualu monayi, kuvua tshitupa tshia bantu tshivua tshijinga ne amua malu masunguluka a mikenji akudimunyibua.
51.3: Kadi monayi, Paholana wakabenga kukudimuna mikenji anyi kuyilekela ikudimunyibua; bua nanku, kakateleja kudi bavua batuma mêyi abu ne malomba abu bua dikudimuna dia mikenji to.
51.4: Bua nanku, bavua bajinga ne mikenji ikudimunyibua bakamufîkila tshiji, ne bakajinga bua kikadi kabidi mulumbuluishi munena ku mutu kua bulaba to; bua nanku kuakajuka ditandangana dikola bitangila bualu ebu, kadi kabiakafika ku dimatshisha dia mashi to.
51.5: Ne biakalua ne bavua bajinga ne Paholana umbushibua mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu abu bavua bababikila ne bantu-ba-mfumu, bualu bavua bajinga ne mikenji ikudimunyibua mu mushindu wa kutonkola bukalenga bua budishikaminyi ne bua kushikika mfumu ku mutu kua bulaba.
51.6: Ne bavua bajinga ne Paholana ashala mulumbuluishi munena ku mutu kua bulaba bakadiangatshila dîna dia bantu-badishikaminyi; ne nanku ditapuluka divua munkatshi muabu, bualu bantu-badishikaminyi bavua baditshipa anyi benza tshipungidi bua kulaminyina manema abu ne diakalengela dia ntendelelu wabu ku bukalenga bua budishikaminyi.
51.7: Ne biakalua ne dîyi dia bantu diakakosa bualu bua dikokangana diabu. Ne biakalua ne dîyi dia bantu diakalua mu disungula dia bantu-badishikaminyi, ne Paholana wakalama nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu, tshiakenzeja disanka dia bungi munkatshi mua bana babu ne Paholana ne ba bungi ba ku bantu ba budishikaminyi kabidi, bakapuwisha kabidi bantu-ba-mfumu, bualu kabakidikija kubenga to kadi bakabenzeja bua kukuba kipatshila ka budishikaminyi.
51.8: Mpindiewu aba bavua bananga bamfumu bavua aba baledibua ku mêku manena, ne bavua bakeba bua kuikala bamfumu; ne bavua bakuatshishibua kudi bavua bakeba bukalenga ne bukôkeshi pa mutu pa bantu.
51.9: Kadi monayi, edi divua diba dikola bua makokangana a nanku avua munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi; bualu monayi, Amalikia uvua musonsola mitshima ya bantu ba Bena Lamana bua kuluisha bantu ba Bena Nefi, ne uvua usangisha basalayi bumbukila ku bitupa bionsu bia bulaba buenda, ne uvua ubapaya ne biluilu, ne uvua ulongolola mvita ne dinanukila dionsu; bualu uvua muditshipa bua kunua mashi a Moloni.
51.10: Kadi monayi, netumona ne mulayi wenda uvuaye muenza uvua wa tshimpitshimpi; nansha nanku, wakadilongolola nkayenda ne misumba yenda ya basalayi bua kuluisha Bena Nefi.
51.11: Mpindiewu misumba yenda ya basalayi kayivua ya bungi bu muvuayi ku kala to, bualu binunu bia bungi bivua bishipibua ku tshianza tshia Bena Nefi; kadi nansha bua dijimija diabu dinena, Amalikia uvua musangisha musumba munena wa dikema wa basalayi pamua, ki bua bualu kayi kakatshina bua kupueka ku bulaba bua Zalahemela to.
51.12: Eyowa, Amalikia mena nkayenda wakapueka, ku mutu kua Bena Lamana. Ne bivua mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitânu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi; ne bivua diba dia momumua divuabu babanga kukosa nsambu ya makokangana abu bitangila mulumbuluishi munena, Paholana.
51.13: Ne biakalua ne pakumvua bantu bavua babikidibua ne bantu-ba-mfumu ne Bena Lamana bavua bapueka bua kuluisha Bena Nefi, bakasanka mu mitshima yabu; ne bakabenga bua kuambula biluilu, bualu bavua bafîkila mulumbuluishi munena tshiji tshipita, ne bantu ba budishikaminyi kabidi, ki bua tshinyi bakabenga kuambula biluilu bua kusungidila ditunga diabu.
51.14: Ne biakalua ne pakamona Moloni nanku, ne pakamonaye kabidi ne Bena Lamana bavua balua ku mikalu ya bulaba, wakafîka tshiji menamena bua bualu bua mutu mukola wa bantu bavuaye mukuatshila mudimu ne dinanukila dia bungi bua kubakuba; eyowa, wakafîka tshiji menamena; anyima wenda uvua muwujibua ntenta ne tshiji kudibu.
51.15: Ne biakalua ne wakatuma dilomba, ne dîyi dia bantu, kudi ngovena wa mu bulaba, ujinga ne adibala, ne amupesha (Moloni) bukôkeshi bua kuenzeja batapuluki abu ku bukola bua kusungidila ditunga diabu anyi kubashipa.
51.16: Bualu ki tshivua lusumpakenu luenda lua kumpala bua kujikija makokangana a nanku ne matapuluka a nanku munkatshi mua bantu; bualu monayi, etshi tshivua tô ne tshikala tshiena bualu tshia dinyanguka diabu dionsu. Ne biakalua ne ngovena wakamuanyishila ne enza bilondeshila ku dîyi dia bantu.
51.17: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakapesha musumba wenda wa basalayi mukenji ne uya kuluisha bantu-ba-mfumu abu, bua kupûta panshi diditambisha diabu ne kunema kuabu ne kubakepesha bu mudi buloba, anyi ne bambula biluilu ne bakuatshisha bualu bua budishikaminyi.
51.18: Ne biakalua ne misumba ya basalayi yakaya kuluisha bantu-ba-mfumu; ne bakapûta panshi diditambisha diabu ne kunema kuabu, mua ne pakajulabu biluilu biabu bia mvita bua kuluisha bantu ba Moloni bakupudibua ne bakakepeshibua bu mudi buloba.
51.19: Ne biakalua ne kuvua binunu binayi bia batapuluki bavuabu bupudibua ku muela wa mvita; ne ba ku balombodi babu bavuabu kabayi bashipa mu mvita to abu bakangatshibua ne kuedibua mu buloko, bualu kakuvua diba malumbulula abu mu tshikondu etshi to.
51.20: Ne tshishadila tshia batapuluki abu, pa mutu pa kukuluishibua panshi pa buloba ku muela wa mvita, bakadifila ku dibendela dia budishikaminyi, ne bakabenzeja ku bukola bua kubandisha mukanda wa budishikaminyi pa bibumba biabu, ne mu bimenga biabu, ne bua kuambula biluilu biabu bua kusungidila ditunga diabu.
51.21: Ne nanku Moloni wakajikija bualu bua bantu-ba-mfumu abu, bualu kakuvua kabidi tshibikidilu tshia bantu-ba-mfumu to; ne nanku wakajikija mutu mukola ne diditambisha dia bantu bavua bakula bua mashi a bunema abu; kadi Moloni wakabafikisha ku didipuekesha bu muvua bana babu, ne kuluangana ne bukitu bua budishikaminyi buabu ku bupika.
51.22: Monayi, pavua Moloni ujikija mvita ne makokangana munkatshi mua bantu benda nkayenda nanku, ne ubabambikidila ditalala ne nshidimukilu, ne ufila mikandu bua kudilongolola bua kuluangana mvita ne Bena Lamana, monayi, Bena Lamana bavua babuela mu bulaba bua Moloni, buvua ku mikalu pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa.
51.23: Ne biakalua ne Bena Nefi kabavua ne bukola bukumbana mu tshimenga tshia Moloni to; bua nanku Amalikia wakabanyemesha, ne wakashipa ba bungi. Ne biakalua ne Amalikia wakangata tshimenga, eyowa miaba yabu mikolesha yonsu.
51.24: Ne bakanyema tshimenga tshia Moloni abu bakaya ku tshimenga tshia Nefiha; ne bantu ba mu tshimenga tshia Nefi bakadisangisha pabu pamua, ne bakenza didilongolola ne bavua badikumbaja bua kusambakena ne Bena Lamana bua mvita.
51.25: Kadi biakalua ne Amalikia kakalekela ne Bena Lamana baya kuluisha tshimenga tshia Nefiha to, kadi wakabalama kuinshi pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa, ushiya bantu mu tshimenga tshionsu bua kutshikuba ne kutshisungidila.
51.26: Ne nanku wakatungunuka, wangata bimenga bia bungi, tshimenga tshia Nefiha, ne tshimenga tshia Lehi, ne tshimenga tshia Moliantona, ne tshimenga tshia Omenele, ne tshimenga tshia Gidi, ne tshimenga tshia Muleke, bivua bionsu ku mikalu ya ku esete pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa.
51.27: Ne nanku Bena Lamana bavua bapeta, ku budimu bua Amalikia, ku misumba yabu ya basalayi ya bungi kayiyi kubala to, bimenga bia bungi menamena, bionsu bivua bikolesha bikola ku mushindu wa dikolesha dia Moloni; bionsu bivua bikala miaba mikolesha bua Bena Lamana.
51.28: Ne biakalua ne bakaya ku mikalu ya bulaba bua Buvula, banyemesha Bena Nefi kumpala kuabu ne bashipa ba bungi.
51.29: Ne biakalua ne bakasambakena ne Teyankuma, uvua mushipa Moliantona ne uvua mukosa bantu benda njila mu dinyema dienda.
51.30: Ne biakalua ne wakakosa Amalikia njila kabidi, pavuaye uya ne musumba wenda wa basalayi ba bungi bua kuangata bulaba bua Buvula, ne kabidi bulaba bua ku node.
51.31: Kadi monayi wakasambakena ne diteketa dia maboku mu dipingajibua dienda kunyima kudi Teyankuma ne bantu benda; bualu bavua baluanganyi ba mvita banena; bualu muntu yonsu wa Teyankuma uvua mupita Bena Lamana ku bukola buabu ne ku bumanyi buabu bua mvita, ki bua bualu kayi bakatamba Bena Lamana bukola.
51.32: Ne biakalua ne bakababambakaja, mua ne bakabashipa mena tô ne pakîlabu. Ne biakalua ne Teyankuma ne bantu benda bakâsa ntenta yabu ku mikalu ya bulaba bua Buvula; ne Amalikia wakâsa ntenta yenda ku mikalu pa kukala kua lusenga pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa, ne ku mushindu ewu bakanyemeshibua.
51.33: Ne biakalua ne pakîla butuku, Teyankuma ne musadidi wenda bakaya mu musokoku ne bakapatuka butuku, ne bakabuela mu tshitudilu tshia Amalikia; ne monayi, tulu tuvua tubatamba bukola bua dipungi diabu dia bungi, uvua mufumina ku midimu ne luya lua munda munya.
51.34: Ne biakalua ne Teyankuma wakadibueja mu musokoku mu ntenta wa mfumu ne wakamutua difuma ku mutshima wenda; ne wakenzeja lufu lua mfumu lukasa mu mushindu ne kakabîsha basadidi benda to.
51.35: Ne wakapingana mu musokoku ku tshitudilu tshienda, ne monayi, bantu benda bavua balala, ne wakababîsha ne wakabalondela bintu bionsu bivuaye muenza.
51.36: Ne wakenzeja ne misumba yenda ya basalayi idilongolola, bua Bena Lamana kabalu kubîka ne balua kubabunda.
51.37: Ne tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitânu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi tshiakajika nanku; ne matuku a Amalikia akajika nanku.

52.1: Ne mpindiewu, biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, monayi, pakabîka Bena Lamana mu dinda dia kumpala dia ngondu wa kumpala, monayi, bakasangana Amalikia mufua mu ntenta wenda nkayenda; ne bakamona kabidi ne Teyankuma uvua mudilongolola bua kubela mvita dituku adi.
52.2: Ne mpindiewu, pakamona Bena Lamana nanku bakumvua bôwa bikola; ne bakalekela dijinga diabu dia kuya ku bulaba buvua ku node, ne bakapingana ne musumba wabu wa basalayi mujima ku tshimenga tshia Muleke, ne bakadikuba munda mua miaba yabu mikolesha.
52.3: Ne biakalua ne muanabu ne Amalikia wa baluma wakasungudibua mfumu ku mutu kua bantu; ne dîna dienda divua Amolona; nanku mfumu Amolona, muanabu ne mfumu Amalikia wa baluma, uvua musungudibua bua kukôkesha pa muaba wenda.
52.4: Ne biakalua ne wakela mukenji ne bantu benda bakuba bimenga abi, bivuabu banyenga ku dimatshisha dia mashi; bualu kabavua banyenga tshimenga nansha tshimua to amu pa kumbusha pakajimijabu mashi a bungi.
52.5: Ne mpindiewu, Teyankuma wakamona Bena Lamana bavua bapangadika bua kukuba bimenga bivuabu banyenga abi, ne bitupa bia bulaba bivuabu bangata; ne kabidi pakamonaye bunena bua bungi buabu, Teyankuma wakela meji ne kabivua bikengedibua ne idikija bua kubabundila mu bisokomenu biabu to.
52.6: Kadi wakalama bantu benda mu miaba yabu, bu ne bavua badilongolola ku mvita; eyowa, ne bulelela uvua udilongolola bua kudisungila kudibu, ku diela dia bimanu ku mpenga yonsu ya bimenga biabu, ne ku dilongolola dia miaba ya tshinyemenu.
52.7: Ne biakalua ne wakatungunuka nanku udilongolola bua mvita tô ne pakatuma Moloni bungi bunena bua bantu bua kupesha musumba wenda wa basalayi makanda.
52.8: Ne Moloni wakamutumina kabidi dîyi bua alama bena lukanu bonsu bavua bapona mu bianza bienda; bualu bu muvua Bena Lamana bakuata bena lukanu ba bungi; ne uvua ne bua kulama bena lukanu ba Bena Lamana bu mudi tshia busungidi bua bavua Bena Lamana bakuata.
52.9: Ne wakamutumina kabidi dîyi ne akolesha bulaba bua Buvula, ne alama kajila kabumbakana kavua kalombola ku bulaba bua ku node, bua Bena Lamana kabalu kuangata muaba awu ne kabalu kupeta bukola bua kubabambakajila ku luseka lonsu.
52.10: Ne Moloni wakamutumina kabidi dîyi, ujinga ne ikala ne lulamatu mu dikuba tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi ne bua akeba njila yonsu wa kunyasula Bena Lamana mu tshitupa atshi, diba dionsu divuabi ku bukola buenda, bua pamuapa anyenga kabidi bimenga bivua Bena Lamana banyenga mu bianza biabu, ku budimu buenda anyi ku mushindu mukuabu; ne bua akolesha kabidi bimenga bivua kabiyi bipona mu bianza bia Bena Lamana, ku mpenga yonsu ne abipesha makanda.
52.11: Ne wakamuambila kabidi ne, ndi musua kulua kûdi, kadi mona, Bena Lamana badi batubunda ku mikalu ya bulaba bua pabuipi ne mbuwa wa ku wesete; ne mona, ndi nya kubaluisha, bua nanku ntshiena mua kulua kûdi to.
52.12: Mpindiewu, mfumu (Amolona) uvua mumbuka ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne uvua mumanyisha mukaji wa mfumu bitangila lufu lua muanabu wa baluma, ne uvua musangisha bungi bunena bua bantu, ne uvua muya kuluisha Bena Nefi ku mikalu ya pabuipi ne mbuwa wa wesete.
52.13: Ne uvua ukeba bua kubambakaja Bena Nefi, ne bua kukoka tshitupa tshia bisumbu bia basalayi biabu ku tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi, pavuaye mupesha mukenji kudi bavuaye mushiya bua kusomba mu bimenga bivuaye muangata, ne babambakaja kabidi Bena Nefi ku mikalu ya pabuipi ne mbuwa wa esete, ne bangata malaba abu misangu yonsu ivuabi ku bukôkeshi buabu, bilondeshila ku bukola bua misumba yabu ya basalayi.
52.14: Ne Bena Nefi bavua nanku mu mushindu wa njiwu awu ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi.
52.15: Kadi monayi, biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda muteketa tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, ne Teyankuma, ku mukenji wa Moloni—uvua mushikika misumba ya basalayi bua kukuba mikalu ya ku sude ne ya ku wesete ya bulaba, ne uvua mubanga kuya mutangila ku bulaba bua Buvula, bua ambuluisha Teyankuma ne bantu benda bua bangatulula bimenga bivuabu bajimija—
52.16: Ne biakalua ne Teyankuma uvua mupeta mukenji bua kubunda tshimenga tshia Muleke, ne kutshiangatulula, bu biobi bua kukumbana.
52.17: Ne biakalua ne Teyankuma wakadilongolola bua kubunda tshimenga tshia Muleke, ne wakaya kubunda Bena Lamana ne musumba wenda wa basalayi; kadi wakamona ne kabivua bikumbana ne uvua mua kubatamba bukola pavuabu mu miaba yabu mikolesha to; bua nanku wakalekela majinga enda ne wakapingana ku tshimenga tshia Buvula, bua kuindila dilua dia Moloni, bua kupetaye makanda bua musumba wenda wa basalayi.
52.18: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakafika ne musumba wenda wa basalayi ku bulaba bua Buvula, ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda muteketa tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi.
52.19: Ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda mukulu, Moloni ne Teyankuma ne tupita tunena tua bungi tuakenza tshipangu tshia mvita—bua kumanya tshivuabu ne bua kuenza bua kuenzeja Bena Lamana bua kulua kubaluisha; anyi bua bapeta mushindu wa kubabomba bua bapatuka ku miaba yabu mikolesha, bua ne bamona mua kubatamba bukola ne kuangata kabidi tshimenga tshia Muleke.
52.20: Ne biakalua ne bakatuma bantu kudi musumba wa basalayi wa Bena Lamana, uvua ukuba tshimenga tshia Muleke, kudi mulombodi wabu, muena dîna dia Yakoba, ne apatuka ne misumba yenda ya basalayi bua kusambakena nabu mu mpata ya pankatshi pa bimenga bibidi. Kadi monayi, Yakoba, uvua muikala Muena Zolama, wakabenga kupatuka ne musumba wenda wa basalayi bua kusambakena nabu mu mpata.
52.21: Ne biakalua ne Moloni, bualu kavua ne ditekemena nansha dimua dia kusambakena nabu mu mulongu umua, bua nanku, wakashikika bulongolodi bua kulobeshaye Bena Lamana bua kubapatuisha mu miaba yabu mikolesha.
52.22: Bua nanku wakenzeja ne Teyankuma angata bungi bukesa bua bantu ne apueka pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa; ne Moloni ne musumba wenda wa basalayi bakaya mu tshipela, butuku, ku wesete kua tshimenga tshia Muleke; ne nanku pakatshiabu, pakamona balami ba Bena Lamana Teyankuma, bakanyema ne bakabuambila Yakoba, mulombodi wabu.
52.23: Ne biakalua ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana yakaya kuluisha Teyankuma, itshinka bua kutamba Teyankuma bukola bua bualu bua bukesa bua bungi buenda. Ne pakamona Teyankuma misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana ilua kumuluisha, wakabanga kupingana kuinshi pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa, ku node.
52.24: Ne biakalua ne pakamona Bena Lamana wakabanga kunyema, bakapeta dikima ne bakabalondakaja ne bukola. Ne pavua Teyankuma upambuisha Bena Lamana bavua bamulondakaja tshianana nanku, monayi, Moloni wakapesha tshitupa tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi tshivua nenda mukenji bua tshiya ku tshimenga, ne tshitshiangata.
52.25: Ne bakenza nanku, ne bakashipa bonsu bavuabu bashiya bua kukuba tshimenga abu, eyowa, bonsu bavua babenga kufila biluilu biabu bia mvita.
52.26: Ne nanku Moloni wakangata tshimenga tshia Muleke ne tshitupa tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi, pavuaye uya ne tshishadila tshiawu bua kusambakena ne Bena Lamana pâpinganabu ku dilondakaja dia Teyankuma.
52.27: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakalondakaja Teyankuma tô ne pakaluabu pabuipi ne tshimenga tshia Buvula, ne pashisha bakasambakena ne Lehi ne musumba mukesa wa basalayi, uvuabu bashiya bua kukuba tshimenga tshia Buvula.
52.28: Ne mpindiewu monayi, pakamona tupita tunena tua Bena Lamana Lehi ulua kubabunda ne musumba wenda wa basalayi, bakanyema ne disalu dikola, bua kabalu pamuapa kuangata tshimenga tshia Muleke kumpala kua Lehi kubakuata; bualu bavua batshioka bua luendu luabu, ne bantu ba Lehi bavua ne bukola.
52.29: Mpindiewu Bena Lamana kabavua bamanya ne Moloni uvua panyima pabu ne musumba wenda wa basalayi to; ne bonsu bavuabu batshina bavua amu Lehi ne bantu benda.
52.30: Mpindiewu Lehi kavua ujinga bua kubakuata kumpala kua bobu kusambakena ne Moloni ne musumba wenda wa basalayi to.
52.31: Ne biakalua ne kumpala kua Bena Lamana kupinganabu panyima kula bakabanyungulula kudi Bena Nefi, kudi bantu ba Moloni ku diboku dimua ne kudi bantu ba Lehi ku dikuabu, bavua bonsu bikala ne bukola ne buwula ntenta ne makanda; kadi Bena Lamana bavua batshioka bua luendu luabu lula.
52.32: Ne Moloni wakapesha bantu benda mukenji bua badiela kudibu tô ne pavuabu bafila biluilu biabu bia mvita.
52.33: Ne biakalua ne Yakoba, uvua muikala mulombodi wabu, bualu uvua kabidi Muena Zolama, ne uvua ne nyuma uvua kayi bua kutshimunyibua to, wakalombola Bena Lamana bua kuluangana ne tshiji tshikola kudi Moloni.
52.34: Bualu Moloni uvua muikala mu njila wabu uvuabu bikala bapitshila, bua nanku Yakoba wakapangadika bua kubashipa ne kupanda njila wenda munkatshi mua tshimenga tshia Muleke. Kadi monayi, Moloni ne bantu benda bavua ne bukola bupita bungi; bua nanku kabakapingana panyima kumpala kua Bena Lamana to.
52.35: Ne biakalua ne bakaluangana ku maboku onsu abidi ne tshiji tshikola; ne ba bungi bakashipabu ku nseka yonsu ibidi; eyowa, ne Moloni wakatapika mputa ne bakashipa Yakoba.
52.36: Ne Lehi wakenza mbamba panyima pa Bena Lamana ne tshiji tshikola ne bantu benda ba makanda, ki bua tshinyi Bena Lamana bavua panyima bakafila biluilu biabu bia mvita; ne bashadila babu, bualu bavua babuelakana bikola mu meji, kabakamanya kua kuya anyi kua kukuma to.
52.37: Mpindiewu pakamona Moloni dibuelakana diabu dia meji, wakabambila ne: Nuenu batuala biluilu bienu bia mvita ne babifila, monayi netulekela dimatshisha dia mashi enu.
52.38: Ne biakalua ne pakumvua Bena Lamana mêyi â, tupita tuabu tunena, tonsu tuvuabu kabayi bashipa to, tuakalua ne tuakimansha biluilu biatu bia mvita panshi ku makasa a Moloni, ne tuakapesha kabidi bantu batu mukenji ne benza bia momumua.
52.39: Kadi monayi, kuvua ba bungi bavua babenga; ne bakakuata ne bakasuika aba bavua babenga kufila miela yabu ya mvita, ne bakabanyenga biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne bakabenzeja ku bukola bua kuya ne bana babu ku bulaba bua Buvula.
52.40: Ne mpindiewu bungi bua bena lukanu bavuabu bakuata buvua bupita bungi bua bavuabu bashipa, eyowa, bupita bua bavuabu bashipa ku nseka yonsu ibidi.

53.1: Ne biakalua ne bakatekela bena lukanu ba ku Bena Lamana balami, ne bakabenzeja ku bukola bua kuya kujîka bafua babu, eyowa, ne bafua ba Bena Nefi kabidi bavuabu bashipa; ne Moloni wakabatekela bantu bua kubalama pavuabu bakuata midimu yabu.
53.2: Ne Moloni wakaya ku tshimenga tshia Muleke ne Lehi, ne wakangata bulombodi bua tshimenga ne wakabupesha kudi Lehi. Kadi monayi, Lehi ewu uvua muntu uvua muikala ne Moloni mu tshitupa tshinena tshia mvita yenda yonsu; ne uvua muntu uvua bu Moloni, ne muntu ne muntu uvua usanka bua bupola bua mukuenda; eyowa, bavua banangangana, ne bavua kabidi banangibua kudi bantu ba Nefi bonsu.
53.3: Ne biakalua ne pakajikija Bena Lamana kujîka bafua babu ne bafua ba Bena Nefi kabidi, bakabalukija ku bulaba bua Buvula; ne Teyankuma, ku mikenji wa Moloni, wakabenzeja ne batuadija kumbula tshina tshia munkoloji ku mpenga yonsu ya bulaba, anyi kua tshimenga, tshia Buvula.
53.4: Ne wakenzeja ne bibaka tshimanu tshia mikamba ku luseka lua munda mua tshina tshia munkoloji; ne bakela buloba bua mu tshina tshia munkoloji ku tshimanu tshia mikamba; ne bakenzeja Bena Lamana mudimu nanku tô ne pakanyungululabu tshimenga tshia Buvula ne tshimanu tshikola tshia mikamba ne buloba, tshia bula bupita.
53.5: Ne tshimenga etshi tshiakalua muaba mukolesha kupita kashidi; ne mu tshimenga etshi bakalamamu bena lukanu ba ku Bena Lamana; eyowa, mena munda mua tshimanu tshivuabu babenzeja bua kuibaka ne bianza biabu nkayabu. Mpindiewu Moloni wakenzeja Bena Lamana ku bukola bua kukuata mudimu, bualu bivua biteketa bua kubalama pavuabu bakuata mudimu; ne wakajinga kuikala ne basalayi benda bonsu pâbundaye Bena Lamana.
53.6: Ne biakalua ne Moloni uvua nanku mutshimuna umua wa misumba minena ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana, ne wakangata tshimenga tshia Muleke, tshivua tshikala umua wa miaba mipita kukolesha ya Bena Lamana mu bulaba bua Nefi; ne nanku uvua kabidi muibaka muaba mukolesha bua kulama bena lukanu benda.
53.7: Ne biakalua ne kakidikija kabidi mvita ne Bena Lamana mu tshidimu atshi to, kadi wakapesha bantu benda mudimu wa kudilongolola bua mvita, eyowa, ne bua kuibaka kua miaba mikolesha bua kudikuba ku Bena Lamana, eyowa, ne kabidi bua kupatuisha bakaji babu ne bana babu mu tshiyola ne mu lutatu, ne bua kupesha misumba yabu ya basalayi biakudia.
53.8: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pavua misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana, ku sude kua mbuwa wa ku wesete, pavua Moloni kayiku to, dimua dilongolola disokoka munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, tshiakenzeja matapuluka munkatshi muabu, tshiakapeta muaba kudi Bena Nefi, eyowa, mu mushindu wa ne bakangata bungi kampanda bua bimenga biabu mu tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi.
53.9: Ne nanku bua malu mabi avua munkatshi muabu, eyowa, bua bualu bua matapuluka ne malongolola masokoka avua munkatshi muabu nkayabu bakedibua mu malu a njiwu mipita.
53.10: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi ne kakesa ka kuamba bitangila bantu ba Amona, bavua, ku mbangilu, bikala Bena Lamana; kadi kupitshila ku Amona ne bana babu, anyi kupitshila ku bukola ne ku dîyi dia Nzambi, bavua bakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga; ne bakabapuekesha ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne, katshia ku diba adi Bena Nefi bavua babakuba.
53.11: Ne kabavua bua kumbula biluilu bua kuluisha bana babu bua mutshipu wabu; bualu bavua bela mutshipu ne kabakumatshisha mashi kabidi nansha; ne bilondeshila ku mutshipu wabu bavua bua kufua; eyowa, bavua bua kudilekela bua kupona mu bianza bia bana babu, bu kabivua bua lusa ne dinanga ditamba bunena divua Amona ne bana babu bikala nâdi buabu.
53.12: Ne bua bualu ebu bakabapuekesha ku bulaba bua Zalahemela; ne Bena Nefi bavua babakuba katshia ku diba adi.
53.13: Kadi biakalua ne pakamonabu njiwu, ne ntatu ya bungi ne mpaji ya bungi bivua Bena Nefi bambula buabu, bakanyungushibua ne moyo wa lusa ne bakajinga kuambula biluilu bua kusungidila ditunga diabu.
53.14: Kadi monayi, bu muvuabu pabuipi ne kuangata biluilu biabu bia mvita, bavua batambibua bukola kudi ditabuijija dia Helamana ne dia bana babu, bualu bavua pabuipi ne mutshipu uvuabu bela.
53.15: Ne Helamana wakatshina ne ku dienza dia nanku kabalu kujimija anyima yabu; bua nanku bonsu bavua babuela mu tshipungidi etshi bakenzejibua bua kumona bana babu bapututuka mu ntatu yabu, mu malu abu a njiwu avua abafikila mu tshikondu etshi.
53.16: Kadi monayi, biakalua ne bavua ne bana ba baluma ba bungi bavua kabayi babuela mu tshipungidi to ne kabakuangata biluilu bua mvita biabu bua kudisungidila kudi bena lukuna babu to; bua nanku bakadisangisha pamua diba adi, bonsu bavua ne bukola bua kuambula biluilu, ne bakadinyika ne Bena Nefi.
53.17: Ne babuela mu tshipungidi tshia kuluangana bua budishikaminyi bua Bena Nefi; eyowa, bua kukuba bulaba tô ne ku difila dia mioyo yabu; eyowa, bakenza tshipungidi mena ne kabakulekela budishikaminyi buabu nansha, kadi nebaluangana mu mishindu yonsu bua kukuba Bena Nefi ne bobu bina ku bupika.
53.18: Mpindiewu monayi, bansongaluma bakabuela mu tshipungidi etshi ne bakangata biluilu bia mvita biabu bua kusungidila ditunga diabu abu bavua binunu bibidi.
53.19: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bu muvuabu tô ne mpindiewu kabayi banji kuikala dikasa dibi bua Bena Nefi to, bakalua mpindiewu mu tshikondu etshi dikuatshisha dinena kabidi; bualu bakangata biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne bakasua ne Helamana ikala mulombodi wabu.
53.20: Ne bavua bonsu bansongaluma, ne bavua bikala ne bukitu menamena bua dikima, ne kabidi bua makanda abu ne bua dikuata diabu dia mudimu; kadi monayi, ebi kabivua bionsu to—bavua bantu bavua bikala ne butumikidi diba dionsu ku mudimu yonsu uvuabu babapesha.
53.21: Eyowa, bavua bantu ba bulelela ne bushindama, bualu bavua babalongesha bua kulama mikenji ya Nzambi ne bua kuenda bôloloka kumpala kuenda.
53.22: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne Helamana wakaya ku mutu kua bitenda bienda bia basalayi binunu bibidi, bua kukuatshisha bantu ba ku mikalu ya bulaba bua ku sude pabuipi ne ku mbuwa wa ku wesete.
53.23: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.

54.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitema tshia balumbuluishi, ne Amolona wakatuma muntu kudi Moloni ujinga ne ashintulula bena lukanu.
54.2: Ne biakalua ne Moloni wakumvua disanka menamena bua dilomba edi, bualu uvua ujinga ne biakudia bivuabu bafila bua dikuatshisha dia bena lukanu ba ku Bena Lamana abi bikala bua dikuatshisha dia bantu benda nkayenda; ne uvua ujinga bantu benda kabidi bua kukolesha musumba wenda wa basalayi.
54.3: Mpindiewu Bena Lamana bavua bakuata bantu bakaji ne bana ba bungi, ne kakuvua muntu mukaji anyi muana umua munkatshi mua bena lukanu ba Moloni to, anyi bena lukanu bavua Moloni mukuata to; bua nanku Moloni wakangata dipangadika dia bumua budimu bua kuangata bungi bonsu bua bena lukanu ba ku Bena Nefi buvuaye bua kuangata kudi Bena Lamana.
54.4: Bua nanku wakafunda mukanda, ne wakawutuma kudi musadidi wa Amolona, yeya muina uvua mulua ne mukanda kudi Moloni awu. Mpindiewu eyi ki miaku yakafundilaye Amolona, wamba ne:
54.5: Mona, Amolona, ndi mukufundila kakesa bitangila mvita eyi iwudi muela bantu banyi, anyi idi muanenu wa baluma mubela, ne iwutshidi mupangadika bua kutungunuka nayi kunyima kua lufu luenda.
54.6: Mona, ndi musua kukuambila kakesa bitangila bululama bua Nzambi, ne muela wa mvita wa tshiji tshienda tshia bukitu bonsu, udi mulembelela pa mutu weba, amu wewa mukudimuna mutshima ne mupingaja misumba yenu ya basalayi mu malaba enu nkayenu, anyi mu bulaba bunudi nuasamu, budi buikala bulaba bua Nefi.
54.7: Eyowa, nenkuambila bintu ebi bu wewa muikala mukumbana bua diteleja kudibi; eyowa, nenkuambila bitangila ngena mutamba bubi awu udi muindila bua kuakidila bashibeyi ba bantu ba bu munuvua bikala wewa ne muanenu wa baluma bikala, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima ne balekela majinga enu a kushibeya bantu, ne bapingana ne misumba yenu ya basalayi ku malaba enu nkayenu.
54.8: Kadi bu munuvua umua musangu babenga bintu ebi, ne nuvua baluangana ne bantu ba Mukalenga, ndi mua kutekemena ne nenuenza kabidi nanku.
54.9: Ne mpindiewu mona, tudi badilongolola bua kuluangana nuenu; eyowa, ne pa kumbusha nuenu balekela majinga enu, mona, nenudikuluila tshiji tshia Nzambi awu unuvua babenga, mena bua dibutuka dijima dienu.
54.10: Kadi, bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, misumba yetu ya basalayi neilua kunubunda pa kumbusha nuenu bumbuka, ne nenukumbudibua ne lufu katataka, bualu netulama bimenga bietu ne malaba etu; eyowa, ne netukuba ntendelelu wetu ne kipatshila ka Nzambi wetu.
54.11: Kadi mona, ndi ntshinka ba ndi nkuambila bitangila bintu ebi tshianana; anyi ndi ntshinka ne udi muana wa mu ngena; bua nanku nenjikija mukanda wanyi ku dikuambila ne ntshiakushintulula bena lukanu, amu pa kumbusha ku diumvuangana ne neufila muntu umua ne mukaji wenda ne bana benda, bua muena lukanu umua; pikalabi ne newenza nanku, nenshintulula.
54.12: Ne mona, panuikala kuyi wenza nanku to, nendua kunubunda ne misumba yanyi ya basalayi, eyowa, nempaya mena bakaji banyi ne bana banyi ne biluilu, ne nendua kukubunda, ne nenkulonda mena ku bulaba buenu nkayenu, budi buikala bulaba bua bupianyi buetu bua kumpala; eyowa, ne nebikala mashi bua mashi, eyowa, moyo bua moyo; ne nennuluisha mena tô ne panuabutuka pa mpala wa buloba.
54.13: Mona, ndi ne tshiji, ne bantu banyi kabidi; nuvua nukeba bua kutushibeya, ne tuvuanu tukeba bua kudisungila. Kadi mona, panuikala nukeba bua kutubutula bikola netukeba bua kunubutula; eyowa, ne netukeba bua kunyenga bulaba buetu, bulaba bua bupianyi buetu bua kumpala.
54.14: Mpindiewu ngajikiji mukanda wanyi. Ndi Moloni; ndi mulombodi wa bantu ba Bena Nefi.
54.15: Mpindiewu biakalua ne Amolona, pakapetaye mukanda ewu, wakafîka tshiji; ne wakafundila Moloni mukanda mukuabu, ne eyi ki miaku yakafundaye, wamba ne:
54.16: Ndi Amolona, mfumu wa Bena Lamana; ndi muanabu ne Amalikia wa baluma unuvua bashibeya. Mona, nensombola mashi enda kunudi, eyowa, nennuluila ne misumba yanyi ya basalayi bualu ntshiena ntshina dikanyina dieba to.
54.17: Bualu mona, batatuenu bakenzela bana babu bibi, mu mushindu wa ne bakabanyenga bunema buabu bua bukalenga pavuabu bulelela buikala buabu.
54.18: Ne mpindiewu mona, panuateka biluilu bienu panshi, ne panuadibatshika bua kulombodibua kudi badi bulombodi buikala buabu, pashisha nengenzeja ne bantu banyi bateka biluilu biabu bia mvita panshi ne kabakuluangana kabidi mvita nansha.
54.19: Mona, udi unkanyina mema ne bantu banyi; kadi mona, katuena tutshina dikanyina dieba to.
54.20: Nansha nanku, nenganyisha bua kushintulula bena lukanu bilondeshila ku dilomba dieba, ne disanka, bua kukuba biakudia bianyi bua bantu banyi ba mvita; ne netunuela mvita ikala ya tshiendelela, bua dibatshika dia Bena Nefi ku bukôkeshi buetu anyi bua dibutuka diabu dia tshiendelela.
54.21: Ne bua bidi bitangila Nzambi uwudi wamba ne tudi babenga, mona, katuena bamanya muntu wa buena awu to, nansha nuenu bina; kadi pikalabi ne kudi muntu wa buena ewu, tudi tuela meji ne udi mutufuka bu mudiyi munufuka.
54.22: Ne pikalabi ne kudi diabulu ne ngena, mona kena ukutuma mômu bua kusomba ne muanetu wa baluma unuvua bashibeya, uwudi usua kuamba ne udi muya ku muaba wa buena ewu anyi? Kadi mona bintu ebi kabiena ne mushinga to.
54.23: Ndi Amolona, ne ndi kankanunuina ka Zolama, uvua batatuenu bapatuisha mu Yelushalema ku mbamba.
54.24: Ne mona mpindiewu, ndi Muena Lamana wa dikima; mona, mvita eyi ivua miedibua bua kusombuela bubi buakenzelabu Bena Lamana ne bua kupeta ne bua kukuba manema abu ku bukalenga; ne ngajikiji mukanda wanyi kudi Moloni.

55.1: Mpindiewu biakalua ne pakapeta Moloni mukanda ewu wakafîka tshiji tshipita, bualu uvua mumanya ne Amolona uvua ne dimanya dijima dia dîbila dienda; eyowa, uvua mumanya ne Amolona uvua mumanya ne katshivua kipatshila kalulama kavua kamuenzeja bua kuela bantu ba Nefi mvita to.
55.2: Ne wakamba ne: Monayi, ntshiakushintulula bena lukanu ne Amolona to amu pa kumbusha yeya mulekela dijinga dienda, bu mumvua muamba mu mukanda wanyi; bualu ntshiakumuanyishila ne ikala ne bukola bukuabu kupita budiye nabu to.
55.3: Monayi, ndi mumanya muaba udi Bena Lamana balama bantu banyi bavuabu bakuata bena lukanu; ne bualu Amolona wakabenga kunganyishila tshindi ndomba mu mukanda wanyi, monayi, nemmuenzela bilondeshila ku miaku yanyi; eyowa, nenkeba lufu munkatshi muabu tô ne pâlombabu ditalala.
55.4: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Moloni mêyi â, wakenzeja makebulula munkatshi mua bantu benda, bua pamuapa badi mua kupeta kankanunuina ka Lamana munkatshi muabu.
55.5: Ne biakalua ne bakapeta umua, muena dîna ne Lamana; ne uvua umua wa basadidi ba mfumu uvua Amalikia mushibeya.
55.6: Mpindiewu Moloni wakenzeja ne Lamana ne bungi bukesa bua bantu benda baya kudi balami bavua balama Bena Nefi.
55.7: Mpindiewu Bena Nefi bavua balama mu tshimenga tshia Gidi; bua nanku Moloni wakasungula Lamana ne wakenzeja ne bungi bukesa bua bantu buya nenda.
55.8: Ne pakavua dilolo Lamana wakaya kudi balami bavua balama Bena Nefi, ne monayi, bakamumona ulua ne bakamuelela mbila; kadi wakabambila ne: Kanutshinyi to; monayi, ndi Muena Lamana. Monayi, tudi banyema kudi Bena Nefi, ne badi balala; ne monayi, tudi bangata mvinyo wabu ne tudi biya nenda.
55.9: Mpindiewu pakumvua Bena Lamana mêyi â bakamuakidila ne disanka; ne bakamuambila ne: Tupeshayi amua mvinyo wenu, bua tunua; tudi ne disanka ne nudi balua nanku ne mvinyo bualu tudi batshioka.
55.10: Kadi Lamana wakabambila ne: Tulamayi ndambu wa mvinyo wetu tô ne patuaya kuluisha Bena Nefi mvita. Kadi ngakuilu ewu wakabapesha amu dijinga dikola dia kunua amua mvinyo;
55.11: Bualu, bakamba ne: Tudi batshioka, bua nanku lekela tuangata ndambu wa mvinyo, ne kunyima kua mutantshi netupeta mvinyo mu dipesha dietu, atukolesha bua kuya kuluisha Bena Nefi.
55.12: Ne Lamana wakabambila ne: Nudi mua kuenza bilondeshila ku dijinga dienu.
55.13: Ne biakalua ne bakanua mvinyo eyi bikola; ne ivua mishema mukana muabu, bua nanku, bakayinua bikola kupita; ne ivua mikola, bualu ivua milambibua mu bukola buayi.
55.14: Ne biakalua ne bakanua ne bakasanka, ne kunyima kua mutantshi bakakuatshika bonsu.
55.15: Ne mpindiewu pakamona Lamana ne bantu benda ne bavua bonsu bakuatshika, ne bavua bikala mu tulu tukola, bakapingana kudi Moloni ne bakamuambila bintu bionsu bivua bienzeka.
55.16: Ne mpindiewu ebi bivua bilondeshila ku dijinga dia Moloni. Ne Moloni uvua mulongolola bantu benda ne biluilu bia mvita; ne wakaya ku tshimenga tshia Gidi, patshivua Bena Lamana mu tulu tukola ne bakuatshika, ne wakimanshila bena lukanu biamua bia mvita, mua ne bakapayibua bonsu ne biluilu;
55.17: Eyowa, mena kudi bantu bakaji babu, ne kudi bana babu bonsu bavua, bonsu bakumbana bua kuenzela tshiluilu tshia mvita, Moloni wakapaya bena lukanu bonsu ne biluilu; ne bakenza bintu bionsu ebi bikala bapuwa bikola.
55.18: Kadi bu bobu babîsha Bena Lamana, monayi bavua bakuatshika ne Bena Nefi bavua mua kubashipa.
55.19: Kadi monayi, edi kadivua dijinga dia Moloni to; kavua usankila mu dishibeya dia bantu anyi mu dimatshisha dia mashi to, kadi uvua usankila mu dipandisha dia bantu benda ku dinyanguka; ne bua kipatshila aka, bua kalu kupanga bululama to, wakabenga kudiela kudi Bena Lamana ne kubashipa pavuabu bakuatshika.
55.20: Kadi wakapeta dijinga dienda; bualu wakapaya bena lukanu ba ku Bena Nefi bavua munda mua bimanu bia tshimenga ne biluilu, ne wakabapesha bukola bua kuangata bitupa bia tshimenga bivua munda mua bimanu abi.
55.21: Ne pashisha wakenzeja bantu bavua nenda bua kubashila muaba kakesa, ne bua kunyungulula misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana.
55.22: Mpindiewu monayi ebi bivua biakenzeka munda nkulu, bua ne pakabîka Bena Lamana mu dinda bakamona ne bavua banyungulula kudi Bena Nefi pambelu, ne bena lukanu bavuabu bakuata bavua bambula biluilu munda.
55.23: Ne nanku bakamona ne Bena Nefi bavua ne bukola kudibu; ne mu malu â bakamona ne kabivua bikengedibua ne baluangana ne Bena Nefi to; bua nanku tupita tuabu tunena tuakabalomba biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne bakalua nabi ne bakabimansha ku makasa a Bena Nefi, babasengelela bua lusa.
55.24: Mpindiewu monayi, edi divua dijinga dia Moloni. Wakabakuata bena lukanu ba mvita, ne wakangata tshimenga, ne wakalekesha bena lukanu bonsu bavua bikala Bena Nefi; ne bakadisangisha ku musumba wa basalayi wa Moloni, ne bakatuadila musumba wenda wa basalayi makanda a bungi.
55.25: Ne biakalua ne wakenzeja Bena Lamana, bavuaye mukuata bu bena lukanu, ne batuadija kukuata mudimu bua kukolesha miaba mikolesha ku mpenga yonsu ya tshimenga tshia Gidi.
55.26: Ne biakalua ne pakakoleshaye tshimenga tshia Gidi, bilondeshila ku dijinga dienda, wakenzeja ne baya ne bena lukanu benda ku tshimenga tshia Buvula; ne wakalama kabidi tshimenga atshi ne musumba wa basalayi mukola menamena.
55.27: Ne biakalua ne, nansha bua malongolola masokoka onsu a Bena Lamana, bakalama ne bakakuba bena lukanu bonsu bavuabu bakuata, ne bakalama buloba bonsu ne bukola bivuabu bangatulula.
55.28: Ne biakalua ne Bena Nefi bakabanga kutshimuna kabidi, ne kuangatulula manema abu ne diakalengela diabu.
55.29: Misangu ya bungi Bena Lamana bakidikija bua kubanyungulula butuku, kadi mu midikija abu â, bakajimija bena lukanu ba bungi.
55.30: Ne misangu ya bungi bakidikija bua kupesha Bena Nefi mvinyo wabu, bua babashipa ne mulungu anyi ku dikuatshika.
55.31: Kadi monayi, Bena Nefi kabavua ne lujoku bua kuvuluka Mukalenga Nzambi wabu to mu diba edi dia lutatu luabu. Kabavua mua kubakuata ku mateyi abu to; eyowa, bakabenga kuangata mvinyo wabu, amu pa kumbusha diambedi kufila kudi ndambu wa bena lukanu ba ku bena Lamana.
55.32: Ne bavua nanku badimuka bua ne mulungu kawedibu munkatshi muabu to; bualu bu mvinyo wabu uvua bua kulunga Muena Lamana uvua bua kulunga kabidi Muena Nefi; ne ki muakatêtabu maluvu abu makola nanku.
55.33: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne bivua bikengedibua bua Moloni adilongolola bua kubunda tshimenga tshia Moliantona; bualu monayi, Bena Lamana bavua, ku midimu yabu, bakolesha tshimenga tshia Moliantona tô ne pakaluatshi muaba mukolesha menamena.
55.34: Ne bavua batungunuka kulua ne bisumbu bia basalayi bipia-bipia mu tshimenga etshi, ne kabidi difila dipia-dipia dia biakudia.
55.35: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.

56.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi asatu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, mu dituku dibîdi dia ngondu wa kumpala, Moloni wakapeta mukanda wa Helamana, ulonda malu a bantu mu tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi.
56.2: Ne eyi ki miaku yakafundaye, wamba ne: Moloni, muanetu munanga bikola kupita wa mu Mukalenga ne wa mu mpaji yetu ya ku mvita yetu; mona, muanetu munanga, ndi ne kakesa ka kukuambila bitangila mvita yetu mu tshitupa tshia bulaba etshi.
56.3: Mona, binunu bibidi bia bana ba baluma ba bantu bavua Amona mupatuisha ku bulaba bua Nefi abu—mpindiewu udi mumanya aba tudi tunkanunuina tua Lamana, uvua muikala muana wa kumpala wa baluma wa tatuetu Lehi;
56.4: Ntshiena ne dijinga dia kukuambuluila bidi bitangila ngenzelu yabu anyi dipanga ditabuja diabu to, bualu udi mumanya bitangila bintu bionsu ebi—
56.5: Bua nanku buanyi mema mema bidi bikumbana ne nkuambila ne binunu bibidi bia bansongaluma aba bavua bangata biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne bavua basua ne ngikala mulombodi wabu; ne tudi balua kusungidila ditunga dietu.
56.6: Ne mpindiewu udi kabidi mumanya bitangila tshipungidi tshiakenza batatuabu, ne bakabenga kuambula biluilu biabu bia mvita bua kuluisha bana babu bua kumatshisha mashi abu.
56.7: Kadi mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo, pakamonabu ntatu yetu ne mpaji yetu buabu, bavua pabuipi ne kushipa tshipungidi tshivuabu bapunga ne kuambula biluilu biabu bia mvita bua kutusungidila.
56.8: Kadi ntshivua mulekela ne bashipa tshipungidi etshi tshivuabu benza to, bualu ngakatshinka ne Nzambi neatukolesha, mu mushindu wa ne katukengi kabidi to bua dikumbaja dia mutshipu uvuabu bela.
56.9: Kadi mona, kudi tshintu tshimua kutudi mua kupetela disanka dinena. Bualu mona, mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo, mema, Helamana, ngakaya kumutu kua bansongaluma binunu bibidi aba batangila ku tshimenga tshia Yudaya, bua kuambuluisha Antipu, uwuvua musungula bu mulombodi ku mutu kua bantu ba mu tshitupa tshia bulaba atshi.
56.10: Ne ngakasangisha kudi bana banyi ba baluma binunu bibidi, (bualu badi bakumbana bua kubabikila ne bana banyi ba baluma) ku musumba wa basalayi wa Antipu, makanda akasanka nawu Antipu menamena; bualu mona, Bena Lamana bavua bakepesha musumba wenda wa basalayi bualu musumba wenda wa basalayi uvua mushipa bungi bunena bua bantu betu, tshivua tshikala bualu bua kudila kutudi.
56.11: Nansha nanku, tudi mua kudisamba ku bualu ebu, ne badi bafua bua bualu bua ditunga diabu ne bua Nzambi wabu, eyowa, ne badi basangala.
56.12: Ne Bena Lamana pabu bavua bakuata bena lukanu ba bungi, bonsu buabu badi bikala tupita tunena, bualu kabavua bepelesha moyo wa muntu mukuabu to. Ne tudi tutshinka ne badi diba edi mu bulaba bua Nefi; bidi nanku pikalabu kabayi babashipa to.
56.13: Ne mpindiewu ebi ki bimenga bidi Bena Lamana bangata ku dimatshisha dia mashi a bantu betu ba bungi ba bukitu:
56.14: Bulaba bua Manti, anyi tshimenga tshia Manti, ne tshimenga tshia Zêzeloma, ne tshimenga tshia Kumeni, ne tshimenga tshia Antipala.
56.15: Ne ebi ki bimenga biakangatabu pangakafika ku tshimenga tshia Yuda; ne ngakasangana Antipu ne bantu benda bakuata mudimu ne bukola buabu bua kukolesha tshimenga.
56.16: Eyowa, ne bavua bapungila mu mubidi ne mu nyuma, bualu bavua baluangana ne bukitu munda munya ne bavua bakuata mudimu butuku bua kukuba bimenga biabu; ne bavua bafua ne ntatu mikola ya mushindu yonsu.
56.17: Ne mpindiewu bavua bapangadika bua kutshimunabu mu muaba ewu anyi bua kufuabu; bua nanku udi mua kutshinka bimpa ne musumba mukesa ewu undi mulua nawu, eyowa, bana banyi ba baluma abu, bakabapesha ditekemena dinena ne disanka dia bungi.
56.18: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamona Bena Lamana ne Antipu uvua mupeta makanda mapita bungi bua musumba wenda wa basalayi, Amolona wakabenzeja ku bukola ku dîyi dienda ne kabalu kubunda tshimenga tshia Yuda, anyi kutubunda, bua kutuluisha to.
56.19: Ne nanku tuakasuibua kudi Mukalenga; bualu bu bobu balua kutubunda patuvua bapanga makanda nanku awu, bavua pamuapa mua kubutula musumba wetu mukesa wa basalayi; kadi ki mua katukuba Mukalenga nanku.
56.20: Bavua bapeshibua mukenji kudi Amolona bua kukuba bimenga bivuabu bangata. Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo nanku. Ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda muteketa tuvua balongolola tshimenga tshietu ne tuetu bina bua kudisungidila.
56.21: Mpindiewu tuvua bajinga ne Bena Lamana balua kutubunda; bualu katuvua bajinga bua kubabundila munda mua miaba yabu mikolesha to.
56.22: Ne biakalua ne tuakalama batentekedi ku miaba yonsu, bua kutentekela dipitakana dia Bena Lamana, bua kabalu kutupita butuku anyi munda munya bua kubundabu bimenga bietu bikuabu bivua ku node.
56.23: Bualu tuvua bamanya ne mu bimenga abi kabavua ne makanda makumbana bua kutuilangana nabu to; bua nanku tuvua bajinga ne tubaponela kunyima kuabu, bobu bapita pabuipi netu, ne nanku kubakuatshila panyima mu diba dimua divuabu batuilangana nabu kumpala. Tuakatshinka ne tuvua mua kubatamba bukola; kadi, mona, tuakateketa maboku bua dijinga dietu edi.
56.24: Kabakidikija kupita pabuipi netu ne musumba wabu mujima wa basalayi to, kabakidikija kupita ne tshitupa tshiawu to, bua kabalu kuikala kabayi ne makanda kâyi makumbana to, ne badishinda.
56.25: Anyi kabakidikija kupueka bua kuluisha tshimenga tshia Zalahemela to; anyi kabakidikija kusabuka mpokolo wa musulu wa Sidona, bua kuya ku tshimenga tshia Nefiha to.
56.26: Ne nanku, ne bisumbu biabu bia basalayi, bavua bikala bapangadika bua kukuba bimenga bivuabu bangata.
56.27: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mu ngondu muibîdi wa tshidimu etshi, kuvua biakudia bia bungi biakatuluilabu nabi bifuma kudi batatuenda ba bana banyi ba baluma binunu bibidi abu.
56.28: Ne kabidi kuvua bantu binunu bibidi batutumina bafuma ku bulaba bua Zalahemela. Ne nanku tuvua badilongolola ne bantu binunu dikumi, ne biakudia buabu, ne bua bakaji babu ne bana babu kabidi.
56.29: Ne Bena Lamana, bualu bakamona nanku ne bisumbu bietu bia basalayi bivua bivulangana dituku dionsu, ne biakudia bivua bifika bua didikuatshisha dietu, bakabanga kumvua bôwa bikola, ne bakabanga kulopoka, bua ne pikalabi bua kukumbana bakandika ditufikila dia biakudia bietu ne dia makanda etu.
56.30: Mpindiewu patuakamona ne Bena Lamana bakabanga kusumpakana mushindu ewu, kuenza budimu buvua bua kubakuata; bua nanku Antipu wakafila dîyi bua nya ne bana banyi baluma ba bateketa ku tshimenga tshituvua natshi mutumba, bikala bu ne tuvua tuya ne biakudia ku tshimenga tshituvua natshi mutumba.
56.31: Ne tuvua ne tshia kuyila pabuipi ne ku tshimenga tshia Antipala, bikala bu ne tuvua tuya ku tshimenga tshia tshivua tshilonda, ku mikalu ya pabuipi ne ku muelelu wa mbuwa.
56.32: Ne biakalua ne tuakaya, bikala bu ne biakudia bietu, bua kuya ku tshimenga atshi.
56.33: Ne biakalua ne Antipu wakaya ne tshitupa tshia musumba wenda wa basalayi, ne wakashiya tshishadila tshiawu bua kukuba tshimenga. Kadi kakaya to tô ne pangakaya ne musumba wanyi mukesa wa basalayi, ne pangakalua pabuipi ne ku tshimenga tshia Antipala.
56.34: Ne mpindiewu, musumba mutamba makanda wa basalayi wa Bena Lamana uvua musombela mu tshimenga tshia Antipala; eyowa, wa bungi kupita.
56.35: Ne biakalua ne pakabamanyishabu kudi batentekedi babu, bakalua ne musumba wabu wa basalayi ne bakalua kutubunda.
56.36: Ne biakalua ne tuakanyema kumpala kuabu, batangila ku node. Ne nanku tuakapambuisha musumba wa basalayi wa Bena Lamana uvua mupita bukola;
56.37: Eyowa, mena bua mutantshi mula, mu mushindu wa pakamonabu musumba wa basalayi wa Antipu ubalondakaja, ne bukitu buabu, kabakakudimuka ku dia baluma anyi ku dia bakaji to, kadi bakatungunuka ne luendu luabu mu njila mululama bua kutukuatabu; ne, bu mutudi tutshinka, divua dijinga diabu bua kutushipabu kumpala kua Antipu kubakuata, ne nanku bua bantu betu kababanyunguludi to.
56.38: Ne mpindiewu Antipu, pakamonaye njiwu yetu, wakakolesha luendu lua musumba wenda wa basalayi. Kadi mona, bivua butuku; bua nanku kabakatukuata to, nansha Antipu kakabakuata to; bua nanku tuakatudila bua butuku.
56.39: Ne biakalua ne, mu dinda kumpala kua patshiatshia, mona, Bena Lamana bavua batulondakaja. Mpindiewu katuvua ne makanda makumbana bua kukokangana nabu to; eyowa, ntshivua mulekela ne bana banyi ba baluma bateketa bapona mu bianza biabu to; bua nanku tuakatungunuka ne luendu luetu, ne tuakâsa luendu luetu batangila mu tshipela.
56.40: Mpindiewu kabakidikija kukudimuka ku dia baluma anyi ku dia bakaji to bua kabalu kubanyunguluka; anyi ntshiakukudimuka ku dia baluma anyi ku dia bakaji to, bua kabalu kunkuata, ne katuvua mua kubakandamena to, kadi bavua bua kutushipa, ne bavua bua kunyema; ne nanku tuakanyema dituku dijima mu tshipela, mena tô ne pakîlabu.
56.41: Ne biakalua kabidi ne, pakalua bukenka bua mu dinda tuakamona Bena Lamana bakadi pabuipi netu, ne tuakanyema kumpala kuabu.
56.42: Kadi biakalua ne kabakatulondakaja kula to kumpala kua kuimanabu; ne bivua mu dinda dia dituku disâtu dia ngondu wa muanda muteketa.
56.43: Ne mpindiewu, katuvua bamanya to ne bavua bakuatshibua kudi Antipu, kadi ngakambila bantu banyi ne: Monayi, katuena bamanya to ne badi bimana ne kipatshila ka ne tuya kubabunda, bua batukuata mu diteyi diabu;
56.44: Bua nanku nudi nuamba tshinyi, bana banyi ba baluma, nenuya kubaluisha mvita anyi?
56.45: Ne mpindiewu ndi nkuambila ne, muanetu munanga wa baluma Moloni, ne ntshivua muanji kumona dikima dinena nanku to, tô, nansha munkatshi mua Bena Nefi bonsu.
56.46: Bualu bu mumvua mbabikila diba dionsu ne bana banyi ba baluma (bualu bavua bonsu bansonga) mena bia momumua bakangambila ne: Tatu, mona Nzambi wetu udi netu, ne kakulekela ne tudishinda to; bua nanku lekela tuya; katuakushipa bana betu to biatulekelabu talala; bua nanku lekela tuya, bua kabalu kutamba musumba wa basalayi wa Antipu bukola.
56.47: Mpindiewu kabavua banji kuluangana nansha, kadi kabavua batshina lufu to; ne bavua bela meji bikola ku budishikaminyi bua batatuabu kupita mioyo yabu; eyowa, bavua babalongesha kudi bamamuabu ne, pikalabu kabayi bela mpata to, Nzambi neabapatuisha.
56.48: Ne bakangambuluila mêyi a bamamuabu, bamba ne: Katuena tuela mpata to ne bamamuetu bavua bamanya nanku.
56.49: Ne biakalua ne ngakapingana ne binunu bianyi bibidi bua kubunda Bena Lamana bavua batulondakaja aba. Ne mpindiewu mona, misumba ya basalayi ya Antipu ivua mibakuata, ne mvita ivua itshinyisha ivua mituadija.
56.50: Musumba wa basalayi wa Antipu uvua mutshioka, bua luendu luabu lula mu mutantshi mukesa wa diba, uvua pabuipi ne kupona mu bianza bia Bena Lamana; ne bu ntshivua mupingana ne binunu bianyi bibidi to, Bena Lamana bavua bua kupeta kipatshila kabu.
56.51: Bualu Antipu uvua mufua ku muela wa mvita, ne balombodi benda ba bungi, bua ditshioka diabu, divua dienzeka bua lukasa lua luendu luabu—bua nanku bantu ba Antipu, bualu bavua babuelakana mu meji bua dipona dia balombodi babu, bakabanga kupingana panyima kumpala kua Bena Lamana.
56.52: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakapeta dikima, ne bakabanga kubalondakaja; ne nanku Bena Lamana bavua babalondakaja ne bukola bua bungi pakabaluila Helamana panyima pabu ne binunu bienda bibidi, ne wakabanga kubashipa menamena, mu mushindu wa ne musumba mujima wa basalayi wa Bena Lamana wakimana ne wakakudimukila Helamana.
56.53: Mpindiewu pakamona bantu ba Antipu ne Bena Lamana bavua bakudimuka panyima, bakasangisha bantu babu pamua ne bakabundila kabidi Bena Lamana panyima pabu.
56.54: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne tuetu, bantu ba Nefi, bantu ba Antipu, ne mema ne binunu bianyi bibidi, tuakanyungulula Bena Lamana, ne tuakabashipa; eyowa, bua ne tuakabenzeja bua kufilabu biluilu biabu bia mvita ne kudifilabu kabidi bu bena lukanu ba mvita.
56.55: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakadifilabu kutudi, mona, ngakabala bavua baluangana nanyi abu, bualu mvua ntshina ne kakuikadi ba bungi babu bafua.
56.56: Kadi mona, disanka dianyi divua dinena, bualu muntu wabu nansha umua kavua mupona panshi to; eyowa, ne bavua baluangana bu mudi ne makanda adi afuma kudi Nzambi; eyowa, kakuvua bantu bamanyika bakaluangana ne makanda a tshishima nanku to; ne bakadiela kudi Bena Lamana ne bukola bupita, mu mushindu wa bakabumvuija bôwa bikola; ne bua bualu ebu Bena Lamana bakadifila bu bena lukanu ba mvita.
56.57: Ne bu mutuvua katuyi ne muaba bua bena lukanu betu ba mvita to, mua tuetu kubalama kula ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Lamana, bua nanku tuakabatuma ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, pamua ne tshitupa tshia bantu ba Antipu bavuabu kabayi bashipa to; ne ngakangata bavua bashala ne ngakabasangisha bitenda bianyi bia Bena Amona, ne tuakâsa luendu luetu tupingana ku tshimenga tshia Yudaya.

57.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne ngakapeta mukanda wa Amolona, mfumu, ulonda ne pangafila bena lukanu ba mvita batuvua bakuata neafila tshimenga tshia Antipala kutudi.
57.2: Kadi ngakatuma mukanda kudi mfumu, ne tuvua bamanya bushuwa ne bisumbu bietu bia basalayi bivua bikumbana bua kuangata tshimenga tshia Antipala ku bukola buetu; ne mu difila bena lukanu bua kupeta tshimenga atshi, netudimona katuyi ne lungenyi to, ne katuakufila bena lukanu betu to, amu mu dishintulula.
57.3: Ne Amolona wakabenga mukanda wanyi, bualu wakabenga kushintulula bena lukanu; bua nanku tuakabanga kudilongolola bua kuya kubunda tshimenga tshia Antipala.
57.4: Kadi bantu ba mu Antipala bakashiya tshimenga, ne bakanyema ku bimenga biabu bikuabu, bivuabu bangata, bua kubikolesha; ne nanku tshimenga tshia Antipala tshiakapona mu bianza bietu.
57.5: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi nanku.
57.6: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitema, tuakapeta biakudia, ne kabidi dikumbaja dia basalayi bakuabu ku musumba wetu wa basalayi, bafumina ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne ku bulaba bua ku mpenga yabu yonsu, bafika tô ne ku bungi bua binunu bisambombo, pa kumbusha bana ba baluma makumi asambombo ba Bena Amona, bavua balua kudisangisha kudi bana babu, bavua bikala tshisumbu tshianyi tshikesa tshia binunu bibidi. Ne mpindiewu mona, tuvua ne makanda, eyowa, ne bakatuluila kabidi biakudia bia bungi.
57.7: Ne biakalua ne dijinga dietu divua dia kuela musumba wa basalayi uvuabu bateka bua kukuba tshimenga tshia Kumeni mvita.
57.8: Ne mpindiewu mona, nenkuleja ne katataka tuakakumbaja dijinga dietu; eyowa, ne masalayi etu a makanda, anyi ne tshitupa tshia masalayi etu a makanda, tuakanyungulula, butuku, tshimenga tshia Kumeni, kakesa kumpala kua bobu kupeta biakudia.
57.9: Ne biakalua ne tuakatudila ku mpenga yonsu ya tshimenga bua matuku a bungi; kadi tuvua tulala ne miela yetu ya mvita, ne tuvua bateka balami, bua Bena Lamana kabalu kutubunda butuku ne kutushipa, muakidikijabu misangu ya bungi; kadi misangu yonsu yakidikijabu nanku tuakitshikija mashi abu.
