5.12: Ne mpindiewu, bana banyi ba baluma, vulukayi, vulukayi ne mpa lubuebua lua Musungidi wetu, udi muikala Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, ki panudi ne tshia kuibakila tshishimikidi tshienu; bua ne pâtuma diabulu mpepela yenda mikola, eyowa, miketa yenda munda mua mvunda, eyowa, pânutûta mvula wenda wa mabua ne mvula wenda wa tshipepela mukola, kabiakuikala ne bukola pa mutu penu bua kunupulumuna panshi tô ne ku lupongu lua dikenga ne diakabi kadiyi ndekelu to, bualu lubuebua lunudi bibakila pa mutu palu, ludi luikala tshishimikidi tshia bushuwa, tshishimikidi tshidi bantu bobu bibakapu kabena mua kupona to.
5.13: Ne biakalua ne â ki mêyi akalongesha Helamana bana benda ba baluma; eyowa, wakabalongesha bintu bia bungi bidi kabiyi bifunda to, ne kabidi bintu bia bungi bidi bikala bifunda.
5.14: Ne bakavuluka mêyi enda; ne bua nanku bakaya, ne bakalama mikenji ya Nzambi, bua kulongesha dîyi dia Nzambi munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, kubangila ku tshimenga tshia Buvula;
5.15: Ne apu tô ne ku tshimenga tshia Gidi; ne ku tshimenga tshia Gidi tô ne ku tshimenga tshia Muleke;
5.16: Ne mena ku tshimenga tshimua tô ne ku tshikuabu, tô ne muakayabu munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi bonsu bavua bikala mu buloba bua ku sude; ne aku tô ne ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, munkatshi mua Bena Lamana.
5.17: Ne biakalua ne bakayisha ne bukola bua bungi, mua ne bakapuwisha ba bungi ba ku batapuluki bavua bafumina ku Bena Nefi abu, mua ne bakalua ne bakatonda mibi yabu ne bakatambuisha bualu bakakudimuna mutshima, ne bakapingana katataka kudi Bena Nefi bua kukeba bua kulongolola bubi buvuabu benzela Bena Lamana.
5.18: Ne biakalua ne Nefi ne Lehi bakayisha Bena Lamana ne bukola ne bukôkeshi bua bungi kupita, bualu bavua ne bukola ne bukôkeshi bikala bibapesha bua kuakulabu, ne tshivuabu ne bua kuamba tshivua kabidi tshibapesha—
5.19: Bua nanku bakakula ku dikema dikola dia Bena Lamana, ku dibitabujija, mua ne kuvua binunu muanda mukulu bia ku Bena Lamana bavua mu bulaba bua Zalahemela ne ku mpenga yabu yonsu, bakatambuishibua ku dikudimuna dia mitshima, ne bakitabujijibua bitangila bubi bua ngenzelu ya batatuabu.
5.20: Ne biakalua ne Nefi ne Lehi bakatungunukila apu bua kuya ku bulaba bua Nefi.
5.21: Ne biakalua ne bakakuatshibua kudi musumba wa basalayi wa Bena Lamana ne kuedibua mu buloko; eyowa, mena buloko bumua abu buvua Amona ne bana babu bedibua kudi basadidi ba Limihi.
5.22: Ne kunyima kua kubelabu mu buloko matuku a bungi kabayi ne biakudia to, monayi, bakabuela mu buloko bua kubangata bua babashipa.
5.23: Ne biakalua ne Nefi ne Lehi bavua banyunguludibua ku mpenga yonsu bikala bu kudi kapia, mena mu mushindu wa kabakidikija bua kubatua bianza to bua bôwa ne kabalu kôshika. Nansha nanku, Nefi ne Lehi kabakôshika to; ne bavua bikala bu ne bavua bikala bimana munkatshi mua kapia ne kabavua bôshika to.
5.24: Ne pakamonabu ne dikunji dia kapia divua dibanyungulula ku mpenga yonsu, ne kadivua dibôsha to, mitshima yabu yakapeta dikima.
5.25: Bualu bakamona ne Bena Lamana kabakidikija bua kubatua bianza to; anyi kabakidikija kulua pabuipi nabu to, kadi bakimana bu ne bavua bavuijibua tumama bua dikatshila diabu.
5.26: Ne biakalua ne Nefi ne Lehi bakimana ne bakabanga kubambila, bamba ne: Kanutshinyi to, bualu monayi, Nzambi ki udi munuleja tshintu tshia kukema etshi, mudi mulejibua ne kanuena mua kutulenga ne bianza bienu bua kutushipa to.
5.27: Ne monayi, pakambabu mêyi â, buloba buakanyungana menamena, ne bimanu bia buloko biakanyungana bu bivua pabuipi pa kukuluka panshi; kadi monayi, kabiakakuluka to. Ne monayi, bavua mu buloko bavua Bena Lamana ne Bena Nefi bavua patapuluki.
5.28: Ne biakalua ne ditutu dia mîdima yakababuikila, ne bôwa butamba bubi buakalua kudibu.
5.29: Ne biakalua ne kuakalua dîyi bu divua kûlu kua ditutu dia mîdima, diamba ne: Kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima, ne kanukebi kabidi bua kushipa basadidi banyi bamvua mutuma bua kunumanyisha mukenji muimpa to.
5.30: Ne biakalua ne pakumvuabu dîyi edi, ne pakamonabu ne kadivua dîyi dia dikubakuba to, anyi dîyi dia mutoyi munena wa diyoyi, kadi monayi, divua dîyi diteketa dia lutulu lujima, bu divua dinungana, ne divua ditubula tô ne mu anyima mena—
5.31: Ne nansha muvua dîyi dikala dia kalolu, monayi buloba buakanyungana menamena, ne bimanu bia buloko kazakala kabidi, bu bivua pabuipi pa kukuluka panshi; ne monayi ditutu dia mîdima, divua dibabuikila, kadiakatangalaka to—
5.32: Ne monayi dîyi diakalua kabidi, diamba ne: Kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu bukadi pabuipi; ne kanukebi kabidi bua kushipa basadidi banyi to. Ne biakalua ne buloba buakanyungana kabidi, ne bimanu biakazakala.
5.33: Ne dîyi diakalua kabidi musangu muisâtu, ne diakabambila mêyi a dikema adi muntu kayi bua kuamba to; ne bimanu biakazakala kabidi, ne buloba buakanyungana bu buvua pabuipi ne kuabuluka pankatshi-nkatshi.
5.34: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana kabavua mua kunyema to bua ditutu dia mîdima divua dibabuikila; eyowa, ne kabavua kabidi mua kunyungana to bua bôwa buvua bubakuata.
5.35: Mpindiewu kuvua muntu umua munkatshi muabu uvua Muena Nefi ku diledibua, uvua musangu mukuabu muikala muena ku ekelezia wa Nzambi kadi uvua mutapuluki kudibu.
5.36: Ne biakalua ne wakakudimuka, ne monayi, wakamona mpala ya Nefi ne Lehi munda mua ditutu dia mîdima; ne monayi, bavua bakenka menamena, mena bu mpala ya banjelu. Ne wakamona ne bavua babandisha mesu abu mu diûlu; ne bavua mu ngikadilu bu wa kuakula anyi kuela mbila kudi muntu uvuabu bamona.
5.37: Ne biakalua ne muntu ewu wakabila kudi musumba wa bantu, bua bakudimuka ne batangila. Ne monayi, bavua bapeshibua bukola ne bakakudimuka ne bakatangila; ne bakamona mpala ya Nefi ne Lehi.
5.38: Ne bakambila muntu ne: Mona, bintu bionsu ebi bidi bileja tshinyi, ne bantu aba badi bayukila ne nganyi?
5.39: Mpindiewu dîna dia muntu ewu divua Aminadaba. Ne Aminadaba wakabambila ne: Badi bayukila ne banjelu ba Nzambi.
5.40: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakamuambila ne: Netuenza tshinyi, bua ditutu dia mîdima edi diumbuka kutubuikila?
5.41: Ne Aminadaba wakabambila ne: Kudimunayi mutshima, ne nubila kudi dîyi, mena tô ne panuapeta ditabuja mu Kilisto, uvua mulongesha Alama, ne Amuleke, ne Zêzeloma; ne panuenza nanku, ditutu dia mîdima nediumbuka kunubuikila.
5.42: Ne biakalua ne bakabanga bonsu kubila kudi dîyi dia uvua munyungusha buloba; eyowa, bakabila mena tô ne pakumbuka ditutu dia mîdima.
5.43: Ne biakalua ne pakakupabu mesu abu ku mpenga yabu yonsu, ne bakamona ne ditutu dia mîdima divua diumbuka ku babuikila, monayi, bakamona ne bavua banyunguludibua, eyowa muntu yonsu, ku dikunji dia kapia.
5.44: Ne Nefi ne Lehi bavua munkatshi muabu; eyowa, bavua banyunguludibua; eyowa, bavua bu munkatshi mua ndimi ya kapia, kadi kakavua kabôsha to, anyi kakavua kakuata bimanu bia buloko to; ne bavua buwujibua ne disanka didi kadiyi bua kuamba to ne luwula ne butumbi.
5.45: Ne monayi, Nyuma wa Tshijila wa Nzambi wakalua panshi mufuma mu diûlu, ne wakabuela mu mitshima yabu, ne bavua buwula bu ne kapia, ne bavua mua kuamba mêyi a dikema.
5.46: Ne biakalua ne dîyi diakalua kudibu, eyowa, dîyi dimpa, bu divua dinungana, diamba ne:
5.47: Ditalala, ditalala dikala kunudi, bua ditabuja dienu kudi Munanga Mutamba Wanyi, uvua katshia ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba.
5.48: Ne mpindiewu, pakumvuabu nanku bakabandisha mesu abu bu bua kumona kuvua dîyi diluila; ne monayi, bakamona diûlu diunzuluka; ne banjelu bakalua panshi bapatukila mu diûlu ne bakabasadila.
5.49: Ne kuvua bantu pabuipi ne nkama isatu bavua bamona ne bumvua bintu ebi; ne bakabambila ne baya ne kabakemi to, anyi kabedi mpata to.
5.50: Ne biakalua ne bakaya, ne bakalongesha bantu, bamanyisha bintu bionsu bivuabu bumvua ne bamona ku mpenga yonsu ya mu bitupa bionsu bia bulaba, mua ne tshitupa tshinena tshia Bena Lamana tshivua tshitabujijibua buabu, bua bunena bua majadikibua avuabu bapeta.
5.51: Ne bonsu bavua bitabujijibua bakalekela biluilu biabu bia mvita panshi, ne lukinu luabu ne ngenzelu ya batatuabu kabidi.
5.52: Ne biakalua ne bakapesha Bena Nefi malaba adibu bangata.

6.1: Ne biakalua ne pakajika tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshibîdi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, bintu bionsu ebi bikavua bienzeka ne Bena Lamana bakavua balua, tshitupa tshinena, bantu bakana, mu mushindu ne buakana buabu buvua bupita bua Bena Nefi, bua dikamakana diabu ne disuminyina diabu mu ditabuja.
6.2: Bualu monayi, kuvua Bena Nefi ba bungi bakavua balua bapapishibua ne kabayi bitaba tshilema tshiabu to ne bena bubi bupita, mu mushindu ne bavua babenga dîyi dia Nzambi ne mayisha onsu ne diamba mêyi a buprofete divua dilua munkatshi muabu.
6.3: Nansha nanku, bantu ba mu ekelezia bavua bapeta disanka dinena bua dikudimuna moyo dia Bena Lamana, eyowa, bua ekelezia wa Nzambi, uvua mushikikibua munkatshi muabu. Ne bakalejangana buwetu, ne bakasankidilangana, ne bavua ne disanka dinena.
6.4: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana ba bungi bakapueka ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne bakamanyisha Bena Nefi mushindu wa dikudimuna moyo diabu, ne bakabakankamija bua kuikala ne ditabuja ne dikudimuna mutshima.
6.5: Eyowa, ne ba bungi ba kudibu bakayisha ne bukola ne bukôkeshi binena menamena, ne bakafikisha ba bungi babu mu ndondu ya didipuekesha, bua kuikala bena balondi badipuekeshi ba Nzambi ne Muana wa Mukoku.
6.6: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana ba bungi bakaya ku bulaba bua ku node; ne Nefi ne Lehi kabidi bakaya ku bulaba bua ku node, bua kuyisha bantu. Ne ki mua kajika tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshisâtu nanku.
6.7: Ne monayi, kuvua ditalala mu bulaba bonsu, bua ne Bena Nefi bakaya ku tshitupa tshionsu tshia bulaba kuvuabu basua, bikalabi munkatshi mua Bena Nefi anyi Bena Lamana.
6.8: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakaya kabidi konsu kuvuabu basua, bikalabi munkatshi mua Bena Lamana anyi munkatshi mua Bena Nefi; ne nanku bavua ne kuendelangana kudikadila, bua kusumbangana ne kupanyishangana bintu, ne bua kupeta makasa, bilondeshila ku dijinga diabu.
6.9: Ne biakalua ne bakanema menamena, Bena Lamana ne Bena Nefi; ne bakapeta ngolo wa bungi menamena, ne mpalata, ne mishindu yonsu ya biamua bia mushinga, mu bulaba bua ku sude ne mu bulaba bua ku node.
6.10: Mpindiewu bulaba bua ku sude buvua bubikidibua ne Lehi, ne bulaba bua ku node buvua bubikidibua ne Muleke, bivua bilondeshila mu dîna dia muana wa baluma wa Sedekiya; bualu Mukalenga wakatuala Muleke ku bulaba bua ku node, ne Lehi ku bulaba bua ku sude.
6.11: Ne monayi, kuvua mishindu yonsu ya ngolo mu malaba abidi â, ne wa mpalata, ne biamua bia mushindu yonsu; ne kuvua ba nsenda bapiluka, bavua benza mudimu wa biamua bia mishindu yonsu ne bavua babipeluja; ne ki muvuabu banema nanku.
6.12: Bakakuna nteta ya bungi, ku node ne ku sude; ne yakatoloka menamena, ku node ne ku sude. Ne yakavulangana ne yakakola bikola menamena mu bulaba. Ne bakamuna bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena, eyowa, nyama ya manyi ya bungi.
6.13: Monayi bakaji babu bakakuata mudimu ne bakasala buanda, ne bakenza mishindu yonsu ya bilulu, bia lin muluka bimpa ne bilulu bia mishindu yonsu, bua kuvuadika butaka buabu. Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshinâyi mu ditalala nanku.
6.14: Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshitânu bakapeta kabidi disanka dinena ne ditalala, eyowa, kuyisha kua bungi ne kuamba mêyi a buprofete a bungi bitangila tshivua ne bua kulua. Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshitânu nanku.
6.15: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshisambombo tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, monayi, muntu uvua kayi mumanyika wakashibeya Sezolama pavuaye musomba mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu. Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi, muanenda wa baluma, uvua bantu basungula pa muaba wenda, uvua kabidi mushibeyibua. Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshisambombo nanku.
6.16: Ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshia muanda muteketa bantu bakabanga kukola menamena mu bubi kabidi.
6.17: Bualu monayi, Mukalenga uvua mubabenesha mutantshi mula ne mabanji a pa buloba bua nanku kabavua basonsodibua ku tshiji, ku mvita, anyi ku dimatshisha dia mashi to; bua nanku bakabanga ku teka mitshima yabu ku mabanji; eyowa, bakabanga kukeba mua kupeta makasa bua kudibandisha umua kupita mukuabu; bua nanku bakabanga kushibeya bantu mu musokoku, ne kuiba ne kupawula, bua kupeta makasa.
6.18: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bashibeyi ba bantu ne bapawudi abu bavua bena tshisumbu tshivua tshienza kudi Kishikumena ne Gadiantona. Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kuvua ba bungi, mena munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, bavua bena tshisumbu tshia Gadiantona. Kadi monayi, bavua bapita bungi munkatshi mua tshitupa tshibi kupita tshia Bena Lamana. Ne bavua babikidibua ne banyengi ne bashibeyanganyi ba Gadiantona.
6.19: Ne mbobu bakashibeya mulumbuluishi munena Sezolama, ne muanenda wa baluma, pavuaye mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu; ne monayi, kabakabapeta to.
6.20: Ne monayi biakalua ne pakamanya Bena Lamana ne kuvua banyengi munkatshi muabu bakanyingalala menamena; ne bakenza mushindu yonsu uvua ku bukôkeshi buabu bua kubabutula pa mpala wa buloba.
6.21: Kadi monayi, Satana wakasonsola mitshima ya tshitupa tshinena tshia Bena Nefi, mu mushindu wa ne bakadisangisha ne bisumbu bia banyengi abu, ne bakabuela mu bipungidi biabu ne bakela mitshipu yabu, bua balamangana ne bakubangana ku malu makola onsu âpetanganabu nawu, bua kabakengi bua dishibeya dia bantu diabu, ne dipawula diabu, ne buivi buabu to.
6.22: Ne biakalua ne bavua ne bimanyinu biabu, eyowa, bimanyinu bia musokoku biabu, ne mêyi abu a musokoku; ne ebi bua bobu kumanya muanabu udi mupunga tshipungidi, bua ne bubi bonsu buenza muanabu, kenjibu bibi kudi muanabu to, anyi kudi abu bavua bena tshisumbu tshienda, bavua bapunga tshipungidi etshi.
6.23: Ne nanku bavua mua kushibeya bantu, kupawula, ne kuiba, ne kuenda masandi ne kuenza bubi bua mushindu yonsu, bishilangana ne mêyi a ditunga diabu ne mêyi a Nzambi wabu kabidi.
6.24: Ne ewu yonsu wa ku bavua bena tshisumbu tshiabu wamanyisha ba pa buloba bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu, nealumbuluishibua, kabiyi bilondeshila ku mêyi a ditunga to, kadi bilondeshila ku mêyi a bubi buabu, avua Gadiantona ne Kishikumena bafila.
6.25: Mpindiewu monayi, bidi mitshipu ne bipungidi bia mu musokoku ebi bivua Alama mupesha muanenda wa baluma mukenji ne kabiyi kudi ba pa buloba to, bua kabilu njila wa kutuala bantu ku dibutuka to.
6.26: Mpindiewu monayi, mitshipu ne bipungidi bia mu musokoku abi kabiakalua kudi Gadiantona kupitshila ku miandiku ivua Shibulona mupesha Helamana to; kadi monayi, bivua biedibua mu mutshima wa Gadiantona kudi muntu umua awu wakalobesha baledi betu ba diambedi bua kudia tshimuma tshikandikibua.
6.27: Eyowa, muntu umua awu wakabuela mu tshipangu ne Kayina, ne biashibeyaye muanabu wa baluma Abele, kabiakumanyika kudi ba pa buloba to. Ne wakabuela mu tshipangu ne Kayina ne balondi benda katshia ku tshikondu atshi.
6.28: Ne bidi kabidi muntu umua awu wakateka meji mu mitshima ya bantu bua kuibaka tshibumba tshila tshikumbana bua bamona mua kufika mu diûlu. Ne bivua muntu umua awu wakalombola bantu bakafuma ku tshibumba atshi ku bulaba ebu; wakatangalaja midimu ya mîdima ne malu mapita bubi pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, tô ne pakapulumunaye bantu panshi ku dibutuka dijima, ne ku ngena wa kashidi.
6.29: Eyowa, bidi muntu umua awu wakateka meji mu mutshima wa Gadiantona bua kuenza mudimu wa mîdima, ne wa dishibeya dia bantu dia mu musokoku; ne wakawutuala kumbukila ku mbangilu wa muntu mena tô ne ku diba edi.
6.30: Ne monayi, nyeya udi muena mibi yonsu. Ne monayi, udi mutuala midimu ya mîdima ne dishibeya dia bantu dia mu musokoku, ne udi ufila bipangu biabu, ne mitshipu yabu, ne bipungidi biabu, ne malongolodi abu a bubi butamba bubi, ku tshikondu ne tshikondu bilondeshila bu mudiye mua kukuata mitshima ya bana ba bantu.
6.31: Ne mpindiewu monayi, uvua mukuata mitshima ya Bena Nefi; eyowa, mua ne bavua balua bena bubi menamena; eyowa, tshitupa tshinena tshiabu bavua bumbuka ku njila wa buakana, ne bavua badiatakaja mikenji ya Nzambi muinshi mua makasa abu, ne bavua bakudimuka ku njila yabu nkayabu, ne bakukuila ngolo yabu ne mpalata yabu bu mpingu.
6.32: Ne biakalua ne malu mabi onsu â akalua kudibu mu mutantshi wa bidimu bikesa, bua ne tshitupa tshinena tshiawu tshivua tshilua kudibu mu tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshia muanda muteketa tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi.
6.33: Ne bakakola mu malu mabi mu tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshia muanda mukulu kabidi, biakapesha bantu bakana kanyinganyinga ne muadi.
6.34: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne Bena Nefi bakabanga kushinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja, ne kokola mu bubi ne malu mapita bubi, pavua Bena Lamana bavua babanga kokola menamena mu dimanya dia Nzambi wabu; eyowa, bakabanga kulama mikandu ne mikenji yenda, ne kuenda mu bulelela ne bululama kumpala kuenda.
6.35: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne Nyuma wa Mukalenga wakabanga kumbuka kudi Bena Nefi, bua bubi ne dipapa dia mitshima yabu.
6.36: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne Mukalenga wakabanga kupumunyina Bena Lamana Nyuma wenda, bua buteketa buabu ne ditaba diabu bua kuitabuja miaku yenda.
6.37: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bakipatakaja tshisumbu tshia banyengi ba Gadiantona; ne bakayisha dîyi dia Nzambi munkatshi mua tshitupa tshipita bubi tshiabu, bua ne tshisumbu tshia banyengi etshi tshiakabutuka tshionsu munkatshi mua Bena Lamana.
6.38: Ne biakalua ne ku luseka lukuabu, ne Bena Nefi bakabakuatshisha ne kubambuluisha, kubanga ku tshitupa tshipita bubi tshiabu, tô ne pakatangalakabu mu bulaba bua Bena Nefi bonsu, ne pakapambuishabu tshitupa tshinena tshia bakana tô ne pakaluabu kuitabuja midimu yabu ne kudia bintu biabu binyenga, ne kudisangisha nabu mu dishibeya diabu dia bantu ne bipungidi biabu bia musokoku.
6.39: Ne nanku bakapeta bulombodi bua bukalenga bonsu, mua ne bakadiata bapela ne bapola, ne badipuekeshi balondi ba Nzambi mu makasa abu ne bakabatûta ne kubapanda ne kubela nyima yabu.
6.40: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne bavua mu ngikadilu mutamba bubi, ne bavua baboba bua dibutuka dia kashidi.
6.41: Ne biakalua ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.

7.intro: Dîyi dia buprofete dia Nefi, muana wa baluma wa Helamana—Nzambi udi ukanyina bantu ba Nefi ne neabakumbula mu tshiji tshienda, bua dibutuka dijima diabu amu bobu bakudimuna mutshima bua bubi buabu. Nzambi udi utûta bantu ba Nefi ne tshipupu; badi bakudimuna mutshima ne bakudimuka kudiye. Samuele, Muena Lamana, udi wamba mêyi a buprofete kudi Bena Nefi.
7.1: Monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asambombo ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, ne Nefi, muana wa Helamana, wakapingana ku bulaba bua Zalahemela ufuma ku buloba bua ku node.
7.2: Bualu uvua muya munkatshi mua bantu bavua mu bulaba bua ku node, ne wakabayisha dîyi dia Nzambi, ne wakamba mêyi a buprofete pa bintu bia bungi kudibu;
7.3: Ne bakabenga mêyi enda onsu, bua ne kavua mua kushala munkatshi muabu to, kadi wakapingana kabidi ku bulaba bua diledibua dienda.
7.4: Ne pakamonaye ne bantu bavua mu ngikadilu wa bubi butamba bubi, ne banyengi ba Gadiantona bavua basomba mu nkuasa ya bilumbuluilu—bikala banyenga bukalenga ne bukôkeshi bua mu bulaba; balekela mikenji ya Nzambi ku luseka, ne kabayi ne buakana nansha bukesa kumpala kuenda to; kabayi benzela bululama kudi bana ba bantu to;
7.5: Bapîsha bakana bua buakana buabu; balekela bapîla ne bena bubi baya kabayi banyokibua to bua makuta abu; ne menamena kabidi bua kushiyibua mu mudimu ku mutu kua bukalenga, bua kukôkesha ne kuenza bilondeshila ku disua diabu, ne bua kupeta makasa ne butumbi bia kudi ba pa buloba, ne menamena kabidi, bua kuluabi biteketa bua bobu kuenda masandi, ne kuiba, ne kushipa, ne kuenza bilondeshila ku disua diabu—
7.6: Mpindiewu bualu bubi bunena ebu buakaluila Bena Nefi, kabiyi mu mutantshi wa bidimu bia bungi to; ne pavua Nefi mubumona, mutshima wenda wakuwula ne kanyinganyinga mu munda muenda; ne wakatua tshikemu ne dipampakana dia anyima wenda, wamba ne:
7.7: Ô, bu matuku anyi mikala mu matuku avua tatuanyi Nefi diambedi mupatuka ku bulaba bua Yelushalema, mvua mua kusanka nenda mu buloba bulaya; mu matuku â, bantu benda bavua bateketa bua kubasengelela, bakamakana mu dilama dia mikenji ya Nzambi, ne kabayi basakibua ku dienza dia bubi lukasa to; ne bavua bateleja mêyi a Mukalenga lukasa—
7.8: Eyowa, bu matuku anyi mikala mu matuku awu, anyima wanyi uvua mua kuikala ne disanka bua buakana bua bana betu.
7.9: Kadi monayi, ndi muenjibua ne â ki matuku anyi, ne anyima wanyi neuwujibua ne kanyinganyinga bualu bua ebu bubi bua bana betu.
7.10: Ne monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne bivua pa mutu pa tshibumba, tshivua mu budimi bua Nefi, buvua ku tshibeba tshivua tshilombola ku tshisalu tshinena, tshivua mu tshimenga tshia Zalahemela; bua nanku, Nefi uvua muinama pa mutu pa tshibumba tshivua mu budimi buenda, tshibumba tshivua kabidi pabuipi ne tshibuelelu tshia ku budimi tshivua tshilombola ku tshibeba.
7.11: Ne biakalua ne kuvua bantu bakuabu bavua bapitapu ne bakamona Nefi pavuaye witshikija anyima wenda kudi Nzambi pa mutu pa tshibumba; ne bakanyema ne bakambila bantu tshivuabu bamona, ne bantu bakatuilangana pamua mu misumba bua bamona mua kumanya tshiena bualu tshia kudila kunena eku bua bubi bua bantu.
7.12: Ne mpindiewu, pakajuka Nefi wakamona misumba ya bantu bavua badisangisha pamua.
7.13: Ne biakalua ne wakabulula mukana muenda ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, bua tshinyi nudi badisangisha pamua? Bua mema kunuambila bua malu mabi enu?
7.14: Eyowa, bualu ndi mubanda pa tshibumba tshianyi bua kuitshikija anyima wanyi kudi Nzambi, bua kanyinganyinga katamba bunena ka mutshima wanyi, kadi kikala bua malu mabi enu!
7.15: Ne nudi badisangisha pamua bua bualu bua didila ne muadi wanyi, ne nudi nukema; eyowa, ne nudi ne bua kukema bikola; eyowa, nudi ne tshia kukema bualu nudi badifila kudi diabulu ne udi ne bukôkeshi ku mitshima yenu.
7.16: Eyowa, munyi munuvua mua kupesha njila kudi bulobeshi bua yeya udi upuekesha anyima yenu mu dikenga dia kashidi ne diakabi kadiyi ndekelu?
7.17: Ô kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima! Nudi basua kufua bua tshinyi? Kudimukayi, kudimukayi kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wenu. Bua tshinyi wanulekedi?
7.18: Mbualu nudi bapapisha mitshima yenu; eyowa, kanuakuteleja dîyi dia mulami wa mikoku muimpa; eyowa, nudi bamuyobola bua anufîkila munda.
7.19: Ne monayi, pa mutu pa kunusangisha, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima, monayi, neanutangalaja bua nulua biakudia bia mbua ne nyama ya dîtu.
7.20: Ô, munyi munuvua mua kupua Nzambi wenu moyo mu dituku mena divuaye munupatuisha?
7.21: Kadi monayi, mbua kupeta makasa, mbua kusamunyibua kudi bantu, eyowa, ne mbua nupeta ngolo ne mpalata. Ne nudi bateka mitshima yenu pa mabanji ne bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba ebu, binudi nushibeya bantu, ne nupawula, ne nuiba, ne nushiminyina mukuenu malu, ne nuenza bubi bua mishindu yonsu ya malu a bubi.
7.22: Ne bua bualu ebu diakabi nedinukuata, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima. Bualu nuenu kanuyi bakudimuna mutshima to, monayi, tshimenga tshinena etshi, ne kabidi bimenga binena abi bidi ku mpenga yonsu, bidi mu bulaba butudi bâsa, nebinyengibua bua kanuikadi ne muaba munkatshi muabi to; bualu, Mukalenga kakunupesha bukola to, bu mudiye muenza tô ne mpindiewu, bua nukandamena bena lukuna benu.
7.23: Bualu monayi, Mukalenga udi wamba nanku: Ntshiakuleja bena bubi bukola buanyi to, ne kudi umua kupita kudi mukuabu, amu kudi badi bakudimuna mutshima yabu bua mibi yabu, ne bumvuila mêyi anyi. Mpindiewu, nanku, ndi musua ne numona, bana betu, ne nebikala bilengela bua Bena Lamana kupita buenu pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
7.24: Bualu monayi, badi bakana bikola kunupita, bualu kabena benza mibi kushilangana ne dimanya dinena dinudi bapeta to; bua nanku Mukalenga neikala ne lusa kudibu; eyowa, nealepesha matuku abu ne neavudija ndelanganyi yabu, nansha panuabutuka bonsu, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
7.25: Eyowa, diakabi dikala kunudi bua ne malu abu a bubi bupita manena budi bulua munkatshi muenu; ne nudi badisangisha kudibu, eyowa, ku tshisumbu tshia musokoku atshi tshivua Gadiantona mushikika!
7.26: Eyowa, diakabi nedinuluila bualu bua diditambisha dinudi balekela ne dibuela mu mitshima yenu, didi dinutambisha kupita tshidi tshimpa bua mabanji enu matamba bungi!
7.27: Eyowa, diakabi dikala kunudi bua bubi ne malu enu a bubi bupita!
7.28: Ne nenufua pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima; eyowa, mena malaba enu neanyengibua kunudi, ne nenubutuka pa mpala wa buloba.
7.29: Monayi mpindiewu, ntshiena ngamba ne bintu ebi nebienzeka, nkayanyi, bualu ntshiena mudimanyina bintu ebi to; kadi monayi, ndi mumanya ne bintu ebi bidi bilelela bualu Mukalenga Nzambi uvua mubimanyisha, bua nanku ndi njadika ne nebienzeka.

8.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Nefi mêyi â, monayi, kuvua bantu bavua balumbuluishi, bavua kabidi bena tshisumbu tshia musokoku tshia Gadiantona, ne bakafîka tshiji, ne bakabila bua kumufunda, bambila bantu ne: Bua tshinyi kanuena nukuata muntu ewu ne nulua nenda, bua ne apîshibua bilondeshila ku bubi buvuaye muenza?
8.2: Bua tshinyi nudi nutangila muntu ewu, ne numuteleja upenda bantu aba ne mikenji yetu?
8.3: Bualu monayi, Nefi uvua mubambila bitangila dinyanguka dia mikenji yabu; eyowa, uvua muamba bintu bia bungi bidi kabiyi mua kufunda to; ne kavua muamba tshintu tshivua tshishilangana ne mikenji ya Nzambi to.
8.4: Ne balumbuluishi abu bakamufîkila tshiji bualu uvua mubambila patoka bitangila midimu yabu ya musokoku ya mîdima; nansha nanku, kabakidikija kumulenga to, bualu bavua batshina bantu, bua kabalu kubelela mbila.
8.5: Bua nanku bakabila kudi bantu, bamba ne: Bua tshinyi nudi nulekela ne muntu ewu atupenda? Bualu monayi udi upîsha bantu bonsu aba, mena tô ne ku dibutuka; eyowa, ne bimenga bietu binena bionsu ebi kabidi nebatubinyenga, ne katuakuikala ne muaba munda muabi to.
8.6: Ne mpindiewu nudi bamanya ne kabiena mua kuenzeka nanku to, bualu monayi, tudi ne bukola bua bungi, ne bimenga bietu bidi binena, bua nanku bena lukuna betu kabena mua kututshimuna to.
8.7: Ne biakalua ne bakasonsola bantu ku tshiji kudi Nefi nanku, ne bakajula makokangana munkatshi muabu; bualu kuvua bamua bakabila ne: Lekelayi muntu ewu, bualu udi muntu muimpa, ne bintu bidiye wamba abi nebienzeka bulelela pa kumbusha tuetu bakudimuna mutshima;
8.8: Eyowa, monayi, bitungu bionsu nebilua pa mutu petu bidiye mutujadikila; bualu tudi bamanya ne udi mutujadikila biakana bitangila malu mabi etu. Ne monayi adi a bungi, ne udi mumanya kabidi malu onsu âtufikila bu mudiye mumanya malu mabi etu;
8.9: Eyowa, ne monayi, bu yeya kayi muikala muprofete to kavua mua kujadika bitangila bintu abi to.
8.10: Ne biakalua ne bantu bavua bakeba bua kushipa Nefi abu, bôwa buabu buakabandika, bualu kabakamulenga to; bua nanku wakabanga kabidi kuakula kudibu, bualu uvua mumona ne uvua musuibua ku mesu a bamua bantu, mua ne tshishadila tshiabu tshiakatshina.
8.11: Bua nanku wakenzejibua bua kubambila bikola wamba ne: Monayi, bana betu, nudi babala ne Nzambi wakapesha bukola kudi muntu umua, mena Mose, bua kutûta mâyi a Mbuwa Mukunza, ne akatapuluka eku ne eku, mua ne Bena Isalele, bavua batatuetu, bakapita pa buloba bûma, ne mâyi akapingana pa mutu pa misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Ejipitu ne akabadînyisha anyi?
8.12: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bu mudi Nzambi mupesha muntu ewu bukola bua mushindu ewu, kadi bua tshinyi nudi nutandangana munkatshi muenu, ne nuamba ne kena mumpesha bukola to mbundi mua kumanya nabu bitangila bitungu bialua pa mutu penu, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima?
8.13: Kadi, monayi, kanuena amu nuvila mêyi anyi to, kadi nudi nuvila kabidi miaku yonsu ivua batatuetu bakula, ne kabidi miaku ivua muntu ewu, Mose, muakula, uvua ne bukola bunena bumupesha, eyowa, miaku ivuaye muakula bitangila dilua dia Mashiya.
8.14: Eyowa, kakajadika ne Muana wa Nzambi nealua to anyi? Ne bu muakabandishaye nyoka wa kalabi mu tshipela, mena nanku neabandisha walua.
8.15: Ne bonsu bela mesu kudi nyoka nebapeta moyo, momumua ne bonsu bela mesu kudi Muana wa Nzambi ne ditabuja, bikala ne nyuma munyingalala, badi mua kuikala ne moyo, mena ne ku moyo awu udi muikala wa tshiendelela.
8.16: Ne mpindiewu monayi, Mose kakajadika amu bua bintu ebi to, kadi baprofete bansantu bonsu kabidi, katshia ku matuku enda mena tô ne ku matuku a Abalahama.
8.17: Eyowa, ne monayi, Abalahama wakamona dilua dienda, ne uvua muwujibua ne disanka ne wakasanka.
8.18: Eyowa, ne monayi ndi nnuambila ne, kabivua amu Abalahama uvua mumanya bintu ebi to, kadi kuvua ba bungi kumpala kua matuku a Abalahama bavua babikidibua bilondeshila ku mulongu wa Nzambi; eyowa, mena ku mulongu wa Muanenda; ne nanku bua ne bilejibua kudi bantu, bidimu binunu bia bungi kumpala kua dilua dienda, ne mena disungila nedilua kudibu.
8.19: Ne mpindiewu ndi musua ne numanya, ne katshia mena ku matuku a Abalahama kuvua baprofete ba bungi bavua bajadika bintu ebi; eyowa, monayi, muprofete Zenose wakajadika ne dikima; bua etshi uvua mushipibua.
8.20: Ne monayi, Zenoke kabidi, ne Eziasa kabidi, ne Yeshaya kabidi, ne Yelemiya, (Yelemiya muikala muprofete awu wa momumua wakajadika bua dibutuka dia Yelushalema) ne mpindiewu tudi bamanya ne Yelushalema uvua mubutuka bilondeshila ku miaku ya Yelemiya. Ô kadi munyi muapanga Muana wa Nzambi kulua, bilondeshila ku dîyi dia buprofete dienda?
8.21: Ne mpindiewu nenuela mpata ne Yelushalema uvua mubutuka anyi? Nenuamba ne kabakashipa bana ba baluma ba Sedekiya, bonsu pa kumbusha Muleke anyi? Eyowa, ne kanuena numona ne ndelanganyi ya Sedekiya idi netu, ne badi babipata mu bulaba bua Yelushalema anyi? Kadi monayi, ebi kabiena bionsu to—
8.22: Bakipata tatuetu Lehi ku Yelushalema bualu wakajadika bua bintu ebi. Nefi wakajadika bintu ebi kabidi, ne pabuipi ne batatuetu bonsu kabidi, mena tô ne diba edi; eyowa, badi bajadika bua dilua dia Kilisto, ne badi batekemena, ne badi basanka bua dituku dienda dilualua.
8.23: Ne monayi, udi Nzambi, ne udi nabu, ne wakadimuenesha kudibu, bua kubasungilayi; ne bakamupesha butumbi, bua bualu bulualua.
8.24: Ne mpindiewu, bualu nudi bamanya bintu ebi ne kanuena mua kubivila to pa kumbusha panuashima, bua nanku nudi benza mubi mu bualu ebu, bualu nudi babenga bintu bionsu ebi, nansha munudi bapeta majadikibua mapita bungi; eyowa, nudi bapeta bintu bionsu ebi mena, bintu bia mu diûlu, ne bintu bionsu bia pa buloba, bu njadikilu wa ne bidi bilelela.
8.25: Kadi monayi, nudi babenga bulelela, ne batombokela Nzambi wenu munsantu; ne diba edi mena, pa mutu pa nuenu kudibutshila bintu bia mushinga mu diûlu buenu nkayenu, mudi tshintu katshiyi tshibipisha, ne mudi tshintu tshia bukoya katshiyi mua kulua to, nudi nudiwujila tshiji bua dituku dia tshilumbuluilu.
8.26: Eyowa, nansha diba edi nudi baboba, bua bualu bua dishibeya dia bantu dienu ne buendenda ne bubi buenu, bua dibutuka dia kashidi; eyowa, ne pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima nedinufikila katataka.
8.27: Eyowa, monayi didi mpindiewu mena ku bibi bienu; eyowa, ndayi ku nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu, ne nukebayi; ne monayi, mulumbuluishi wenu udi mushibeyibua, ne udi mulala mu mashi enda; ne udi mushibeyibua kudi muanabu wa baluma, udi ukeba kusomba mu nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu.
8.28: Ne monayi, bubidi buabu badi bena tshisumbu tshia musokoku, Gadiantona ki mufuki watshi ne muena bubi udi ukeba bua kufuisha anyima ya bantu.

9.1: Monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Nefi mêyi â, bamua bantu bavua munkatshi muabu bakanyema lubilu ku nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu; eyowa, bakaya bavua mena batanu, ne bakambilangana, bu muvuabu ne:
9.2: Monayi, mpindiewu netumanya bushuwa bikala muntu ewu udi muprofete, ne bikala Nzambi mumupa mukenji bua kuamba mêyi a buprofete pa malu a dikema nanku kutudi. Monayi, katuena tuitabuja ne udi mumupa mukenji to; eyowa, katuena tuitabuja ne udi muprofete to; nansha nanku, bikala bualu ebu buvuaye muamba bitangila mulumbuluishi munena ebu bulelela, ne mmufua, apu netuitabuja ne mêyi makuabu adiye muakula adi malelela.
9.3: Ne biakalua ne bakanyema lubilu ne makanda abu, ne bakabuela mu muaba wa nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu; ne monayi, mulumbuluishi munena uvua mupona panshi, ne uvua mulala mu mashi enda.
9.4: Ne mpindiewu monayi, pakamonabu nanku bakakema menamena, mua ne bakakuluka panshi; bualu kabavua bitabuja mêyi avua Nefi muamba bitangila mulumbuluishi munena to.
9.5: Kadi mpindiewu, pakamonabu bakitabuja, ne bôwa buakabakuata bua bitungu bionsu bivua Nefi muamba kabilu pa mutu pa bantu; bua nanku bakakanka, ne bakapona panshi.
9.6: Mpindiewu, katataka pakashibeyibua mulumbuluishi—yeya muikala mutuibua kela kudi muanabu wa baluma uvua mudivuadika bua kabamumanyi to, ne wakanyema, ne basadidi bakaya lubilu bua kuambila bantu, bela lubila lua dishibeya munkatshi muabu;
9.7: Ne monayi bantu bakadisangisha pamua ku muaba wa nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu—ne monayi, bakakema pakamonabu bantu batanu bavua bapona panshi.
9.8: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bantu kabavua bamanya tshintu to bitangila musumba wa bantu uvua mudisangisha pamua ku budimi bua Nefi; bua nanku bakambilangana munkatshi muabu ne: Bantu aba ki badi bashibeya mulumbuluishi, ne Nzambi mmubatûta bua kabatunyemi to.
9.9: Ne biakalua ne bakabakuata, ne bakabasuika ne bakabela mu buloko. Ne kuvua dimanyisha diakatumibua konsu diamba ne: mulumbuluishi uvua mushibeyibua, ne bamushibeyi bavua bakuatshibua ne bedibua mu buloko.
9.10: Ne biakalua ne pakatshiabu bantu bakadisangisha pamua bua kudila ne kujila biakudia, ku dijîka dia mulumbuluishi munena uvuabu bashipa.
9.11: Ne nanku kabidi balumbuluishi abu bavua ku budimi bua Nefi, ne bavua bumvua mêyi enda, bavua pabu basangishibua pamua ku dijîka.
9.12: Ne biakalua ne bakebeja munkatshi mua bantu, bamba ne: Bantu batanu bavua batumibua bua kuebeja bitangila mulumbuluishi munena bua kumanya ne uvua mufua badi penyi? Ne bakabandamuna ne bamba ne: Katuena bamanya bitangila bantu batanu banudi nuamba ne nuvua batuma to; kadi kudi bantu batanu badi bamushibeyi, batudi bela mu buloko.
9.13: Ne biakalua ne balumbuluishi bakajinga ne balua nabu; ne bakalua nabu, ne monayi bavua bantu batanu bavuabu batuma; ne monayi balumbuluishi bakabebeja bua kumanya bitangila bualu ebu, ne bakabambila bionsu bivua bienzeka, bamba ne:
9.14: Tuakanyema lubilu ne tuakalua ku muaba wa nkuasa wa tshilumbuluishi, ne patuakamona bintu bionsu bu muvua Nefi mujadika mena, tuakakema mua ne tuakapona panshi; ne patuakajuka dikema dietu, monayi bakatuela mu buloko.
9.15: Mpindiewu, bua dishibeya dia muntu ewu, katuena bamanya udi muenza nanku to; ne tudi amu bamanya ne, tuakanyema lubilu bilondeshila munuakajinga, ne monayi uvua mufua, bilondeshila ku mêyi a Nefi.
9.16: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne balumbuluishi bakumvuija bantu bualu, ne bakabila, bafunda Nefi, bamba ne: Monayi, tudi bamanya ne Nefi ewu udi ne tshia bua kuikala mumvuangana ne muntu bua kushipa mulumbuluishi, ne pashisha bua atumanyishabi, bua akudimuna moyo wetu ku ditabuja dienda, bua adibandisha bua kuikala muntu munena, musungula kudi Nzambi, ne muprofete.
9.17: Ne mpindiewu monayi, netujandula muntu ewu, ne neatonda tshilema tshienda ne neatuambila bashibeyi balelela ba mulumbuluishi ewu.
9.18: Ne biakalua ne bakalekesha bantu batanu aba dituku dia dijîka. Nansha nanku, bakatandisha balumbuluishi bua mêyi avuabu bakanyina Nefi, ne bakakokangana nabu umua ku umua, mu mushindu ne bakabapuwisha.
9.19: Nansha nanku, bakakuatshisha Nefi ne bakamusuikisha mionji ne bakamuvuija kumpala kua musumba wa bantu, ne bakabanga kumuela nkonku mu mishindu mishilangana bua kumubuejakajabu, bua bamona mua kumufundabu bua kumushipabu—
9.20: Bamukonka ne: Udi muena tshipangu; muntu kayi udi mumushibeya? Tuambila mpindiewu, ne itabuja tshilema tshieba; bamba ne, Mona makuta; ne netukuanyishila ne wikala ne moyo kabidi biwatuambila, ne witaba diumvuangana diwudi muenza nenda.
9.21: Kadi Nefi wakabambila ne: Ô nuenu badi bapota, nuenu badi kabayi batengula ku mitshima, nuenu mpofu, ne nuenu bena nshingu miumisha, nudi bamanya mutantshi bula kayi Mukalenga Nzambi neanulekela ne nutungunuka mu njila wenu wa mibi anyi?
9.22: Ô nudi tshia kubanga kuela mikunda ne kudila, bua dibutuka dinena didi dinuindila diba edi, pa kumbusha nuenu bakakudimuna mutshima.
9.23: Monayi nudi nuamba ne ndi mumvuangana ne muntu bua ashibeya Sêzolama, mulumbuluishi munena wetu. Kadi monayi, ndi nnuambila ne, mbualu ndi munujadikila bua nuenu kumanya bitangila bualu ebu; eyowa, mena bua njadikilu kunudi, ne mvua mumanya bubi ne malu mapita bubi bidi munkatshi muenu.
9.24: Ne bualu ndi muenza nanku, nudi nuamba ne ndi mumvuangana ne muntu bua enza bualu ebu; eyowa, bualu mvua munuleja tshimanyinu nudi numfîkila tshiji, ne nudi nukeba bua nuangata moyo wanyi.
9.25: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nuleja tshimanyinu tshikuabu, ne nemmona ne nuakeba bua nunshipa mu bualu ebu.
9.26: Monayi ndi nnuambila ne: Ndayi ku nzubu wa Seyantuma, udi muanabu wa baluma wa Sêzolama, ne mukonkayi ne:
9.27: Nefi, udi udipitshisha bu muprofete, wamba mêyi a buprofete pa bibi bivula bitangila bantu aba, ngudi mumvuangana neba, muwudi mushibeya Sêzolama, udi muikala muanenu wa baluma anyi?
9.29: Ne nenumukonka ne: Udi mushibeya muanenu wa baluma anyi?
9.30: Ne neimana ne bôwa, ne kakumanya tshia kuamba to. Ne monayi, neavila kunudi; ne neenza bu uvua ukema; nansha nanku, neanumanyisha ne kena mumanya bualu to.
9.31: Kadi monayi, nenumukenketa, ne nenusangana mashi kuinshi kua tshinkutu tshienda.
9.32: Ne panuamona nanku, nenukonka ne: Mashi â adi mafumina penyi? Tudi bamanya ne adi mashi a muanenu wa baluma?
9.33: Ne pashisha neazakala, ne nealua mutoketoka, mena bu lufu luvua lumukuata.
9.34: Ne pashisha nenuamba ne: Bua bôwa ebu ne butoketoka ebu budi bumueneka pa mpala weba, mona, tudi bamanya ne udi mupîla.
9.35: Ne pashisha bôwa bukola ne bumukuata; ne pashisha neatonda kunudi, ne kakuvila kabidi ne kena mumushibeya to.
9.36: Ne pashisha neanuambila ne, mema, Nefi, ntshiena mumanya bualu bitangila bualu ebu amu ne buvua mbundeja ku bukola bua Nzambi. Ne pashisha nenumanya ne ndi muntu muena bulelela, ne Nzambi udi muntuma kunudi.
9.37: Ne biakalua ne bakaya ne bakenza, mena bilondeshila bu muvua Nefi mubambila. Ne monayi, mêyi avuaye muamba avua malelela; bualu bilondeshila ku mêyi enda wakavila; ne bilondeshila ku mêyi enda wakatonda kabidi.
9.38: Ne wakasakibua bua kujadika ne yeya nkayenda ki uvua mushibeyi mulelela, mua ne bakalekela bantu batanu abu, ne bakalekela Nefi kabidi.
9.39: Ne kuvua bamua ba ku Bena Nefi bakitabuja mêyi a Nefi; ne kuvua bamua kabidi, bakitabuja bua bujadiki bua bantu batanu abu, bualu bavua bakudimuna moyo pavuabu mu buloko.
9.40: Ne mpindiewu kuvua banga munkatshi mua bantu, bavua bamba ne Nefi uvua muprofete.
9.41: Ne kuvua bakuabu bakamba ne: Monayi, udi Nzambi, bualu pa kumbusha yeya muikala Nzambi kavua mua kumanya malu onsu â to. Bualu monayi, mmutuambila meji a mitshima yetu ne mmutuambila kabidi malu; ne mena watuadi ku dimanya dietu mushibeyi mulelela wa mulumbuluishi wetu munena.

10.1: Ne biakalua ne kuakenzeka ditapulukangana munkatshi mua bantu, mua ne bakatapulukangana eku ne eku ne bakaya njila mishilangana, bashiya Nefi nkayenda, pavuaye muimana munkatshi muabu.
10.2: Ne biakalua ne Nefi wakaya wenda njila mutangila ku nzubu kuenda, unana meji bua bintu bivua Mukalenga mumuleja.
10.3: Ne biakalua pavuaye unana meji nanku—ne uvua muteketa bikola munda muenda bua bubi bua bantu ba Bena Nefi, midimu yabu ya musokoku ya mîdima, ne dishibeya dia bantu diabu, ne dipawula dia bintu diabu, ne mishindu yonsu ya malu mabi—ne biakalua pavuaye unana meji mu mutshima wenda nanku, monayi, wakumvua dîyi diamba ne:
10.4: Udi mubeneshibua, Nefi, bua bintu abi biwudi muenza; bualu ndi mumona mûdi mumanyisha dîyi dianyi, dindi mukupesha, kudi bantu aba, kuyi utshioka to. Ne kuena mubatshina to, ne kuena mukeba moyo weba nkayawu to, kadi udi mukeba disua dianyi, ne bua kulama mikenji yanyi.
10.5: Ne mpindiewu, bualu udi muenza nanku kuyi utshioka to, mona, nenkubenesha bua kashidi; ne nenkuvuija wa ngulu mu muaku ne mu midimu, mu ditabuja ne mu bienzedi; eyowa, mena bua ne bintu bionsu nebikuenzekela bilondeshila ku muaku weba, bualu kuakulomba tshidi tshishilangana ne disua dianyi to.
10.6: Mona, udi Nefi, ne ndi Nzambi. Mona, ndi nkumanyisha kumpala kua banjelu banyi, ne newikala ne bukôkeshi pa mutu pa bantu aba, ne neutûta buloba ne tshiyola, ne tshipupu, ne dinyanguka, bilondeshila ku bubi bua bantu aba.
10.7: Mona, ndi nkupesha bukôkeshi, bua ne tshionsu tshiwasuika pa buloba netshisuikibua mu diûlu; ne tshionsu tshiwasulula pa buloba netshisuludibua mu diûlu; ne nanku newikala ne bukola munkatshi mua bantu aba.
10.8: Ne nanku, pawambila ntempelo ewu ne neapanduluka mu bitupa bibidi, nebienzeka.
10.9: Ne pawambila mukuna ewu ne, Kuluka panshi ne ulua bula bumua ne buloba budi panshi, nebienzeka.
10.10: Ne mona, bu wewa bua kuamba ne Nzambi neatûta bantu aba, nebilua.
10.11: Ne mpindiewu mona, ndi nkutuma, ne uya ne umanyisha bantu aba, ne Mukalenga Nzambi udi wa Bukitu Bonsu udi wamba nanku: Pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima nenutûtshibua, mena tô ne ku dibutuka.
10.12: Ne monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Mukalenga mêyi â kudi Nefi, wakimana ne kakaya ku nzubu wenda to, kadi wakapingana kudi misumba ya bantu bavua batangalaka konsu pa mpala wa bulaba, ne wakabanga kuyisha dîyi dia Mukalenga divua dimuambila, bitangila dibutuka diabu bu bobu kabayi bakudimuna mutshima to.
10.13: Mpindiewu monayi, nansha muvuaku tshishima tshinena tshivua Nefi muenza tshia kubambila bitangila lufu lua mulumbuluishi munena, bakapapisha mitshima yabu ne kaba kumvuila mêyi a Mukalenga to.
10.14: Bua nanku Nefi wakabayisha dîyi dia Mukalenga, wamba ne: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima, nenutûtshibua tô ne ku dibutuka.
10.15: Ne biakalua ne pakabayisha Nefi dîyi, monayi, batshivua bapapisha mitshima yabu ne bakabenga kuteleja mêyi enda; bua nanku bakamupenda, ne bakakeba bua kumukuata bua kumuelabu mu buloko.
10.16: Kadi monayi, bukola bua Nzambi buvua nenda, ne kabavua mua kumuela mu buloko to, bualu wakumbushibua kudi Nyuma ne wakapatudibua munkatshi muabu.
10.17: Ne biakalua ne wakaya nanku mu Nyuma, ku musumba wa bantu ne ku musumba wa bantu, uyisha dîyi dia Nzambi, mena tô ne pakayishaye bantu bonsu, anyi pakaditumaye munkatshi mua bantu bonsu.
10.18: Ne biakalua ne bakabenga kuteleja mêyi enda; ne kuakabanga kuikala makokangana, mua ne bakâbulukangana kabidi ne bakabanga kushipangana ne muela wa mvita.
10.19: Ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshia kumpala tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi tshiakajika nanku.

11.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshibîdi tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi makokangana akavulangana, mua ne kuvua mvita mu bulaba bonsu munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi.
11.2: Ne tshisumbu tshia musokoku tshia banyengi etshi ki tshivua tshienza mudimu ewu wa dibutuka ne wa bubi. Ne mvita eyi ivuaku tshidimu tshijima atshi; ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshisâtu ivuaku kabidi.
11.3: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu etshi Nefi wakabila kudi Mukalenga, wamba ne:
11.4: Ô Mukalenga, kulekedi ne bantu aba babutuka ku muela wa mvita to; kadi Ô Mukalenga, kadi lekela kuikala tshiyola mu bulaba, bua kubasonsola ku divuluka dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne pamuapa nebakudimuna mutshima ne balua kûdi.
11.5: Ne biakenzeka nanku, bilondeshila ku mêyi a Nefi. Ne kuvua tshiyola tshinena pa bulaba, munkatshi mua bantu bonsu ba Nefi. Ne nanku mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshinâyi tshiyola tshiakatungunuka, ne mudimu wa lufu ku muela wa mvita wakajika kadi wakalua mukola bua tshiyola.
11.6: Ne mudimu wa lufu ewu wakatungunuka kabidi mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshitânu. Buloba buvua butûtshibua bua ne buvua bûma, ne kabuakela nteta mu tshikondu tshia nteta to; ne buloba bujima buvua butûtshibua, mena munkatshi mua Bena Lamana ne munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, butûtshibua bua ne bakafua mu binunu mu bitupa bia bulaba bivua bantu bapita bubi.
11.7: Ne biakalua ne bantu bakamona ne bavua pabuipi ne kufua bua tshiyola, ne bakabanga kuvuluka Mukalenga Nzambi wabu; ne bakabanga kuvuluka mêyi a Nefi.
11.8: Ne bantu bakabanga kusengelela balumbuluishi banena ne balombodi babu, ne bambila Nefi ne: Mona, tudi bamanya ne udi muntu wa Nzambi, ne bua nanku, bila kudi Mukalenga Nzambi bua atumbushila tshiyola etshi, bua mêyi onsu awuvua mutuambila bitangila dibutuka dietu kâlu kukumbajibua to.
11.9: Ne biakalua ne balumbuluishi bakambila Nefi, bilondeshila ku mêyi avua majingibua. Ne biakalua ne pakamona Nefi ne bantu bavua bakudimuna mutshima ne bakadipuekesha bavuala bikunyi, wakabila kudi Mukalenga, wamba ne:
11.10: Ô Mukalenga, mona bantu aba bakudimunyi mutshima; ne bakombi tshisumbu tshia Gadiantona munkatshi muabu mua ne babutuki, ne bajîki malongolodi abu a musokoku mu buloba.
11.11: Mpindiewu, Ô Mukalenga, suaku umbusha tshiji tshieba bua didipuekesha diabu edi, ne tshiji tshieba tshitudijibua bua dibutuka dia bantu babi aba bawukadi mumana kubutula.
11.12: Ô Mukalenga, suaku ulekela tshiji tshieba, eyowa, tshiji tshieba tshikola, ne wenza ne tshiyola etshi tshijika mu bulaba ebu.
11.13: Ô Mukalenga, suaku uteleja kundi, ne wenza ne bienzeka bilondeshila ku mêyi anyi, ne utuma mvula pa mpala wa buloba, bua bukuama bimuma buabu, ne nebuela nteta yabu mu tshikondu tshia nteta.
11.14: Ô Mukalenga, wakateleja mêyi anyi pangakamba ne, Lekela kuikala tshiyola, bua tshipupu tshia muela wa mvita tshijika; ne ndi mumanya ne, nansha musangu ewu, neuteleja mêyi anyi, bualu wakamba ne: Bantu aba bobu bakudimuna mutshima, nembepelesha.
11.15: Eyowa, Ô Mukalenga, ne udi mumona ne bakudimunyi mutshima, bua tshiyola ne tshipupu ne dibutuka bivua bibavuila.
11.16: Ne mpindiewu, Ô Mukalenga, udi muakusua kulekela tshiji tshieba, ne kutêta kabidi bua kumona bialuabu kukusadila anyi? Ne pikalabu benza nanku, Ô Mukalenga, udi mua kubabenesha bilondeshila ku mêyi eba awuvua muamba.
11.17: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshisambombo Mukalenga wakalekelela bantu tshiji tshienda, ne wakalokesha mvula pa buloba, mua ne buakakuama bimuma biabu mu tshikondu tshia bimuma biabu. Ne biakalua ne buakela nteta yabu mu tshikondu tshia nteta yabu.
11.18: Ne monayi, bantu bakasanka ne kutumbisha Nzambi, ne mpala mujima wa bulaba uvua muwujibua ne disanka; ne kabakakeba kabidi bua kushipa Nefi to, kadi bakamubala bu muprofete munena, ne muntu wa Nzambi, muikala ne bukola ne bukôkeshi bimupesha kudi Nzambi.
11.19: Ne monayi, Lehi, muanabu wa baluma, kavua mushadila panyima penda nansha kakesa to bua malu adi matangila buakana.
11.20: Ne nanku bifikila ne bantu ba Nefi bakabanga kulubuluka kabidi mu buloba, ne bakabanga kuibakulula miaba yabu ivua mishala bikulu, ne bakabanga kuvulangana ne kutangalaka, mena tô ne pakabuikilabu mpala mujima wa bulaba, ku node ne ku sude, kufuma ku mbuwa wa ku wesete tô ne ku mbuwa wa ku esete.
11.21: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshisambombo tshiakajika mu ditalala. Ne tshidimu tshia mukumi muanda muteketa ne muanda muteketa tshiakabanga mu ditalala; ne ekelezia wakatangalaka pa mpala wa buloba bonsu; ne tshitupa tshinena tshia bantu, ku Bena Nefi ne ku Bena Lamana, tshiakabuela mu ekelezia; ne bavua ne ditalala dipita bunena mu bulaba; ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne muanda muteketa tshiakajika nanku.
11.22: Ne bavua ne ditalala kabidi mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne muanda mukulu, pa kumbusha bua makokangana makesa bitangila bitupa bia dilongesha divua baprofete bateka.
11.23: Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda muteketa ne tshinayi kuakabanga kuikala luntûta lua bungi. Kadi biakalua ne Nefi ne Lehi, ne ba bungi ba ku balombodi nabu ba mu ekelezia bavua bamanya bitangila malu malelela a dilongesha, muvuabu bapeta mabuluila a bungi dituku dionsu, bua nanku bakayisha kudi bantu, mua ne bakajikija luntûta luabu mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi.
11.24: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi, kuvua bungi kampanda bua ku batapuluki ba ku bantu ba Nefi, bavua bimua bidimu bishala baya kudi Bena Lamana, ne badiangatshila dîna dia Bena Lamana, ne kabidi bungi kampanda buvua buikala tunkanunuina tulelela tua Bena Lamana, bikala basonsodibua ku tshiji kudibu, anyi kudi batapuluki abu, bua nanku bakatuadija mvita ne bana babu.
11.25: Ne bakashibeya bantu ne bakapawula bintu; ne pashisha bavua bapingana mu mikuna, ne mu tshipela ne miaba ya musokoku, badisokoka bua kababajandudi to, ne bavua bapeta bakuabu balua kudisangisha kudibu dituku dionsu, monsu muvuaku batapuluki baya kudibu.
11.26: Ne nanku panyima, eyowa, mena mu mutantshi wa bidimu bikesa, bakavua tshisumbu tshinena menamena tshia banyengi; ne bakakebakeba malongolodi a musokoku a Gadiantona onsu; ne bakalua banyengi ba Gadiantona.
11.27: Mpindiewu monayi, banyengi aba bakatuala tshinyangu tshinena, eyowa, mena lufu lunena munkatshi mua bantu ba Nefi, ne kabidi munkatshi mua bantu ba Bena Lamana.
11.28: Ne biakalua ne bivua bikengedibua ne mudimu wa lufu ewu wimanyikibua; bua nanku bakatuma musumba wa basalayi ba makanda mu tshipela ne ku mikuna bua kukebakeba tshisumbu tshia banyengi etshi, ne bua kubabutula.
11.29: Kadi monayi, biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi bakabapingaja ku malaba abu nkayabu. Ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi tshiakajika nanku.
11.30: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshia kumpala bakaya kabidi kuluisha tshisumbu tshia banyengi etshi, ne bakashipa ba bungi; ne bakakumbudibua pabu ne lufu lua bungi.
11.31: Ne bavua benzejibua kabidi bua kulopoka mu tshipela ne mu mikuna bua kupingana ku malaba abu nkayabu, bua bualu bua bungi bupita bua banyengi abu bavua buwula mu mikuna ne tshipela.
11.32: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshiakajika nanku. Ne banyengi batshivua amu bavulangana ne bakakolakana, mua ne bakatshimuna misumba mijima ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, ne ya Bena Lamana kabidi; ne bakapesha bantu ba Nefi bôwa pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba.
11.33: Eyowa, bualu bakaya mu bitupa bia bungi bia bulaba, ne bakababutula bikola; eyowa, bakashipa ba bungi, ne bakangata bakuabu bakuatshibu mu tshipela, eyowa, ne nangananga bakaji babu ne bana babu ba bungi.
11.34: Mpindiewu bubi bunena ebu, buvua buvuila bantu bua malu mabi abu, buakabasonsola bua kuvulukabu Mukalenga Nzambi wabu.
11.35: Ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshia kumpala tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi tshiakajika nanku.
11.36: Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshibîdi bakabanga kabidi kupua Mukalenga Nzambi wabu moyo. Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshisâtu bakabanga kukolakana mu malu mabi. Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshinâyi kabakalongolola ngikadilu yabu to.
11.37: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshitânu bakatamba kukolakana mu diditambisha diabu, ne mu bubi buabu; ne nanku bakavua baboba nanku kabidi bua dibutuka.
11.38: Ne tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshitânu tshiakajika nanku.

12.1: Ne nanku tudi mua kumona bu mudiyi ya mashimi ne kabidi ya dibenga kusuminyina mitshima ya bana ba bantu; eyowa, tudi mua kumona ne Mukalenga mu buimpa buenda budi kabuyi ndekelu udi ubenesha ne ulubuluja badi bateka tshieyemenu tshiabu kudiye.
12.2: Eyowa, ne tudi mua kumona mena diba didiye ulubuluja bantu benda, eyowa, bitangila divulangana dia madimi abu, bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena biabu, ne dia ngolo, ne dia tshiamua tshia mpalata, ne dia mishindu yonsu ya bintu bia mushinga bia mushindu yonsu ne ngenzedi wabi yonsu; wepeshela mioyo yabu, ne ubapatuisha mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu; utekesha mitshima ya bena lukuna babu bua ne kabakebi mvita nabu to; eyowa, ne mu tshikosu, wenza bintu bionsu bua diakalenga ne musangelu bia bantu benda; eyowa, ki diba adi badi bapapisha mitshima yabu, ne bapua Mukalenga Nzambi wabu moyo, ne badiatakaja Wa Tshijila muinshi mua makasa abu—eyowa, ne ebi mbualu kabena ne makenga to, ne mbua bubanji buabu.
12.3: Ne nanku tudi tumona ne pa kumbusha Mukalenga yeya munyoka bantu benda ne ntatu ya bungi, eyowa, pa kumbusha yeya mubakumbula ne lufu ne bôwa bukola, ne tshiyola ne mishindu yonsu ya tshipupu, kabakumuvuluka to.
12.4: Ô bu mudi bana ba bantu bapota, ne baditambishi, ne babi, ne bena diabulu, ne bu mudibu ne lukasa lunena bua kuenza malu mabi, ne lujoku lunena bua kuenza malu mimpa; eyowa, bu mudibu ne lukasa lunena bua kuteleja mêyi a muena bubi, ne kuteka mitshima yabu pa bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba!
12.5: Eyowa, bu mudibu ne lukasa lunena bua kudibandisha mu diditambisha; eyowa, bu mudibu ne lukasa lunena bua kudiamba, ne kuenza mishindu yonsu ya malu mabi; ne bu mudibu ne lujoku lunena bua kuvuluka Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne bua kuteka matshi ku mibelu yenda, eyowa, bu mudibu ne lujoku lunena bua kuenda mu njila ya lungenyi!
12.6: Monayi, kabena bajinga ne Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, uvua mubafuka, abakôkesha ne ikala mukalenga wabu to; nansha mudi buimpa bunena buenda ne lusa luenda kudibu, badi bapetula mibelu yenda, ne kabena basua ne ikala muludiki wabu to.
12.7: Ô bu mudibu bunena butupu bua bana ba bantu; eyowa, badi mena ne mushinga mukesa kumpala kua lupuishi lua buloba.
12.8: Bualu monayi, lupuishi lua buloba ludi luenda eku ne eku, lupanduluka pankatshi, ku mukenji wa Nzambi munena ne wa kashidi.
12.9: Eyowa, monayi ku dîyi dienda tukuna ne mikuna bidi bizakala ne binyungana.
12.10: Ne ku bukola bua dîyi dienda idi yupuka, ne ilua mishemakana, eyowa, mena bu mudi tshibanda.
12.11: Eyowa, ku bukola bua dîyi dienda buloba bujima budi bunyungana;
12.12: Eyowa, ku bukola bua dîyi dienda, bishimikidi bidi binyungana, mena munkatshi-nkatshi.
12.13: Eyowa, ne padiye wambila buloba ne—Umbuka—budi bumbuka.
12.14: Eyowa, padiye wambila buloba ne—Ne upingana panyima, bua bulepesha bula bua dituku bua meba a bungi—bidi bienzeka;
12.15: Ne nanku, bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda buloba budi bupingana panyima, ne bidi bimueneka kudi muntu ne diba didi dimana muaba umua; eyowa, ne monayi, bidi nanku; bualu bulelela buloba ki budi bunyunga ne ki ndiba to.
12.16: Ne monayi, kabidi, pambilaye ndondu ya ndondu mula—Ûma—bidi bienzeka.
12.17: Monayi, yeya muambila mukuna ne—Juka, ne luaku apa ne kulukila tshimenga atshi, bua tshijîkibua—monayi bidi bienzeka.
12.18: Ne monayi, pikala muntu musokoka tshiuma tshienda mu buloba, ne Mukalenga muamba ne—Lekelayi tshitshipibua, bua malu mabi a udi mutshisokoka—monayi, netshitshipibua.
12.19: Ne pikala Mukalenga muamba ne—Ikala mushipibua, bua muntu katshipetshi kubangila tshikondu etshi tô ne bua kashidi—monayi, muntu kakutshipeta tshikondu etshi tô ne bua kashidi to.
12.20: Ne monayi, pikala Mukalenga muambila muntu ne—Neutshipibua bua kashidi, bua malu mabi eba—nebienzeka.
12.21: Ne pikala Mukalenga muamba ne—Bua bualu bua malu mabi eba neukoshibua ku mpala kuanyi—neenza ne nebikala nanku.
12.22: Ne diakabi kudi wambilaye nanku, bualu nebikala kudi udi wenza malu mabi, ne kena mua kupandishibua to; nanku, bua bualu ebu, dikudimuna dia mutshima divua difidibua bua bantu kupandabu.
12.23: Nanku, babeneshibua badi aba bikala bakudimuna mutshima ne bumvuila dîyi dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu; bualu aba ki bobu bapandishibua.
12.24: Ne Nzambi anyisha, mu tshiwudi tshienda tshinena, ne bantu bafikishibua ku dikudimuna dia mutshima ne bienzedi bimpa, bua bikala mua kupingajibua ku ngâsa pa mutu pa ngâsa, bilondeshila ku bienzedi biabu.
12.25: Ne ndi musua ne bantu bapandishibua. Kadi tudi tubala ne mu dituku dinena ne dia ndekelu kudi bamua bipatshibua, eyowa, bumbushibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga;
12.26: Eyowa, bâtekibua mu ngikadilu wa dikenga kadiyi ndekelu, ne nanku nebikumbaja miaku idi yamba ne: Bobu badi benza malu mimpa nebapeta moyo wa kashidi; ne bobu badi benza bibi nebapeta dipîshibua dia kashidi. Ne nanku mudibi. Amena.

13.intro: Dîyi dia buprofete dia Samuele, Muena Lamana, kudi Bena Nefi.
13.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshisambombo, Bena Nefi batshivua bashala mu bubi, eyowa, mu bubi bupita, pavua Bena Lamana badienzeja bua kulama mikenji ya Nzambi ne bushuwa menamena, bilondeshila ku mikenji ya Mose.
13.2: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu etshi kuvua muntu umua uvua ne dîna ne Samuele, Muena Lamana, wakalua ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne wakabanga kuyisha bantu. Ne biakalua ne wakayisha bantu, matuku a bungi, bua dikudimuna dia mutshima, ne bakamuipata, ne ukavua pabuipi ne kupingana ku bulaba buenda.
13.3: Kadi monayi, dîyi dia Mukalenga diakalua kudiye, bua ne apingana kabidi, ne amba mêyi a buprofete kudi bantu bitangila bintu bionsu biamuluila ku mutshima wenda.
13.4: Ne biakalua ne kabakalekela ne abuela mu tshimenga to; bua nanku wakaya ne wakabanda pa mutu pa tshimanu tshiatshi, ne wakôlola tshianza tshienda ne wakabila ne dîyi dikola, ne wakamba mêyi a buprofete kudi bantu bitangila bintu bionsu bivua Mukalenga wela mu mutshima wenda.
13.5: Ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, mema, Samuele, Muena Lamana, ndi ngakula mêyi a Mukalenga adiye wela mu mutshima wanyi; ne monayi udi muela mu mutshima wanyi bua kuambila bantu aba ne: muela wa mvita wa bululama udi mulembelela pa mitu ya bantu aba; ne bidimu nkama inayi kabiakupita to amu pa kumbusha muela wa mvita wa bululama muponela bantu aba.
13.6: Eyowa, dibutuka dikola didi dindila bantu aba, ne bushuwa didi diluila bantu aba, ne tshintu nansha tshimua katshiena mua kupandisha bantu aba to amu pa kumbusha bikala dikudimuna dia mutshima ne ditabuja kudi Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto, walua bushuwa pa buloba, ne wakenga makenga a bungi ne washipabu bua bantu benda.
13.7: Ne monayi, muanjelu wa Mukalenga wakabimanyisha, ne wakatuadila anyima wanyi mukenji mulenga. Ne monayi, ngakatumibua kunudi bua kunumanyishalu penu, bua nupeta mukenji mulenga; kadi monayi nuakabenga kungakidila.
13.8: Bua nanku, Mukalenga udi wamba ne: Bua dipapa dia mitshima ya bantu ba Bena Nefi, pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima nengumbusha dîyi dianyi kudibu, ne nengumbusha Nyuma wanyi kudibu, ne ntshiakubatukijila kabidi to, ne nenshintula mitshima ya bana babu kudibu.
13.9: Ne bidimu nkama inayi kabiakupita to kumpala kua mema kuenza ne batûtshibua; eyowa, nembakumbula ne muela wa mvita, ne tshiyola, ne tshipupu.
13.10: Eyowa, nembakumbula mu tshiji tshianyi tshikola, ne nekuikala bamua ba ku lukongu lua bantu luinâyi, ba ku bena lukuna benu, bikala ne moyo, bua bamona dibutuka dijima dienu; ne ebi nebienzeka bushuwa pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima; ne ba ku lukongu lua bantu luinâyi nebenzeja dibutuka dienu, mudi Mukalenga wamba.
13.11: Kadi panuakudimuna mutshima ne panuapingana kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wenu nendekela tshiji tshianyi, Mukalenga udi wamba nanku; eyowa, nanku Mukalenga udi wamba, babeneshibua badi aba bikala bakudimuna mutshima ne bapingana kundi, kadi diakabi kudi yeya udi kayi ukudimuna mutshima to.
13.12: Eyowa, Mukalenga udi wamba ne, diakabi kudi tshimenga tshinena etshi tshia Zalahemela; bualu monayi, tshidi tshipandishibua bua bantu badi bikala bakana; eyowa, Mukalenga udi wamba ne, diakabi kudi tshimenga tshinena etshi, bualu ndi mumona ne kudi bantu ba bungi, eyowa, mena tshitupa tshinena tshia tshimenga tshinena etshi, bâmpapishila mitshima yabu.
13.13: Kadi babeneshibua badi aba badi bakudimuna mutshima, bualu bobu nengepelesha. Kadi monayi, bu biobi kabiyi bua bantu bakana badi mu tshimenga tshinena etshi to, monayi, mvua ngenzeja ne kapia kapueka mu diûlu ne katshibutula.
13.14: Kadi monayi, bua bualu bua bakana ki tshiditshi tshiepeleshibua. Kadi monayi, diba didi dilua, Mukalenga udi wamba nanku, ne panuipata bakana munkatshi muenu, pashisha nenuikala baboba bua dibutuka; eyowa, diakabi dikala kudi tshimenga tshinena etshi, bua bubi ne malu mapita bubi bidimu.
13.15: Eyowa, ne diakabi dikala kudi tshimenga tshia Gideona, bua bubi ne malu mapita bubi bidimu.
13.16: Eyowa, ne diakabi dikala kabidi kudi bimenga bionsu bidi ku mpenga yonsu ya mu bulaba, bidi Bena Nefi basamu, bua bualu bua bubi ne malu mapita bubi bidimu.
13.17: Ne monayi, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, mulawu neulua mu bulaba, bua bualu bua bantu badi mu bulaba, eyowa, bua bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu.
13.18: Ne Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, eyowa, Nzambi wetu munena ne mulelela, nebilua ne ewu yonsu wasokoka biuma munda mua buloba kakubipeta kabidi to, bua mulawu mukola wa mu bulaba, amu pa kumbusha yeya muikala muntu muakana ne pabisokokaye bua Mukalenga.
13.19: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, bualu ndi musua ne basokoka biuma biabu kundi; ne batshipibua bikala badi kabayi basokoka biuma biabu kundi to; bualu muntu nansha umua kena usokoka biuma bienda kundi, amu pa kumbusha pikalaye muntu muakana; ne udi kayi usokoka biuma bienda kundi to, udi mutshipibua, ne kudi tshiuma tshienda kabidi, ne muntu nansha umua kakutshiangula to bua mulawu wa mu bulaba.
13.20: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, dituku nedilua diasokokabu biuma biabu, bualu badi bateka mitshima yabu ku mabanji; ne bualu badi bateka mitshima yabu ku mabanji, ne nebasokoka biuma biabu pânyemabu kumpala kua bena lukuna babu; bualu kabakubisokoka kundi to, batshipibua bikala bobu ne kabidi biuma biabu; ne mu dituku adi nebatûtshibua.
13.21: Monayi, nuenu bantu ba mu tshimenga tshinena etshi, ne telejayi mêyi anyi; eyowa, telejayi mêyi adi Mukalenga wamba; bualu monayi, udi wamba ne nudi batshipibua bua mabanji enu, ne kabidi mabanji enu mmatshipibua bualu nudi bateka mitshima yenu kudiwu, ne kanuena bumvuila mêyi a wakanupeshawu to.
13.22: Kanuena nuvuluka Mukalenga Nzambi wenu bua bintu bidiye munubenesha nabi to, kadi nudi nuvuluka diba dionsu mabanji enu, kanuyi nusakidila Mukalenga Nzambi wenu buawu to; eyowa, mitshima yenu kayena midifila kudi Mukalenga to, kadi idi yuwula ne diditambisha dikola, tô ne ku didiamba, ne tô ne ku didileja dikola, malakana, luntûta lua bungi, budimu, dikengeshangana, ne dishibeya dia bantu, ne mishindu yonsu ya malu mabi.
13.23: Bua bualu ebu Mukalenga Nzambi wakatuala mulawu pa mutu pa bulaba, ne kabidi pa mabanji enu, ne ebi nanku bua malu enu mabi.
13.24: Eyowa, diakabi kudi bantu aba, bualu tshikondu etshi tshidi tshifika, tshinudi nuipata baprofete, ne nubaseka, ne nubâsa mabua, ne nubashipa, ne nubenzela mishindu yonsu ya malu a bubi, mena bu munuakenzela bantu ba mu tshikondu tshia kala.
13.25: Ne mpindiewu panudi nuakula, nudi nuamba ne: Bu matuku etu mikala mu matuku a batatuetu ba kala, katuvua tushipa baprofete to; katuvua tubâsa mabua, ne tubipata to.
13.26: Monayi nudi bibi kubapita; bualu bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, padi muprofete ulua munkatshi muenu ne padiyi uyisha dîyi dia Mukalenga, didi dijadika bua mibi yenu ne malu enu mabi, nudi numufîkila tshiji, ne numuipata ne nukeba mishindu ya njila yonsu ya kumushipa; eyowa, nenuamba ne yeya udi muprofete wa mafi, ne muenji wa mibi, ne tshia diabulu, bualu udi ujadika ne bienzedi bienu bidi bibi.
13.27: Kadi monayi, palua muntu munkatshi muenu ne pambaye ne: Enzayi nanku, ne kakuena bualu bubi to; enzayi naka ne kanuakukenga to; eyowa, unuambila ne: Endayi bu munudi nudiumvua mu mitshima yenu; eyowa, endayi bu munudi nudimona ku mesu enu, ne enzayi tshionsu tshidi mitshima yenu ijinga—ne palua muntu munkatshi muenu ne pambaye nanku, nenumuakidila, ne nenuamba ne udi muprofete.
13.28: Eyowa, nenumuzanjika, ne nenumupesha bimua bia ku bintu bienu; nenumupesha imua ya ku ngolo yenu, ne ya ku mpalata yenu, ne nenumuvuadika ne bilamba bia mushinga mukola; ne bualu udi wakula ne mêyi a lubombu kunudi, ne udi wamba ne bintu bionsu bidi bimpa, apu kanuakumukuata tshilema to.
13.29: Ô nuenu lukongu lua bantu lubi ne lunyanguka; nuenu bantu bapapishibua ne ba nshingu miumisha, mutantshi bula kayi unuatshinka ne Mukalenga neanutukijila nuenza nanku? Eyowa, mutantshi bula kayi unuadilekela ne baludiki bapota ne mpofu banulombola? Eyowa, mutantshi bula kayi unuasungula mîdima pa mutu pa bukenka?
13.30: Eyowa, monayi, tshiji tshia Mukalenga tshikadi tshinutemela; monayi, udi utshipa bulaba bua malu enu mabi.
13.31: Ne monayi, tshikondu tshidi tshilua tshidiye utshipa mabanji enu, bua alua ne bufinu, bua ne kanuena mua ku’alama to; ne mu matuku a bupela buenu kanuena mua ku’alama to.
13.32: Ne Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, mu matuku a bupela buenu nenubila kudi Mukalenga; ne nenubila tshianana, bualu kabutu kenu kakadi kamana kulua pa mutu penu, ne dibutuka dienu didi dia bushuwa; ne pashisha nenudila ne nenuela mikunda mu dituku adi. Ne pashisha nenudilakana, ne nenuamba ne:
13.33: Ô bu mema mukudimuna mutshima, ne ntshivua mushipa baprofete, ne ntshivua mubâsa mabua, ne ntshivua mubipata to. Eyowa, nenuamba mu dituku adi ne: Ô bu tuetu bavuluka Mukalenga Nzambi wetu mu dituku diakatupeshaye mabanji etu, ne pashisha ka’avua alua ne bufinu bua tuetu katu’ajimiji to; bualu monayi, mabanji etu atunyemi.
13.34: Monayi, tudi tuteka tshiamua tshia mudimu apa ne malaba tshidi tshijimina; ne monayi miela yetu ya mvita idi mitunyenga mu dituku tuyikeba bua kuluangana mvita.
13.35: Eyowa, tuakasokoka biuma bietu ne biakatufinuka, bua mulawu wa mu bulaba.
13.36: Ô bu tuetu bakudimuna mutshima mu dituku diakalua dîyi dia Mukalenga kutudi; bualu monayi bulaba budi butshipibua, ne bintu bionsu bidi bilua ne bufinu, ne katuena mua kubilama to.
13.37: Monayi, nyuma mibi idi mitunyungulula, eyowa, banjelu ba udi ukeba bua kufuisha anyima yetu badi batunyungulula ku mpenga yonsu. Monayi, malu mabi etu adi makola. Ô Mukalenga, kuena mua kumbusha tshiji tshieba kutudi anyi? Ne ewu neikala ngakuilu wenu mu matuku awu.
13.38: Kadi monayi, matuku enu a kutêtshibua akadi mapita; nuvua bapumbisha dituku dia lupandu luenu tô ne padidi dipita bua kashidi, ne dibutuka dienu didi dia bushuwa; eyowa, bualu mu matuku onsu a moyo wenu nuakakeba tshinuvua kanuyi mua kupeta to; ne nuakakeba musangelu ku dienza dia malu mabi, tshintu tshidi tshishilangana ne buikadi bua buakana ebu budi munda mua Mfumu wetu munena ne wa Tshiendelela.
13.39: Ô nuenu bantu ba pa bulaba, telejayi mêyi anyi! Ne ndi nsambila ne tshiji tshia Mukalenga tshiumbuka kunudi, ne nukudimuna mutshima ne nupandishibua.

14.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne Samuele, Muena Lamana, wakamba mêyi a buprofete pa malu manena a bungi avua kâyi mua kufundibua to.
14.2: Ne monayi, wakabambila ne: Monayi, ndi nupesha tshimanyinu; bualu bua bidimu bitanu bikuabu nebipita, ne monayi, pashisha Muana wa Nzambi nealua bua kusungila bonsu bitabuja mu dîna dienda abu.
14.3: Ne monayi, nennupesha tshimanyinu etshi bua diba dia dilua dienda; bualu monayi, nekuikala bukenka bukola mu diûlu, mua ne butuku kumpala kua yeya kulua kakuakuikala mîdima to, mua ne nebimueneka kudi bantu bu ne badi mundamunya.
14.4: Bua nanku, nekuikala dituku dimua ne butuku bumua ne dituku dimua, bikala bu mudi dituku dimua ne kakuyi butuku to; ne etshi netshikala kunudi bu mudi tshimanyinu; bualu nenumanya papatuka diba ne pabueladi kabidi; bua nanku nebamanya bushuwa ne matuku abidi ne butuku bumua; nansha nanku butuku kabuakuila to; ne nebuikala butuku bua kumpala kua yeya kuledibua.
14.5: Ne monayi, mutotu mupia-mupia neupatuka, unudi kanuyi banji kumona to; ne etshi netshikala kabidi tshimanyinu kunudi.
14.6: Ne monayi ebi ki mbionsu to, nekuikala bimanyinu ne malu a dikema bia bungi mu diûlu.
14.7: Ne nebilua ne nenukatshila bonsu, ne nenukema, mua ne nenupona panshi.
14.8: Ne nebilua ne ewu yonsu witabuja Muana wa Nzambi, nyeya mena neapeta moyo wa kashidi.
14.9: Ne monayi, ki muakampesha Mukalenga mukenji, kudi muanjelu wenda, ne ndua ne nnuambila bualu ebu; eyowa, udi mumpesha mukenji ne ngamba mêyi a buprofete pa malu â kunudi; eyowa, udi mungambila ne: Bila kudi bantu aba ne, kudimunayi mutshima ne longololayi njila wa Mukalenga.
14.10: Ne mpindiewu, bualu ndi Muena Lamana, ne ndi munuambila mêyi adi Mukalenga mumpeshila mukenji, ne bualu adi makola kunudi, nudi numfîkila tshiji ne nudi nukeba bua kunshipa, ne nuakangipata munkatshi muenu.
14.11: Ne nenumvua mêyi anyi, bualu, bua dijinga edi ndi mubanda pa bimanu bia tshimenga etshi, bua numvua ne numanya bitungu bia Nzambi binuindila bua malu mabi enu, ne bua numanya kabidi mikenji ya dikudimuna dia mutshima;
14.12: Ne kabidi ne numanya bua dilua dia Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, Tatu wa diûlu ne wa buloba, Mufuki wa bintu bionsu kumbukila ku mbangilu; ne numanya bimanyinu bia dilua dienda, bua dijinga dia ne nuitabuja mu dîna dienda.
14.13: Ne binuitabuja mu dîna dienda nenukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenu yonsu, nanku bua nupeta dilekedibua diayi kupitshila ku makumbanyinyi enda.
14.14: Ne monayi, kabidi, ndi nupesha tshimanyinu tshikuabu, eyowa, tshimanyinu tshia lufu luenda.
14.15: Bualu monayi, bushuwa udi ne tshia kufua bua lupandu lulua; eyowa, budiyi nabu ne tshidi tshikengela mbua ne afua, bua kuvuija dibîka ku lufu dia bafua, nanku bua bantu batuadibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga.
14.16: Eyowa, monayi, lufu elu ludi lutuala dibîka, ne ludi lusungila bukua bantu bonsu ku lufu lua kumpala—lufu lua nyuma alu; bualu bukua bantu bonsu, ku dipona dia Adama bikala bakoshibua ku mpala kua Mukalenga, badi bikala bu bafua, bubidi bua malu a mu mubidi ne a malu a mu nyuma.
14.17: Kadi monayi, dibîka dia Kilisto ku lufu didi disungila bukua bantu, eyowa, mena bukua bantu bonsu, ne didi dibapingaja ku mpala kua Mukalenga.
14.18: Eyowa, ne didi dituala mukenji wa dikudimuna dia mutshima, bua ne ewu yonsu udi ukudimuna mutshima yeya kena upudibua ne wedibua mu kapia to; kadi ewu yonsu udi kayi ukudimuna mutshima to udi upudibua ne wedibua mu kapia; ne lufu lua nyuma ludi lubaluila kabidi, eyowa, lufu luibîdi, bualu badi bakoshibua kabidi bua malu adi matangila buakana.
14.19: Bua nanku kudimunayi mutshima, kudimunayi mutshima, bua mu dimanya dia bintu ebi ne kanuyi nubienza, kanudilekedi bua kulua mu dipîshibua to, ne nutulukibua ku lufu luibîdi elu.
14.20: Kadi monayi, bu mungakanuambila bitangila tshimanyinu tshikuabu, tshimanyinu tshia lufu luenda, monayi, mu dituku diakengaye lufu, diba nedifîkishibua ne nedibenga bua kunupesha bukenka buadi; ne kabidi ngondu ne mitoto; ne kakuakuikala bukenka pa mpala wa bulaba ebu to, mena katshia ku tshikondu tshiafuaye, bua mutantshi wa matuku asatu, tô ne tshikondu tshiajukaye kabidi ku bafua.
14.21: Eyowa, tshikondu tshiakulaye moyo nekuikala makubakuba ne mipenyi bua mutantshi wa meba a bungi, ne buloba nebunyungana ne nebuzakala; ne mbuebua idi pa mpala wa buloba ebu, idi pa mutu pa buloba ne idi muinshi, inudi bamanya ne idi milamakana mpindiewu, anyi tshitupa tshiayi tshinena tshidi tshilamakana pamua, neipanduluka;
14.22: Eyowa, neapanduluka mu bitupa bibidi, ne nebâsanga kunyima kua apu mu mapandika ne mu mitanta, ne mu bipesa pa mpala wa buloba bujima, eyowa, bionsu pa mutu ne muinshi mua buloba.
14.23: Ne monayi, nekuikala tshipepela tshikola, ne mikuna ya bungi neikuluka panshi, bu mudi tshibanda, ne nekuikala miaba ya bungi idibu babikila mpindiewu ne bibanda yalua mikuna, mipita bula.
14.24: Ne bibeba bia bungi nebikoseka, ne bimenga binena bia bungi nebishala bitupu.
14.25: Ne nkita ya bungi neikanguka, ne neipatula bafua bayi ba bungi; ne bansantu ba bungi nebamueneka kudi bantu ba bungi.
14.26: Ne monayi, ki muakangambila muanjelu nanku; bualu wakangambila ne nekuikala makubakuba ne mipenyi bua mutantshi wa meba a bungi.
14.27: Ne wakangambila ne pikala makubakuba ne mipenyi biela, ne tshipepela, ne bintu ebi nebikalaku, ne wakamba ne mîdima neibuikila mpala wa buloba bujima bua mutantshi wa matuku asatu.
14.28: Ne muanjelu wakangambila ne ba bungi nebamona bintu binena bipita ebi, bua dijinga dia ne bitabuja ne bimanyinu ebi ne malu a dikema â nebilua pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba ebu, bua kipatshila ka ne kakuikadi bualu bua dipanga ditabuja munkatshi mua bana ba bantu to—
14.29: Ne ebi mu dijinga ne bonsu bitabuja bapandishibua, ne bonsu badi kabayi bitabuja, tshitungu tshiakana tshilua pa mutu pabu; ne kabidi biapîshibuabu badi badituadila pa mutu pabu dipîshibua diabu nkayabu.
14.30: Ne mpindiewu vulukayi, vulukayi, bana betu, ne ewu yonsu udi ufua, udi udifuisha nkayenda; ne ewu yonsu udi wenza malu a bubi, udi udienzelawu nkayenda; bualu monayi, nudi badisuila; nudi ne dianyisha dia kudienzela nkayenu; bualu monayi, Nzambi udi munupesha dimanya ne munuenza badisuila.
14.31: Udi munupesha bua ne nujingulula buimpa ku bubi, ne udi munupesha bua ne nusungula moyo anyi lufu; ne nudi mua kuenza buimpa ne kupingajibua ku tshidi tshimpa, anyi ne kuenza ne tshidi tshimpa tshipingajibua kunudi; anyi nudi mua kuenza bubi, ne kuenza ne tshidi tshibi tshipingajibua kunudi.

15.1: Ne mpindiewu, bana betu bananga, monayi, ndi nnumanyisha ne pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima nzubu yenu neinushala mitupu.
15.2: Eyowa, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima, bakaji benu nebikala ne bualu bua kudidila mu dituku dikalabu bâmuisha bana; bualu nenuidikija bua kunyema ne kakuakuikala muaba nansha umua wa kusokomena to; eyowa, ne diakabi kudi badi bikala ne mafu, bualu nebikala ne bujitu ne kabayi mua kunyema to; bua nanku, nebadiatshîbua ne nebashiyibua bafua.
15.3: Eyowa, diakabi kudi bantu aba badibu babikila ne Bena Nefi pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima, pâmonabu bimanyinu ebi ne malu a dikema bionsu bialejibua kudibu; bualu monayi, bavua bikala bantu basungula kudi Mukalenga; eyowa, uvua munanga bantu ba Nefi, ne kabidi uvua mubapesha dinyoka; eyowa, mu matuku a malu abu mabi uvua mubapesha dinyoka bualu uvua mubananga.
15.4: Kadi monayi bana betu, udi mukina Bena Lamana bualu bienzedi biabu bivua bikala bibi diba dionsu, ne bivua nanku bua malu mabi a ngenzelu wa batatuabu. Kadi monayi, lupandu ludi lulua kudibu kupitshila ku diyisha dia kudi Bena Nefi; ne bua kipatshila aka Mukalenga wakalepesha matuku abu.
15.5: Ne ndi musua ne numona ne tshitupa tshiabu tshinena tshidi tshienza mudimu wabu, ne badi benda ne kudilama kumpala kua Nzambi, ne badi badienzeja bua kulama mikenji yenda ne mikandu yenda ne mêyi enda bilondeshila ku mikenji ya Mose.
15.6: Eyowa, ndi nnuambila, ne tshitupa tshinena tshiabu tshidi tshienza nanku, ne badi benza muabu monsu ne dinanukila kabayi batshioka to bua bafikisha tshishadila tshia bana babu ku dimanya dia bulelela; bua nanku kudi ba bungi bavua badikumbaja ku bungi buabu dituku dionsu.
15.7: Ne monayi, nudi bamanya nuenu nkayenu, bualu nuvua badimuenatshi ne, bonsu babu bakafika ku dimanya dia bulelela, ne ku dimanya dia ngenzelu mibi ne ya malu a bubi bupita ya batatuabu, ne badi balombodibua ku ditabuja mifundu ya tshijila, eyowa, mêyi a buprofete a baprofete bansantu, adi mafundibua, adi abalombola ku ditabuja dia Mukalenga, ne ku dikudimuna dia mutshima, ditabuja ne dikudimuna dia mutshima bidi bibatuadila dishintuluka dia mutshima—
15.8: Nanku, bonsu badi balua ku dimanya dia bulelela ebu, nudi bamanya nuenu nkayenu ne badi bakamakana ne basuminyina mu ditabuja, ne mu tshintu tshivuabu benjibua badikadila.
15.9: Ne nudi bamanya kabidi ne bakajîka biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne badi batshina bua kubiambula ne mu mushindu mukuabu kabalu kuenza mibi to; eyowa, nudi mua kumona mudibu batshina bua kuenza mibi—bualu monayi nebadilekela bua bena lukuna babu babadiata ne babashipa, ne kabakujula miela yabu ya mvita bua kubaluisha to, ne nanku bua ditabuja diabu mu Kilisto.
15.10: Ne mpindiewu, bua disuminyina diabu padibu bitabuja tshintu tshidibu bitabuja, bualu bua dikamakana diabu pakamanabu kuengejibua, monayi, Mukalenga neababenesha ne nealepesha matuku abu, nansha bua malu mabi abu—
15.11: Eyowa, nansha bobu bashinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja Mukalenga nealepesha matuku abu, tô ne pâlua tshikondu tshivua batatuetu bamba, ne kabidi muprofete Zenose, ne baprofete bakuabu ba bungi, bitangila dipingaja dia bana betu, Bena Lamana, kabidi ku dimanya dia bulelela—
15.12: Eyowa, ndi nnuambila, ne mu bikondu bia ku ndekelu milayi ya Mukalenga ivua mifidibua kudi bana betu, Bena Lamana; ne nansha bua ntatu ya bungi ikalabu nayi, ne nansha pânyemeshibuabu ku muaba ne ku muaba pa mpala wa buloba, ne pîpatshibuabu, ne pâtûtshibuabu ne pâtangalajibuabu kula, ne kabayi ne muaba wa kusokomena to, Mukalenga neikala ne lusa kudibu.
15.13: Ne ebi bidi bilondeshila ku dîyi dia buprofete, ne nebafikishibua kabidi ku dimanya dilelela, didi dikala dimanya dia Musungidi wabu, ne mulami wa mikoku wabu munena ne mulelela, ne nebabadibua munkatshi mua mikoku yenda.
15.14: Bua nanku ndi nnuambila ne, nebikala bimpa buabu kupita buenu pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima.
15.15: Bualu monayi, bu midimu minena yakanulejabu mikala mibaleja, eyowa, bobu badi bashinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja bua ngumvuilu ya batatuabu, nudi mua kudimuena ne kabavua kabidi kushinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja to.
15.16: Bua nanku, Mukalenga udi wamba ne: Ntshiakubabutula bonsu to, kadi nengenza ne mu dituku dia lungenyi luanyi nebapingana kabidi kundi, mudi Mukalenga wamba.
15.17: Ne mpindiewu monayi, Mukalenga udi wamba, bua bantu ba Bena Nefi, ne: Pikalabu kabayi bakudimuna mutshima, ne kabayi badienzeja bua kuenza disua dianyi to, nembabutula bonsu, ki mudi Mukalenga wamba nanku, bua dipanga ditabuja diabu nansha bua midimu minena ya bungi imvua muenza munkatshi muabu; ne bushuwa bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo bintu ebi nebienzeka, Mukalenga udi wamba.

16.1: Ne mpindiewu, biakalua ne kuvua ba bungi bakumvua mêyi a Samuele, Muena Lamana, akambaye pa tshimanu tshia tshimenga. Ne bonsu bakitabuja mêyi enda bakaya ne bakakeba Nefi; ne pakaluabu ne pakamupetabu bakamutondela mibi yabu ne kabakavila to, ne bakajinga ne batambuishibua bua Mukalenga.
16.2: Kadi bonsu bavuaku bavua kabayi bitabuja mêyi a Samuele to bakamufîkila tshiji; ne bakamuasa mabua pa tshimanu, ne ba bungi bakamuasa kabidi miketa pavuaye muimana pa tshimanu; kadi Nyuma wa Mukalenga uvua nenda, mua ne mabua abu anyi miketa kabivua mua kumutûta to.
16.3: Mpindiewu pakamonabu ne kabivua mua kumutûta to, kuvua ba bungi bakitabuja mêyi enda, mua ne bakaya kudi Nefi bua kutambuishibua.
16.4: Bualu monayi, Nefi uvua utambuisha, ne wamba mêyi a buprofete, ne uyisha, ubila kudi bantu bua bakudimuna mutshima, uleja bimanyinu bidi malu a dikema, wenza bishima munkatshi mua bantu, bua bamanya ne Kilisto udi ulua katataka—
16.5: Ubambila bintu bivua ne tshia kulua katataka, bua bamanya ne bavuluka diba dia dilua diabi ne bakavua badianjila kubamanyishabi, bua dijinga dia ne bitabuja; bua nanku bonsu bakitabuja mêyi a Samuele bakaya kudiye bua kutambuishibua, bualu bakalua bakudimuna mutshima ne batonda mibi yabu.
16.6: Kadi tshitupa tshiabu tshinena katshiakitabuja mêyi a Samuele to; bua nanku pakamonabu ne kabavua mua kumutûta ne mabua abu ne miketa yabu to, bakabila kudi tupita tuabu, bamba ne: Kuatayi muntu ewu ne musuikayi, bualu monayi udi ne nyuma wa diabulu; ne bua bukola bua nyuma wa diabulu udi munda muenda katuena mua kumutûta ne mabua etu ne miketa yetu to; bua nanku mukuatayi ne musuikayi, ne ndayi nenda.
16.7: Ne bu muvuabu baya bua kumutua bianza, monayi, wakadiela panshi pa tshimanu, ne wakanyema kupatukaye mu malaba abu, eyowa, ne wakaya mena ku ditunga dienda, ne wakabanga kuyisha ne kuamba mêyi a buprofete munkatshi mua bantu benda.
16.8: Ne monayi, kabakumvua kabidi bualu buenda munkatshi mua Bena Nefi to; ne ki muvua malu a bantu nanku.
16.9: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshisambombo tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.
16.10: Ne ki muakajika kabidi tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshia muanda muteketa tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi nanku, tshitupa tshinena tshia bantu tshikala tshishala ne diditambisha ne bubi buabu, ne tshitupa tshikesa tshikala tshienda ne kudilama kumpala kua Nzambi.
16.11: Ne ebi bionsu bivua muvua malu kabidi, mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshia muanda mukulu tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
