16.12: Ne kuvua amu dikudimuka dikesa mu malu a bantu, amu pa kumbusha ne bantu bakabanga kupapishibua bikola mu malu mabi, ne kuenza malu mapita ne mapita avua mashilangana ne mikenji ya Nzambi, mu tshidimu tshia makumi muanda mukulu ne tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi.
16.13: Kadi biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi, kuvua bimanyinu binena biakapesha Nzambi bantu, ne malu a dikema; ne mêyi a baprofete akabanga kukumbajibua.
16.14: Ne banjelu bakamuenekela bantu, bantu ba lungenyi, ne bakabamanyisha mukenji mulenga wa disanka dinena; nanku mu tshidimu etshi mifundu ya Nzambi yakabanga kukumbajibua.
16.15: Nansha nanku, bantu bakabanga kupapisha mitshima yabu, bonsu amu pa kumbusha tshitupa tshiabu tshivua tshitabuja bikola ku Bena Nefi kadi kabidi ku Bena Lamana, ne bakabanga kueyemena ku bukola buabu nkayabu ne ku lungenyi luabu nkayabu, bamba ne:
16.16: bimua bintu bia ku bivuabu batshinka bidi bilelela; kadi monayi, tudi bamanya ne midimu yonsu minena ne ya dikema ivuabu bamba eyi kayena mua kuenzeka to.
16.17: Ne bakabanga kunana meji ne kukokangana munkatshi muabu, bamba ne:
16.18: Kabiena ne bua nsongu to bua ne muntu bu mudi Kilisto alua; pikalabi nanku, ne bu yeya muikala Muana wa Nzambi, Tatu wa diûlu ne wa buloba, bu muvuabi biamba, bua tshinyi kena udileja kutudi mushindu umua ne bikala ku Yelushalema?
16.19: Eyowa, bua tshinyi kena udileja mu bulaba ebu to bu mudiyi udileja mu bulaba bua Yelushalema?
16.20: Kadi monayi, tudi bamanya ne etshi tshidi ngumvuilu mubi, uvua mutushila kudi batatuetu, bua kutuenzeja ne tuitabuja bumua bualu bunena ne bua dikema bualua, kadi kabuyi munkatshi muetu to, kadi mu bulaba budi kula, bulaba butudi katuyi bamanya to; bua nanku badi mua kutushiya mu dipanga, bualu katuena mua kudimuena ne mesu etu nkayetu ne bidi bilelela to.
16.21: Ne nebenza, ku midimu ya budimu ne ya malu masokoka ya muena bubi, amua bualu busokoka bunena butudi katuyi mua kumvua to, tshintu tshia tulama panshi bua kuikala benji mudimu ba mêyi abu, ne kabidi benji mudimu babu, bualu tudi beyemena kudibu bua kutulongeshabu dîyi; ne kabidi basadidi babu, bualu bua tudi babalamata bua kutulongesha dîyi; ne nanku nebatushiya mu dipanga patuadifila kudibu, matuku onsu a moyo wetu.
16.22: Ne bantu bakela meji mu mitshima yabu bua bia bungi bipita, bivua bikala bia bupota ne bia tshianana; ne bavua basaluka bikola, bualu bua Satana wakabasonsola ku dienza dia malu mabi misangu yonsu; eyowa, uvua wendakana mu kutangalaja ngumu ya mafi ne makokangana pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, bua ne apapisha mitshima ya bantu ku bualu buimpa ne ku bualu bualua.
16.23: Ne nansha bu muvua bimanyinu ne malu a dikema bienzejibua munkatshi mua bantu ba Mukalenga, ne bishima bia bungi biakenzabu, Satana wakakuata mitshima ya bantu bikola pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba.
16.24: Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema tshia dikôkesha dia balumbuluishi pa mutu pa bantu ba Nefi nanku.
16.25: Ne ki muakajika mukanda wa Helamana nanku, bilondeshila ku miandiku ya Helamana ne bana benda ba baluma.

1.intro: Ne Helamana uvua muikala muana wa Helamana, uvua muikala muana wa Alama, uvua muikala muana wa Alama, uvua muikala kankanunuina ka Nefi uvua muikala muana wa Lehi, wakapatuka mu Yelushalema mu tshidimu tshia kumpala tshia bumfumu bua Sedekiya, mfumu wa mu bulaba bua Yuda.
1.1: Mpindiewu biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshimua tshiakapita ne kukavu bidimu nkama isambombo katshia ku tshikondu tshiakumbuka Lehi ku Yelushalema; ne tshivua tshidimu tshivua Lakoneuse muikala mulumbuluishi munena ne ngovena mu bulaba.
1.2: Ne Nefi, muana wa Helamana, wakumbuka ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne uvua mupesha muanenda wa baluma Nefi, uvua muikala muana wa kumpala wenda wa baluma, bujitu bua bitata bia tshiamua tshia kalabi, ne miandiku yonsu ivua milamibua, ne bintu bionsu bivua bilamibua ne tshijila katshia ku diumbuka dia Lehi ku Yelushalema.
1.3: Pashisha wakumbuka ku bulaba, ne muntu kena mumanya kua kuakayaye to; ne muanenda Nefi wakalama miandiku pa muaba wenda, eyowa, miandiku ya bantu aba.
1.4: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshibîdi, monayi, mêyi a buprofete a baprofete akabanga kukumbajibua bikola bipita kabidi; bualu kuakabanga kuenzeka bimanyinu binena ne bishima binena munkatshi mua bantu.
1.5: Kadi kuvua bamua bantu bakabanga kuamba ne diba dikavua dipita bua miaku ivua Samuele, Muena Lamana, kukumbajibuaye.
1.6: Ne bakabanga kusanka baseka bana babu, bamba ne: Monayi dikadi dipita, ne miaku ya Samuele kayena mikumbajibua to; bua nanku, disanka dienu ne ditabuja dienu bitangila bualu ebu bivua bia tshianana.
1.7: Ne biakalua ne bakenza diyoyi dikola mu bulaba bonsu; ne bantu bakitabuja bakabanga kunyingalala bikola, ne mu mushindu mukuabu malu â avua mamba ka’alu kufika.
1.8: Kadi monayi, bakindila ne disuminyina dituku adi, ne butuku abu, ne dituku adi bikala bu dituku dimua bikala bu ne kakuvua butuku to, bua bamanya ne ditabuja diabu kadivua tshianana to.
1.9: Mpindiewu biakalua ne kuvua dituku ditekibua ku luseka kudi bavua kabayi bitabuja to, bua ne bonsu bavua bitabuja ngumvuilu ayi nebashipibua pa kumbusha tshimanyinu tshilua, tshivua tshipeshibua kudi muprofete Samuele.
1.10: Mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamona Nefi, muana wa baluma wa Nefi, bubi bua bantu benda ebu, mutshima wenda wakanyingalala menamena.
1.11: Ne biakalua ne wakaya ne wakinama pa buloba, ne wakabila ne bukitu kudi Nzambi wenda mu dîna dia bantu benda, eyowa, bavua pabuipi ne kushipibua bua ditabuja diabu dia ngumvuilu wa batatuabu abu.
1.12: Ne biakalua ne wakabila ne bukitu kudi Mukalenga dituku adi dijima; ne monayi, dîyi dia Mukalenga diakalua kudiye, diamba ne:
1.13: Ambulula mutu weba ne sangala; bualu mona, tshikondu tshidi pabuipi, ne butuku ebu tshimanyinu netshipeshibua, ne malaba ndi ndua pa buloba, bua kuleja ba pa buloba ne nenkumbaja bionsu bimvua muakuishisha ku mukana mua baprofete banyi bansantu.
1.14: Monayi, ndi ndua kudi banyi nkayanyi, bua kukumbaja bintu bionsu bimvua mumanyisha kudi bana ba bantu kumbukila ku tshishimikidi tshia buloba, ne bua kuenza disua, bubidi buadi dia Tatu ne dia Muana—dia Tatu bua bualu buanyi, ne dia Muana bua bualu bua musunyi wanyi. Ne monayi, tshikondu tshidi pabuipi, ne butuku ebu tshimanyinu netshipeshibua.
1.15: Ne biakalua ne mêyi akalua kudi Nefi akakumbajibua, bilondeshila bu muvuawu mamba; bualu monayi, ku dibuela dia diba kakuvua mîdima to; ne bantu bakabanga kukema bualu kakuvua mîdima pakîla butuku to.
1.16: Ne kuvua ba bungi, bavua kabayi bitabuja mêyi a baprofete to, bakapona panshi ne bakalua bu ne bavua bafua, bualu bua bakamanya ne bulongolodi bunena bua dibutula buvuabu bateka bua bavua bitabuja mêyi a baprofete buvua bunyanguka; bualu tshimanyinu tshivua tshipeshibua tshikavu pabuipi.
1.17: Ne bakabanga kumanya ne Muana wa Nzambi uvua ne tshia kumueneka katataka; eyowa, mu tshikosu, bantu bonsu ba pa mpala wa buloba bujima kubangila ku wesete tô ne ku esete, mu bulaba bua ku node ne mu bulaba bua ku sude, bakakema menamena bua ne bakapona panshi.
1.18: Bualu bavua bamanya ne baprofete bavua bajadika bua bintu ebi bidimu bia bungi, ne tshimanyinu tshivua tshifidibua tshikavu pabuipi; ne bakabanga kutshina bua malu mabi abu ne dipanga ditabuja diabu.
1.19: Ne biakalua ne kakuvua mîdima butuku bujima abu to, kadi kuvua bukenka bu mudi diba dia mujalamu. Ne biakalua ne diba diakapatuka mu dinda kabidi, bilondeshila ku mushindu wadi; ne bakamanya ne divua dituku dialedibua Mukalenga, bua tshimanyinu tshivua tshifidibua.
1.20: Ne biakalua ne, eyowa, malu onsu, kaleta konsu, bilondeshila ku mêyi a baprofete.
1.21: Ne biakalua kabidi ne mutotu mupia-mupia wakamueneka, bilondeshila ku muaku.
1.22: Ne biakalua ne katshia ku tshikondu etshi kuakabanga kuikala mafi matuma munkatshi mua bantu, kudi Satana, bua kupapisha mitshima yabu, bua kipatshila ka ne kabitabuji bimanyinu ne malu a dikema bivuabu bamona abi to; kadi nansha muvuaku mafi ne didinga ebi tshitupa tshinena tshia bantu tshiakitabuja, ne bakakakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga.
1.23: Ne biakalua ne Nefi ne bakuabu kabidi ba bungi bakaya munkatshi mua bantu, batambuisha bua dikudimuna dia mutshima, muvua muikala ne dilekedibua dinena dia mibi. Ne ki muakabanga bantu kupeta kabidi ditalala mu bulaba nanku.
1.24: Ne kakuvua makokangana to, amu pa kumbusha bantu bakesa bakabanga kuyisha, bakeba bua kujadika ne mifundu ya Nzambi ne kabitshivua bikengedibua kabidi bua kulama mikenji ya Mose to. Mpindiewu bakenza bakapambuka mu bualu ebu, bua kabavua bumvua mifundu ya Nzambi to.
1.25: Kadi biakalua ne bakakudimuna moyo katataka, ne bakitabujijibua bitangila ditupakana divuabu nâdi, bualu biakamanyishibua kudibu ne mikenji kayivua mianji kukumbajibua to, ne idi ne bua kukumbajibua ku katupa konsu; eyowa, dîyi diakalua kudibu ne idi ne bua kukumbajibua; eyowa, ne nansha kaleta anyi katoba kamua kabiakujimina to, tô ne pakumbajibuayi yonsu; bua nanku mu tshidimu tshia momumua etshi bakafika ku dimanya dia ditupakana diabu ne bakatonda bilema biabu.
1.26: Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshibîdi nanku, tshituadila bantu mukenji mulenga bua bimanyinu biakenzeka, bilondeshila ku mêyi a buprofete a baprofete bonsu bansantu.
1.27: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshisâtu tshiakapita kabidi mu ditalala, amu pa kumbusha kabiyi bua banyengi ba Gadiantona, bavua basomba mu mikuna, bavua buwula mu bulaba; bualu bua miaba yabu mikolesha ne miaba yabu ya musokoku ivua mikala mikola bikola bua ne bantu kabavua mua kubatamba bukola to; ki bua bualu kayi bakashibeya bantu ba bungi, ne bakatapa bikola munkatshi mua bantu.
1.28: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshinâyi bakabanga kuvula mu tshipimu tshinena, bualu kuvua batapuluki ba bungi ba Bena Nefi bakanyemena kudibu, tshiakapesha Bena Nefi bakashala mu bulaba kanyinganyinga ka bungi.
1.29: Ne kuvua kabidi tshiena bualu tshiakenzeja kanyinganyinga ka bungi munkatshi mua Bena Lamana; bualu monayi, bavua ne bana ba bungi bakakola ne bakabanga kubandila mu bidimu, bua ne bakavua badiangatshila bujitu buabu nkayabu, ne bakapambuishibua kudi bamua bavua Bena Zolama, ku mafi abu ne ku lubombu luabu, bua kudisangishabu kudi banyengi ba Gadiantona.
1.30: Ne nanku ki muakatatshishibua Bena Lamana pabu, ne bakabanga kukepela mu ditabuja ne buakana buabu, bua bubi bua lukongu lua bantu luvua lulua.

2.1: Ne biakalua ne ki muakapita kabidi tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshitânu nanku, ne bantu bakabanga kupua moyo bimanyinu ne malu a dikema bivuabu bumvua, ne bakabanga kuikala ku kakesa ku kakesa kabayi bakema bua tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua dikema bidi bifumina mu diûlu to, mua ne bakabanga kupapa mu mitshima yabu, ne kufofoma mu meji abu, ne bakabanga kubenga kuitabuja bionsu bivuabu bumvua ne bamona—
2.2: Bakela amua meji a tshianana mu mitshima yabu, ne bantu bakapetela bimanyinu ne malu a kukema ku bukola bua diabulu, bua kupambuisha ne kudinga mitshima ya bantu; ne ki muakakuata kabidi Satana mitshima ya bantu nanku, mua ne wakafofomija mesu abu ne wakabapambula bua bitabuja ne dilongesha dia Kilisto divua tshintu tshipota ne tshia tshianana.
2.3: Ne biakalua ne bantu bakabanga kukolakana mu bubi ne mu malu mapita bubi; ne kabakitabuja ne bimanyinu anyi malu a dikema bivua kabidi mua kufidibua to; ne Satana uvua wendakana, mu kupambuisha mitshima ya bantu, mu kubatêta ne kubenzeja ne benza bubi bua bungi mu bulaba.
2.4: Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi tshitema ne tshisambombo nanku; ne tshia makumi tshitema ne muanda muteketa kabidi; ne tshia makumi tshitema ne muanda mukulu kabidi; ne tshia makumi tshitema ne tshitema kabidi;
2.5: Ne kabidi bidimu lukama bivua bipita katshia ku matuku a Mosiya, uvua muikala mfumu ku mutu kua bantu Bena Nefi.
2.6: Ne bidimu nkama isambombo ne tshitema bivua bipita katshia Lehi umbuka ku Yelushalema.
2.7: Ne bidimu tshitema bivua bipita katshia ku tshikondu tshivua tshimanyinu tshifidibua, tshivua baprofete bamba ne, Kilisto nealua pa buloba.
2.8: Mpindiewu Bena Nefi bakabanga kubala diba diabu katshia ku tshikondu etshi tshivua tshimanyinu tshifidibua, anyi katshia ku dilua dia Kilisto; bua nanku, bidimu tshitema bivua bipita.
2.9: Ne Nefi, uvua muikala tatuenda wa Nefi, uvua ne bujitu bua miandiku, kakapingana ku bulaba bua Zalahemela to, ne kabakamusangana muaba nansha umua to mu bulaba bonsu.
2.10: Ne biakalua ne bantu batshiakashala mu bubi, nansha muvuaku mayisha a bungi ne mêyi a buprofete a bungi avua Nzambi mutuma munkatshi muabu; ne ki muakapita kabidi tshidimu tshia dikumi; ne tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimua tshiakapita kabidi mu malu mabi.
2.11: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshisatu kuakabanga kuikala mvita ne makokangana mu bulaba bonsu; bualu banyengi ba Gadiantona bakavua balua bapita bungi, ne bakashipa bantu bipita bungi, ne bakabutula bimenga bia bungi, ne bakatangalaja lufu lupita bungi ne dishipangana mu bulaba bonsu, bua ne biakakengedibua ne bantu bonsu, Bena Nefi ne Bena Lamana bambula biluilu bia mvita bua kubaluisha.
2.12: Bua nanku, Bena Lamana bonsu bavua bakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga bakadisanga kudi bana babu, Bena Nefi, ne bakabenzeja bua kuambula biluilu bia mvita bua kuluisha banyengi ba Gadiantona abu, bua bukubi bua mioyo yabu ne bua bakaji babu ne bua bana babu, eyowa, ne bua kukuba kabidi manema abu, ne diakalengela dia ekelezia wabu ne ditendelela diabu, ne budikadila buabu ne budishikaminyi buabu.
2.13: Ne biakalua ne kumpala kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshisatu etshi kupitatshi, Bena Nefi bakakanyinyibua ku dibutuka dijima bua bualu bua mvita eyi, ivua milua mikola menamena.
2.14: Ne biakalua ne Bena Lamana bavua badisanga ne Bena Nefi abu bakabala munkatshi mua Bena Nefi;
2.15: Ne mulawu wabu wakumbushibua kudibu, ne dikoba diabu diakalua ditoka bu dia Bena Nefi;
2.16: Ne bansongaluma babu ne bana babu ba bakaji bakalua balenga menamena, ne bakabala munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, ne bakababikila ne Bena Nefi. Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshisatu nanku.
2.17: Ne biakalua ne ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinayi, mvita ya pankatshi pa banyengi ne bantu ba Nefi yakatungunuka ne yakalua mikola menamena; nansha nanku, bantu ba Nefi bakatamba banyengi bukola kakesa, mua ne bakabapingaja panyima ku malaba abu mu mikuna ne mu miaba yabu ya mu musokoku.
2.18: Ne nanku ki muakajika tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinayi. Ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitanu bakalua kuluisha bantu ba Nefi; ne bua bubi bua bantu ba Nefi, ne bua makokangana ne matapuluka abu a bungi, banyengi ba Gadiantona bakabatamba bukola bua bungi.
2.19: Ne nanku ki muakajika tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitanu, ne nanku ki muvua bantu mu ngikadilu wa ntatu ya bungi; ne muela wa mvita wa dibutula uvua mubalembelela pa mutu pabu, mua ne uvua pabuipi ne kubakuluisha panshi, ne ebi bua malu mabi abu.

3.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshisambombo kumbukila ku dilua dia Kilisto, Lakoneuse, ngovena wa mu bulaba, wakapeta mukanda mufumina kudi mulombodi ne ngovena wa tshisumbu etshi tshia banyengi; ne eyi ki miaku ivuayi mufunda:
3.2: Lakoneuse, mutamba bunena ne ngovena munena wa mu bulaba, mona, ndi nkufundila mukanda ewu, ne ndi nkusamuna bikola menamena bua dikamakana dieba, ne kabidi bua dikamakana dia bantu beba, bitangila dikuba dia binudi nutshinka ne bidi bikala bunema ne budishikaminyi buenu; eyowa, nudi nukankamana bimpa, bu ne kudi tshianza tshia umua nzambi kampanda tshidi tshinukuatshisha, bua disungidila dia budishikaminyi buenu, ne dia bintu bienu, ne dia ditunga dienu, anyi dia binudi nubikila nanku.
3.3: Ne bidi bimueneka bibi kundi, mutamba bunena Lakoneuse, bua wewa kuikala mupota ne muditambishi nanku awu bua kutshinka ne nudi mua kukandamena bantu ba dikima ba bungi nanku badi ku bulombodi buanyi, badi mpindiewu bimana ne biluilu biabu bia mvita, ne badi bindila ne mutshima muipi dîyi dia ne: Puekelayi Bena Nefi ne babutulayi.
3.4: Ne mema, bualu ndi mumanya dikima diabu didi kadiyi bua kutshimunyibua to, bualu nkadi mubatêta mu mutumba wa mvita, ne ndi mumanya lukinu luabu lua kashidi kunudi bua malu mabi a bungi anuvua babenzela, bua nanku pikalabu bua kunupuekela, nebanukumbula ne dibutuka dijima.
3.5: Bua nanku ngafundi mukanda ewu, mu kutua tshiala ne tshianza tshianyi nkayanyi, ngela meji bua diakalengela dienu, bua bualu bua dikamakana dienu mu tshinudi nuitabuja ne tshidi tshikala tshiakana atshi, ne nyuma yenu minena mu mpata ya mvita.
3.6: Bua nanku ndi nkufundila, bualu ndi njinga ne nufila bimenga bienu, ne malaba enu, ne bintu bienu kudi bantu banyi aba, pa mutu pa bobu kunukumbula ne muela wa mvita ne dibutuka kunufikila.
3.7: Anyi mu miaku mikuabu, difilayi kutudi, ne disangayi kutudi ne numanya midimu yetu ya mu musokoku, nulua bana betu bua nuikala bu mutudi—kanuyi bapika betu to, kadi bana betu ne tuabanyinangana nuenu bintu bietu bionsu.
3.8: Ne mona, ndi nditshipa kûdi ne mutshipu ne, panuikala kanuyi benza nanku kanuakubutuka to; kadi panuikala kanuyi benza nanku to, ndi nditshipa kûdi ne mutshipu ne ngondu udi ulonda nengela mukenji bua misumba yanyi ya basalayi ipueka bua kunuluisha, ne kalaminyina bianza biabu to ne kabakunuepelesha to, kadi ne binushipa, ne nebalekela muela wa mvita upona pa mitu yenu tô ne panuabutuka.
3.9: Ne mona, ndi Gidiani; ne ndi ngovena wa tshisumbu tshia mu musokoku tshia Gadiantona etshi; tshisumbu ne midimu bindi mumanya ne bidi bimpa; ne mbiaku kala ne bivua bitushila.
3.10: Ne ndi nkufundila mukanda ewu, Lakoneuse, ne ndi ntekemena ne nenufila malaba ne bintu bienu, kakuyi dimatshisha dia mashi to, bua bantu banyi aba, bavua batapuluka kunudi bua bubi buenu bua munua kabanyenga manema abu ne bukalenga buabu, bapetulula manema abu a bukalenga, ne amu nuenu benza nanku, nensombuela malu mabi anuvua babenzela. Ndi Gidiani.
3.11: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakapeta Lakoneuse mukanda ewu wakakema menamena bua dikima divua Gidiani ulomba nâdi bua kuangata bulaba bua Bena Nefi, ne kabidi bua dikanyina dia bantu bua kusombuela bantu bavua kabayi benzela bualu bubi nansha bumua to, amu pa kumbusha ne bavua badienzela bibi bobu nkayabu ku ditapuluka bua kudisangisha kudi bantu babi ne banyengi bena bubi ne ba malu mapita bubi abu.
3.12: Mpindiewu monayi, Lakoneuse ewu, ngovena, uvua muntu mululama, ne kavua bua kumvua bôwa bua milombu ne dikanyina dia munyenganganyi wa bintu to; bua nanku kakumvuila mukanda wa Gidiani, ngovena wa banyengi to, kadi wakenzeja ne bantu benda babila kudi Mukalenga bua bukola bua kudilongolola bua tshikondu tshiabapuekela banyengi.
3.13: Eyowa, wakatuma dimanyisha munkatshi mua bantu bonsu, ne basangisha pamua bakaji babu ne bana babu, bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena biabu, ne bintu biabu bionsu, amu pa kumbusha bulaba buabu, pa muaba umua.
3.14: Ne wakenzeja ne bibaka miaba mikolesha ku mpenga yabu yonsu, ne mujobu wabu wikala mukola menamena. Ne wakenzeja ne bateka misumba ya basalayi, ya Bena Nefi ne ya Bena Lamana, anyi ya bonsu bavuabu babala munkatshi mua Bena Nefi, bu mudi balami ku mpenga yonsu bua kubalama, ne bua ku bakuba kudi banyengi butuku ne munya.
3.15: Eyowa, wakabambila ne: Bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, pa kumbusha nuenu bakudimuna mutshima bua malu mabi enu onsu, ne babila kudi Mukalenga, kanuakupatuishibua mu bianza bia banyengi ba Gadiantona abu to nansha bishi.
3.16: Ne miaku ne mêyi a buprofete a Lakoneuse avua manena ne a dikema bua ne biakapesha bantu bonsu bôwa; ne bakadienzeja ku bukola buabu bua kuenza bilondeshila ku miaku ya Lakoneuse.
3.17: Ne biakalua ne Lakoneuse wakasungula tupita tunena ku mutu kua misumba yonsu ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, bua kubalombola diba diapatuka banyengi mu tshipela bua kubaluisha.
3.18: Mpindiewu kapita kanena kupita munkatshi mua tupita tunena ne komanda munena wa misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi wakasungudibua, ne dîna diaku divua dikala Gidigidoni.
3.19: Mpindiewu tshivua tshibidilu munkatshi mua Bena Nefi tshia kusungula tupita tuabu tunena, (amu pa kumbusha mu tshikondu tshiabu tshia bubi) muntu uvua ne nyuma wa dibuluila ne wa buprofete kabidi; bua nanku, Gidigidoni ewu uvua muprofete munena munkatshi muabu, bu muvuaye kabidi mulumbuluishi munena.
3.20: Mpindiewu bantu bakambila Gidigidoni ne: Sambila kudi Mukalenga, ne tubandayi pa mikuna ne mu tshipela, bua tubunda banyengi ne kubabutula mu malaba abu nkayabu.
3.21: Kadi Gidigidoni wakabambila: Mukalenga mmukandika; bualu tuetu babanda bua kubaluisha, Mukalenga neatufila mu bianza biabu; bua nanku netudilongolola munkatshi-nkatshi mua malaba etu, ne netusangisha misumba yetu ya basalayi yonsu pamua, ne katuakuya kubaluisha to, kadi netuindila tô ne paluabu kutuluisha; bua nanku bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, tuetu benza nanku neabafila mu bianza bietu.
3.22: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshia muanda muteketa, ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu, dimanyisha dia Lakoneuse diakaya pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, ne bakangata tubalu tuabu, ne makalu abu a mvita, ne ngomba yabu, ne bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa biabu bionsu, ne bia bimuna binena biabu, ne nteta yabu, ne bintu biabu bionsu, ne bakâsa luendu mu bisumbu bia binunu ne bia makumi a binunu, tô ne pakayabu bonsu ku muaba uvua musungula bua badisangisha pamua, bua kudisungidilabu kudi bena lukuna babu.
3.23: Ne bulaba buvua busungula buvua bulaba bua Zalahemela, ne buloba buvua buikala pankatshi pa bulaba bua Zalahemela ne bulaba bua Buvula, eyowa, tô ne ku mushonyi uvua pankatshi pa bulaba bua Buvula ne bulaba bua Kabutu.
3.24: Ne kuvua binunu bia bantu bipita bungi bivua bibikidibua ne Bena Nefi, biakadisangisha pamua mu bulaba ebu. Mpindiewu Lakoneuse wakenzeja ne badisangisha pamua mu buloba bua ku sude, bua mulawu mukola uvua pa mutu pa bulaba bua ku node.
3.25: Ne bakadikuba bua kudilama ku bena lukuna babu; ne bakasomba mu bulaba bumua, ne mu tshisumbu tshimua, ne batshina mêyi avua Lakoneuse muakula, mua ne bakakudimuna mutshima bua mibi yabu yonsu; ne bakela masambila abu kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne abapatuisha diba diapatuka bena lukuna babu bua kubaluisha mvita.
3.26: Ne bavua ne kanyinganyinga menamena bua bena lukuna babu. Ne Gidigidoni wakenzeja ne benza biluilu bia mvita bia mushindu yonsu, ne bikala ne makanda ne biluilu, ne ngabu, ne ngabu ya pa maboku, ku mushindu uvuaye mubambila.

4.1: Ne biakalua ne ku nshikidilu kua tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshia muanda mukulu misumba ya basalayi ya banyengi ayi ivua midilongolola bua mvita, yakabanga kupueka ne kulopoka mu tukuna, ne mu mikuna, ne mu tshipela, ne mu miaba yabu mikolesha ne mu miaba yabu ya musokoku, ne bakabanga kuangata malaba, avua mu bulaba bua ku sude ne avua mu bulaba bua ku node, ne bakabanga kuangata malaba onsu avua Bena Nefi bashiya, ne bimenga bivuabu bashiya bitupu.
4.2: Kadi monayi, kakuvua nyama ya mu tshisuku anyi nyama ya dîtu mu malaba awu avua Bena Nefi balekela to, ne kakuvua nyama ya dîtu bua banyengi to amu pa kumbusha mu tshipela.
4.3: Ne banyengi bavua mua kuikala amu mu tshipela, bua dipanga dia biakudia; bualu Bena Nefi bavua bashiya malaba abu matupu, ne bavua basangisha bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena biabu ne bintu biabu bionsu, ne bavua mu tshisumbu tshimua.
4.4: Bua nanku, kakuvua mushindu nansha umua bua banyengi kupawula ne kupeta biakudia to, amu pa kumbusha bua kulua kuluisha Bena Nefi mvita patoka; ne Bena Nefi bavua mu tshisumbu tshimua, ne bualu bavua bikala bungi bupita, ne bavua badilamina biakudia, ne tubalu ne ngomba, ne bisumbu bia bimuna bia mushindu yonsu, bua kudidishabu bua mutantshi wa bidimu muanda muteketa, muvuabu batekemena bua kubutula banyengi pa mpala wa bulaba; ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshia muanda mukulu nanku.
4.5: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema Gidiani wakamona ne bivua bikengedibua bua aya kuluisha Bena Nefi mvita, bualu kakuvua mushindu nansha umua wa bobu kudidisha to amu pa kumbusha bua kupawula ne kunyengangana bintu ne kushibeya bantu.
4.6: Ne kabakidikija kutangalaka pa mpala wa bulaba mua ne bakuna nteta to, bua Bena Nefi kabalu kubabunda ne kubashipa to; bua nanku Gidiani wakapesha misumba yenda ya basalayi mukenji ne mu tshidimu etshi iya kuluisha Bena Nefi mvita.
4.7: Ne biakalua ne bakaya kuluangana mvita, ne bivua mu ngondu muisambombo; ne monayi, dituku diakayabu kuluangana mvita divua dinena ne ditshinyisha; ne bavua bavuala mushindu wa banyengi; ne bavua ne tshiseba tshia muana mukoku tshijingila ku bimonu biabu, ne bavua bakunjijibua mu mashi, ne mitu yabu ivua mikungula, ne bavua bavuala bifulu bia mvita; ne dimueneka dia misumba ya basalayi ya Gidiani divua dimueneka dinena ne ditshinyisha, bua biluilu biabu, ne bua bavua bakunjijibua mu mashi.
4.8: Ne biakalua ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi, pakamonaye muvua musumba wa basalayi wa Gidiani umueneka, yakapona yonsu panshi, ne bakela mbila yabu kudi Mukalenga Nzambi wayi, ne abepelesha ne abapatuisha mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu.
4.9: Ne biakalua ne pakamona misumba ya basalayi ya Gidiani nanku yakabanga kuela mbila ne dîyi dikola, bua disanka diayi, bualu bavua batshinka ne Bena Nefi bavua bapona bua bua bôwa bua luzakalu lukola divua misumba yabu ya basalayi mituala.
4.10: Kadi mu bualu ebu bakateketa maboku, bualu Bena Nefi kabavua bayitshina to, kadi bavua batshina Nzambi wabu ne bavua bamutendekena bua bukubi; bua nanku, pakalua misumba ya basalayi ya Gidiani lubilu kudibu bavua badilongolola bua kutuilangana nabu; eyowa, bakabakidila ne makanda a Mukalenga.
4.11: Ne mvita yakatuadija mu ngondu muisambombo ewu; ne mvita yabu ivua minena ne itshinyisha, eyowa, ne dishibeyengana diabu divua dikola ne ya ditshingisha, mua ne kakuvua kuanji kuikala dishibeyangana dikola nanku to munkatshi mua bantu bonsu ba Lehi katshia umbuka ku Yelushalema.
4.12: Ne nansha dikanyina divua Gidiani mufuna ne mitshipu ivuayi muela, monayi, Bena Nefi bakabatamba mua ne bakapingana kunyima kumpala kuabu.
4.13: Ne biakalua ne Gidigidoni wakafila mukenji ne misumba yenda ya basalayi ibalondakaja tô ne ku mikalu ya tshipela, ne kabepeleshi muntu nansha umua wapona mu bianza biabu mu njila to; ne ki muakabalondakajabu ne muakabashipabu nanku, ku mikalu ya tshipela, mena tô ne muvuabu bakumbaja mukenji wa Gidigidoni.
4.14: Ne biakalua ne bakalondakaja Gidiani, uvua muimana ne muluangana ne dikima, pavuaye unyema; ne bakamukuata ne bakamushipa bualu uvua mupungila bua diluangana dienda dia bungi. Ne ki muvua ndekelu wa Gidiani munyenganganyi wa bintu nanku.
4.15: Ne biakalua ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi yakapingana ku muaba wayi wa bukubi. Ne biakalua ne tshidimu etshi tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshiakapita, ne banyengi kabakalua kabidi kuluangana mvita to; ne kabakalua kabidi mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi to.
4.16: Ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshimua kabakalua bua kuluangana mvita to, kadi bakaluila ku nseka yonsu bua kunyungulula bantu ba Nefi ku mpenga yonsu; bualu bakatshinka ne biakosabu bantu ba Nefi ku malaba abu, ne biabajingilabu ku nseka yonsu, ne biabakosabu ku bintu biabu bionsu bivua bifumina pambelu, bavua mua kubenzeja bua kudifilabu bilondeshila majinga abu.
4.17: Mpindiewu bavua badisunguila mulombodi mukuabu, muena dîna dia Zemenaliha; bua nanku tshivua Zemenaliha wakenzeja bua disombela edi difika.
4.18: Kadi monayi, ebu buvua bualu buimpa bua Bena Nefi; bualu kabivua bikumbana bua banyengi kusomba mutantshi mula bua kuikala ne tshipeta kampanda pa mutu pa Bena Nefi, bua bualu bua biakudia biabu bia bungi bivuabu balama mu tshibutshilu,
4.19: Ne bua bualu bua bukepela bua biakudia munkatshi mua banyengi; bualu monayi, kabavua ne tshintu to amu pa kumbusha munyinyi bua kudia kuabu, munyinyi wakapetabu mu tshipela;
4.20: Ne biakalua ne nyama ya dîtu yakakepela mu tshipela mua ne banyengi bakavua pabuipi ne kufua ne nzala.
4.21: Ne Bena Nefi bavua batungunuka kuya mu munya ne butuku, ne bavua babunda misumba yabu ya basalayi, ne bavua babashipa ku binunu ne ku makumi a binunu.
4.22: Ne nanku bantu ba Zemenaliha bakajinga bua kulekela dijinga, bua lufu lunena luvua lubaluila mu munya ne butuku.
4.23: Ne biakalua ne Zemenaliha wakapesha bantu benda mukenji bua badiumbusha mu disombela, ne baya mu bitupa bia kula bia mu bulaba bua ku node.
4.24: Ne mpindiewu, Gidigidoni bualu uvua mumanya dijinga diabu, ne bualu uvua mumanya buteketa buabu bua dipanga dia biakudia, ne bua dishipeyangana dikola divua dienzeka munkatshi muabu, bua nanku wakatuma misumba yenda ya basalayi mundankulu, ne wakabakosa njila wa ku muaba wabu wa kunyemena, ne wakateka misumba yenda ya basalayi mu njila wabu wa kunyemena.
4.25: Ne bakenza nanku mundankulu, ne bakaya mu luendu luabu kupita muaba uvua banyengi bikala, bua ne pakatshiabu, pakabanga banyengi luendu luabu, bakatuilangana ne misumba ya basalayi ya Bena Nefi kumpala kuabu ne kunyima kuabu.
4.26: Ne banyengi bavua bikala ku sude bavua pabu bakoshibua mu miaba yabu ya kunyemena. Ne bintu bionsu ebi biakenzeka ku bulombodi bua Gidigidoni.
4.27: Ne kuvua banyengi binunu bia bungi bakadifila bu mudi bena lukanu kudi Bena Nefi, ne bakashipa tshishadila tshiabu.
4.28: Ne bakakuata mulombodi wabu, Zemenaliha, ne bakamowa ku mutshi, eyowa, ku katongobela kawu tô ne muakafuaye. Ne pakamowabu tô ne pakafuaye bakûpula mutshi panshi, ne kubila ne dîyi dikola, bamba ne:
4.29: Mukalenga akuba bantu benda mu buakana ne mu bunsantu bua mutshima, bua bupudishibua panshi bonsu bâkeba bua kubashipa bua bukalenga ne bipungidi bia mu musokoku, mena bu muvua muntu ewu mupudibua panshi.
4.30: Ne bakasanka ne kubila kabidi ne dîyi dimua, bamba ne: Nzambi wa Abalahama, ne Nzambi wa Isaka, ne Nzambi wa Yakoba, akuba bantu aba mu buakana, diba dionsu dikalabu babila dîna dia Nzambi wabu bua bukubi.
4.31: Ne biakalua ne bakela mbila, bonsu bu mudi muntu umua, batudika mu kuimba ne mu kusamuna Nzambi wabu bua bualu bunena buvuaye mubenzela, mu dibakuba dia kupona mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu.
4.32: Eyowa, bakabila: Hozana kudi Nzambi Mutamba Bunena. Ne bakabila: Dibeneshibua dikala dîna dia Mukalenga Nzambi wa Bukitu Bonsu, Nzambi Mutamba Bunena.
4.33: Ne mitshima yabu ivua miwula ne disanka, tô ne ku dipatula dia binsonji bia bungi, bua bualu bua buimpa bua Nzambi bua kubapatuisha mu bianza bia bena lukuna babu; ne bavua bamanya ne bivua bua dikudimuna diabu dia mutshima ne didipuekesha diabu ki muakapatuishibuabu mu dibutuka dia kashidi.

5.1: Ne mpindiewu monayi, kakuvua muntu wa moyo nansha umua munkatshi mua bantu ba Bena Nefi bonsu wekela mpata nansha mikesa ku miaku ya baprofete bansantu bonsu bavua bakula to; bualu bavua bamanya ne bivua bikengedibua ne ivua ne tshia kukumbajibua.
5.2: Ne bavua bamanya ne bivua bikengedibua ne Kilisto uvua ne tshia kulua, bua bimanyinu bia bungi bivua bifila, bilondeshila mêyi a baprofete; ne bua bintu bikavua bimana kuenzeka bavua bamanya ne bivua bikengedibua ne bintu bionsu bilua bilondeshila ku bivua biamba.
5.3: Buana nanku bakalekela mibi yabu yonsu, ne malu mapita bubi abu, ne masandi abu, ne bakasadila Nzambi munya ne butuku dinanukila dionsu.
5.4: Ne biakalua ne pakakuatabu banyengi bonsu bena lukanu, mua ne nansha umua uvua kayi mushipa to kakanyema to, bakela bena lukanu babu mu buloko, ne bakenzeja ne babayisha dîyi dia Nzambi; ne bonsu bavua bakudimuna mutshima bua mibi yabu ne babuela mu tshipungidi bua kubenga kushibeya kabidi bantu, bakabalekela.
5.5: Kadi bonsu bavua kabayi babuela mu tshipungidi, ne batshivua batungunuka kuikala ne meji a dishibeya dia bantu mu musokoku adi mu mitshima yabu, eyowa, bonsu bavuabu basangana bakanyina bana babu, bakapîshibua ne kupeshibua dinyoka bilondeshila ku mikenji.
5.6: Ne nanku bakajikija â bipungidi bibi, ne bia mu musokoku, ne bia malu mapita bubi bionsu abi, muvua muikala muenzeka bubi bupita bungi, ne dishibeya dia bantu dipita bungi.
5.7: Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshibîdi nanku, ne tshia makumi abidi ne tshisâtu kabidi, ne tshia makumi abidi ne tshinâyi, ne tshia makumi abidi ne tshitânu; ne ki muakapita bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu nanku.
5.8: Ne kuvua bintu bia bungi bivua bienzeka, mu dimona dia bamua, bivua bikala binena ne bia dikema; nansha nanku, kabena mua kubifunda bionsu mu mukanda ewu to; eyowa, nansha tshitupa tshia lukama tshimua tshia biakenzeka munkatshi mua bantu ba bungi nanku mu mutantshi wa bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu katshivua bua kukumbana mu mukanda ewu to;
5.9: Kadi monayi kudi miandiku idi mikala ne bienzedi bionsu bia bantu aba; ne mulubu muipi bikola kadi mulelela uvua mupeshibua kudi Nefi.
5.10: Bua nanku ndi mufunda miandiku yanyi ya malu â bilondeshila ku miandiku ya Nefi, ivua mikanunyibua pa bitata bivua bibikidibua ne bitata bia Nefi.
5.11: Ne monayi, ndi muenza miandiku eyi pa bitata bimvua muenza ne bianza bianyi nkayanyi.
5.12: Ne monayi, ndi mbikidibua ne Molomo, bualu mvua muinyikila bulaba bua Molomo, mu bulaba muakashikika Alama ekelezia munkatshi mua bantu, eyowa, ekelezia wa kumpala uvuabu bashikika munkatshi muabu kunyima kua disambuka dia mikenji diabu.
5.13: Monayi, ndi muyidi wa Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi. Ndi mubikidibua kudiye bua kumanyisha muaku wenda munkatshi mua bantu benda, bua bapeta moyo wa kashidi.
5.14: Ne biakakengedibua ne ngenza miandiku ya malu avua menjibua â, bilondeshila ku disua dia Nzambi, bua ne masambila a bakadi baya, bavua bikala bansantu, akumbajibua bilondeshila ku ditabuja dietu—
5.15: Eyowa, miandiku mikesa ya bionsu bivua bienzeka katshia ku tshikondu tshivua Lehi mumbuka ku Yelushalema, mena tô ne ku tshikondu etshi.
5.16: Bua nanku ndi ngenza miandiku yanyi bilondeshila ku milubu ivua bantu bavua bikalaku kumpala kuanyi bafunda, tô ne ku ntuadijilu kua matuku anyi;
5.17: Ne pashisha ndi ngenza miandiku ya malu amvua mumona ne mesu anyi nkayanyi.
5.18: Ne ndi mumanya ne miandiku indi ngenza idi mikala ya bushuwa ne milelela; nansha nanku kudi bintu bia bungi, bitudi katuyi bua kufunda to bua bualu bua muakulu wetu.
5.19: Ne mpindiewu ngajikiji kuakula kuanyi, kudi nkutangila mema nkayanyi, ne ndi ntungunuka kuamba mulubu wanyi wa malu akavuaku kumpala kuanyi.
5.20: Ndi Molomo, ne ndi kankanunuina kalelela ka Lehi. Ndi ne kipatshila ka kubenesha Nzambi wanyi ne Mupandishi wanyi Yezu Kilisto, bualu wakapatula batatuetu mu bulaba bua Yelushalema (ne muntu nansha umua kavua mumanya bualu ebu to amu pa kumbusha yeya nkayenda ne abu bavuaye mupatula mu bulaba ebu) ne udi mutupesha mema ne bantu banyi dimanya dia bungi didi dikumbana bua kupeta lupandu lua anyima yetu.
5.21: Bushuwa udi mubenesha nzubu wa Yakoba, ne udi ne lusa kudi ndelanganyi ya Yosefe.
5.22: Ne monsu muvua bana ba Lehi balama mikenji yenda uvua mubabenesha ne mubalubuluja bilondeshila ku dîyi dienda.
5.23: Eyowa, ne bushuwa neafikisha kabidi tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe ku dimanya dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu.
5.24: Ne bushuwa bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo, neasangishamu tshishadila tshionsu tshia ndelanganyi ya Yakoba kumbukila ku matumba anayi a buloba, badi batangalaka kula pa mpala yonsu wa buloba.
5.25: Ne bu muvuaye muenza tshipungidi ne nzubu yonsu wa Yakoba, mena nanku tshipungidi tshivuaye muenza ne nzubu wa Yakoba netshikumbajibua mu tshikondu tshimukumbanyina nkayenda, ne ku dipingaja dia nzubu yonsu wa Yakoba ku dimanya dia tshipungidi tshivuaye muenza nabu.
5.26: Ne pashisha nebamanya Musungidi wabu, udi muikala Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi; ne pashisha nebasangishibua kumbukila ku matumba anayi a buloba ne ku malaba abu nkayabu, kuvuabu batangalajibua; eyowa, bu mudi Mukalenga ne moyo nanku nebikala. Amena.

6.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne bantu ba Bena Nefi bakapingana bonsu ku malaba abu nkayabu mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisambombo, muntu yonsu ne dîku dienda, bisumbu bia bimuna bikesa ne binena bienda, tubalu tuenda ne ngomba yenda, ne bintu bikuabu bionsu bivua bikala biabu.
6.2: Ne biakalua ne kabavua badia biakudia biabu bionsu to; bua nanku bakaya ne bionsu bivuabu kabayi badia to, ntenta yabu yonsu ya mushindu yonsu, ne ngolo yabu, ne mpalata yabu, ne bintu biabu bia mushinga bionsu, ne bakapingana ku malaba abu ne ku bintu biabu, ku ku node ne ku sude, ku buloba bua ku bulaba bua ku node ne ku bulaba bua ku sude.
6.3: Ne bakapesha banyengi bavua babuela mu tshipungidi tshia kulama ditalala dia mu bulaba, bavua bajinga kushala Bena Lamana, malaba, bilondeshila ku bungi buabu, bua bapeta, ku dikuata diabu dia mudimu, biakudidîshabu nabi; ne nanku bakashikika ditalala mu bulaba bonsu.
6.4: Ne bakabanga kabidi kulubuluka ne kulua bantu banena; ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bisambombo ne makumi abidi ne muanda muteketa biakapita, ne kuakadi bulongama bunena mu bulaba; ne bavua bateka mêyi abu bilondeshila ku bujalama ne bululama.
6.5: Ne mpindiewu, kakuvua tshintu nansha tshimua mu bulaba to bua kukandika bantu bua kutungunuka kulubuluka, pa kumbusha bapona mu disambuka dia mikenji.
6.6: Ne mpindiewu Gidigidoni ne mulumbuluishi, Lakoneuse, ne bavuabu basungula bu mudi balombodi abu, ki bavua bashikika ditalala dia bungi edi mu bulaba.
6.7: Ne biakalua ne kuvua bimenga bia bungi bivuabu bibakilula, ne kuvua bimenga bia kala bia bungi bivuabu bakaja.
6.8: Ne kuvua bibeba bia bungi bivuabu bibaka, ne njila ya bungi ivuabu benza, bivua bilombola ku tshimenga ne ku tshimenga, ne ku bulaba ne ku bulaba, ne ku muaba ne ku muaba.
6.9: Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshia muanda mukulu nanku, ne bantu bavua ne ditalala ditungunuka.
6.10: Kadi biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshitema kuakabanga kuikala matandu munkatshi mua bantu; ne bamua bavua badibandisha mu diditambisha ne didiamba bua mabanji abu mapita bungi, eyowa, mena ne ku dikengeshangana dikola;
6.11: Bualu kuvua bangenda mushinga ba bungi mu bulaba, ne kabidi balumbuluidi ba bungi, ne bampulushi ba bungi.
6.12: Ne bantu kusunguludibua ku milongu, bilondeshila ku mabanji abu ne dikasa dimpa dia kulonga kuabu kua tulasa; eyowa, bamua bavua bapangila dimanya bua bupela buabu, bakuabu bavua ne dimanya dia bungi bua mabanji abu.
6.13: Bamua bakadibandisha mu diditambisha, ne bakuabu bavua bikala badipuekeshi menamena; bamua bavua bapingaja kupenda ne kupenda, pavua bakuabu bakenga kupenda ne dikengeshibua ne mishindu yonsu ya ntatu, ne kabavua bakudimuka ne bapenda pabu to, kadi bavua badipuekeshi ne bakudimuna mutshima kumpala kua Nzambi.
6.14: Ne nanku kuakalua dishilangana dinena mu bulaba bonsu, mua ne ekelezia wakabanga kukosolokangana; eyowa, mua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ekelezia uvua mukosolokangana mu buloba bonsu amu pa kumbusha munkatshi mua Bena Lamana bakesa bavua bakudimuna moyo ku ditabuja dilelela; ne kabavua badilekela to, bualu bavua bakamakana, ne basuminyina, ne kabayi banyungana to, bitaba bua kulama mikenji ya Mukalenga ne dinanukila dionsu.
6.15: Mpindiewu tshiena bualu tshia malu mabi a bantu â tshivua nanku—Satana uvua ne bukola bua bungi, bua kusonsola bantu ku dienza dia mishindu yonsu ya malu a bubi, ne bua kubuwuja ne diditambisha, ubatêta bua kukeba bukalenga, ne bukôkeshi, ne mabanji, ne bintu bia tshianana bia pa buloba.
6.16: Ne nanku Satana wakapambuisha mitshima ya bantu bua kuenza mishindu yonsu ya malu a bubi; bua nanku bakasanka bua ditalala bua bidimu bikesa.
6.17: Ne nanku, ku ntuadijilu wa tshidimu tshia makumi asatu—bantu bikala badifila bua mutantshi wa tshikondu tshila bua matêtshibua a diabulu aya nabu konsu kuvuaye unjiga bua kuya nabu, ne bua kuenza malu mabi onsu avuaye ujinga ne benza—ne nanku ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi asatu etshi, bavua mu ngikadilu wa bubi butamba bubi.
6.18: Mpindiewu kabavua benza mibi mu dipanga to, bualu bavua bamanya disua dia Nzambi bibatangila, bualu divua dibalongesha; bua nanku bavua batombokela Nzambi muvuabu basua.
6.19: Ne mpindiewu bivua mu matuku a Lakoneuse, muana wa Lakoneuse, bualu Lakoneuse uvua musomba mu nkuasa wa tatuenda ne uvua ulombola bantu tshidimu atshi.
6.20: Ne kuakabanga kuikala bantu bapetela meji kudi diûlu ne batumibua, bimana munkatshi mua bantu mu bulaba bonsu, bayisha ne bajadika ne dikima bua mibi ne malu mabi a bantu, ne ubajadikila bitangila disungila divua Mukalenga wenza bua bantu benda, anyi mu miaku mikuabu, dibîka dia ku lufu dia Kilisto; ne bakajadika ne dikima bua lufu luenda ne makenga enda.
6.21: Mpindiewu kuvua ba bungi ba ku bantu bavua bafîka tshiji menamena bua bualu bua aba bavua bajadika bua bintu ebi; ne aba bavua bafîka tshiji bavua bikala nangananga balumbuluishi banena, ne aba bavua bikala bakuidi banena ne balumbuluidi; eyowa, bonsu bavua bikala balumbuluidi bavua bafîkila aba bavua bajadika bintu ebi tshiji.
6.22: Mpindiewu kakuvua mulumbuluidi nansha umua anyi mulumbuluishi anyi muakuidi munena uvua ne bukôkeshi bua kukosela muntu lufu to amu dipîshibua diabu dituibua tshiala kudi ngovena wa mu bulaba.
6.23: Mpindiewu kuvua bantu ba bungi ba ku bavua bajadika bua bintu bivua bitangila Kilisto bavua bajadika ne dikima, bakakuatabu ne bakashipabu mu musokoku kudi balumbuluishi, bua ne dimanya dia lufu luabu kadiakalua kudi ngovena wa bulaba to tô ne kunyima kua lufu luabu.
6.24: Mpindiewu monayi, ebi bivua bishilangana ne mêyi a mu bulaba, ne kabena bashipa muntu to, pa kumbusha bobu bapeta bukôkeshi kudi ngovena wa mu bulaba—
6.25: Bua nanku difunda diakaya ku bulaba bua Zalahemela, kudi ngovena wa mu bulaba, bua kufunda balumbuluishi bavua bakosela baprofete ba Mukalenga lufu abu, kabiyi bilondeshila mikenji to.
6.26: Mpindiewu biakalua ne bakabakuata ne bakalua nabu ku mpala kua mulumbuluishi, bua kulumbushibuabu bua bubi buvuabu benza, bilondeshila mikenji ivua bantu bateka.
6.27: Mpindiewu biakalua ne balumbuluishi abu bavua ne balunda ba bungi ne malela; ne bavua bashala, eyowa, mena pabuipi ne balumbuluidi bonsu ne bakuidi banena, bakadisangisha pamua, ne bakadisanga ne malela a balumbuluishi bavua ne bua kulumbuluishibua bilondeshila ku mikenji.
6.28: Ne bakabuela mu tshipungidi muntu ne mukuenda, eyowa, mena tshipungidi tshivua bantu ba kala bashiya, tshina tshipungidi tshivua tshipeshibua ne tshitshipishibua kudi diabulu, bua kusangidila buakana bonsu.
6.29: Bua nanku bakadisanga bua kuluisha bantu ba Mukalenga, ne babuela mu tshipungidi tshia kubashipa, ne kupatuisha bavua bapîla bua dishibeya dia muntu bavua kabayi bua kubafuka ku bululama to, buvuabu pabuipi ne kuenzela bilondeshila ku mikenji.
6.30: Ne bakelangana mpata ne mikenji ne manema a ditunga diabu; ne bakenza tshipungidi muntu ne mukuenda bua kushipa ngovena, ne kushikika mfumu ku mutu kua bulaba, bua ne bulaba kabuikadi kabidi ne budishikaminyi to, kadi buikala bubatshikibua kudi bamfumu.

7.1: Mpindiewu monayi, nennuleja ne kabakashikika mfumu mu bulaba to; kadi mu tshidimu tshia momumua etshi, eyowa, tshidimu tshia makumi asatu, bakashipa mulumbuluishi munena wa mu bulaba, eyowa, bakamushibeya pa nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu.
7.2: Ne bantu bavua babulukangana muntu kudi mukuenda; ne bakatapulukangana muntu kudi mukuenda mu bîsa, muntu yonsu bilondeshila ku dîku dienda ne malela enda ne balunda benda; ne nanku bakanyangakaja bukalenga bua mu bulaba.
7.3: Ne tshîsa tshionsu tshiakasungula kapita anyi mulombodi ku mutu kuatshi; ne nanku bakalua bîsa ne balombodi ba bîsa.
7.4: Mpindiewu monayi, kakuvua muntu nansha umua munkatshi muabu uvua mupanga dîku dinena ne malela ne balunda ba bungi to; bua nanku bîsa biabu binena menamena.
7.5: Mpindiewu bionsu ebi biakenzeka, ne kakuvua kabidi mvita munkatshi muabu to; ne malu mabi onsu â akakuata bantu bualu bakadifila ku bukôkeshi bua Satana.
7.6: Ne bakanyangakaja mikandu ya bukalenga, bua bualu bua tshipungidi tshia mu musokoku tshia balunda ne malela bavua bashibeya baprofete.
7.7: Ne biakajula dikokangana dikola mu bulaba, mua ne tshitupa tshivua tshipita buakana tshia bantu tshivua pabuipi ne tshionsu tshilua tshibi; eyowa, kuvua amu bakana bakesa munkatshi muabu.
7.8: Ne nanku bidimu bisambombo kabivua bipita to kadi tshitupa tshinena tshia bantu tshikavua tshilekela buakana buatshi, bu mudi mbua upingana ku bilushi bienda, anyi bu mudi nguluba udibonda mu bitotshi.
7.9: Mpindiewu tshipungidi tshia mu musokoku etshi, tshivua tshituadila bantu malu mabi makola kupita, tshiakadisangisha pamua, ne tshiakateka muntu uvuabu babikila ne Yakoba ku mutu kuatshi;
7.10: Ne bakamubikila ne mfumuabu; bua nanku wakalua mfumu wa tshisumbu tshibi etshi; ne uvua umua wa tupita tutamba wakafila dîyi dienda bua kuluisha baprofete bavua bajadika bua Yezu.
7.11: Ne biakalua ne kabavua ba bungi bu muvua bîsa bia bantu, bivua bidisanga pamua to amu pa kumbusha ne balombodi babu bakashikika mêyi abu, muntu yonsu bilondeshila ku tshîsa tshienda; nansha nanku bavua bena lukuna; nansha muvuabu kabayi bikala bantu bakana to, kadi bavua badisanga bua kukina bavua babuela mu tshipungidi bua kunyangakaja bukalenga abu.
7.12: Nanku, bualu Yakoba wakamona ne bena lukuna babu bavua babapita bungi, bualu uvua mfumu wa tshisumbu, bua nanku wakapesha bantu benda mukenji ne banyemena ku tshitupa tshia ku node menamena tshia bulaba, ne badiashila koku bukalenga, tô ne padisangisha kudi batapuluki, (bualu uvua ubabomba ne kuikala batapuluki ba bungi) ne bobu nebapeta makanda makumbana bua kukokangana ne bîsa bia bantu; ne bakenza nanku.
7.13: Ne luendu luabu luvua lua lubilu bua ne muntu kavua mua kubakuata to tô pavuabu bamana kushiya bantu. Ne ki muakajika tshidimu tshia makumi asatu nanku; ne ki muvua malu a bantu ba Nefi nanku.
7.14: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshimua bavua babuluka mu bîsa, muntu yonsu bilondeshila ku dîku dienda, malela enda ne balunda benda; nansha nanku, bavua bafika ku diumvuangana dia ne kabakuluishangana mvita to; kadi kabavua ne bobumua bitangila mikenji yabu to, ne mushindu wa bukalenga buabu to, bualu bavua bishikikibua bilondeshila ku meji a bavua bikala tupita tuabu ne balombodi babu. Kadi bakateka mikenji mikola menamena bua ne tshîsa tshimua katshivua bua kuenzela tshikuabu bibi to, mua ne ku tshimua tshipimu bavua ne ditalala mu bulaba; nansha nanku, mitshima yabu ivua mibenga Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, ne bakâsa baprofete mabua ne bakabipata munkatshi muabu.
7.15: Ne biakalua ne Nefi—muikala mukumbudibua kudi banjelu ne kabidi dîyi dia Mukalenga, bua nanku mumona banjelu, ne muikala mujadiki ne mesu, ne muikala ne bokola bupeshibua kudiye bua ne amanya bitangila disadila dia Kilisto, ne kabidi muikala mujadiki ne mesu dia diumbuka lukasa ku buakana kupinga ku bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi;
7.16: Nanku, bualu uvua ne dibungama bua dipapa dia mitshima yabu ne bua bumpofu bua meji abu—wakaya munkatshi muabu mu tshidimu tshia momumua atshi, ne wakabanga kujadika, ne dikima, bua dikudimuna dia mutshima ne dilekedibua dia mibi kupitshila ku ditabuja dia Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto.
7.17: Ne wakabalongesha bintu bia bungi; ne bionsu kabiena mua kufundibua to, ne tshitupa tshiabi katshiakukumbana to, bua nanku kabiena mua kufundibua mu mukanda ewu to. Ne Nefi wakalongesha ne bukola ne bukôkeshi bunena.
7.18: Ne biakalua ne bakamufîkila tshiji, mena bualu bua uvua ne bukola bunena kubatamba, bualu kabivua bikumbana bua kubenga kuitabuja mêyi enda to, bualu ditabuja dienda kudi Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto divua dinena bikola bua ne banjelu bakamusadila dituku ne dituku.
7.19: Ne mu dîna dia Yezu wakipata badiabulu ne nyuma ya bukoya; ne wakabîsha mena muanabu wa baluma ku bafua, kunyima kua muashibua mabua ne mukengeshibua ne lufu kudi bantu.
7.20: Ne bantu bakamona bualu ebu, ne bakabujadika, ne bakamufîkila tshiji bua bukola buenda; ne wakenza kabidi bishima bikuabu bia bungi, ku mesu a bantu, mu dîna dia Yezu.
7.21: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshia kumpala tshiakapita, ne kuvua amu bakesa bakakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga; kadi bonsu bavua bakudimuna moyo bulelela bakaleja kudi bantu ne bavua bakumbudibua kudi bukola ne Nyuma bia Nzambi bivua mu Yezu Kilisto, uvuabu bitabuja.
7.22: Ne bonsu bavua badiabulu bipatshibua kudibu, ne bavua bôndopibua ku mabêdi abu ne ku bulema buabu, bulelela bakaleja bantu ne Nyuma wa Nzambi uvua muenza mudimu kudibu, ne bavua bôndopibua; ne bakaleja kabidi bimanyinu ne bakenza bimua bishima munkatshi mua bantu.
7.23: Ka muakapita kabidi tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshibîdi nanku. Ne Nefi wakabila kudi bantu ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshisâtu ne wakabayisha dikudimuna dia mutshima ne dilekedibua dia mibi.
7.24: Mpindiewu ndi musua bua nuvuluka kabidi, kakuvua nansha umua uvua mufikishibua ku dikudimuna dia mutshima uvua kayi mutambuishibua mu mâyi to.
7.25: Bua nanku, kuvua bantu bavua bajididibua kudi Nefi ku disadila edi, bua ne bonsu bâlua kudibu batambuishibua mu mâyi, ne nanku bu mudi njadikilu ne bujadiki kumpala kua Nzambi, ne kudi bantu, ne bavua bakudimuna mutshima ne bavua bapeta dilekedibua dia mibi yabu.
7.26: Ne kuvua ba bungi ku ntuadijilu kua tshidimu etshi bavua batambuishibua bua dikudimuna dia mutshima; ne ki muakapita tshitupa tshinena tshia tshidimu nanku.

8.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne bilondeshila ku miandiku yetu, ne tudi bamanya ne mifundu yetu idi milelela, bualu monayi, muntu mululama ki uvua mulama miandiku—bualu bulelela wakenza bishima bia bungi mu dîna dia Yezu; ne kakuvua muntu nansha umua uvua mua kuenza tshishima mu dîna dia Yezu to amu pa kumbusha katupa kenda konsu kikala katokeshibua ku malu mabi enda—
8.2: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne, bu koku kakuyi tshilema tshienza kudi muntu ewu to mu mushindu wetu wa kubala kua diba, tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshisâtu tshikavua tshipita;
8.3: Ne bantu bakabanga kutekemena ne bikola tshimanyinu tshivua tshifidibua kudi muprofete Samuele, Muena Lamana, eyowa, bua diba dikala mîdima pa mpala wa bulaba bua mutantshi wa matuku asatu.
8.4: Ne kuakabanga kuikala dielangana mpata dinena ne matandu manena munkatshi mua bantu, nansha nanku Mukalenga uvua muleja bimanyinu bia bungi.
8.5: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshinâyi, mu ngondu wa kumpala, mu dituku dinâyi dia ngondu, kuakalua mvula wa tshipepela mukola, wa mushindu uvua kawuyi muanji kumona mu bulaba bonsu to.
8.6: Ne kuvua kabidi tshipepela tshinena ne tshitshinyisha; ne kuvua makubakuba avua atshinyisha, mua ne akanyungusha buloba bujima bu ne buvua bua kuabuluka pankatshi-nkatshi.
8.7: Ne kuvua mipenyi mikola menamena, wa mushindu utu kawuyi muanji kumona mu bulaba bonsu to.
8.8: Ne tshimenga tshia Zalahemela tshiakakuata kapia.
8.9: Ne tshimenga tshia Moloni tshiakadîna mu ndondu ya mbuwa, ne benamu bakafua mu mâyi awu.
8.10: Ne buloba buakimana pa mutu pa tshimenga tshia Moloniha, ne pa muaba wa tshimenga pakalua mukuna munena.
8.11: Ne kuvua dibutuka dinena ne ditshinyisha mu bulaba bua ku sude.
8.12: Kadi monayi, kuvua dibutuka dinena ne ditshinyisha mu buloba bua ku node; bualu monayi, pa mpala mujima wa bulaba pavua pashintuluka, bua tshipepela ne mvunda, ne makubakuba ne mipenyi ne dinyungana dikola menamena dia buloba bujima;
8.13: Ne bibeba bivua bikosoloka, ne njila mibatalala yakanyanguka, ne miaba ya bungi ivua milandakana yakalua ne binabina.
8.14: Ne bimenga binena ne bia bunema bia bungi biakadîna, ne bia bungi biakôshika, ne bia bungi biakanyungakana tô ne pakupuka bibakilu biabi panshi, ne benamu bakashipibua, ne miaba yakashala mitupu.
8.15: Ne kuvua bimua bimenga bivua bishala; kadi dinyanguka diabi divua dinena menamena, ne kuvua ba bungi munda muabi bavua bashipibua.
8.16: Ne kuvua bamua bakaya ne mvunda; ne muntu kena mumanya kuakayabu to, amu pa kumbusha ne mbamanya ne bavua baya nabu.
8.17: Ne nanku pa mpala wa buloba bujima pakalua panyanguka, bua bipepela, ne makubakuba, ne mipenyi, ne dinyungana dia buloba.
8.18: Ne monayi, mbuebua yakapanduluka mu bitupa bibidi; ivua mipanduluka pa mpala wa buloba bujima, mua ne bakasangana mipanduluka mu bipesa, ne mu mapandika ne mu mitanta, pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba.
8.19: Ne biakalua ne pakajika makubakuba, ne mipenyi, ne mvula mukola wa tshipepela ne wa muvimbi, ne manyungana a buloba—bualu monayi, biakanenga mutantshi wa meba asatu; ne bamua bavua bamba ne bivua binenga mutantshi mula mupita; nansha nanku, bintu ebi bionsu binena ne bitshinyisha biakenzeka mu pabuipi ne mutantshi wa meba asatu—ne pashisha monayi, kuvua mîdima pa mpala wa bulaba.
8.20: Ne biakalua ne kuvua mîdima mikola pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, mua ne benamu bavua kabayi bafua to bavua mua kumvua dibungibungi dia mîdima;
8.21: Ne kakuvua muakuikala bukenka to, bua bualu bua mîdima, anyi minda, anyi bimunyi to; anyi kakuvua mua kuikala kapia katema ne nkunyi miuma menamena to, bua ne kakuvua mua kuikala bukenka nansha to;
8.22: Ne kakuvua bukenka nansha bumua bumueneka to, anyi kapia, anyi katoditodi, anyi diba, anyi ngondu, nansha mitoto to, bualu mabungi a mîdima avua mikala pa mpala wa bulaba avua mikala mapita bukola.
8.23: Ne biakalua ne yakanenga bua mutantshi wa matuku asatu kakuyi bukenka nansha bumua bumueneka to; ne kuvua didila ne mikunda ne miadi bikola bitungunuka munkatshi mua bantu bonsu; eyowa, mikemu ya bantu ivua mikala mikola, bua mîdima ne dibutuka dinena biakabaluila.
8.24: Ne mu muaba umua bakumvuibua babila, bamba: Ô bu tuetu bakudimuna mutshima kumpala kua dituku edi dinena ne ditshinyisha, ne nanku bana betu bavua mua kuepeleshibua, ne kabavua bôshibua mu tshimenga tshinena atshi Zalahemela.
8.25: Ne mu muaba mukuabu bakumvuibua babila ne badila, bamba ne: Ô bu tuetu bakudimuna mutshima kumpala kua dituku edi dinena ne ditshinyisha, ne katuyi bashipa ne bâsa baprofete mabua, ne babipata to; nanku bamamuetu ne bana betu ba bakaji balenga, ne bana betu bavua mua kuepeleshibua, ne kabavua mua kujîkibua mu tshimenga tshinena atshi Moloniha to. Ne nanku ki muvua mikunda ya bantu mikala minena ne itshinyisha.

9.1: Ne biakalua ne kuvua dîyi diumvuika munkatshi mua bena mu buloba bonsu, pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba ebu, dibila:
9.2: Diakabi, diakabi, diakabi kudi bantu aba; diakabi kudi bena mu buloba bujima pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima; bualu diabulu udi useka, ne banjelu benda badi basanka, bua ba ku bana ba baluma ne bana ba bakaji balenga ba bantu banyi bavuabu bashipa; ne baponyi bua malu abu mabi ne malu mapita bubi abu!
9.3: Monayi, ndi môsha tshimenga tshinena tshia Zalahemela ne kapia, ne benamu.
9.4: Ne monayi, ndi muenzeja ne tshimenga tshinena tshia Moloni tshidîna mu ndondu ya mbuwa, ne benamu bafua mu mâyi awu.
9.5: Ne monayi, ndi mubuikila tshimenga tshia Moloniha ne buloba, ne benamu, bua kusokoka malu mabi ne malu mapita bubi abu kumpala kua mpala wanyi, bua ne mashi a baprofete ne a bansantu ka’abandi kabidi kundi bua kubaluisha to.
9.6: Ne monayi, ndi muenzeja ne tshimenga tshia Gilegala tshidîna, ne benamu bajîkibua mu ndondu ya buloba;
9.7: Eyowa, ne tshimenga tshia Oniha ne benamu, ne tshimenga tshia Mokume ne benamu ne tshimenga tshia Yelushalema ne benamu; ne mvua muenzeja ne mâyi alua pa muaba wabi, bua kusokoka bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu kumpala kua mpala wanyi, bua ne mashi a baprofete ne a bansantu ka’abandi kabidi kundi bua kubaluisha to.
9.8: Ne monayi, tshimenga tshia Gadiandi, ne tshimenga tshia Gadiomana, ne tshimenga tshia Yakoba, ne tshimenga tshia Gimigimino, bionsu ebi ndi muenzeja ne bidîna, ne muenza tukuna ne bibanda pa miaba yabu; ne ndi mujîka benamu mu ndondu ya buloba, bua kusokoka bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu kumpala kua mpala wanyi, bua ne mashi a baprofete ne a bansantu ka’abandi kabidi kundi bua kubaluisha to.
9.9: Ne monayi, tshimenga tshinena tshia Yakobugata atshi, muvua bantu ba mfumu Yakoba basomba, ndi môshisha ne kapia bua mibi yabu ne malu mapita bubi abu, buvua bupita bubi bonsu bua mu buloba bujima, bua bipungidi ne dishibeya dia bantu biabu bia mu musokoku; bualu bobu bakanyangakaja ditalala dia bantu banyi ne bukalenga bua mu bulaba; bua nanku ngakabôshisha, bua kubabutula kumpala kua mpala wanyi, bua ne mashi a baprofete ne a bansantu ka’abandi kabidi kundi bua kubaluisha to.
9.10: Ne monayi, tshimenga tshia Lamana, ne tshimenga tshia Yosha, ne tshimenga tshia Gada, ne tshimenga tshia Kishikumena, ndi môshisha ne kapia, ne benamu, bua bubi buabu mu dipata dia baprofete, ne diasa dia mabua dia bangakatuma abu bua kubamanyisha bitangila bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu.
9.11: Ne bualu bakabipata bonsu, bua ne kakuvua muakana nansha umua munkatshi muabu to, ngakatuma kapia panshi ne ngakababutula, bua kusokoka bubi buabu ne malu mapita bubi abu kumpala kua mpala wanyi, bua ne mashi a baprofete ne bansantu bamvua mutuma munkatshi muabu ka’abeledi lubila kundi lufuma ku buloba to.
9.12: Ne mvua muenzeja bua dibutuka dinena dia bungi dilua pa mutu pa bulaba ebu, ne pa mutu pa bantu aba, bua bualu bua bubi buabu ne bua malu mapita bubi abu.
9.13: Ô nuenu bonsu badi bepeleshibua bualu bua nuvua bakana kubapitshila, kanuena mpindiewu nupingana kundi, ne kukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenu, ne kukudimuna moyo, bua ne nnôndopa anyi?
9.14: Eyowa, bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, nuenu balua kundi ne nupeta moyo wa tshiendelela. Monayi, diboku dianyi dia lusa didi dinôluela, ne ewu yonsu walua, yeya nemmuakidila: ne babeneshibua badi aba badi balua kundi.
9.15: Monayi, ndi muyidi wa Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi. Ngakafuka diûlu ne buloba, ne bintu bionsu bidi mômu. Mvua ne Tatu kumbukila ku mbangilu. Ndi munda mua Tatu, ne Tatu udi munda muanyi; ne kundi Tatu watumbishi dîna dienda.
9.16: Ngakalua kudi bantu banyi, ne bantu banyi kabakangakidila to. Ne mifundu ya Nzambi idi mitangila dilua dianyi yakumbajibu.
9.17: Ne bonsu badi bangakidila, ndi mubapesha bukola bua kulua bana ba Nzambi; ne nengenza mena momumua bua bonsu bitabuja mu dîna dianyi, bualu monayi, disungila didi diluila kundi, ne kundi mikenji ya Mose idi mikumbajibua.
9.18: Ndi bukenka ne moyo wa ba pa buloba. Ndi Alfa ne Omega, mbangilu ne ndekelu.
9.19: Ne kanuakundambula kabidi dimatshisha dia mashi to; eyowa, milambu yenu ne milambu yenu miôsha neijika, bualu tshiakuitaba nansha umua wa ku milambu yenu ne milambu yenu miôsha to.
9.20: Ne nenundambula mulambu ne mutshima mutshibuluka ne nyuma munyingalala. Ne ewu yonsu udi ulua kundi ne mutshima mutshibuluka ne nyuma munyingalala, yeya nemmutambuisha ne kapia ne Nyuma wa Tshijila, mena bu Bena Lamana, bua bualu bua ditabuja diabu kundi tshikondu tshia dikudimuna dia moyo diabu, bavua batambuishibua ne kapia ne Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne kabavua bamanya nanku to.
9.21: Monayi, ngalu pa buloba bua kutuala disungila kudi ba pa buloba, bua kupandisha ba pa buloba ku mibi.
9.22: Bua nanku, ewu yonsu udi ukudimuna mutshima ne ulua kundi bu mudi muana muteketa, yeya nemmuakidila, bualu bua wa nanku bukalenga bua Nzambi budi buenda. Monayi, bualu bua wa nanku ngateki moyo wanyi panshi, ne ngawangatshi kabidi; bua nanku kudimunayi mutshima, ne luayi kundi nuenu ndekelu ya buloba, ne pandishibuayi.

10.1: Ne mpindiewu monayi, biakalua ne bantu bonsu ba mu bulaba bakumvua mêyi â, ne bakajadika buatshi. Ne kunyima kua mêyi â kuvua bupudikila mu bulaba bua mutantshi wa meba a bungi;
10.2: Bantu bakalekela didilakana ne diela mikunda bua dijimija dia malela abu avuabu bashipa bualu tshikemu tshivua tshipita bunena; bua nanku kakuvua mutoyi mu bulaba bonsu to bua mutantshi wa meba a bungi.
10.3: Ne biakalua ne dîyi diakalua kabidi kudi bantu, ne bantu bonsu bakadiumvua ne bakajadika buadi, diamba ne:
10.4: Ô nuenu bantu ba mu bimenga ebi binena bidi bipona, badi bikala tunkanunuina tua Yakoba, eyowa, badi bikala ba mu nzubu wa Isalele, bu mudiyi ya bungi misangu imvua munusangisha bu mudi nzolu wa tshikuka usangisha bana benda muinshi mua mapuapua enda, ne mumvua munudîsha.
10.5: Ne kabidi, bu mudiyi ya bungi misangu imvua mua kunusangisha bu mudi nzolu wa tshikuka usangisha bana benda muinshi mua mapuapua enda, eyowa, Ô nuenu bantu ba mu nzubu wa Isalele, badi bapona; Ô nuenu bantu ba mu nzubu wa Isalele, nuenu badi basomba mu Yelushalema, ne nuenu badi bapona, eyowa, bu mudiyi ya bungi misangu imvua mua kunusangisha bu mudi nzolu wa tshikuka usangisha bana benda muinshi mua mapuapua enda, kadi nuakabenga.
10.6: Ô nuenu nzubu wa Isalele undi muepelesha, bu mudiyi ya bungi misangu inganusangisha bu mudi nzolu wa tshikuka usangisha bana benda muinshi mua mapuapua enda, panuikala bakudimuna mutshima ne bapingana kundi ne mutshima mujima.
10.7: Tshianana, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, miaba inudi basomba neilua mitupu tô ne diba dia dikumbajibua dia tshipungidi tshindi muenza ne batatuenu.
10.8: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kunyima kua bantu bumvua mêyi â, monayi, bakabanga kudila ne kuela mikunda kabidi bua dijimija dia malela ne balunda babu.
10.9: Ne biakalua ne ki muakapita matuku asatu nanku. Ne bivua mu dinda, ne mîdima yakajika pa mpala wa bulaba, ne buloba bua kalekela kuzakala, ne mbuebua ya kalekela kupandika, ne mikemu ivua mikuatshisha bôwa yakajika, ne mitoyi ya diyoyi yakajika.
10.10: Ne buloba bua kalamatangana pamua kabidi, mu mushindu wa ne buakashala bukola; ne madilu, ne muadi, ne didilakana dia bantu bavua bepeleshibua ne moyo biakajika; ne madilu abu akakudimuka disanka, ne didilakana diabu diakalua disamuna ne disakidila dia Mukalenga Yezu Kilisto, Musungidi wabu.
10.11: Ne tô ne diba adi, mifundu ya Nzambi ivua baprofete bakula ivua mikumbajibua.
10.12: Ne tshitupa tshia bantu tshivua tshipita buakana ki tshivua tshipandishibua, ne ki bobu bavua bakidila baprofete ne bavua kabayi babâsa mabua to; ne bobu ki bavua kabayi bamatshisha mashi a bansantu to, bavua bepeleshibua—
10.13: Ne bavua bepeleshibua ne kabavua bidîna ne bajîkibua mu buloba to; ne kabavua bafua mu ndondu ya mbuwa to; ne kabavua bôshika ku kapia to, anyi kakuvua tshintu tshikuluka pa mutu pabu ne tshibazâza ku lufu to; ne kabavua bambula kudi mvunda to; anyi kabavua batambibua bukola kudi dibungibungi dia muishi ne dia mîdima to.
10.14: Ne mpindiewu, ewu yonsu udi ubala, umvua; ewu udi ne mifundu, ayikebulula, ne atangila ne amona ne lufu ne dibutuka ebi bionsu bia ku kapia, ne ku muishi, ne ku bipepela, ne ku mvunda, ne ku diunzuluka dia buloba bua kubadinyisha, ne bintu bionsu ebi ne kabiena dikumbajibua dia mêyi a buprofete a baprofete bansantu ba bungi to anyi.
10.15: Monayi, ndi nnuambila ne, Eyowa, ba bungi bavua bajadika bua bintu ebi pa dilua dia Kilisto, ne bavua bashipibua bualu bakajadika bua bintu ebi.
10.16: Eyowa, muprofete Zenose uvua mujadika bua bintu ebi, ne Zenoke kabidi uvua muakula bitangila bintu ebi, bualu bakajadika nangananga bitutangila, tuetu badi bikala tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi yabu.
10.17: Monayi, tatuetu Yakoba uvua kabidi mujadika bitangila tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe. Ne monayi, katuena tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi ya Yosefe anyi? Ne bintu ebi bidi bijadika buetu kabiena bifunda pa bitata bia tshiamua tshia kalabi biakalua nabi tatuetu Lehi ku Yelushalema anyi?
10.18: Ne biakalua ne ku ndekelu kua tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshinâyi, monayi, nennuleja ne bantu ba Nefi bavua bepeleshibua, ne kabidi bavuabu babikila ne Bena Lamana, bavua bikala bepeleshibua abu, bakalejibua masanka manena, ne mabenesha manena mapumuinyibua pa mitu yabu, mua ne katataka kunyima kua dibanda dia Kilisto mu diûlu wakadileja bulelela kudibu—
10.19: Ubaleja mubidi wenda, ne ubalongesha; ne nendonda mulubu wa disadila dienda kunyima. Bua nanku bua mpindiewu ngajikiji miaku yanyi.

11.intro: Yezu Kilisto wakadileja kudi bantu ba Nefi, pavua musumba wa bantu mudisangisha pamua mu bulaba bua Buvula, ne wakabalongesha; ne ewu ki mushindu wakadilejaye kudibu.
11.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne kuvua musumba munena wa bantu ba Nefi wakadisangisha pamua, ku mpenga yonsu ya ntempelo uvua mu bulaba bua Buvula; ne bavua bakema ne bakatshila munkatshi muabu, ne balejangana dishintuluka dinena ne dia dikema divua dienzeka.
11.2: Ne bavua bayukila kabidi bua Yezu Kilisto ewu, uvua tshimanyinu tshifidibua bitangila lufu luenda.
11.3: Ne biakalua ne patshivuabu bayukilangana nanku, bakumvua dîyi bu difumina mu diûlu; ne bakakupa mesu abu ku mpenga yonsu, bualu kabakumvua dîyi diakatelejabu to; ne kadivua dîyi dia tshikisu, anyi kadivua dikola; nansha nanku, bu muvuadi dikala dîyi diteketa diakatubula munda mua bavua badiumvua, bua ne kakuvua tshitupa tshia mubidi wabu tshiakapangatshi kukankisha to; eyowa, diakabatubula munda mua anyima mena, ne diakenzeja ne mitshima yabu yôsha.
11.4: Ne biakalua ne bakateleja kabidi dîyi, ne kabakadiumvua to.
11.5: Ne bakateleja kabidi dîyi musangu muisâtu, ne bakakangula matshi abu bua kuditeleja; ne mesu abu avua matangila ku luseka luvua mutoyi wadi uluila; ne bakatangila ne disuminyina mu diûlu, muvua mutoyi ufumina.
11.6: Ne monayi, musangu muisâtu bakumvua dîyi diakatelejabu; ne diakabambila:
11.7: Monayi Muananyi Munanga, yeya udi unsankisha bikola, wa kundi mutumbishila dîna dianyi—mumvuilayi.
11.8: Ne biakalua ne, pakumvuabu bakabandisha kabidi mesu abu mu diûlu; ne monayi, bakamona Muntu ufuma mu diûlu; ne uvua muvuala nkanzu mutoka; ne wakapueka panshi ne wakimana munkatshi muabu; ne mesu a musumba mujima akakudimuka kudiye, ne kabakidikija kubulula mikana yabu to, nansha bua kuyikilangana bobu nkayabu, ne kabavua bamanya tshivuabi biumvuija to, bualu bua bakela meji ne muanjelu ki uvua mubamuenekela.
11.9: Ne biakalua ne wakôlola tshianza tshienda ne wakambila bantu, wamba ne:
11.10: Monayi, ndi Yezu Kilisto, uvua baprofete bajadika ne nealua pa buloba.
11.11: Ne monayi, ndi bukenka ne moyo wa ba pa buloba; ne ngakanua dikopu dia bululu diakampesha Tatu, ne ngakatumbisha Tatu mu diambula dia mibi ya ba pa buloba, mu diodi ngakitaba disua dia Tatu mu bintu bionsu kumbukila ku mbangilu.
11.12: Ne biakalua ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â musumba mujima wa bantu wakapona panshi; bualu bakavuluka ne bavua bamba mêyi a buprofete munkatshi muabu ne, Kilisto neadileja kudibu kunyima kua dibanda dienda mu diûlu.
11.13: Ne biakalua ne Mukalenga wakabambila wamba ne:
11.14: Jukayi ne luayi kundi, bua nuela bianza bienu mu badi yanyi, ne kabidi bua ne numvua bibangu bia misonsu mu bianza bianyi ne mu makasa anyi, bua ne numanya ne ndi Nzambi wa Isalele, ne Nzambi wa buloba bujima, ne mvua mushipibua bua mibi ya ba pa buloba.
11.15: Ne biakalua ne musumba wa bantu wakasemena, ne kuela bianza biabu mu badi yenda, ne kumvua bibangu bia misonsu mu bianza bienda ne mu makasa enda; ne etshi bakenza, basemena ku muntu ku muntu tô ne pakasemenabu bonsu, ne kumona ne mesu abu ne kulenga ne bianza biabu, ne kumanya bua bushuwa ne kujadika ne, uvua yeya, uvuabi bifundibua kudi baprofete, walua.
11.16: Ne pakayabu bonsu ne pakadimuenenabu, bakabila ne dîyi dimua, bamba:
11.17: Hozana! Dibeneshibua dikala dîna dia Nzambi Mutamba Bunena! Ne bakapona panshi ku makasa a Yezu, ne bakamukukuila.
11.18: Ne biakalua ne wakambila Nefi (bualu Nefi uvua munkatshi mua musumba wa bantu) ne wakamupesha mukenji ne asemena.
11.19: Ne Nefi wakajuka ne wakasemena, ne wakinama kumpala kua Mukalenga ne wakatua makasa enda mishiku.
11.20: Ne Mukalenga wakamupesha mukenji ne ajuka. Ne wakajuka ne wakimana kumpala kuenda.
11.21: Ne Mukalenga wakamuambila ne: Ndi nkupesha bukôkeshi bua utambuisha bantu aba pangikala mubanda kabidi mu diûlu.
11.22: Ne kabidi Mukalenga wakabikila bakuabu, ne kuamba kudibu momumua; ne wakabapesha bukola bua kutambuisha. Ne wakamba kudibu: Ku mushindu ewu nenutambuisha; ne kakua kuikala matandu munkatshi muenu to.
11.23: Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, ewu yonsu udi ukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenda bua mêyi enu, ne ujinga kutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, mushindu ewu nenumutambuisha—Monayi, nenupueka ne nenuimana mu mâyi, ne mu dîna dianyi nenumutambuisha.
11.24: Ne mpindiewu monayi, â adi mêyi anuamba, nubabikila mu dîna, nuamba:
11.25: Muikala mupeshibua bukôkeshi kudi Yezu Kilisto, ndi nkutambuisha mu dîna dia Tatu, ne dia Muana, ne dia Nyuma wa Tshijila. Amena.
11.26: Ne pashisha nenubina mu mâyi, ne kubapatula kabidi mu mâyi.
11.27: Ne ku mushindu ewu nenutambuisha mu dîna dianyi; bualu monayi, bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, Tatu, ne Muana, ne Nyuma wa Tshijila badi tshimua; ne ndi munda mua Tatu, ne Tatu udi munda muanyi, ne Tatu ne mema tudi tshimua.
11.28: Ne nenutambuisha nanku bilondeshila bu mundi munupesha mukenji. Ne kakuikadi matandu munkatshi muenu to, bu muvuabi bikala tô ne mpindiewu; kakuikadi matandu munkatshi muenu bitangila malu a dilongesha dianyi to, bu muvuabi bikala tô ne mpindiewu.
11.29: Bualu bulelela, bulelela ndi nnuambila, udi ne nyuma wa dikokangana kena wanyi to, kadi udi wa diabulu, udi muikala tatuenda wa dikokangana, ne udi usonsola mitshima ya bantu bua kutandangana ne tshiji.
11.30: Monayi, edi kadiena dilongesha dianyi to, bua kusonsola mitshima ya bantu bua kuluishangana ne tshiji; kadi edi didi dilongesha dianyi, bua bintu bia nanku bijika.
11.31: Monayi, bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, nennumanyisha dilongesha dianyi.
11.32: Ne edi didi dilongesha dianyi, ne didi dilongesha didi Tatu mumpesha; ne ndi njadika bua Tatu, ne Tatu udi ujadika buanyi, ne Nyuma wa Tshijila udi ujadika bua Tatu ne buanyi; ne ndi njadika ne Tatu udi upesha bantu bonsu mukenji, muaba yonsu, bua kukudimuna mutshima ne kungitabuja.
11.33: Ne ewu yonsu udi ungitabuja, ne udi utambuishibua, awawu neapandishibua; ne badi aba bâpiana bukalenga bua Nzambi.
11.34: Ne ewu yonsu udi kayi ungitabuja, ne udi kayi utambuishibua, neapîshibua.
11.35: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila, edi didi dilongesha dianyi, ne ndi njadika buadi bua Tatu; ne ewu yonsu udi ungitabuja udi witabuja Tatu kabidi; ne kudiye Tatu neajadika buanyi, bualu neamukumbula ne kapia ne Nyuma wa Tshijila.
11.36: Ne nanku Tatu neajadika buanyi, ne Nyuma wa Tshijila neamujadikila bua Tatu ne buanyi; bualu Tatu, ne mema, ne Nyuma wa Tshijila tudi umua.
11.37: Ne ndi nnuambila kabidi ne, nudi ne tshia kukudimuna mutshima, ne kulua bu mudi muana muteketa, ne kutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, tshianana kanuena mua kupeta bintu ebi to nansha bishi.
11.38: Ne ndi nnuambila kabidi ne, nudi ne tshia kukudimuna mutshima, ne kutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, ne kulua bu mudi muana muteketa, tshianana kanuena mua kupiana bukalenga bua Nzambi to nansha bishi.
11.39: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, edi ki dilongesha dianyi, ne ewu yonsu udi wibakila pa mutu padi, udi wibakila pa mutu pa lubuebua luanyi, ne bibuelelu bia ku ngena kabiakubatshimuna to.
11.40: Ne ewu yonsu wayisha bipita anyi bishadila edi, ne kubishikika ne dilongesha dianyi, yeya udi ufumina ku bubi, ne kena muibakila pa mutu pa lubuebua luanyi to; kadi udi wibakila pa mutu pa tshibangilu tshia lusenga, ne bibuelelu bia ku ngena bidi bikala biunzulula bua kuakidila muntu awu palua mâyi a nkoka ne pabatûta mpepela.
11.41: Nanku, ndayi kudi bantu aba, ne yishayi mêyi angakudi, ne ku ndekelu ya buloba.

12.1: Ne biakalua ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â kudi Nefi, ne kudi bavua babikidibua abu, (mpindiewu bungi bua bavua babikidibua, ne bakapeta bukola ne bukôkeshi bua kutambuisha, buvua dikumi ne babidi) ne monayi, wakôlola tshianza tshienda kudi musumba wa bantu, ne wakabila kudibu, wamba: Nudi babeneshibua binuateya ntema ku mêyi a bayidi aba dikumi ne babidi bandi musungula munkatshi muenu bua kunulongesha, ne bua kuikala basadidi benu; ne ndi mubapesha bukola bua ne banutambuisha ne mâyi; ne kunyima kua nuenu batambuishibua ne mâyi, monayi, nennutambuisha ne kapia ne Nyuma wa Tshijila; bua nanku nudi babeneshibua binuangitabuja ne kutambuishibua, kunyima kua nuenu bammona ne bamanya ne ndiku.
12.2: Ne kabidi, nangananga babeneshibua badi aba bitabuja mêyi enu bualu bua nenujadika ne nuamonyi, ne nudi bamanya ne ndi. Eyowa, babeneshibua badi aba bitabuja mêyi enu, ne bâpueka mu ndondu ya didipuekesha ne bâtambuishibua, bualu nebakumbudibua ne kapia ne Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne nebapeta dilekedibua dia mibi yabu.
12.3: Eyowa, babeneshibua badi bapela mu nyuma badi balua kundi, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu budi buabu.
12.4: Ne kabidi, babeneshibua badi bonsu badi badila, bualu nebasambibua.
12.5: Ne babeneshibua badi bapola, bualu nebapiana buloba.
12.6: Ne babeneshibua badi bonsu badi ne nzala ne nyota ya buakana, bualu nebuwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila.
12.7: Ne babeneshibua badi bena lusa, bualu nebapeta lusa.
12.8: Ne babeneshibua badi bonsu badi ne mutshima mukezuka, bualu nebamona Nzambi.
12.9: Ne babeneshibua badi bonsu benji ba ditalala, bualu nebabikidibua ne bana ba Nzambi.
12.10: Ne babeneshibua badi bonsu badi bakengeshibua bua bualu bua dîna dianyi, bualu bukalenga bua mu diûlu budi buabu.
12.11: Ne nudi babeneshibua pânupenda bantu ne pânukengeshabu, ne pânushiminyinabu malu mabi a mushindu yonsu, bua bualu buanyi;
12.12: Bualu nenuikala ne disanka dinena ne nenusangala menamena, bualu difutu dienu mu diûlu nedikala dinena; bualu nanku ki muakakengeshabu baprofete bavua kumpala kuenu.
12.13: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, ndi nutuma bua nuikala mukela wa buloba; kadi pikala mukela mujimija kutua kuawu, ne batuisha buloba ne tshinyi? Mukela kawakuikala muimpa bua tshintu kabidi to, kadi bua kuipatshibua ne kudiatakajibua mu makasa abu.
12.14: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila, ndi nupesha bua kuikala bukenka bua bantu aba. Tshimenga tshiasa pa kakuna katshiena mua kusokokibua to.
12.15: Monayi, bantu badi batemesha muinda ne ba’uteka muinshi mua tshibondu anyi? To, kadi badi ba’uteka pa mensa a muinda, ne udi ufila bukenka kudi bonsu badi bikala mu nzubu;
12.16: Bua nanku lekelayi bukenka buenu buengelela bikola kumpala kua bantu aba, bua ne bamona bienzedi bienu bimpa ne batumbisha Tatuenu udi mu diûlu.
12.17: Kanuedi meji ne ndi mulua bua kushipa mikenji anyi mêyi a baprofete to. Ntshiena mulua bua kushipa to kadi bua kukumbaja;
12.18: Bualu bulelela ndi nnuambila, katoba anyi kaleta nansha kamua kakena kajimina ku mikenji to, kadi kundi bionsu biakumbajibu.
12.19: Ne monayi, ndi munupesha mikenji ne mikandu ya Tatuanyi, ne nungitabuja, ne nukudimuna mutshima bua mibi yenu, ne nulua kundi ne mutshima mutshibuluka ne nyuma munyingalala. Monayi, nudi bikala ne mikenji kumpala kuenu, ne mikenji yakumbajibu.
12.20: Bua nanku luayi kundi ne nupandishibua; bualu bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, pa kumbusha nuenu balama mikenji yanyi, indi munupesha diba edi, kanuakubuela mu bukalenga bua mu diûlu to nansha bishi.
12.21: Nuvua bumvua ne bantu ba tshikondu tshia kala bakamba, ne bidi bifundibua kabidi kumpala kuenu ne, kushipi muntu to, ne ewu yonsu washipa muntu neikala mu njiwu wa dikosedibua dia tshibawu tshia Nzambi;
12.22: Kadi ndi nnuambila ne, ewu yonsu udi ufîkila muanabu tshiji neikala mu njiwu wa tshilumbuluilu tshienda. Ne ewu yonsu wambila muanabu ne, Laka, neikala mu njiwu wa kudi tshipangu; ne ewu yonsu wamba ne, Wewa mupota, neikala mu njiwu wa kapia ka mu ngena.
12.23: Bua nanku, biwalua kundi, anyi ujinga bua kulua kundi, ne uvuluka ne muanenu udi neba tshilumbu—
12.24: Ndâku kudi muanenu, ne diambedi ulengeja ne muanenu, ne pashisha ulua kundi ne kipatshila kajima ka mutshima, ne nenkuakidila.
12.25: Umvuangana ne muluishi weba lukasa pawutshidi muikala nenda mu njila, bua kalu kukukuata diba dionsu, ne newedibua mu buloko.
12.26: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nkuambila ne, kuakupatukamu to nansha mushindu kayi tô ne pawikala mufuta ne senina wa ndekelu. Ne pawutshidi muikala mu buloko udi mua kufuta nansha senina umua anyi? Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, To.
12.27: Monayi, bantu ba tshikondu tshia kala bakafunda ne, kuakuenda masandi to;
12.28: Kadi ndi nnuambila ne, ewu yonsu udi utangila mukaji, bua kumualakana, ukadi mumana kuenda nenda masandi mu mutshima wenda.
12.29: Monayi, ndi nupesha mukenji ne, kanulekedi bua tshintu nansha tshimua tshia ku bintu ebi tshibuela mu mutshima wenu to;
12.30: Bualu bidi bitamba buimpa ne nudibengela bintu ebi, bua nanku nenuambula mutshi wenu mutshiamakana, pa mutu pa nuenu kuedibua mu ngena.
12.31: Bidi bifunda ne, ewu yonsu wipata mukajenda, mulekelayi amupesha mukanda wa dishipa dia dibaka.
12.32: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila, ewu yonsu wîpata mukaji wenda, amu bua buendenda, udi umuenzeja kuenda masandi; ne ewu yonsu udi usela mukaji udi mushipa dibaka udi wenda masandi.
12.33: Ne kabidi bidi bifunda ne, kuditshipi tshianana to, kadi wenzela Mukalenga mitshipu yeba;
12.34: Kadi bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, kanuditshipi nansha to; nansha kudi diûlu, bualu didi nkuasa wa butumbi wa Nzambi;
12.35: Anyi kudi buloba, bualu bua budi tshitekelu tshia makasa enda;
12.36: Kuditshipi nansha ku mutu weba, bualu bua kuena mua kuvuija lusuki lufîka anyi lutoka to;
12.37: Kadi diakula dieba dikala Eyowa, eyowa; To, to; bualu diakula dionsu didi ditentekeja pa ebi didi difumina ku bualu bubi.
12.38: Ne monayi, bidi bifunda ne, disu ku disu, ne dinu ku dinu;
12.39: Kadi ndi nnuambila ne, kanuluanganyi ne bubi to, kadi ewu yonsu wakutûta ku ditama dia tshianza tshia baluma, umuandamuina dikuabu kabidi;
12.40: Ne biaya neba muntu ku tshilumbuluilu ne kukunyenga tshilamba tshieba, lekela angata ne tshinkutu tshieba kabidi;
12.41: Ne ewu yonsu wakuendesha kilometre umua, enda nenda kilometre ibidi.
12.42: Upesha udi ukulomba, ne kupadi udi musua kukusomba tshintu to.
12.43: Ne monayi bifunda kabidi ne, neunanga mukueba ne ukina muena lukuna neba;
12.44: Kadi monayi ndi nnuambila, nangayi bena lukuna benu, beneshayi badi banutshipa, enzelayi badi banukina bimpa, ne sambilayi bua badi banumuenena ne badi banukengesha;
12.45: Bua ne nuikala bana ba Tatuenu udi mu diûlu; bualu udi ubandisha diba dienda bua babi ne bimpa.
12.46: Bua nanku malu awu avua mikala a mu tshikondu tshia kala, avua muinshi mua mikenji, kundi adi makumbajibua onsu.
12.47: Malu a kala ajiki, ne malu onsu alu mapia-mapia.
12.48: Nanku ndi musua ne nuikala bajalama bu mundi mema, anyi bu mudi Tatu wenu udi mu diûlu muikala mujalama.

13.1: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne ndi musua ne nufila ka lusa kudi bapela; kadi dimukayi bua kanufidi ka lusa kenu kumpala kua bantu bua banumona; tshianana kanuena ne difutu dia kudi Tatu wenu udi mu diûlu to.
13.2: Bua nanku, panuafila ka lusa kenu, kanuedi mpungi kumpala kuenu to, bu mudi bantu ba mpala ibidi benza mu nsunagoga ne mu misêsu, bua bantu babatumbisha. Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, bobu bakadi bapeta difutu diabu.
13.3: Kadi pawudi ufila ka lusa, kulekedi tshianza tshieba tshia bakaji tshimanya tshidi tshianza tshieba tshia baluma tshienza to;
13.4: Bua ne ka lusa keba kikala ka mu musokoku; ne Tatu weba udi umona mu musokoku, neakufuta patoka.
13.5: Ne pawudi usambila kuakuenza bu mudi bantu ba mpala ibidi benza to, bualu badi bananga kusambila, bimana mu nsunagoga ne mu mansangu a misêsu, bua ne bantu babamona. Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, bobu bakadi bapeta difutu diabu.
13.6: Kadi wewa, pawudi usambila, buela mu kazubu keba ka tshisokomenu, ne pawinjila tshibi, usambila Tatu weba udi muikala mu musokoku; ne Tatu weba, udi umona mu musokoku, neakufuta patoka.
13.7: Kadi panudi nusambila, kanuakudi biakulakula to, bu bu mudi bampakanyi benza to, bualu badi bela meji ne nebabateleja bua bungi bua diakula diabu.
13.8: Kanuikadi bu mudibu to, bualu Tatu wenu udi mumanya bintu binudi nabi dijinga kumpala kua kanuyi banji kumulomba.
13.9: Ku mushindu ewu bua nanku nenusambila: Tatu wetu udi mu diûlu, dîna dieba ditumba.
13.10: Disua dieba dienzeka pa buloba bu mudidi dienzeka mu diûlu.
13.11: Ne utubuikidila mabanza etu, bu mutudi tubuikidila badi netu mabanza.
13.12: Ne kutufikishi ku ditêtshibua to, kadi utupatuisha mu bubi.
13.13: Bualu bukalenga, ne bukôkeshi, ne butumbi, bidi bieba bua kashidi. Amena.
13.14: Bualu, binuabuikidila bantu mapanga abu Tatu wenu wa mu diûlu neanubuikidila penu;
13.15: Kadi binuabenga kubuikidila bantu mapanga abu Tatu wenu kakunubuikidila mapanga enu to.
13.16: Menamena kabidi, panudi nujila kanuikadi ne mpala mibungama bu mudi bantu ba mpala ibidi benza, bualu bua badi bakudimuna mpala yabu bua bamueneka kudi bantu ne badi bajila to. Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, bobu bakadi bapeta difutu diabu.
13.17: Kadi wewa, pawudi ujila, kulâba manyi pa mutu weba, ne usukula mpala;
13.18: Bua kumueneki kudi bantu ne udi ujila to, kadi kudi Tatu weba, udi muikala mu musokoku; ne Tatu weba, udi umona mu musokoku, neakufuta patoka.
