13.19: Kanudibutshidi bintu bia mushinga pa buloba, padi musuasua ne dimomena bibipisha, ne bivi babuela ne bîba to;
13.20: Kadi dibutshilayi bintu bia mushinga mu diûlu, mudi bishi anyi dimomena kabiyi bibipisha, ne bivi kabayi babuela anyi bîba to.
13.21: Bualu kudi bintu bueba bia mushinga, ki kuikala mutshima weba kabidi.
13.22: Disu didi muinda wa mubidi; bua nanku, bikala disu dieba dimona tshintu bimpa, mubidi weba mujima newikala muwula ntenta ne bukenka.
13.23: Kadi pikala disu dieba dibi, mubidi weba mujima neuwula ntenta ne mîdima. Bua nanku, pikala bukenka budi munda mueba buikala mîdima, bu mudiyi minena mîdima eyi!
13.24: Muntu nansha umua kena mua kusadila bamfumu babidi to; bualu neakina umua ne neananga mukuabu, anyi nansha nealamata kudi umua ne apetula mukuabu. Kanuena mua kusadila Nzambi ne Mamona to.
13.25: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â wakatangila bayidi dikumi ne babidi bavuaye musungula, ne wakabambila ne: Nuvuluka mêyi andi muamba. Bualu monayi, nuenu nudi bandi musungula bua kusadila bantu aba. Bua nanku ndi nnuambila ne, kanuedi meji bua moyo wenu, bua tshinuadia, anyi tshinuanua to; anyi nansha bua mubidi wenu, bua tshinuavuala to. Moyo kawena mutamba biakudia, ne mubidi kawena mutamba bivualu anyi?
13.26: Monayi nyunyi ya mûlu, bualu kayena ikuna, anyi kayena ipôla anyi kayena isangisha nteta mu bisaka to; kadi Tatu wenu udi mu diûlu udi uyidîsha. Nuenu kanuena bayitamba anyi?
13.27: Nganyi wa munkatshi muenu udi ku dielangana meji dienda mua kulunga nkubita umua ku bula buenda?
13.28: Ne bua tshinyi nudi nuelangana meji a bivualu? Tangilayi bilongu bia mu mpata mudibi bisasa; kabiena bikuata mudimu, anyi kabiena bisala buanda to;
13.29: Ne kadi ndi nnuambila ne, nansha Solomo, uvua ne butumbi buenda bonsu, kabakamuvuadika bu mudi tshimua tshia ku bilongu ebi to.
13.30: Bua nanku, bikala Nzambi udi uvuadika mashinda a mu mpata nanku, adiku lelu, makelela adi edibua mu mfulu, mena nanku neanuvuadika, binuikala kanuyi ba ditabuja dikesa to.
13.31: Bua nanku kanuedi meji to, nuamba ne, Netudia tshinyi? anyi, Netunua tshinyi? anyi ne, Ntshinyi tshituadivuadika natshi?
13.32: Bualu bua Tatu wenu udi mu diûlu mmumanya ne nudi dijinga ne bintu ebi bionsu.
13.33: Kadi kebayi kumpala bukalenga bua Nzambi ne buakana buenda, ne bintu ebi bionsu nebanusakidilabi.
13.34: Bua nanku kanuelanganyi meji a malaba to, bualu malaba neadielela meji a bintu biawu. Dituku dionsu didi ne luadi lutatu ludi ludikumbanyina.

14.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â wakakudimuka kabidi kudi musumba wa bantu, ne wakabulula mukana muenda kudibu kabidi, wamba ne: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, kanulumbuluishi bakuabu to, bua kabanulumbuluishi penu to.
14.2: Bualu ne dilumbuluisha dinudi nulumbuluisha, nebanulumbuluisha kabidi nâdi; ne dipima dinudi nupima, nebanupima kabidi nâdi.
14.3: Ne bua tshinyi udi utangila kasonsa kadi mu disu dia muanenu, kadi kuyi umona mukamba udi mu dieba disu to?
14.4: Kadi munyi mûdi mua kuambila muanenu ne: Lekela nkumbusha kasonsa kadi mu disu dieba—ne tangila, mukamba muikala mu dieba disu?
14.5: Wewa muntu wa mpala ibidi, kumpala umbusha mukamba udi mu disu dieba; ne pashisha neumona bimpa bua kumbusha kasonsa kadi mu disu dia muanenu.
14.6: Kanupeshi mbua tshintu tshia tshijila to, anyi kanuimanshi masanga kumpala kua nguluba to, bua kayilu kuadiatakaja muinshi mua makasa ayi, ne kayikudimuki kabidi ne kayinupandakaji.
14.7: Lombayi, ne nebanupesha; kebayi, ne nenupeta; kokolayi, ne netshiunzuludibua kunudi.
14.8: Bualu yonsu udi ulomba, udi upeta; ne udi ukeba, udi umona; ne udi ukokola, badi bamunzuluila.
14.9: Kadi muntu kayi wa kunudi, pikala muanenda wa baluma ulomba diampa, yeya neamupesha dibua anyi?
14.10: Anyi pikalaye ulomba mushipa, yeya neamupesha nyoka anyi?
14.11: Panuikala nuenu, badi bikala bantu babi, bamanya bua kupesha bana benu bintu bimpa, Tatu wenu udi mu diûlu kena utamba kupesha badi bamulomba bintu bimpa anyi?
14.12: Bua nanku, bintu bionsu binudi basua ne bantu banuenzela, benzelayi momumua, bualu etshi tshidi mikenji ne baprofete.
14.13: Buelelayi ku tshibuelelu tshifinakana; bualu tshibuelelu tshidi tshinena, ne njila udi mualabala, udi ulombola ku dibutuka, ne kudi ba bungi badi babuelelaku;
14.14: Bualu tshibuelelu tshidi tshifinakana, ne njila udi mubumbakana, udi ulombola ku moyo, ne kudi bakesa badi bamupeta.
14.15: Dimukilayi baprofete ba mafi, badi balua kunudi bavuala biseba bia mikoku, kadi munda muabu bikala mibuabua ya lonji.
14.16: Ne nenubamanyina ku bimuma biabu. Bantu batu bapôla tumuma tua mvinyo ku mionji ya meba, anyi mfigi ku mingonga anyi?
14.17: Mena nanku mutshi muimpa yonsu udi ukuama bimuma bimpa; kadi mutshi munyanguka udi ukuama bimuma bibi.
14.18: Mutshi muimpa kawena mua kukuama bimuma bibi to, anyi mutshi munyanguka kawena mua kukuama bimuma bimpa to.
14.19: Mutshi yonsu udi kawuyi ukuama bimuma bimpa udi upudibua, ne udi wimanshibua mu kapia.
14.20: Bua nanku, nenubamanyina ku bimuma biabu.
14.21: Muntu yonsu udi umbikila ne, Mukalenga, Mukalenga, kakubuela mu bukalenga bua mu diûlu to; kadi amu udi wenza disua dia Tatu wanyi udi mu diûlu.
14.22: Ba bungi nebangambila dituku adi ne: Mukalenga, Mukalenga, katuvua bamba mêyi a buprofete mu dîna dieba anyi? ne mu dîna dieba katuvua bipata badiabulu anyi? ne mu dîna dieba katuvua benza malu a bungi a dikema anyi?
14.23: Ne pashisha nembambila patoka ne: Ntshitu munumanya nansha; umbukayi kundi, nuenu benji ba malu mabi.
14.24: Bua nanku, ewu yonsu udi umvua mêyi anyi â ne udi u’enzela, nemmufuanyikija ne muntu wa lungenyi, wakibakila nzubu wenda pa mutu pa lubuebua—
14.25: Ne mvula wakaloka, ne mâyi a nkoka akalua, ne mpepa yakalua, ne biakadikuma ku nzubu awu; ne kakupuka to, bualu uvua muibakila pa mutu pa lubuebua.
14.26: Ne muntu yonsu udi umvua mêyi anyi â ne kena u’enzela to neafuanyikijibua ne muntu mupota, wakibaka nzubu wenda pa mutu pa lusenga—
14.27: Ne mvula wakaloka, ne mâyi a nkoka akalua, ne mpepa yakalua, ne biakadikuma ku nzubu awu; ne wakupuka, ne diupuka dienda divua dikola.

15.1: Ne biakalua ne pakajikija Yezu mêyi â wakakupa mesu enda ku mpenga yonsu kudi musumba wa bantu, ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, numvu bintu bingalongeshi kumpala kua mema mubanda kudi Tatu wanyi; bua nanku, ewu yonsu udi uvuluka mêyi â ne udi u’enzela, yeya nemmujula ku dituku dia ndekelu.
15.2: Ne biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â wakamona ne kuvua bamua munkatshi muabu bavua bakema, ne badiebeja ne tshinyi tshivuaye musua kuenza ne mikenji ya Mose; bualu kabavua bumvua mêyi avua amba ne bintu bia kala bikadi bipita, ne bintu bionsu biakadi bilua bipia-bipia to.
15.3: Ne wakabambila ne: Kanukemi to bualu nganuambidi ne bintu bia kala bikadi bipita, ne bintu bionsu bikadi bilua bipia-bipia.
15.4: Monayi, ndi nnuambila ne mikenji ivua mipeshibua kudi Mose yakumbajibu.
15.5: Monayi, ndi yeya wakafila mikenji, ne ndi yeya wakenza tshipungidi ne bantu banyi Isalele; bua nanku, mikenji idi mikumbajibua kundi, bualu ndi mulua bua kukumbaja mikenji; bua nanku idi ne ndekelu.
15.6: Monayi, ntshiena nshipa mêyi a baprofete to, bualu yonsu idi kayiyi mikumbajibua kundi to, bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, neikumbajibua yonsu.
15.7: Ne bualu nganuambidi ne bintu bia kala bikadi bipita, ntshiena nshipa bivua biamba bitangila malu atshilualua to.
15.8: Bualu monayi, tshipungidi tshingakenza ne bantu banyi katshiena tshikumbajibua tshionsu to; kadi mikenji ivua mipeshibua kudi Mose idi ne ndekelu kundi.
15.9: Monayi, mema ndi mikenji, ne bukenka. Tangilayi kundi, ne nanukilayi tô ne ku ndekelu, ne nenupeta moyo; bualu nempesha moyo wa tshiendelela kudi ewu udi unanukila tô ne ku ndekelu.
15.10: Monayi, ndi munupesha mikandu; bua nanku lamayi mikandu yanyi. Ne etshi tshidi mikenji ne mêyi a baprofete, bualu bulelela bidi bijadika bua bualu buanyi.
15.11: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â, wakambila dikumi ne babidi bakasungulaye abu ne:
15.12: Nuenu nudi bayidi banyi; ne nuenu nudi bukenka kudi bantu aba, badi bikala tshishadila tshia nzubu wa Yosefe.
15.13: Ne monayi, ebu budi bulaba bua bupianyi buenu; ne Tatu udi munupeshabu.
15.14: Ne musangu nansha umua Tatu kavua mumpesha mukenji ne mbuambila bana benu badi ku Yelushalema to.
15.15: Anyi musangu nansha umua Tatu kavua mumpesha mukenji ne mbambila bitangila bîsa bikuabu bia ku nzubu Isalele, bidi Tatu mulombola kula ne bulaba to.
15.16: Nanku ki mudi Tatu mumpeshela mukenji, ne mbambila etshi:
15.17: Ndi ne mikoku mikuabu idi kayiyi ya mu tshikumbi etshi to; ndi ne tshia kulua nayi payi, ne neyumvua dîyi dianyi; ne nekuikala tshisumbu tshia mikoko tshimua, ne mulami umua.
15.18: Ne mpindiewu, bua diumisha dia nshingu ne dipanga ditabuja kabakumvua dîyi dianyi to; bua nanku Tatu wakampesha mukenji ne tshibambidi bitangila bualu ebu to.
15.19: Kadi, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne Tatu uvua mumpesha mukenji, ne ndi nnuambila ne, nuvua batapulula kudibu bua malu mabi abu; bua nanku kabena bamanya bualu buenu to bua malu mabi abu.
15.20: Ne bulelela, ndi nnuambila kabidi ne Tatu uvua mutapulula bîsa bikuabu kudibu; ne kabena bamanya bualu buabu to bua malu mabi abu.
15.21: Ne bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, nudi bangakamba ne: Ndi ne mikoko mikuabu idi kayiyi ya mu tshikumbi etshi to; yoyi ndi ne tshia kulua nayi payi, ne neyumvua dîyi dianyi; ne nekuikala tshisumbu tshia mikoko tshimua, ne mulami umua.
15.22: Ne kabakumvua to, bualu bakatshinka ne ivua mikala Bena Bisamba bia Benda; bualu kabakumvua ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda nebakudimuna moyo kupitshila ku diyisha diabu to.
15.23: Ne kabakangumvua to pangakamba ne nebateleja dîyi dianyi; ne kabakumvua ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda kabakuteleja dîyi dianyi nansha musangu umua to—ne ntshiakudileja kudibu to, pa kumbusha bikala kupitshila ku Nyuma wa Tshijila.
15.24: Kadi monayi, nuateleji dîyi dianyi, ne nuammonyi; ne nudi mikoku yanyi, ne nudi nubadibua munkatshi mua aba badi Tatu mumpesha.

16.1: Ne bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne ndi ne mikoku mikuabu, idi kayiyi ya mu bulaba ebu to, anyi ya mu bulaba bua Yelushalema to, anyi mu tshitupa nansha tshimua ku mpenga yonsu ya bulaba abu bumvua muya kusadila to.
16.2: Bualu bobu bandi ngamba abu kabatu banji kumvua dîyi dianyi to; anyi tshitu muanji kudileja kudibu to.
16.3: Kadi ndi mupeta mukenji mufumina kudi Tatu ne nenya kudibu, ne nebumvua dîyi dianyi, ne nebabadibua munkatshi mua mikoko yanyi, bua ne kuikala tshisumbu tshia mikoko tshimua ne mulami umua; bua nanku ndi nya kudileja kudibu.
16.4: Ne ndi nupesha mukenji ne nufunda miaku eyi kunyima kua mema muya, bua ne pikalabi ne bantu banyi badi mu Yelushalema, bavua bammona ne bavua bikala nanyi mu disadila dianyi, kabayi balomba kudi Tatu mu dîna dianyi to, bua ne bapeta dimanya dienu ku Nyuma wa Tshijila, ne bua bîsa bikuabu kabidi bidibu kabayi bamanya to, bua ne miaku eyi inuafunda ilamibua ne ifikishibua kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, bua ne kupitshila ku tshiwudi tshia Bena Bisamba bia Benda, tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi yabu, tshiatangalajibua pa mpala wa buloba bua bualu bua dipanga ditabuja diabu, tshipingajibua koku, anyi tshipingajibua ku dimanya dianyi mema, Musungidi wabu.
16.5: Ne pashisha nembasangisha kumbukila ku matumba anayi a buloba; ne pashisha nenkumbaja tshipungidi tshivua Tatu muenza ne bantu bonsu ba ku nzubu wa Isalele.
16.6: Ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda badi babeneshibua bua bualu bua ditabuja diabu kundi, bua ne ku Nyuma wa Tshijila, udi ubajadikila bualu buanyi ne bua Tatu.
16.7: Monayi, Tatu udi wamba ne, bua bualu bua ditabuja diabu kundi ne bua dipanga dia ditabuja dieba, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, mu dituku dia ku ndekelu bulelela nebulua kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, bua ne tshiwudi tshia bintu ebi tshimanyishibua kudibu.
16.8: Kadi Tatu udi wamba ne, diakabi kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda badi kabayi bitabuja to—bualu nansha mudibu balua pa mpala wa bulaba ebu, ne badibu batangalaja bantu banyi ba ku nzubu wa Isalele; ne bantu banyi ba ku nzubu wa Isalele badi bipatshibua munkatshi muabu, ne badi badiatakajibua muinshi mua makasa abu;
16.9: Ne bua midimu ya lusa lua Tatu kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, ne kabidi bitungu bia Tatu pa mutu pa bantu banyi badi bikala ba ku nzubu wa Isalele, bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, kunyima kua bionsu ebi, ne ndi muenza ne bantu banyi ba ku nzubu wa Isalele batûtshibua, ne batatshibua, ne bashipibua, ne kuipatshibua munkatshi muabu, ne bakinyibua kudibu, ne nebalua muneku ne muanu munkatshi muabu—
16.10: Ne nanku Tatu udi mumpesha mukenji ne nnuambila ne: Mu dituku adi penza Bena Bisamba bia Benda mibi bishilangana ne lumu luimpa luanyi, ne nebabenga tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi, ne nebikala badibandisha mu diditambisha mu mitshima yabu bu bukua bisamba bionsu, ne kupita bantu bonsu ba pa buloba bujima, ne nebikala buwula ntenta ne mishindu yonsu ya mafi, ne didinga, ne dienzelangana dia bibi, ne mishindu yonsu ya mpala ibidi, ne dishibeya dia bantu, ne buakuidi bua mafi, ne masandi, ne malu mapita bubi a mu musokoku; ne pikalabu benza bintu ebi bionsu, ne babenga tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi, bulelela, monayi, Tatu udi wamba ne, nengumbusha tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi munkatshi muabu.
16.11: Ne pashisha nemvuluka tshipungidi tshianyi tshingakenza ne bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, ne nembatuadila lumu luimpa luanyi.
16.12: Ne nenkuleja, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda kabakuikala ne bukola kûdi to; kadi nemvuluka tshipungidi tshianyi kûdi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, ne neufika ku dimanya dia tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi.
16.13: Tatu udi wamba ne, kadi pikala Bena Bisamba bia Benda bakudimuna mutshima ne bapingana kundi, monayi nebabadibua munkatshi mua bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele.
16.14: Ne Tatu udi wamba ne, ntshiakulekela bua ne bantu banyi, badi bikala ba ku nzubu wa Isalele, baya munkatshi muabu, ne babadiatakaja panshi to.
16.15: Kadi bobu kabayi batangila kundi, ne bumvuila dîyi dianyi to, nembalekela, eyowa, nendekela ne bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, baya munkatshi muabu, ne bua babadiatakaja panshi, ne nebikala bu mudi mukela udi mujimija ditua diawu, ne kubangila apu kawena muimpa bua tshintu nansha tshimua kadi bua kuimanshibua, ne kudiatakajibua mu makasa a bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele.
16.16: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, ki mudi Tatu mumpesha mukenji nanku—ne mpesha bantu aba bulaba ebu bua bupianyi buabu.
16.17: Ne pashisha mêyi a muprofete Yeshaya neakumbajibua, adi amba ne:
16.18: Batentekedi beba nebabandisha dîyi; nebimba misambu ne dîyi pamua, bualu nebadimuena ne mesu pâpingaja Mukalenga Siyona kabidi.
16.19: Tudikayi ne disanka, imbayi pamua, nuenu miaba mitupu ya Yelushalema; bualu Mukalenga wasambi bantu benda, wasungidi Yelushalema.
16.20: Mukalenga waleji diboku dienda dia tshijila patoka ku mesu a bisamba bionsu; ne ndekelu ya buloba yonsu neimona lupandu lua Nzambi.

17.1: Monayi, mpindiewu biakalua ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â, wakatangila musumba yonsu wa bantu kabidi, ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, diba dianyi dikadi pabuipi.
17.2: Ndi mmona ne nudi bateketa, bua ne kanuena mua kumvua mêyi anyi onsu avua Tatu mumpesha mukenji bua kunuambila diba edi to.
17.3: Bua nanku, pinganayi ku mbelu, ne nunana meji bitangila bia malu anganuambidi, ne nuebeja Tatu, mu dîna dianyi, bua nuenu kumvua, ne kulongolola meji enu bua malaba, ne ndi ndua kabidi kunudi.
17.4: Kadi mpindiewu ndi nya kudi Tatu, ne bua kudileja kabidi kudi bîsa bijimina bia Isalele, bualu bua Tatu kabena bajimina to, bualu udi mumanya kudiye muya nabu.
17.5: Ne biakalua ne pakakula Yezu nanku, wakakupa mesu enda kabidi ku mpenga yonsu kudi musumba wa bantu, ne wakamona ne bavua ne binsonji, ne bakamutangila ne disuminyina bikala bu bavua basua kumulomba bua kushala nabu katantshi kala.
17.6: Ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, munda muanyi mudi muwujibua ne moyo wa lusa buenu.
17.7: Nudi ne babêdi munkatshi muenu anyi? Luayi nabu apa. Nudi ne bibombu, anyi mpofu, anyi batebuki, anyi badi balema, anyi bena nsudi, anyi badi ne bitupa bifulama, anyi bapata matshi, anyi badi batatshishibua mu mushindu yonsu anyi? Luayi nabu apa ne nembôndopa, bualu ndi ne moyo wa lusa buenu; munda muanyi mudi muwujibua ne lusa.
17.8: Bualu ndi mmona ne nudi nujinga ne nnuleja tshindi muenzela bana benu ku Yelushalema, bualu ndi mmona ne ditabuja dienu didi dikumbana bua mema kunôndopa.
17.9: Ne biakalua ne pakakulaye nanku, musumba yonsu wa bantu, wakasemena patshimua ne babêdi babu ne batatshishibua babu, ne balema babu, ne mpofu yabu, ne tumama tuabu, ne babu bonsu bavua batatshishibua mu mushindu yonsu; ne wakabôndopa bonsu bu muvuabu balua nabu kudiye.
17.10: Ne bonsu buabu, bavua bôndopibua ne bavua ne bukola bua mubidi, bakinama ku makasa enda, ne bakamukukuila; ne bonsu bavua mua kulua nansha muvuaku musumba wa bantu bakatua makasa enda mishiku, mua ne bakasukula makasa enda ne binsonji biabu.
17.11: Ne biakalua ne wakabapesha mukenji ne batuala bana babu bakesa.
17.12: Nanku bakatuala bana babu bakesa ne bakabateka panshi ku mpenga yenda yonsu, ne Yezu wakimana munkatshi muabu; ne musumba wa bantu wakunzulula njila tô ne pakabatualabu bonsu kudiye.
17.13: Ne biakalua ne pakabatualabu, ne pakimana Yezu munkatshi muabu, wakapesha musumba wa bantu mukenji bua batua binu panshi.
17.14: Ne biakalua ne pakatuabu binu panshi, Yezu wakela mikemu munda muenda, ne wakamba ne: Tatu, ndi mutatshishibua bua bubi bua bantu ba mu nzubu wa Isalele.
17.15: Ne pakambaye mêyi â, yeya nkayenda penda wakatua binu panshi; ne monayi wakasambila Tatu, ne bintu biakasambidilaye kabiena mua kufundibua to, ne musumba wa bantu bakamuteleja, wakajadika.
17.16: Ne mu mushindu ewu badi bajadika: Disu kaditu dianji kumona to, anyi ditshi kaditu dianji kumvua to, katshia, bintu binena ne bia dikema nanku to bu bituakumvua ne bituakamona Yezu wambila Tatu;
17.17: Ne ludimi kaluena mua kuamba to, anyi muntu nansha umua kena mua kubifunda to, anyi mitshima ya bantu kayena mua kuela meji a bintu bipita bunena ne bia dikema nanku bu bituakamona ne bituakumvua Yezu wamba to; ne muntu nansha umua kena mua kuela meji a disanka diakuwuja anyima yetu diba dituakamumvua usambila Tatu buetu.
17.18: Ne biakalua ne pakashîkija Yezu kusambila Tatu, wakajuka; kadi disanka dia musumba wa bantu divua dipita bunena tô ne bakatûtshika.
17.19: Ne biakalua ne Yezu wakakula nabu, ne wakabambila ne bajuka.
17.20: Ne bakajuka panshi, ne wakabambila ne: Nudi babeneshibua bua ditabuja dienu. Ne mpindiewu monayi, disanka dianyi ndiwula ntenta.
17.21: Ne pakambaye mêyi â, wakadila, ne musumba wa bantu wakajadika buatshi, ne yeya wakangata bana babu bateketa, ku umua ku umua, ne wakababenesha, ne wakasambila Tatu buabu.
17.23: Ne wakambila musumba wa bantu, ne wamba ne: monayi bana benu bateketa.
17.24: Ne bu muakatangilabu bua kumona bakabandisha mesu abu mu diûlu, ne bakamona diûlu diunzuluka, ne bakamona banjelu batuluka mu diûlu bu ne bavua munkatshi mua kapia; ne bakapueka panshi ne bakanyungulula bana bakesa abu ku mpenga yonsu, ne bakanyunguludibua ku mpenga yonsu ne kapia; ne banjelu bakabasadila.
17.25: Ne musumba wa bantu wakamona ne wakumvua ne wakajadika; ne badi bamanya ne bujadiki buabu budi bulelela bualu bonsu buabu bakamona ne kumvua, muntu yonsu buenda nkayenda; ne bavua bantu pabuipi ne bungi binunu bibidi ne nkama itanu; ne bavua bantu baluma, bantu bakaji, ne bana.

18.1: Ne biakalua ne Yezu wakapesha bayidi benda mukenji ne batuala diampa ne mvinyo kudiye.
18.2: Ne patshivuabu baya kukeba diampa ne mvinyo, wakapesha musumba wa bantu mukenji ne basomba pa buloba.
18.3: Ne pakalua bayidi ne diampa ne mvinyo, yeya wakangata diampa ne wakadikosolola ne wakadibenesha; ne wakadipesha bayidi ne wakabapesha mukenji ne badia.
18.4: Ne pakadiabu ne pakûkutabu, wakabapesha mukenji ne bapesha musumba wa bantu.
18.5: Ne pakadia musumba wa bantu ne pakûkutawu, wakambila bayidi ne: Monayi nekuikala umua munkatshi muenu wajididibua, ne nemmupesha bukôkeshi bua ne akosa diampa ne adibenesha ne adipesha bantu ba mu ekelezia wanyi, kudi bonsu bitabuja ne bâtambuishibua mu dîna dianyi.
18.6: Ne nenudienzeja bua kuenza nanku diba dionsu, mena bu mungenji, mena bu mungakosolodi diampa ne mungadibeneshi ne munganupeshidi.
18.7: Nenuenza nanku bua kuvuluka mubidi wanyi, unganuleji. Ne nebikala bujadiki kudi Tatu ne nudi numvuluka diba dionsu. Ne panuikala numvuluka diba dionsu, nenuikala ne Nyuma wanyi kunudi.
18.8: Ne biakalua ne pakambaye mêyi â, wakapesha bayidi benda mukenji ne bangata mvinyo uvua muikala mu dikopu ne bamunua, ne bapesha pabu musumba wa bantu bua ne banua.
18.9: Ne biakalua ne bakenza nanku, ne bakamunua ne bakûkuta; ne bakapesha musumba wa bantu, ne bakanua, ne bakûkuta.
18.10: Ne pakenza bayidi nanku, Yezu wakabambila ne: Nudi babeneshibua bua tshintu etshi tshinuenji, bualu etshi tshidi tshikumbaja mikenji yanyi, ne etshi tshidi tshijadika kudi Tatu ne nudi bitaba bua kuenza tshindi munupeshela mukenji.
18.11: Ne nenuenzela nanku diba dionsu badi bakudimuna mutshima ne batambuishibua mu dîna dianyi; ne nenuenza nanku bua kuvuluka mashi anyi, andi mumatshisha buenu, bua nujadika kudi Tatu ne nudi numvuluka diba dionsu. Ne panuikala numvuluka diba dionsu nenuikala ne Nyuma wanyi kunudi.
18.12: Ne ndi nupesha mukenji ne nuenza bintu ebi. Ne panuikala nuenza bintu ebi diba dionsu nudi babeneshibua, bualu nudi bibakibua pa mutu pa lubuebua luanyi.
18.13: Kadi bonsu ba munkatshi muenu bikala benza kupita anyi kushadila ebi kabena bibakibua pa mutu pa lubuebua luanyi to, kadi badi bibakibua pa mutu pa tshishimikidi tshia lusenga; ne padi mvula uloka, ne mâyi a nkoka alua, ne tshipepela tshipepa, netshidikuma kudibu, nebadishinda, ne bibuelelu bia ku ngena nebikala pabuipi biunzuluka bua kubakidila.
18.14: Bua nanku nudi babeneshibua binualama mikenji yanyi, idi Tatu mumpesha mukenji ne nnupesha.
18.15: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, nudi ne tshia kudimuka ne kusambila diba dionsu, bua kanulu kutêtshibua kudi diabulu, ne nulombolodibua bakuatshibu kudiye.
18.16: Ne bu mungasambidi munkatshi muenu mena ki munuasambila mu ekelezia wanyi, munkatshi mua bantu banyi badi bakudimuna mutshima ne badi batambuishibua mu dîna dianyi. Monayi ndi bukenka; nganuleji tshilejilu.
18.17: Ne biakalua ne pakambila Yezu bayidi benda mêyi â, wakakudimuka kabidi kudi musumba wa bantu ne wakabambila ne:
18.18: Monayi, bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila, nudi ne tshia kudimuka ne kusambila diba dionsu bua kanulu kukuluka mu ditêtshibua; bualu Satana udi ujinga bua kunupeta, bua ne anusengulula bu mponda.
18.19: Bua nanku nudi ne tshia kusambila Tatu diba dionsu mu dîna dianyi;
18.20: Ne tshionsu tshinualomba kudi Tatu mu dîna dianyi, tshidi tshikala tshiakana, nuitabuja ne nenupeta, monayi netshifidibua kunudi.
18.21: Sambilayi kudi Tatu mu mêku enu, diba dionsu mu dîna dianyi, bua ne bakaji benu ne bana benu balela babeneshibua.
18.22: Ne monayi, nutuilangana pamua misangu mivula; ne kanuakukandika muntu nansha bua kulua kunudi panuatuilangana pamua to, kadi balekelayi ne balua kunudi ne kanubakandiki to;
18.23: Kadi nenusambila buabu, ne kanuakubipata to; ne pikalabi ne badi balua kunudi misangu mivula nenusambila Tatu buabu, mu dîna dianyi.
18.24: Nanku, ambululayi bukenka buenu kûlu bua bukenkesha ba pa buloba. Monayi mema ndi bukenka bunuambulula kûlu—nuenzayi tshinudi bammona ngenza. Monayi nudi numona ne ngasambidi Tatu, ne nuakamona bonsu.
18.25: Ne nudi numona ne ntshiena muela mukenji ne muntu nansha umua wa kunudi umbuka kundi to, kadi pa mutu pa nanku ngedi mukenji ne nulua kundi, bua ne nulenga ne numona mputa yanyi; ne nuenzela ba pa buloba mushindu ewu; ne ewu yonsu udi ushipa mukenji ewu udi udilekela bua kukuatshibua mu ditêtshibua.
18.26: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â, wakakudimuna mesu enda kabidi kudi bayidi bavuaye musungula, ne wakabambila:
18.27: Monayi bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, ndi nupesha mukenji mukuabu, ne pashisha ndi ne tshia kuya kudi Tatu wanyi bua ne nkumbaja mikenji mikuabu idiye mumpesha.
18.28: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ewu udi mukenji undi nnupesha, panudi nuabanya musunyi wanyi ne mashi anyi, kanulekedi ne muntu nansha umua abiangata nuenu bamanya ne kena mukumbana to;
18.29: Bualu ewu yonsu udi udia musunyi wanyi ne udi unua mashi anyi kayi mukumbana to udi udia ne udi unua dipîshibua dia anyima wenda; bua nanku binuikala bamanya ne muntu kena mukumbana bua kudia mubidi wanyi ne kunua mashi anyi to nenumukandika.
18.30: Nansha nanku, kanuakumuipata munkatshi muenu to, kadi nenumusadila ne nenusambila Tatu buenda, mu dîna dianyi; ne pikalabi ne mmukudimuna mutshima ne mutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, pashisha nenumuakidila, ne nenumuabanyina musunyi ne mashi anyi.
18.31: Kadi pikalaye kayi mukudimuna mutshima to kakubadibua munkatshi mua bantu banyi to, bua ne kafuishi bantu banyi to, bualu monayi ndi mumanya mikoku yanyi, ne yoyi mmibadibua.
18.32: Nansha nanku, kanumuipatshi ku nsunagoga yenu to, anyi mu miaba yenu ya tshitendelelu to, bualu nenutungunuka kusadila bantu ba nanku awu; bualu kanuena bamanya to nebakudimuka ne nebakudimuna mutshima, ne nebalua kundi ne kipatshila kajima ka mutshima, ne nembôndopa; ne nenuikala njila wa kubatuadila lupandu.
18.33: Nanku, lamayi mêyi â andi munupeshela mukenji bua ne kanulu kuikala ne dipîshibua to; bualu diakabi kudi udi Tatu upîsha.
18.34: Ne ndi nupesha mikenji eyi bua matandu avua mikala munkatshi muenu. Ne nudi babeneshibua binuikala kanuyi ne matandu munkatshi muenu to.
18.35: Ne mpindiewu ndi nya kudi Tatu, bualu bidi bikengedibua ne nya kudi Tatu bua bimpa bienu.
18.36: Ne biakalua ne pakashîkija Yezu miaku eyi, wakalenga bayidi bavuaye musungula ne tshianza tshienda, ku muntu ku muntu, mena tô ne pakabalengaye bonsu, ne uvua wakula kudibu pavuaye ubalenga.
18.37: Ne musumba wa bantu kawakumvua mêyi avuaye wakula to, bua nanku kabakajadika to; kadi bayidi bakajadika ne wakabapesha bukôkeshi bua kupesha Nyuma wa Tshijila. Ne nennuleja kunyima ne miandiku eyi idi milelela.
18.38: Ne biakalua ne pakabalenga Yezu bonsu, kuakalua ditutu ne diakabuikila musumba wa bantu mushindu wa ne kabavua mua kumona Yezu to.
18.39: Ne patshivuabu babuikidibua, wakabashiya ne wakabanda mu diûlu. Ne bayidi bakamona ne bakajadika ne wakabanda mu diûlu kabidi.

19.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakabanda Yezu mu diûlu, musumba wa bantu wakatangalaka, ne muntu yonsu wakangata mukajenda ne bana benda ne wakapingana ku nzubu kuenda.
19.2: Ne lumu luakenda kula munkatshi mua bantu katataka, kumpala kua butuku kabuyi buanji kuila to, ne musumba wa bantu uvua mumona Yezu, ne uvua mubasadila, ne neadileja kabidi kudi musumba wa bantu patshiabu.
19.3: Eyowa, ne lumu luvua lutangila Yezu luakenda kula mena butuku bujima; ne bakatuma dîyi kudi bantu mua ne bavua ba bungi, eyowa, bungi bunena menamena, buakakuata mudimu butuku abu bonsu menamena, bua ne bikala patshiabu ku muaba wadileja Yezu kudi musumba wa bantu.
19.4: Ne biakalua ne pakatshiabu, pavua musumba wa bantu musangisha pamua, monayi, Nefi ne muanabu wa baluma uvuaye mujula ku bafua, muena dîna dia Timote, ne muanenda wa baluma kabidi, muena dîna dia Yona, ne Matoni kabidi, ne Matoniha, muanabu wa baluma, ne Kumeni, ne Kumenonohi, ne Yelemiya, ne Shemenona, ne Yona, ne Sedekiya, ne Yeshaya—mpindiewu â avua mêna a bayidi bavua Yezu musungula—ne biakalua ne bakasemena ne bakimana munkatshi mua musumba wa bantu.
19.5: Ne monayi, musumba wa bantu uvua mupita bunena bua ne biakenzeka ne bawutapulula mu bisumbu dikumi ne bibidi.
19.6: Ne bayidi dikumi ne babidi bakalongesha musumba wa bantu; ne monayi, bakenzeja ne musumba wa bantu utua binu panshi pa mpala wa buloba, ne usambila Tatu mu dîna dia Yezu.
19.7: Ne bayidi bakasambila Tatu kabidi mu dîna dia Yezu. Ne biakalua ne bakajuka ne bakalongesha bantu.
19.8: Ne pakabalongeshabu ne mêyi a momumua avua Yezu muakula—kakuyi dikudimuka ku mêyi avua Yezu muakula to—monayi, bakatua binu panshi kabidi ne bakasambila Tatu mu dîna dia Yezu.
19.9: Ne bakasambila bua tshivuabu bajinga kupita; ne bavua bajinga ne Nyuma wa Tshijila afidibua kudibu.
19.10: Ne pakasambilabu nanku bakapueka ku muelelu kua mâyi, ne musumba wa bantu wakabalonda.
19.11: Ne biakalua ne Nefi wakabuela mu mâyi ne wakatambuishibua.
19.12: Ne wakatundubuka mu mâyi ne wakabanga kutambuisha. Ne wakatambuisha bonsu bavua Yezu musungula.
19.13: Ne biakalua ne pakatambuishibuabu bonsu ne pakapatukabu mu mâyi, Nyuma wa Tshijila wakabatulukila, ne bakuwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila ne kapia.
19.14: Ne monayi, bavua banyunguludibua ku mpenga yonsu bu ne bivua kudi kapia; ne kavua kalua panshi kafumina mu diûlu, ne musumba wa bantu wakamona bualu ebu, ne wakajadika; ne banjelu bakapueka panshi bapatukila mu diûlu ne bakabasadila.
19.15: Ne biakalua ne patshivua banjelu basadila bayidi, monayi, Yezu wakalua ne wakimana munkatshi muabu ne wakabasadila.
19.16: Ne biakalua ne wakakula kudi musumba wa bantu, ne wakabapesha mukenji ne batua kabidi binu panshi pa buloba, ne bayidi benda kabidi batua pabu binu panshi pa buloba.
19.17: Ne biakalua ne pakatuabu binu panshi pa buloba, wakapesha bayidi benda mukenji ne basambila.
19.18: Ne monayi, bakabanga kusambila; ne bakasambila Yezu, bamubikila ne Mukalenga wabu ne Nzambi wabu.
19.19: Ne biakalua ne Yezu wakumbuka munkatshi muabu, ne wakaya pabuipi kula nabu ne wakinama panshi, ne wakamba ne:
19.20: Tatu, ndi nkuela tuasakidila bua ne udi mupesha bandi musungula aba Nyuma wa Tshijila; ne bidi bua bualu bua ditabuja diabu kundi mbudi musunguila ku ba pa buloba.
19.21: Tatu, ndi nkulomba ne upesha Nyuma wa Tshijila kudi bonsu bitabuja mêyi abu.
19.22: Tatu, udi mubapesha Nyuma wa Tshijila bualu badi bangitabuja; ne udi umona ne badi bitabuja kundi bualu udi ubumvua, ne badi bansambila; ne badi bansambila bualu ndi nabu.
19.23: Ne mpindiewu Tatu, ndi nkusambila buabu, ne kabidi bonsu bitabuja mêyi abu, bua ne bangitabuja, bua ne ngikala munda muabu bu mûdi, Tatu, munda muanyi, bua ne tuikala umua.
19.24: Ne biakalua ne pakasambila Yezu kudi Tatu nanku, wakalua kudi bayidi benda, ne monayi, batshivua batungunuka, kabayi balekela to, ne kumusambila; ne kabavua bavudija mêyi a bungi to, bualu bakapeshibua bivuabu ne bua kusambidila, ne bavua buwujibua ntenta ne dijinga.
19.25: Ne biakalua ne Yezu wakababenesha bu muvuabu bamusambila; ne mpala wenda wakabafuisha mimuemua, ne bukenka bua mpala wenda buakakenka pa mutu pabu, ne monayi bavua batoka bu muvua mpala ne bilamba kabidi bia Yezu; ne monayi butoka buabi buvua bupita butoka bonsu, eyowa, kakuvua mena tshintu nansha tshimua pa buloba tshivua tshitoka bu muvua butoka buabi.
19.26: Ne Yezu wakabambila ne: Tungunukayi ne kusambila; ne kabakalekela kusambila to.
19.27: Ne wakabashiya kabidi, ne wakaya pabuipi kula ne wakinama panshi; ne wakasambila kabidi Tatu, wamba ne:
19.28: Tatu, ndi nkuela tuasakidila bua ne udi mukezula bandi musungula abu, bua ditabuja diabu, ne ndi nsambila buabu, ne kabidi bua aba bitabuja mêyi abu, ne bakezudibua kundi, ku ditabuja ku mêyi abu, bu mudibu balengejibua kundi.
19.29: Tatu, ntshiena nsambila bua ba pa buloba to, kadi bua ba ku ba pa buloba, bua ditabuja diabu, ne bakezudibua kundi, ne ngikala munda muabu bu wewa, Tatu, muikala munda muanyi, ne tuikala tshintu tshimua, ne ntumbishibua kudibu.
19.30: Ne pakakula Yezu mêyi â wakalua kabidi kudi bayidi benda; ne monayi bavua bamusambila ne disuminyina, kabayi balekela to; ne wakabafuisha mimuemua kabidi; ne monayi, bakatoka, mena bu muvua Yezu.
19.31: Ne biakalua ne wakaya kabidi pabuipi kula ne wakasambila Tatu;
19.32: Ne ludimi kaluena mua kuamba mêyi avuaye musambila nawu to, anyi muntu nansha umua kena mua kufunda mêyi avuaye musambila nawu to.
19.33: Ne musumba wa bantu wakumvua ne udi ujadika; ne mitshima yabu ivua miunzuluka ne bakumvua mu mitshima yabu mêyi akasambilaye nawu.
19.34: Nansha nanku, mêyi avuaye musambila nawu avua mapita manena ne a dikema bua ne ka’ena mua kufundibua, anyi kuambibua kudi muntu to.
19.35: Ne biakalua ne pakashîkija Yezu kusambila wakalua kabidi kudi bayidi, ne wakabambila ne: Tshitu muanji kumona ditabuja dinena nanku munkatshi mua Bena Yuda bonsu to; bua nanku ntshivua mua kubaleja bishima binena nanku to, bua bualu bua dipanga ditabuja diabu.
19.36: Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, kakuena nansha bamua ba ku bobu bakamona bintu binena nanku bu binudi bamona to; anyi kabavua bumvua bintu binena nanku bu binudi bumvua.

20.1: Ne biakalua ne wakapesha musumba wa bantu mukenji ne balekela kusambila, ne bayidi benda kabidi. Ne wakabapesha mukenji ne kabalekedi kusambila mu mitshima yabu to.
20.2: Ne wakabapesha mukenji ne bajuka ne bimana kûlu pa makasa abu. Ne bakajuka ne bakimana pa makasa abu.
20.3: Ne biakalua ne wakakosolola diampa kabidi ne wakadibenesha, ne wakapesha bayidi benda bua kudia.
20.4: Ne pakadiabu wakabapesha mukenji ne bakosolola diampa, ne badipesha musumba wa bantu.
20.5: Ne pakapeshabu musumba wa bantu wakabapesha kabidi mvinyo bua kunua, ne wakabapesha mukenji ne bamupesha musumba wa bantu.
20.6: Mpindiewu, kakuvua diampa to, anyi mvinyo, bivua bayidi anyi musumba wa bantu batuala;
20.7: Kadi bulelela wakabapesha diampa bua kudia, ne kabidi mvinyo bua kunua.
20.8: Ne wakabambila ne: Udi udia diampa edi udi udia mubidi wanyi bua anyima wenda; ne udi unua mvinyo ewu udi unua mashi anyi bua anyima wenda; ne anyima wenda kakufua ne nzala anyi nyota nansha, kadi neukutshibua.
20.9: Mpindiewu, pakadia musumba wa bantu ne pakanuawu yonsu, monayi, bakuwujibua ne Nyuma; ne bakabila ne dîyi dimua, ne bakatumbisha Yezu, uvuabu bamona ne uvuabu bumvua.
20.10: Ne biakalua ne pakatumbishabu bonsu Yezu, wakabambila ne: monayi mpindiewu ngakumbaji mukenji uvua Tatu mumpesha bua bantu aba, badi bikala tshishadila tshia nzubu wa Isalele.
20.11: Nudi nuvuluka ne ngakakula kunudi, ne ngakamba ne pâkumbajibua miaku ya Yeshaya—idi mifundibua, nudi nayi kumpala kuenu, bua nanku ikebululayi—
20.12: Ne bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, pâkumbajibuayi pashisha tshipungidi tshivua Tatu muenza ne bantu benda netshikumbajibua, Ô nzubu wa Isalele.
20.13: Ne pashisha bishadila, biatangalajibua kula pa mutu pa mpala wa buloba, nebisangishibua kumbukila ku esete ne ku wesete, ne kumbukila ku sude ne ku node; ne nebafikishibua ku dimanya dia Mukalenga Nzambi wabu, wakabasungila.
20.14: Ne Tatu udi mumpesha mukenji ne nnupesha bulaba ebu, bu bupianyi buenu.
20.15: Ne ndi nnuambila ne, pikala Bena Bisamba bia Benda kabayi bakudimuna mutshima kunyima kua dibenesha diapetabu to, kunyima kua kutangalajabu bantu banyi—
20.16: Pashisha, nuenu badi bikala tshishadila tshia nzubu wa Yakoba, nenuya munkatshi muabu; ne nenuikala munkatshi muabu muikalabu ba bungi; ne nenuikala munkatshi muabu bu mudi ntambua munkatshi mua nyama ya mu dîtu, ne bu mudi muana wa ntambua munkatshi mua bisumbu bia mikoku, udi, padiye ubuelamu udi uyidiatakaja panshi ne uyipandakaja bipesa, ne muntu nansha umua kayi mua kuyipatuisha to.
20.17: Tshianza tshieba netshijudibua pa mutu pa baluishi beba, ne bena lukuna beba bonsu nebashipibua.
20.18: Ne nensangisha bantu banyi pamua bu mudi muntu usangisha minyaku yenda mu tshituilu.
20.19: Bualu nengenza ne nsengu ya bantu bavua tatuanyi muenza tshipungidi nabu, eyowa, nengenza ne ilua ya tshiamua tshifika, ne nengenza bikonu bieba bia tshiamua tshia kalabi. Ne neubotesha bantu ba bungi; ne nenjidila tshipeta tshimpa tshiabu bua Mukalenga, ne bintu biabu bua Mukalenga wa buloba bujima. Ne monayi, mema ki udi wenza nanku.
20.20: Ne Tatu udi wamba ne, nebilua ne, ne muela wa mvita wa bululama buanyi neulembelela pa mutu pabu dituku adi; ne amu pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima neubakulukila, bu mudi tatu wamba, eyowa, mena pa mutu pa bisamba bionsu bia Bena Bisamba bia Benda.
20.21: Ne nebilua ne nenshikika bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele.
20.22: Ne monayi, nenshikika bantu aba mu bulaba ebu, bua tshipungidi tshindi muenza ne tatu wenu Yakoba tshikumbajibua; ne nebuikala Yelushalema Mupia-mupia. Ne bukola bua mu diûlu nebuikala munkatshi mua bantu aba; eyowa, nengikala mena munkatshi muenu.
20.23: Monayi, mema uvua Mose muakula, wamba ne: Mukalenga Nzambi wenu neanubishila muprofete ku bana benu, bu mundi; yeya nenumuteleja ku bintu bionsu bianuambilaye. Ne nebilua ne muntu yonsu wabenga kuteleja muprofete awu neakoshibua munkatshi mua bantu.
20.24: Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, eyowa, baprofete bonsu kubangila kudi Samuele ne badi balonda kunyima abu, bonsu bavua bakula, bavua bajadika buanyi.
20.25: Ne monayi, nudi bana ba baprofete; ne nudi ba ku nzubu wa Isalele; ne nudi ba ku tshipungidi tshiakenza Tatu ne batatuenu, wambila Abalahama ne: Ne bîsa bionsu bia pa buloba nebibeneshibua kupitshila ku ndelanganyi yeba.
20.26: Tatu mumana kunjula bua kulua kunudi kumpala, ne udi muntuma bua kunubenesha bua kulekeja muntu yonsu wa kunudi malu mabi enda; ne nanku bualu nudi bana ba mu tshipungidi—
20.27: Ne kunyima kua nuenu babeneshibua pashisha Tatu neakumbaja tshipungidi tshidiye muenza ne Abalahama, wamba: Ne bîsa bionsu bia pa buloba nebibeneshibua kupitshila ku ndelanganyi yeba—ku ditshikija dia Nyuma wa Tshijila pa mutu pa Bena Bisamba bia Benda kupitshila kundi, dibenesha edi nedipesha Bena Bisamba bia Benda bukitu kupita bantu bakuabu bonsu, tô ne ku ditangalaja dia bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele.
20.28: Ne, Tatu udi wamba ne, nebikala munyasu bua bantu ba mu bulaba ebu. Nansha nanku, pikalabu bapeta tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi, pashisha biampapishilabu mitshima yabu, nembapingajila malu mabi abu pa mitu yabu nkayabu.
20.29: Ne, Tatu udi wamba ne, nemvuluka tshipungidi tshimvua muenza ne bantu banyi; ne mvua muenza tshipungidi nabu ne nembasangisha pamua mu diba dianyi nkayanyi, ne nembapesha kabidi bulaba bua batatuabu bua bupianyi buabu, adi mikala bulaba bua Yelushalema, adi mikala bulaba bulaya kudibu bua kashidi.
20.30: Ne nebilua ne tshikondu tshilualua, tshiayishibua tshiwudi tshia lumu luimpa luanyi kudibu;
20.31: Ne nebangitabuja, ne mema ndi Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi, ne nebasambila Tatu mu dîna dianyi.
20.32: Pashisha batentekedi babu nebela dîyi diabu, ne nebimba ne dîyi pamua; bualu nebadimuena ne mesu.
20.33: Pashisha Tatu neabasangisha kabidi pamua, ne neabapesha Yelushalema bu mudi bulaba bua bupianyi buabu.
20.34: Pashisha nebatudika ne disanka—Imbayi pamua, nuenu miaba ya bikulu ya Yelushalema; bualu Tatu wasambi bantu benda, wasungila Yelushalema.
20.35: Tatu waleji diboku dienda dia tshijila patoka ku mesu kua bisamba bionsu; ne ndekelu ya buloba yonsu neimona lupandu lua Tatu; ne Tatu ne mema tudi tshintu tshimua.
20.36: Ne pashisha tshidi tshifundibua netshivuijibua: Bîka, bîka kabidi, ne uluata bukola bueba, Ô Siyona; uluata bilamba bieba bilengela, Ô Yelushalema, tshimenga tshia tshijila, bualu bua kubangila apa muntu udi kayi mutengula ne muntu wa bukoya kabakulua kabidi munda mueba to.
20.37: Ditutula ku lupuishi; juka, somba, Ô Yelushalema; disulula mionji ya mu nshingu mueba, wewa muana wa bakaji mukuatshibu wa Siyona.
20.38: Bualu Mukalenga udi wamba nanku: Nuakadipanyisha bua tshianana, ne nenusungidibua kabiyi ne makuta to.
20.39: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, bantu banyi nebamanya dîna dianyi; eyowa, mu dituku adi nebamanya ne mema udi wakula.
20.40: Ne pashisha nebamba: Bu mudiwu malengela pa mikuna makasa a ewu udi utuala lumu luimpa, udi utangalaja ditalala; udi utuala lumu luimpa lua buimpa kudibu, udi utangalaja lupandu; udi wambila Siyona ne: Nzambi weba udi ukôkesha!
20.41: Ne pashisha lubila neluya: Umbukayi, umbukayi, patukayi pa muaba awu, kanulengi tshintu tshia bukoya to; patukayi munkatshi muatshi; ikalayi ne mankenda nuenu badi bambula malongu a Mukalenga.
20.42: Kadi kanuakupatuka tshimpitshimpi anyi kanuakuya lubilu to; bualu Mukalenga neaya kumpala kuenu, ne Nzambi wa Isalele neikala mulami kunyima kuenu.
20.43: Monayi, musadidi wanyi neikala ne budimu; neabandishibua mûlu ne neatamba kuikala mûlu mula.
20.44: Bu muvua ba bungi bakukema—mpala wenda uvua munyanguka, kupita muntu yonsu, ne tshimfuanyi tshienda kupita tshia bana ba baluma ba bantu—
20.45: Nanku neamiamina bisamba bia bungi mashi; bamfumu nebabuikila mikana yabu bualu buenda, bualu nebamona tshivuabu kabayi banji kubambila to; ne nebelangana meji pa malu avuabu kabayi banji kumvua to.
20.46: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, bintu ebi bionsu bushuwa nebilua, mena bu mudi Tatu mumpesha mukenji. Pashisha tshipungidi etshi tshiakenza Tatu ne bantu benda netshikumbajibua; ne pashisha bantu banyi nebasomba kabidi mu Yelushalema, ne nebuikala bulaba bua bupianyi buabu.

21.1: Ne bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, ndi nupesha tshimanyinu, bua ne numanya diba dienzeka bintu ebi—dingasangisha mômu bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele, ku ditangalaka diabu dia mutantshi mula, ne nenshikika kabidi Siyona wanyi munkatshi muabu;
21.2: Ne monayi, etshi tshidi tshintu tshinganupesha bua tshimanyinu—bualu bulelela ndi nnuambila ne pakumbana bintu ebi bindi nnumanyisha, ne binganumanyisha mema nkayanyi kunyima eku, ne ku bukola bua Nyuma wa Tshijila buanupeshabu kudi Tatu, bimanyibua kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda bua bamanya bitangila bantu aba badi bikala tshishadila tshia nzubu wa Yakoba, ne bitangila bantu banyi aba bâtangalajibua kudibu;
21.3: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, pâbamanyisha Tatu bintu ebi, ne pâpatukidibua kudi Tatu, biumbukila kudibu ne bilua kunudi;
21.4: Bualu bidi lungenyi kudi Tatu ne bishikikibua mu bulaba ebu, ne bikala bantu badikadila ku bukola bua Tatu, bua ne bintu ebi bipatukila kudibu bua kulua kudi tshishadila tshia ndelanganyi yenu, bua ne tshipungidi tshia Tatu tshivuaye muenza ne bantu benda tshikumbajibua, Ô nzubu wa Isalele;
21.5: Nanku, pâpatukila midimu eyi ne midimu yenzeka munkatshi muenu kunyima eku kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, iya kudi ndelanganyi yenu yashinguluka mu dipanga dia ditabuja bua bualu bua malu mabi;
21.6: Bualu nanku bidi bikumbanyina Tatu bua ne ilopokela kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, ne aleja bukola buenda kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, bua bualu ebu ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda, bobu kabayi bapapisha mitshima yabu, bua ne bakudimuna mutshima ne balua kundi ne batambuishibua mu dîna dianyi ne bamanya bitupa bilelela bia diyisha dianyi, ne babadibua munkatshi mua bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele;
21.7: Ne pafika bintu ebi, mu mushindu wa ne ndelanganyi yenu neibanga kumanya bintu ebi—netshikala tshimanyinu kudiyi, bua bamanya ne mudimu wa Tatu ukadi mumana kutuadija bua dikumbajibua dia tshipungidi tshivuaye muenza ne bantu badi bikala ba ku nzubu wa Isalele.
21.8: Ne pâlua dituku adi, nebilua ne bamfumu nebabuikila mikana yabu; bualu bua nebamona tshivuabu kabayi banji kubambila to; ne nebelangana meji pa tshivuabu kabayi banji kumvua to.
21.9: Bualu mu dituku adi, Tatu neenza mudimu buanyi, wikala mudimu munena ne wa dikema munkatshi muabu; ne nekuikala munkatshi muabu bikala kabayi bawitabuja to, nansha mua bamanyisha muntu.
21.10: Kadi monayi, moyo wa musadidi wanyi newikala mu tshianza tshianyi; bua nanku kabakumuenzela bibi to, nansha yeya munyanguka bualu buabu. Kadi nemmôndopa, bua mbaleja ne lungenyi luanyi ludi lunena kupita budimu bua diabulu.
21.11: Nanku nebilua ne ewu yonsu wikala kayi muitabuja mêyi anyi to, mema udi muikala Yezu Kilisto, mêyi amuenzeja Tatu bua atuadila Bena Bisamba bia Benda, ne neamupesha bukola bua a’atuadila Bena Bisamba bia Benda, (nebienzeka bu muvua Mose muamba) nebakoshibua ku bantu banyi badi bikala ba mu tshipungidi.
21.12: Ne bantu banyi badi bikala tshishadila tshia Yakoba nebikala munkatshi mua Bena Bisamba bia Benda, eyowa, munkatshi muabu bu mudi ntambua munkatshi mua nyama ya mu dîtu, bu mudi muana wa ntambua munkatshi mua bisumbu bia mikoku, udi, padiye ubuela mômu udi uyidiata ne uyipandakaja mu bipesa, ne muntu nansha umua kena mua kuyipatuisha to.
21.13: Tshianza tshiabu netshijudishibua pa mutu pa baluishi babu, ne bena lukuna babu bonsu nebashipibua.
21.14: Eyowa, diakabi dikala kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda pa kumbusha bobu bakudimuna mutshima; bualu nebilua mu dituku adi, mudi Tatu wamba, ne nembutula tubalu tuenu munkatshi muenu, ne nennyangakaja matempu enu;
21.15: Ne nembutula bimenga bia mu bulaba buenu, ne nengûpula miaba yenu mikolesha yonsu;
21.16: Ne nembutula bu mpaka manga budi mu bulaba buenu, ne kanuakuikala kabidi ne bena lubuku to;
21.17: Mpingu yenu misonga nembutula kabidi, ne mpingu yenu mimana nempatula munkatshi muenu, ne kanuakutendelela kabidi midimu ya ku bianza bienu to;
21.18: Ne nenjula bipuka bienu bidi munkatshi muenu; nembutula bimenga bienu nanku awu.
21.19: Ne nebilua ne mafi onsu, ne didinga, ne malakana, ne luntûta lua bungi, ne buakuidi bua mafi, ne masandi, nebijika.
21.20: Bualu Tatu udi wamba ne, nebilua ne, ne dituku adi bonsu bikala kabayi bakudimuna mutshima ne kuitabuja Muananyi Munanga, bobu nembakosa munkatshi mua bantu banyi, Ô nzubu wa Isalele;
21.21: Ne nendisombuela ne tshiji tshikola kudibu, kudi bampakanyi, bu mutubu kabayi banji kumvua to.
21.22: Kadi pikalabu bakudimuna mutshima ne bumvuila mêyi anyi, ne kabayi bapapisha mitshima yabu to, nenshikika ekelezia wanyi munkatshi muabu, ne nebabuela mu tshipungidi ne nebabadibua munkatshi mua tshishadila tshia Yakoba, tshindi mupesha bulaba ebu bua bupianyi buatshi;
21.23: Ne nebambuluisha bantu banyi, tshishadila tshia Yakoba, ne ba bungi kabidi ba ku nzubu wa Isalele nebalua, bua bibaka tshimenga, tshiabikidibua ne Yelushalema Mupia-mupia.
21.24: Ne pashisha nebambuluisha bantu banyi, badi bikala bamuangalaka pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, bua ne basangishibua munda mua Yelushalema Mupia-mupia.
21.25: Ne pashisha bukola bua mu diûlu nebupueka munkatshi muabu; ne nengikala kabidi munkatshi muabu.
21.26: Ne pashisha mudimu wa Tatu neutuadija dituku adi, mena pâyishibua lumu luimpa elu munkatshi mua tshishadila tshia bantu aba. Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, dituku adi mudimu wa Tatu neutuadija munkatshi mua bonsu ba ku bantu banyi bavua batangalaka, eyowa, mena bîsa bivua bikala bijimina, bivua Tatu mupatula mu Yelushalema.
21.27: Eyowa, mudimu neutuadija munkatshi mua bantu banyi bonsu bavua batangalaka, ne Tatu nealongolola njila wa kuluilabu kundi, bua babikila Tatu mu dîna dianyi.
21.28: Eyowa, ne pashisha mudimu neutuadija, ne Tatu neikala munkatshi mua bisamba bionsu bua dilongolola dia njila wa bantu benda kudisangishabu ku mbelu mu bulaba bua bupianyi buabu.
21.29: Ne Tatu udi wamba ne, nebapatukila ku bisamba bionsu; ne kabakupatuka mu lubilu to, ne anyi kabakuya ne kunyema to, bualu nenya kumpala kuabu, ne nengikala mulami kunyima kuabu.

22.1: Ne pashisha tshidi tshifundibua netshilua: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, Imba musambu, Ô mukaji wa nkumba, wewa udi kuyi mulela; tudika mu kuimba, ne bila bikola, wewa udi kuyi musâma munda mua kulela muana to; bualu bana ba mukaji mulekela badi ba bungi bapita ba bana ba mukaji musela.
22.2: Diundisha muaba wa ntenta weba, ne lekela bantu balabaja bilamba bikudika bia tshisombelu tshieba; kudikandi to, lepesha mionji yeba ne kolesha tukunji tueba;
22.3: Bualu neusampila ku tshianza tshia baluma ne ku tshia bakaji, ne ndelanganyi yeba neipiana Bena Bisamba bia Benda ne yenza ne bimenga bitupu biwujibua ne bantu.
22.4: Kutshinyi to, bualu kuakufua bundu to; anyi kupuekeshibu to, bualu kuakufuishibua bundu to; bualu bua neupua bundu bua ku bunsongakaji bueba moyo, ne kuakuvuluka lumu lubi lua bunsongakaji bueba to, ne kuakuvuluka kabidi lumu lubi lua bukamba bueba to.
22.5: Bualu bua mufuki weba, bayeba, Mukalenga wa Misumba ki dîna dienda; ne Musungidi weba, Wa Tshijila wa Isalele—ne bamubikila ne Nzambi wa buloba bujima.
22.6: Bualu Nzambi udi wamba ne, Mukalenga wakubikidi bu muntu mukaji mulekedibua ne kanyinganyinga mu mutshima, ne mukaji musela mu bunsongakaji buenda, pavuabu bakubenga.
22.7: Bua mutantshi mukesa mvua mukulekela, kadi ne lusa lunena nenkusangisha.
22.8: Mukalenga, Musungidi weba udi wamba ne, ne mvua musokoka mpala wanyi kûdi mutantshi mukesa bua tshiji tshikesa, kadi bua kalolu ka kashidi nengikala ne lusa kûdi.
22.9: Bualu etshi, tshidi bu mâyi a Noa kundi, bualu bu mungakaditshipa ne mâyi a Noa ka’akubuikila kabidi buloba nansha, ki mundi muditshipa ne ntshiakukufîkila tshiji to.
22.10: Bualu Mukalenga udi ne lusa kûdi udi wamba ne, mikuna neyumbuka ne tukuna netumbushibua, kadi kalolu kanyi kakakumbuka kûdi to, anyi tshipungidi tshia ditalala dianyi katshiakumbushibua to.
22.11: Ô wewa mutatshishibua, mutentakajibua kudi tshipepela tshikola, ne kuyi musambibua to! Monayi, nengâsa mabua eba ne mekala malengela, ne nengâsa bishimikidi bieba ne mabua a safire.
22.12: Ne nengâsa madidishi eba ne mabua a rubis, ne bibuelelu bieba ne mabua a escarboucle, ne mikalu yeba yonsu ne mabua a mushinga mukola.
22.13: Ne bana beba bonsu nebalongeshibua kudi Mukalenga; ne ditalala dia bana beba nedikala dinena.
22.14: Ne mu buakana neushikikibua; newikala kula ne dikengeshibua bualu kuakutshina to, ne kula ne luzakalu bualu kaluakufika pabuipi neba to.
22.15: Monayi, bushuwa nebadisangisha pamua bua kukuluisha, kabayi ne dianyisha dianyi to; bonsu badisangisha pamua bua kukuluisha nebapona bua bimpa bieba.
22.16: Monayi, ndi mufuka nsenda wa biamua udi upupula makala mu kapia, ne udi utuala tshiamua bua mudimu wenda; ne ndi mufuka munyangi bua kunyangakaja.
22.17: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, tshiluilu tshia mvita nansha tshimua tshidibu benza bua kukuluisha natshi katshiakulubuluka to; ne ludimi lonsu luakupenda mu tshilumbuluilu neulupîsha. Ebu budi bupianyi bua basadidi ba Mukalenga, ne buakana buabu budi bufumina kundi.

23.1: Ne mpindiewu, monayi, ndi nnuambila ne, nudi ne tshia kukebulula bintu ebi. Eyowa, ndi nupesha mukenji ne nukebulula bintu ebi ne dinanukila; bualu miaku ya Yeshaya idi ne mushinga mukola.
23.2: Bualu uvua muakula bua bintu bionsu bidi bitangila bantu banyi badi bikala ba ku nzubu wa Isalele; bua nanku bidi bikengela ne udi ne tshia kuakula kabidi kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda.
23.3: Ne bintu bionsu biakakulaye biakenzeka ne nebienzeka, mena bilondeshila ku miaku yakakulaye.
23.4: Bua nanku teyayi ntema ku mêyi anyi; fundayi bintu binganuambidi; ne nebiya kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda bilondeshila ku diba ne disua dia Tatu.
23.5: Ne ewu yonsu umvuila mêyi anyi ne wakudimuna mutshima ne watambuishibua, muina awu neapandishibua. Kebululayi baprofete, bualu kudi ba bungi badi bajadika malu â.
23.6: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â wakabambila kabidi, kunyima kua yeya mubumvuija mifundu ya Nzambi yonsu ivuabu bapeta, wakabambila ne: Monayi, ndi musua ne nufunda mifundu ya Nzambi mikuabu inudi kanuyi bafunda to.
23.7: Ne biakalua ne wakambila Nefi ne: Tuala miandiku inudi balama.
23.8: Ne pakatuala Nefi miandiku, ne pakayitekaye kumpala kuenda, wakakupa mesu kudibu ne wakamba ne:
23.9: Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, ngakapesha musadidi wanyi Samuele, Muena Lamana, mukenji ne ajadikila bantu aba, ne ku dituku diatumbisha Tatu dîna dienda kundi ne nekuikala bansantu ba bungi bâbîka ku bafua, ne bâmueneka kudi bantu ba bungi, ne bâbasadila. Ne wakabakonka ne: Kabivua nanku anyi?
23.10: Ne bayidi benda bakamuandamuna ne bakamba ne: Eyowa, Mukalenga, Samuele wakamba mêyi a buprofete bilondeshila ku mêyi eba, ne akakumbajibua onsu.
23.11: Ne Yezu wakabambila ne: Munyi munudi kanuyi bafunda bualu ebu to, ne bansantu ba bungi bakabîka ne bakamuenekela bantu ba bungi ne bakabasadila?
23.12: Ne biakalua ne Nefi wakavuluka ne bualu ebu kabuvua bufundibua to.
23.13: Ne biakalua ne Yezu wakapesha mukenji ne bufundibua; bua nanku bakabufunda bilondeshila bu muvuaye mufila mukenji.
23.14: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakabumvuija Yezu mifundu ya Nzambi yonsu pamua, ivuabu bafunda, wakabapesha mukenji ne balongesha malu avuaye mubumvuija.

24.1: Ne biakalua ne wakabapesha mukenji ne bafunda miaku ivua Tatu mupesha Malaki, ivuaye mubambila. Ne biakalua ne kunyima kua kufundibuayi wakabumvuijayi. Ne eyi ki mêyi akabambilaye, wamba ne: Tatu wakambila Malaki nanku—Monayi, nentuma mutumibua wanyi, ne nealongolola njila kumpala kuanyi, ne Mukalenga unudi nukeba nealua katataka ku ntempelo wenda, mena mutumibua wa tshipungidi, unudi ne disanka nenda; monayi, nealua.
24.2: Kadi nganyi udi mua kushindama mu dituku dia dilua dienda, ne nganyi wimana pamuenekaye? Bualu udi bu mudi kapia ka mupeluji wa biamua, ne nsabanga wa musukudi wa bilamba.
24.3: Ne neasomba panshi bu mudi kapia ka mupeluji ne mukezudi wa tshiamua tshia mpalata; ne neakezula bana ba Lewi, ne neabatâta bu mudi ngolo ne mpalata, bua balambula Mukalenga mulambu mu buakana.
24.4: Pashisha mulambu wa Yuda ne Yelushalema neusankisha Mukalenga, bu muvuawu mu matuku a kala, ne bu muvuawu mu bidimu biakapita.
24.5: Ne, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, nendua pabuipi nênu bua dilumbuluisha; ne nengikala mujadiki udi utuisha bena mupongu lukasa, ne bendi ba masandi, ne baditshipi ba mafi, ne bonsu badi bakengesha musadidi bua difutu dienda, mukaji mukamba ne muana wa nshiya, ne badi bipata muenyi, ne badi kabayi bantshina to.
24.6: Bualu ndi Mukalenga, ntshiena nshintuluka to; ki bualu kayi nuenu bana ba Yakoba kanuena nubutuka to.
24.7: Mena katshia ku matuku a batatuenu nuakalekela mikenji yanyi, ne kanuena bayilama to. Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, Pinganayi kundi ne nempingana kunudi. Kadi nudi nuamba ne: Netupingana munyi?
24.8: Muntu neiba Nzambi anyi? Kadi nuangibi. Kadi nudi nuamba: Tudi bakuiba munyi? Mu tshia dikumi ne milambu.
24.9: Nudi batshipibua ne mulawu, bualu nudi bangiba, mena tshisamba etshi tshijima.
24.10: Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, tualayi tshia dikumi tshionsu ku nzubu wa dibutshila, bua kuikala biakudia mu nzubu muanyi; ne ntêtayi mpindiewu nanku, ne ntshiakununzuluila madidishi a mu diûlu, ne ntshiakunupumuina dibenesha bua ne kakuakuikala muaba mukumbana bua kudiangata to.
24.11: Ne, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, nenkanyina munyangi bua bimpa bienu, ne kakunyangakaja bimuma bia mu buloba buenu; anyi mitshi ya mvinyo yenu kayakuponesha bimuma biawu mu madimi kumpala kua tshikondu to.
24.12: Ne, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, bisamba bionsu nebinubikila ne babeneshibua, bualu nenuikala ne bulaba busanguluka.
24.13: Mukalenga udi wamba ne, miaku yenu idi mikala mikola kundi. Kadi nudi nuamba ne: Ntshinyi tshitudi bamba tshibi kûdi?
24.14: Nudi bamba ne: Bidi tshianana bua kusadila Nzambi, ne tshipeta tshimpa kayi tshituapetshi bua kulama mikenji yenda ne bua patuvua tuenda ne madilu kumpala kua Mukalenga wa Misumba?
24.15: Ne mpindiewu tudi tubikila baditambishi ne mba diakalenga; eyowa, badi benza malu mapita bubi badi baya kumpala; eyowa, badi batêta Nzambi badi mena bapatuishibua.
24.16: Pashisha bavua batshina Mukalenga bavua bakula misangu mivula muntu ne mukuenda, ne Mukalenga wakateleja ne kumvua; ne mukanda wa tshivulukilu wakafundibua kumpala kuenda bua bavua batshina Mukalenga, ne bavua banemeka dîna dienda.
24.17: Ne, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, nebikala banyi, mu dituku adi dingikala nkunguija masanga anyi; ne nembepelesha bu mudi muntu wepelesha muanenda wa baluma udi umusadila.
24.18: Pashisha nenupingana ne nujingulula pankatshi pa bakana ne bena bubi bupita, pankatshi pa udi usadila Nzambi ne udi kayi umusadila to.

25.1: Bualu monayi, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, dituku didi dilua dikala diôsha bu mudi kapia ka mu mfulu; ne baditambishi bonsu, eyowa, ne bonsu badi benza malu mapita bubi, nebikala bu mudi nsona; ne dituku didi dilua nedibôsha, bua ne kadiakubashila muji anyi ditamba to.
25.2: Kadi buenu nuenu badi batshina dîna dianyi, Muana wa Buakana neabîka ne londapu mu mapuapua enda; ne nenupatuka ne nenukola bu mudi bana ba ngomba mu tshikumbi.
25.3: Ne, Mukalenga wa Misumba udi wamba ne, nenudiatakaja benji ba malu mapita bubi mu makasa; bualu nebikala bu mudi butu muinshi mua makasa enu mu dituku dingenza nanku awu.
25.4: Vulukayi mikenji ya Mose, musadidi wanyi, ungakamupesha mu Holeba bua Isalele yonsu, ne mikandu ne mêyi.
25.5: Monayi, nennutumina Eliya muprofete kumpala kua dilua dia dituku dinena ne didi dikuatshisha bôwa dia Mukalenga;
25.6: Ne neakudimuna mutshima wa batatu kudi bana, ne mutshima wa bana kudi batatuabu, bua tshilu kulua ne kutûta buloba ne mulawu.

26.1: Ne mpindiewu biakalua ne pakamba Yezu bintu ebi wakabiumvuija musumba wa bantu; ne wakabumvuija bintu bionsu, binena ne bikesa.
26.2: Ne wakamba: Mifundu eyi, inuvua kanuyi nayi to, Tatu uvua mumpesha mukenji bua nnupeshayi; bualu bivua bimpa mu lungenyi luenda bua ne ipeshibua kudi nkongu ya bantu idi ilua.
26.3: Ne wakumvuija bintu bionsu, mena kumbukila ku mbangilu tô ne ku diba dialuaye mu butumbi buenda—eyowa, mena bintu bionsu bialua pa mpala wa buloba, mena tô ne penguluka bintu ku kapia kakola, ne pâvungibua buloba pamua bu mudi muvungu wa mukanda, ne pâjimina diûlu ne buloba;
26.4: Ne mena ne ku dituku dinena ne dia ndekelu, pimana bantu bonsu, ne bîsa bionsu, ne bisamba bionsu ne miakulu yonsu kumpala kua Nzambi, bua kulumbuluishibua bua bienzedi biabu, ne bidi bikala bimpa anyi ne bidi bikala bibi—
26.5: Bikalayi mimpa, bua kupeta moyo wa kashidi ku dibîka; ne bikalayi mibi, bua kupeta dipîshibua ku dibîka dia ku lufu; bu mudibi bifuanangana, tshimua ku tshianza etshi ne tshikuabu ku tshianza atshi, bilondeshila ku lusa, ne ku bululama, ne ku bunsantu budi munda mua Kilisto, uvua muikala koku kumpala kua buloba bufukibua.
26.6: Ne mpindiewu nansha tshitupa tshimua tshia lukama tshia bintu biakalongesha Yezu bulelela bantu katshiena mua kufundibua munda mua mukanda ewu to;
26.7: Kadi monayi bitata bia Nefi bidi bikala ne tshitupa tshinena tshia bintu biakalongeshaye bantu.
26.8: Ne ndi mufunda bintu ebi, bidi bikala tshitupa tshipita bukesa tshia bintu biakalongeshaye bantu; ne ndi mubifunda ne dijinga dia ne babituadila kabidi kudi bantu aba, biumbukila kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda, bilondeshila ku mêyi avua Yezu muakula.
26.9: Ne pikalabu bapeta ebi, bidi bikengedibua ne babipeta kumpala, bua kutêta ditabuja diabu, ne pikalabi ne nebitabuja bintu ebi pashisha bintu bipita bunena nebimanyishibua kudibu.
26.10: Ne bikalabi ne badi babenga kuitabuja bintu ebi, nanku bintu bipita bunena nebibapadibua, bua dipîshibua diabu.
26.11: Monayi, mvua pabuipi ne kubifunda, bionsu bivua bikanunyibua pa bitata bia Nefi, kadi Mukalenga wakankandika, wamba ne: Nentêta ditabuja dia bantu banyi.
26.12: Bua nanku mema, Molomo, ndi mfunda bintu bivua Mukalenga mumpeshela mukenji. Ne mpindiewu mema, Molomo, ngajikiji miaku yanyi, ne ntungunuka ne kufunda bintu bivuaye mumpeshela mukenji.
26.13: Bua nanku, ndi musua bua numona ne bulelela Mukalenga wakalongesha bantu, bua mutantshi wa matuku asatu; ne kunyima kuaku wakadileja kudibu misangu mivula, ne wakakosolola diampa misangu mivula, ne wakadibenesha, ne wakabapeshadi.
26.14: Ne biakalua ne wakalongesha ne wakasadila bana ba musumba wa bantu uvua muakudibua, ne wakasulula ndimi yabu, ne bakambila batatuabu malu manena ne a dikema, mena manena kupita avua mabuluidibua kudi bantu; ne wakasulula ndimi yabu bua ne bakumbana bua kuakula.
26.15: Ne biakalua ne kunyima kua kubandaye mu diûlu—uvua musangu muibîdi wakadilejaye kudibu, ne wakaya kudi Tatu, kunyima kua kôndopaye babêdi babu bonsu, ne balema babu, ne kutabejaye mesu a mpofu yabu ne kumvuijaye bapata matshi, ne kuenzaye diôndopa dia mushindu yonsu munkatshi muabu, ne kubishaye muntu ku bafua, ne kubaleja bukola buenda, ne kubandaye kudi Tatu—
26.16: Monayi, biakalua ne pakatshiabu, musumba wa bantu wakadisangisha pamua, ne bakamona ne bakumvua bana aba; eyowa, mena bana batshivua bâmua bakabulula mikana yabu ne bakamba bintu bia dikema; ne malu akakulabu avua makandikibua ne muntu ka’afundi to.
26.17: Ne biakalua ne bayidi bavua Yezu musungula bakabanga katshia ku tshikondu atshi kutambuisha ne kulongesha bonsu bakalua kudibu; ne bonsu bakatambuishibua mu dîna dia Yezu bakuwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila.
26.18: Ne ba bungi ba ku bobu bakamona ne bakumvua bintu bivua kabiyi kuamba to, bivua muntu nansha umua kayi ne dianyisha bua kubifunda to.
26.19: Ne bakalongesha, ne bakasadilangana; ne bavua ne bintu bionsu pamua munkatshi muabu, muntu yonsu musomba biakana ne mukuenda.
26.20: Ne biakalua ne bakenza bintu bionsu mena bu muvua Yezu mubapesha mukenji.
26.21: Ne bavua batambuishibua mu dîna dia Yezu bakabikidibua ne ekelezia wa Kilisto.

27.1: Ne biakalua ne bu muvua bayidi ba Yezu bavua bikala benza ngendu ne bavua bikala bayisha bintu bivuabu bumvua ne bamona, ne bavua bikala batambuisha mu dîna dia Yezu, biakalua ne bayidi bavua bikala badisangisha pamua ne bavua bikala ne bobumua mu disambila dia bukitu ne mu dijila.
27.2: Ne Yezu wakadileja kabidi kudibu, bualu bavua bikala basambila Tatu mu dîna dienda; ne Yezu wakalua ne wakimana munkatshi muabu, ne wakabambila ne: Nudi basua ne nupesha ntshinyi?
27.3: Ne bakamuambila ne: Mukalenga, tudi basua bua ne utuambila dîna dituabikila ekelezia ewu; bualu kudi matandu munkatshi mua bantu bitangila bualu ebu.
27.4: Ne Mukalenga wakabambila ne: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, bua tshinyi bidi bikala ne bantu badi banungana ne batandangana bua bualu ebu?
27.5: Kabena babala mifundu ya Nzambi, idi yamba ne nudi ne tshia kuangata dîna dia Kilisto, didi dikala dîna dianyi anyi? Bualu ku dîna edi nenubikidibua ku dituku dia ndekelu;
27.6: Ne ewu yonsu udi wangata dîna dianyi, ne udi unanukila tô ne ku ndekelu, yeya muina neapandishibua ku dituku dia ndekelu.
27.7: Bua nanku, tshionsu tshinuenza, nenutshienza mu dîna dianyi; bua nanku nenubikila ekelezia mu dîna dianyi; ne nenubikila Tatu mu dîna dianyi bua abenesha ekelezia buanyi.
27.8: Ne munyi mudiyi ekelezia wanyi amu pa kumbusha yeya ubikidibua mu dîna dianyi? Bualu pikala ekelezia ubikidibua mu dîna dia Mose nanku udi muikala ekelezia wa Mose; anyi pikalaye ubikidibua mu dîna dia muntu nanku udi ekelezia wa muntu; kadi pikalaye ubikidibua mu dîna dianyi nanku udi ekelezia wanyi, pikalaye muibakibua pa lumu luimpa luanyi.
27.9: Bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, nudi bibakibua pa lumu luimpa luanyi; bua nanku nenuinyika tshionsu tshinudi nuinyika, ne dîna dianyi; bua nanku panuabikila Tatu, bua ekelezia, pikalabi mu dîna dianyi Tatu neanuteleja;
27.10: Ne pikala ekelezia muibakibua pa lumu luimpa luanyi nanku Tatu nealejamu midimu yenda nkayenda.
27.11: Kadi pikalayi kayi muibakibua pa lumu luimpa luanyi to, ne udi muibakibua pa midimu ya bantu, anyi pa midimu ya diabulu, bulelela ndi nnuambila ne bobu badi ne disanka bua midimu yabu bua tshikondu tshipi, ne ndekelu udi ulua ku kakesa ku kakesa, ne badi bupudibua ne bedibua mu kapia, mudi kamuyi dipingana to.
27.12: Bualu midimu yabu idi ibalonda, bualu badi bupudibua bua midimu yabu; bua nanku vulukayi bintu binganuambidi.
27.13: Monayi nganupeshi lumu luimpa luanyi, ne elu ludi lumu luimpa lunganupeshi—ne mvua mulua pa buloba bua kuenza disua dia Tatu wanyi, bualu Tatu wanyi uvua muntuma.
27.14: Ne Tatuanyi wakantuma bua ne mbandishibua pa mutshi mutshiamakana; ne kunyima kua mema muikala mubandishibua pa mutshi mutshiamakana, bua ne nkoka bantu bonsu kundi, bua ne bu mumvua mubandishibua kûlu kudi bantu, mena nanku bantu nebabandishibua kûlu kudi Tatu, bua kuimanabu kumpala kuanyi, bua kulumbuluishibua bua bienzedi biabu, ne bidi bikala bimpa anyi ne bidi bikala bibi—
27.15: Ne bua bualu ebu mvua mubandishibua kûlu; bua nanku, bilondeshila ku bukola bua Tatu nenkoka bantu bonsu kundi, bua ne balumbuluishibua bilondeshila bienzedi biabu.
27.16: Ne nebilua ne, ewu yonsu udi ukudimuna mutshima ne utambuishibua mu dîna dianyi neuwujibua; ne biananukilaye tô ne ku ndekelu, monayi, yeya ntshiakumupîsha to kumpala kua Tatu wanyi ku dituku adi pangimana bua kulumbuluisha ba pa buloba.
27.17: Ne udi kayi unanukila tô ne ku ndekelu to, yeya ki udi kabidi upudibua ne wedibua mu kapia, kudibu kabayi mua kupingana kabidi to, bua bululama bua Tatu.
27.18: Ne edi didi dîyi diakambilaye bana ba bantu. Ne bua bualu ebu udi ukumbaja mêyi avuaye mubambila, ne kena ushima to, kadi udi ukumbaja mêyi enda onsu.
27.19: Ne tshintu tshia bukoya nansha tshimua katshiena mua kubuela mu bukalenga buenda to; bua nanku tshintu nansha tshimua katshiena tshibuela mu dienda to amu pa kumbusha badi basukula bilamba biabu mu mashi anyi, bua ditabuja diabu, ne dikudimuna dia mutshima bua mibi yabu yonsu, ne lulamatu luabu ne ku ndekelu.
27.20: Mpindiewu etshi ki mukenji: Kudimunayi mutshima, nuenu ndekelu ya buloba yonsu, ne luayi kundi ne nutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, bua ne nujididibua ku dipeta dia Nyuma wa Tshijila, bua ne kanuikadi ne ditoba kumpala kuanyi ku dituku dia ndekelu to.
27.21: Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nnuambila ne, elu ludi lumu luimpa luanyi; ne nudi bamanya bintu binudi ne tshia kuenza mu ekelezia wanyi; bualu midimu inuammonyi ngenza ayi nenuyenza penu; bualu tshinuamonyi ngenza mena atshi nenutshienza;
27.22: Bua nanku, panuenza bintu ebi nudi babeneshibua, bualu nenubandishibua ku dituku dia ndekelu.
27.23: Fundayi malu anuamonyi ne anumvu, pa kumbusha adi makandikibua.
27.24: Fundayi bienzedi bia bantu aba, bikalaku, mena bu mudibi bifundibua bua ebi bivua bienzeka.
27.25: Bualu monayi, bantu aba nebalumbuluishibua mu mikanda ivua mifundibua, ne yafundibua, bualu ku yoyi, bienzedi biabu nebimanyika kudi bantu.
27.26: Ne monayi, bintu bionsu bidi bifundibua kudi Tatu; bua nanku ba pa buloba nebalumbuluishibua mu mikanda yafundibua.
27.27: Ne manyayi ne nenuikala balumbuluishi ba bantu aba, bilondeshila ku tshilumbuluilu tshinganupesha, tshikala tshiakana. Bua nanku, mushindu kayi wa bantu unudi ne tshia kuikala? Bulelela ndi nnuambila, mena bu mundi.
27.28: Ne mpindiewu ndi nya kudi Tatu. Ne bulelela ndi nnuambila ne, bintu bionsu binualomba Tatu mu dîna dianyi, nebifidibua kunudi.
27.29: Bua nanku, lombayi, ne nenupeta; kokolayi, ne netshiunzuludibua kunudi; bualu udi ulomba, udi upeta; ne udi ukokola, netshiunzuludibua.
27.30: Ne mpindiewu, monayi, disanka dianyi dinena, mena ne ku tshiwudi tshia disanka, bua bualu buenu, ne bua lukongu lua bantu elu kabidi; eyowa, ne Tatu mena udi usanka, ne banjelu bansantu bonsu kabidi, bualu buenu ne bua lukongu lua bantu elu; bualu nansha umua wabu kena mujimina to.
27.31: Monayi, ndi musua ne numvua; bualu bua ndi ngamba bua ba lukongu lua bantu elu badi ne moyo mpindiewu; ne nansha umua wabu kena mujimina to; ne ndi ne tshiwudi tshia disanka buabu.
27.32: Kadi monayi, bidi binyingalaja bua lukongu lua bantu luinâyi kumbukila ku lukongu lua bantu elu, bualu badi balombolodibua bakuatshibu kudiye mena bu muvua muana wa dibutuka; bualu nebampana bua mpalata ne ngolo, ne bua tshidi musuasua ubipisha ne tshidi bivi babuela ne bîba atshi. Ne mu dituku adi nembanyoka, mena mu kupingaja kua bienzedi biabu pa mitu yabu nkayabu.
27.33: Ne biakalua ne pakajikija Yezu mêyi â wakambila bayidi benda ne: Buelelayi ku tshibuelelu tshifinakana; tshibuelelu tshidi tshifinakana, ne njila udi mubumbakana ki udi ulombola ku moyo, ne kudi bakesa badi bamumona; kadi tshibuelelu tshialabakana, ne njila udi munena ki udi ulombola ku lufu, ne kudi ba bungi badi bendelamu, tô ne padi butuku bulua, budi muntu nansha umua kayi mua kuenza mudimu to.

28.1: Ne biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â, wakambila bayidi benda, ku muntu ku muntu, ubambila ne: Nudi nujinga tshinyi kundi, kunyima kua pangikala muya kudi Tatu?
28.2: Ne bakamba bonsu, amu pa kumbusha basatu, bamba ne: Tudi tujinga ne kunyima kua tuetu bashala ne moyo tô ne ku bidimu bia bu muntu, ne disadila dietu, diwudi mutubikidila, ujika, bua tulua kûdi lukasa mu bukalenga bueba.
28.3: Ne wakabambila ne: Nudi babeneshibua bualu nuajingi tshintu etshi kundi; bua nanku, kunyima kua nuenu bakumbaja bidimu makumi muanda muteketa ne bibidi nenulua kundi mu bukalenga buanyi; ne nenupeta dikisha kundi.
28.4: Ne pakabambilaye nanku, wakakudimuka kudi basatu, ne wakabambila ne: Nudi basua ne nnuenzela tshinyi, pangikala muya kudi Tatu?
28.5: Ne bakanyingalala mu mitshima yabu, bualu kabakidikija bua kumuambila tshintu tshivuabu bajinga to.
28.6: Ne wakabambila ne: Monayi, ndi mumanya meji enu, ne nudi nujinga tshintu tshivua Yone, munanga wanyi, uvua nanyi mu disadila dianyi, mujinga kundi kumpala kua mema kubandishibua kûlu kudi Bena Yuda.
28.7: Bua nanku, nudi babeneshibua nangananga, bualu kanuakulabula lufu nansha; kadi nenuikala ne moyo bua kumona malu onsu adi Tatu wenzela bana ba bantu, mena tô ne pâkumbajibua bintu bionsu bilondeshila ku disua dia Tatu, pangalua mu butumbi buanyi ne bukola bua mu diûlu.
28.8: Ne kanuakukenga ne makenga a lufu nansha; kadi pangalua mu butumbi buanyi nenushintuludibua mu mupodi wa disu kumbuka ku mubidi wa tshifuaka kulua ku mubidi udi kawuyi ufua; pashisha nenubeneshibua mu bukalenga bua Tatuanyi.
28.9: Ne kabidi, kanuakukenga panutshidi mu musunyi to, anyi kanyinganyinga amu pa kumbusha bikala bua mibi ya ba pa buloba; ne nengenza bionsu ebi bua tshintu tshinuajingi kundi, bualu nuajingi ne nutuala anyima ya bantu kundi, pikala buloba butshidiku.
28.10: Ne bua bualu ebu nenupeta tshiwudi tshia disanka; ne nenusomba mu bukalenga bua Tatu wanyi; eyowa, disanka dienu nedikala diwula ntenta, mena bu muakampesha Tatu tshiwudi tshia disanka; ne nenuikala mena bu mundi muikala, ne ndi muikala bu mudi Tatu muikala; ne Tatu ne mema tudi tshintu tshimua;
28.11: Ne Nyuma wa Tshijila udi ujadikilamu bua Tatu ne buanyi; ne Tatu udi upesha bana ba bantu Nyuma wa Tshijila, bua bualu buanyi.
28.12: Ne biakalua ne pakamba Yezu mêyi â, wakalenga muntu wa kudibu yonsu ne munu wenda amu pa kumbusha basatu bavua ne tshia kushala, ne pashisha wakaya.
28.13: Ne monayi, diûlu diakunzuluka, ne bakabandishibua mu diûlu, ne bakamona ne bakumvua bintu bintu bivuabu kabayi mua kuamba to.
28.14: Ne bavua bakandikibua ne kabakudi to; anyi kabavua bapeshibua bukôkeshi bua kuakula malu akamonabu ne kumvuabu to;
28.15: Ne kabavua bamanya to ne bavua mu mubidi anyi ne kabavua mu mubidi; bualu bivua bimueneka kudibu bu mudi dikudimuka diabu, bua ne bakashintuluka kumbuka ku mubidi wa musunyi ewu ne kuya mu ngikadilu udi kayi ufua, bua ne bavua mua kumona malu a Nzambi.
28.16: Kadi biakalua ne bakalongesha kabidi pa mpala wa buloba; nansha nanku kabakalongesha bintu bivuabu bumvua ne bamona to, bua mukenji uvua mubapeshibua mu diûlu.
28.17: Ne mpindiewu, ne bavua ba tshifuaka anyi kabayi bafua, kumbukila ku dituku dia dikudimuka diabu, ntshiena mumanya to;
28.18: Kadi ndi mumanya nanku, bilondeshila ku miandiku ivua mifidibua—bavua baya pa mpala wa bulaba, ne bavua basadila bantu bonsu, basangisha bantu bonsu bavua bitabuja ku diyisha diabu mu ekelezia; babatambuisha, ne bonsu bakatambuishibua bakapeta Nyuma wa Tshijila.
28.19: Ne bakedibua mu buloko kudi bavua kabayi bikala bena mu ekelezia to. Ne maloko kâvua mua kubalama to, bualu akapanduluka mu bitupa bibidi.
28.20: Ne bakabela munda mua buloba; kadi bakatûta buloba ne dîyi dia Nzambi, mu mushindu ne ku bukola buenda bakapatuishibua mu ndondu wa buloba; ne bua nanku kabavua mua kumbula bina bila bivua bikumbana bua kubakuata to.
28.21: Ne bakabela misangu isatu mu tshikutu tshia kapia ne kabakôshika nansha kakesa to.
28.22: Ne bakabela misangu ibidi mu buina bua nyama ya lonji; ne monayi bakanaya ne nyama bu mudi muana ne muana wa mukoku utshidi wâmua, ne kabakapetakana ne bualu nansha bumua to.
28.23: Ne biakalua ne bakaya nanku munkatshi mua bantu bonsu ba Nefi, ne bakayisha lumu luimpa lua Kilisto kudi bantu bonsu pa mpala wa bulaba; ne bakakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga, ne bakadisangisha ku ekelezia wa Kilisto, ne nanku bantu ba tshikondu atshi bakabeneshibua, bilondeshila ku dîyi dia Yezu.
28.24: Ne mpindiewu mema, Molomo, ngajikiji kuakula bitangila bintu ebi bua mutantshi wa diba mukesa.
28.25: Monayi, mvua pabuipi ne kufunda mêna a bavua kabayi ne tshia kulabula lufu nansha abu, kadi Mukalenga wakakandika; bua nanku ntshiena ngafunda to, bualu adi masokokibua kudi ba pa buloba.
28.27: Ne bulelela nebikala munkatshi mua Bena Bisamba bia Benda, ne Bena Bisamba bia Benda kabakubamanya to.
28.28: Nebikala kabidi munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, ne Bena Yuda kabakubamanya to.
28.29: Ne nebilua ne, pamona Mukalenga mu lungenyi luenda ne bidi bikumbana ne basadila bîsa bionsu bia Isalele bidi bikala bitangalaka, ne bisamba bionsu, bîsa bionsu, miakulu yonsu, ne bantu bonsu, ne nebatuala anyima ya bungi kudi Yezu, bua ne dijinga diabu dikumbajibua, ne kabidi bua bukola budi buitabujija bua Nzambi budi buikala munda muabu.
28.30: Ne badi bikala bu mudi banjelu ba Nzambi, ne pikalabu basambila Tatu mu dîna dia Yezu badi mua kudileja kudi muntu yonsu mudibi bibalengelela.
28.31: Bua nanku, nebenza midimu minena ne ya dikema, kumpala kua dituku dinena ne dilualua diba dikala bantu bonsu bushuwa ne tshia kuimana kumpala kua nkuasa wa tshilumbuluilu wa Kilisto;
28.32: Eyowa nebenza mena mudimu munena ne wa dikema munkatshi mua Bena Bisamba bia Benda, kumpala kua dituku dia tshilumbuluilu.
28.33: Ne bu nuenu ne mifundu yonsu idi ilonda mulubu wa midimu ya dikema yonsu ya Kilisto, nuvua kumanya bushuwa ne malu â adi ne tshia kulua, bilondeshila ku miaku ya Kilisto.
28.34: Ne diakabi dikala kudi udi ubenga kumvuila miaku ya Yezu, ne kabidi ya aba badiye musungula ne mutuma munkatshi muabu; bualu ewu yonsu udi kayi witaba miaku ya Yezu ne miaku ya badiye mutuma to kena umuitaba to; ne bua nanku kakubitaba ku dituku dia ndekelu to;
28.35: Ne bivua mua kuikala bimpa buabu bu bobu kabayi baledibua to. Bualu nudi nutshinka ne nudi mua kumbusha bululama bua Nzambi udi mufîka munda, udibu badiatakaja mu makasa a bantu, bua nanku lupandu lulua anyi?
28.36: Ne mpindiewu monayi, bu mumvua ngamba bitangila bavua Mukalenga musungula, eyowa, mena basatu bavua babandishibua mu diûlu, ne ntshivua mumanya ne bavua bakezudibua ku moyo wa tshifuaka bua kulua ku moyo udi kawuyi ufua to—
28.37: Kadi monayi, katshia ngafunda, ndi muebeja Mukalenga, ne wakandeja ne dishintuluka divua ne tshia kuenzeka pa mibidi yabu, anyi bivua bikengela ne bavua ne tshia kulabula lufu;
28.38: Bua nanku, bua ne kabalabudi lufu to kuvua dishintuluka divua dibenzekela pambidi pabu, bua kabakengi anyi kabanyingaladi to, amu pa kumbusha bua mibi ya ba pa buloba.
28.39: Mpindiewu dishintuluka edi kadivua dia momumua ne dienzeka ku dituku dia ndekelu to; kadi kuvua dishintuluka diakenzeka kudibu, mua ne Satana kavua mua kuikala ne bukola pa mutu pabu to, bua ne kavua mua kubatêta to; ne bavua bajididibua mu musunyi, bua ne bakalua bansantu, ne bua ne makola a pa buloba ka’ikadi mua kubakanda to.
28.40: Ne mu ngikadilu ewu bavua ne tshia kushala tô ne dituku dia tshilumbuluilu dia Kilisto; ne mu dituku adi bavua ne tshia kupeta dishintuluka dipita bunena, ne bua kuakidibua mu bukalenga bua Tatu, bua kabayi mua kumupatuka kabidi to, kadi bua kusomba ne Nzambi tshiendelela mu diûlu.

29.1: Ne mpindiewu monayi, ndi nnuambila ne pâmona Mukalenga, mu lungenyi luenda, ne bidi bikumbana bua miaku eyi ilua kudi Bena Bisamba bia Benda bilondeshila ku muaku wenda, pashisha numanya ne tshipungidi tshiakenza Tatu ne bana ba Isalele, bitangila dipingaja diabu ku malaba a bupianyi buabu, tshikadi tshimana kubanga kukumbajibua.
29.2: Ne nenumanya ne mêyi a Mukalenga, avua baprofete bansantu bakula, neakumbajibua onsu; ne kanujingi bua kuamba ne Mukalenga udi unengesha dilua dienda kudi bana ba Isalele to.
29.3: Ne kanujingi bua kuela meji mu mitshima yenu ne mêyi anganuambidi adi mikala a tshianana to, bualu monayi, Mukalenga neavuluka tshipungidi tshienda tshivuaye muenza ne bantu benda ba ku nzubu wa Isalele.
29.4: Ne panuamona miaku eyi ilua munkatshi muenu, pashisha kanujingi kabidi bua kupetula midimu ya Mukalenga to, bualu muela wa mvita wa bululama buenda udi mu tshianza tshienda tshia baluma; ne monayi, mu dituku adi, panuapetula midimu yenda neenzeja ne unukuata katataka.
29.5: Diakabi dikala kudi udi upetula midimu ya Mukalenga; eyowa, diakabi kudi wavila Kilisto ne midimu yenda!
29.6: Eyowa, diakabi kudi wavila mabuluila a Mukalenga, ne wamba ne Mukalenga katshiena wenza mudimu ku dibuluila, anyi ku dîyi dia buprofete, anyi ku mapa, anyi ku miakulu, anyi ku londapu, anyi ku bukola bua Nyuma wa Tshijila to!
29.7: Eyowa, ne diakabi kudi wamba mu dituku adi, bua kupeta makasa, ne kakuena tshishima tshidi Yezu Kilisto mua kuenza to; bualu udi wenza nealua bu mudi muana wa dibutuka, bualu buenda kakuvua lusa to, bilondeshila ku muaku wa Kilisto!
29.8: Eyowa, ne kanujingi kabidi bua kuneka, anyi kupetula, anyi kunayila Bena Yuda, anyi tshishadila tshia nzubu wa Isalele to; bualu monayi, Mukalenga udi uvuluka tshipungidi tshienda kudibu, ne neabenzela bilondeshila muvuaye muditshipa.
29.9: Bua nanku kanujingi kutshinka ne nudi mua kukudimuna tshianza tshia baluma tshia Mukalenga ku dia bakaji to, bua kateki tshilumbuluilu tshiakana bua kukumbaja kua tshipungidi tshiakenzaye ne nzubu wa Isalele to.

30.1: Telejayi, Ô nuenu Bena Bisamba bia Benda, ne umvuayi miaku ya Yezu Kilisto, Muana wa Nzambi wa moyo, idiye mumpeshela mukenji bua ngakula binutangila, bualu, monayi udi mumpesha mukenji ne mfunda, wamba ne:
30.2: Kudimukayi, nuenu Bena Bisamba bia Benda bonsu, ku njila yenu ya bubi; ne kudimunayi mutshima bua midimu yenu mibi, ku mafi enu ne didinga, ne ku masandi enu, ne malu mapita bubi enu a mu musokoku, ne ditendelela dienu dia mpingu, ne ku dishibeya dia bantu dienu, ne buakuidi bua mafi buenu, ne malakana enu, ne luntûta luenu lua bungi, ne ku bubi buenu bonsu ne malu mapita bubi enu, ne nulua kundi, ne nutambuishibua mu dîna dianyi, bua nupeta dilekedibua dia mibi yenu, ne nuwujibua ne Nyuma wa Tshijila, bua nubadibua ne bantu banyi badi bikala ba ku nzubu wa Isalele.

1.intro: Mulubu wa bantu ba Nefi, bilondeshila ku miandiku yenda.
1.1: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshinâyi tshiakapita, ne kabidi tshia makumi asatu ne tshitânu, ne monayi bayidi ba Yezu bakenza ekelezia wa Kilisto mu bulaba bonsu ku mpenga yonsu. Ne bonsu bakalua kudibu, ne bakakudimuna mutshima bua mibi yabu bulelela, bakatambuishibua mu dîna dia Yezu; ne bakapeta kabidi Nyuma wa Tshijila.
1.2: Ne biakalua ne mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshisambombo, bantu bonsu bakakudimuna moyo kudi Mukalenga, pa mpala yonsu wa bulaba, Bena Nefi ne Bena Lamana, ne kakuvua makokangana anyi matandu munkatshi muabu to, ne bantu bonsu bakasomba mu bululama muntu ne mukuenda.
1.3: Ne bavua basangisha bintu biabu bionsu pamua; bua nanku kakuvua mubanji ne mupela, mupika ne mudikadila to, kadi bakavuijibua bonsu badikadila, ne bapetshi ba dipa dia mu diûlu.
1.4: Ne biakalua ne tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshia muanda muteketa tshiakapita kabidi, ne ditalala ditshivua ditungunuka mu bulaba.
1.5: Ne kuvua midimu minena ne ya dikema yakenza bayidi ba Yezu, mua ne bakôndopa babêdi, ne bakajula bafua, ne bakendesha balema, ne bakatabadija mpofu, ne bapata matshi bakumvua; ne bakenza bishima bia mishindu yonsu munkatshi mua bana ba bantu; ne bakenza bishima to amu pa kumbusha mu dîna dia Yezu.
1.6: Ne ki muakapita tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu nanku, ne kabidi tshidimu tshia makumi asatu ne tshitema, ne tshia makumi anayi ne tshimua, ne tshia makumi anayi ne tshibîdi, eyowa, mena tô ne tshidimu tshia makumi anayi ne tshitema biakapita, ne kabidi tshidimu tshia makumi atanu ne tshimua, ne tshia makumi atanu ne tshibîdi; eyowa, mena tô ne tshidimu tshia makumi atanu ne tshitema tshiakapita.
1.7: Ne Mukalenga wakabalubuluja mu bulaba; eyowa, mua ne bakibaka bimenga kabidi pa miaba ivua bimenga bikala biôshibua.
1.8: Eyowa, mena tshimenga tshinena tshia Zalahemela atshi bakatshibakisha kabidi.
1.9: Kadi kuvua bimenga bia bungi bivua bidîna, ne mâyi akalua pa muaba wabi; bua nanku bimenga ebi kabivua mua kuibakishibua kabidi to.
1.10: Ne mpindiewu, monayi, biakalua ne bantu ba Nefi bakakolakana, ne bakavulangana lukasa menamena, ne bakalua bantu balengela ne basanguluka menamena.
1.11: Ne bavua basela, ne bavua baselesha, ne bavua babeneshibua bilondeshila ku milayi ya bungi ivua Mukalenga mubalaya.
